verses.en: Looking all over the world and through all ages, I find no one who has understood My heart.
verses.ro: yorozuyo no sekai ichiretsu miharasedo   mune no wakarita mono wa nai kara
verses.jp_1: よろつよのせかい一れつみはらせど
verses.jp_2: むねのハかりたものハないから

verses.en: So should it be, for I have never taught it to you. It is natural that you know nothing.
verses.ro: sono hazu ya toite kikashita koto wa nai   nanimo shiran ga muri de nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: そのはづやといてきかした事ハない
verses.jp_2: なにもしらんがむりでないそや

verses.en: At this time, I, God, reveal Myself and teach the truth of all things in detail.
verses.ro: konotabi wa Kami ga omote i arawarete   nanika isai o toite kikasuru
verses.jp_1: このたびハ神がをもていあらハれて
verses.jp_2: なにかいさいをといてきかする

verses.en: You are calling this place the Jiba, the Residence of God, in Yamato, but you may not know the origin.
verses.ro: kono tokoro Yamato no Jiba no kamigata to   yute iredomo moto wa shiromai
verses.jp_1: このところやまとのしバのかみがたと
verses.jp_2: ゆうていれども元ハしろまい

verses.en: When you learn of this origin in full, a great yearning will come over you, whoever you may be.
verses.ro: kono moto o kuwashiku kiita koto naraba   ikana mono demo mina koishi naru
verses.jp_1: このもとをくハしくきいた事ならバ
verses.jp_2: いかなものでもみなこいしなる

verses.en: If you wish to know and will come to Me, I shall teach you the original cause of all things.
verses.ro: kiki takuba tazune kuru nara yute kikaso   yorozu isai no moto no innen
verses.jp_1: きゝたくバたつねくるならゆてきかそ
verses.jp_2: よろづいさいのもとのいんねん

verses.en: As God is revealed and teaches the truth of all things in detail, the minds of all in the world will become spirited.
verses.ro: Kami ga dete nanika isai o toku naraba   sekai ichiretsu kokoro isamuru
verses.jp_1: かみがでてなにかいさいをとくならバ
verses.jp_2: せかい一れつ心いさむる

verses.en: As I am in haste to save all of you quickly, I set out to make all minds in the world spirited.
verses.ro: ichiretsu ni hayaku tasuke o isogu kara   sekai no kokoro isame kakarite
verses.jp_1: いちれつにはやくたすけをいそぐから
verses.jp_2: せかいの心いさめかゝりて

verses.en: As your minds become spirited step by step, there shall be rich harvests and prosperity everywhere.
verses.ro: dandan to kokoro isande kuru naraba   sekai yononaka tokoro hanjo
verses.jp_1: だん／＼と心いさんてくるならバ
verses.jp_2: せかいよのなかところはんじよ

verses.en: Hereafter, I shall teach you the hand movements of the Kagura Service and wait for all to assemble and perform it.
verses.ro: konosaki wa Kagura-zutome no te o tsukete   minna sorote Tsutome matsu nari
verses.jp_1: このさきハかくらづとめのてをつけて
verses.jp_2: みんなそろふてつとめまつなり

verses.en: When all are assembled and quickly do the Service, as those close to Me become spirited, God, also, will be spirited.
verses.ro: mina sorote hayaku Tsutome o suru naraba   soba ga isameba Kami mo isamuru
verses.jp_1: みなそろてはやくつとめをするならバ
verses.jp_2: そばがいさめバ神もいさむる

verses.en: When the mind of God is depressed over everything, the growth of all crops will be depressed, too.
verses.ro: ichiretsu ni Kami no kokoro ga izumu nara   mono no ryuke ga mina izumu nari
verses.jp_1: いちれつに神の心がいづむなら
verses.jp_2: ものゝりうけかみないつむなり

verses.en: The mind that causes depressed crops is pitiful. Quickly become spirited so that the crops are not depressed.
verses.ro: ryukei no izumu kokoro wa kinodoku ya   izuman yo to hayaku isame yo
verses.jp_1: りうけいのいつむ心ハきのとくや
verses.jp_2: いづまんよふとはやくいさめよ

verses.en: If you wish that the crops grow spiritedly, do the Kagura Service and the Teodori.
verses.ro: ryukei ga isami deru yo to omou nara   Kagura-zutome ya Teodori o seyo
verses.jp_1: りうけいがいさみでるよとをもうなら
verses.jp_2: かぐらつとめやてをとりをせよ

verses.en: At this time, begin the Teodori quickly. That will be the sign for miraculous things to come.
verses.ro: konotabi wa hayaku Teodori hajime kake   kore ga aizu no fushigi naru zo ya
verses.jp_1: このたびハはやくてをどりはじめかけ
verses.jp_2: これがあいずのふしきなるそや

verses.en: Speaking of the sign and miracles, they are not yet seen. When the day arrives, you will understand clearly.
verses.ro: kono aizu fushigi to yute miete nai   sono hi kitareba tashika wakaru zo
verses.jp_1: このあいずふしぎとゆうてみへてない
verses.jp_2: そのひきたれバたしかハかるぞ

verses.en: When the day arrives and understanding comes, whoever you may be, you will all be filled with admiration.
verses.ro: sono hi kite nanika wakari ga tsuita nara   ikana mono demo mina ga kanshin
verses.jp_1: そのひきてなにかハかりがついたなら
verses.jp_2: いかなものてもみながかんしん

verses.en: To teach of things after they appear is the way of the world. I teach of things before they appear.
verses.ro: miete kara toite kakaru wa sekainami   mien saki kara toite oku zo ya
verses.jp_1: みへてからといてかゝるハせかいなみ
verses.jp_2: みへんさきからといてをくそや

verses.en: Hereafter, I desire that those in high places gradually calm their minds and make peace.
verses.ro: konosaki wa kami taru kokoro dandan to   kokoro shizumete waboku naru yo
verses.jp_1: このさきハ上たる心たん／＼と
verses.jp_2: 心しづめてハぶくなるよふ

verses.en: This peace may seem difficult to attain, but it will come step by step through God's protection.
verses.ro: kono waboku mutsukashi yoni aru keredo   dandan Kami ga shugo suru nari
verses.jp_1: このハほくむつかしよふにあるけれと
verses.jp_2: だん／＼神がしゆこするなり

verses.en: This is a world constructed on reason. So I shall press upon you everything with the reason in verse.
verses.ro: kono yo wa rii de semetaru sekai nari   nanika yorozu o uta no ri de seme
verses.jp_1: このよふハりいでせめたるせかいなり
verses.jp_2: なにかよろづを歌のりでせめ

verses.en: I shall press, though not by force or word of mouth. I shall press by the tip of My writing brush.
verses.ro: semeru tote tezashi suru dewa nai hadoni   kuchi demo yuwan fudesaki no seme
verses.jp_1: せめるとててざしするでハないほどに
verses.jp_2: くちでもゆハんふでさきのせめ

verses.en: It is all very well if you err in nothing. But should you err, I shall inform you by verse.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo chigawan koto wa yokeredomo   chigai aru nara uta de shirasuru
verses.jp_1: なにもかもちがハん事ハよけれども
verses.jp_2: ちがいあるなら歌でしらする

verses.en: I pity you when My warnings become manifest. Know that any illness is from the mind.
verses.ro: shirashitara araware deru wa kinodoku ya   ikana yamai mo kokoro kara tote
verses.jp_1: しらしたらあらハれでるハきのどくや
verses.jp_2: いかなやまいも心からとて

verses.en: What you are calling an illness is not an ordinary one. It is the anger of God now being shown.
verses.ro: yamai tote sekainami dewa nai hodoni   Kami no rippuku imazo arawasu
verses.jp_1: やまいとてせかいなみでハないほどに
verses.jp_2: 神のりいふくいまぞあらハす

verses.en: Because you have not obeyed the words of God even until now, I could not avoid showing it.
verses.ro: imamade mo Kami no yu koto kikan kara   zehi naku omote arawashita nari
verses.jp_1: いまゝでも神のゆう事きかんから
verses.jp_2: ぜひなくをもてあらハしたなり

verses.en: So much of God's regret is now being shown, the matter is beyond the help of doctors and medicines.
verses.ro: kora hodono Kami no zannen deteru kara   isha mo kusuri mo kore wa kanawan
verses.jp_1: こらほどの神のざんねんでてるから
verses.jp_2: いしやもくすりもこれハかなハん

verses.en: Never think of this one matter as being ordinary. By all means, I shall admonish you with My verses.
verses.ro: kore bakari hitonami ya towa omouna yo   nandemo kore wa uta de semekiru
verses.jp_1: これハかりひとなみやとハをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: なんてもこれハ歌でせめきる

verses.en: This time, I shall clean the Residence thoroughly. Watch, as I show you how.
verses.ro: konotabi wa yashiki no soji sukiyaka ni   shitatete miseru kore o mite kure
verses.jp_1: このたびハやしきのそふじすきやかに
verses.jp_2: したゝてみせるこれをみてくれ

verses.en: When this cleaning is thoroughly done, the truth shall be known and it will be told and retold.
verses.ro: soji sai sukiyaka shitaru koto naraba   shirite hanashite hanashi suru nari
verses.jp_1: そふじさいすきやかしたる事ならバ
verses.jp_2: しりてはなしてはなしするなり

verses.en: What is the cause of My regret thus far? The lameness of your leg is My prime regret.
verses.ro: koremade no zannen naru wa nanino koto   ashi no chinba ga ichi no zannen
verses.jp_1: これまでのざんねんなるハなにの事
verses.jp_2: あしのちんばが一のさんねん

verses.en: You are saying that your leg is affected by illness. It is not an illness but the anger of God.
verses.ro: kono ashi wa yamai to yute iru keredo   yamai dewa nai Kami no rippuku
verses.jp_1: このあしハやまいとゆうているけれど
verses.jp_2: やまいでハない神のりいふく

verses.en: My anger is not a small matter. It is the result of causes accumulated and piled up.
verses.ro: rippuku mo chotto no koto dewa nai hodoni   tsumori kasanari yue no koto nari
verses.jp_1: りいふくも一寸の事でハないほどに
verses.jp_2: つもりかさなりゆへの事なり

verses.en: To say why it is that I am angry: it is because the wrongdoing has not been removed.
verses.ro: rippuku mo naniyue naru to yu naraba   akuji ga nokan yue no koto nari
verses.jp_1: りいふくもなにゆへなるどゆうならハ
verses.jp_2: あくじがのかんゆへの事なり

verses.en: Unless this wrongdoing is completely removed, know that it will stand in the way of the construction.
verses.ro: kono akuji sukiyaka noken koto nitewa   fushin no jama ni naru to koso shire
verses.jp_1: このあくじすきやかのけん事にてハ
verses.jp_2: ふしんのしやまになるとこそしれ

verses.en: No matter how stubborn this wrongdoing may be, it will be removed by the admonishment of God.
verses.ro: kono akuji nanbo shibutoi mono ya tote   Kami ga semekiri nokete miseru de
verses.jp_1: このあくじなんぼしぶといものやどて
verses.jp_2: 神がせめきりのけてみせるで

verses.en: If this wrongdoing is completely cleared away, the lameness of your leg, also, will be cleared away.
verses.ro: kono akuji sukiyaka noketa koto naraba   ashi no chinba mo sukiyaka to naru
verses.jp_1: このあくじすきやかのけた事ならバ
verses.jp_2: あしのちんばもすきやかとなる

verses.en: If only your leg is made completely well, nothing will remain but to prepare for the construction.
verses.ro: ashi saika sukiyaka naori shita naraba   ato wa fushin no moyo bakari o
verses.jp_1: あしさいかすきやかなをりしたならバ
verses.jp_2: あとハふしんのもよふハかりを

verses.en: Just a word: returning her by the thirtieth of the first month is also from the mind of God.
verses.ro: choto hanashi shogatsu misoka to hi o kirite   okuru mo Kami no kokoro kara tote
verses.jp_1: 一寸はなし正月三十日とひをきりて
verses.jp_2: をくるも神の心からとて

verses.en: You close to Me may question what I do. This is because you do not know the future.
verses.ro: soba na mono nani goto suru to omoedomo   saki naru koto o shiran yue nari
verses.jp_1: そバなものなに事するとをもへども
verses.jp_2: さきなる事をしらんゆへなり

verses.en: When the day arrives and things are seen, you close to Me will know that God's words never err.
verses.ro: sono hi kite mietaru naraba soba na mono   Kami no yu koto nanimo chigawan
verses.jp_1: そのひきてみへたるならバそばなもの
verses.jp_2: 神のゆう事なにもちがハん

verses.en: Until now, you have doubted the words of God. You have been saying that they are all false.
verses.ro: imamade wa Kami no yu koto utagote   nanimo uso ya to yute ita nari
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハ神のゆう事うたこふて
verses.jp_2: なにもうそやとゆうていたなり

verses.en: Among the words of God, who began this world, there is not even a single mistake in a thousand.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimeta Kami no yu koto ni   sen ni hitotsu mo chigau koto nashi
verses.jp_1: このよふをはじめた神のゆう事に
verses.jp_2: せんに一つもちがう事なし

verses.en: If you begin to see this step by step, be convinced. Every kind of mind will all be revealed.
verses.ro: dandan to miete kita nara tokushin se   ikana kokoro mo mina arawareru
verses.jp_1: だん／＼とみへてきたならとくしんせ
verses.jp_2: いかな心もみなあらハれる

verses.en: Looking all over the world and through all ages, I see various paths of life.
verses.ro: yorozuyo no sekaiju o miwataseba   michi no shidai mo iroiro ni aru
verses.jp_1: よろづよのせかいぢふうをみハたせバ
verses.jp_2: みちのしだいもいろ／＼にある

verses.en: Hereafter, I shall speak in the metaphor of a path, not indicating any place in particular.
verses.ro: konosaki wa michi ni tatoete hanashi suru   doko no koto tomo sarani yuwan de
verses.jp_1: このさきハみちにたとへてはなしする
verses.jp_2: どこの事ともさらにゆハんで

verses.en: Over steep mountains, through tangles of thorns, along narrow ledges, and through brandished swords, if you come,
verses.ro: yamasaka ya ibara guro mo gakemichi mo   tsurugi no naka mo torinuke tara
verses.jp_1: やまさかやいばらぐろふもがけみちも
verses.jp_2: つるぎのなかもとふりぬけたら

verses.en: Yet ahead through a sea of flames and a deep abyss, you will arrive at a narrow lane.
verses.ro: mada mieru hi no naka mo ari fuchinaka mo   sore o koshitara hosoi michi ari
verses.jp_1: まだみへるひのなかもありふちなかも
verses.jp_2: それをこしたらほそいみちあり

verses.en: After following the narrow lane step by step, you will come to a broad way. This is the trustworthy main path.
verses.ro: hosomichi o dandan koseba omichi ya   kore ga tashikana honmichi de aru
verses.jp_1: ほそみちをだん／＼こせばをふみちや
verses.jp_2: これがたしかなほんみちである

verses.en: This talk is not someone else's concern. It is a matter of your own and your single-heartedness with God.
verses.ro: kono hanashi hoka no koto dewa nai hodoni   Kami ichijo de kore waga koto
verses.jp_1: このはなしほかの事でわないほとに
verses.jp_2: 神一ぢよでこれわが事

verses.en: Until now, I have spoken solely about matters within. Now, I shall change the topic.
verses.ro: imamade wa uchi naru koto o bakari nari   mo korekara wa monku kawaru zo
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハうちなる事をばかりなり
verses.jp_2: もふこれからハもんくかハるぞ

verses.en: Looking all over the world and through all ages, I find no one who is evil.
verses.ro: yorozuyo ni sekai no tokoro miwatasedo   ashiki no mono wa sara ni nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: よろづよにせかいのところみハたせど
verses.jp_2: あしきのものハさらにないぞや

verses.en: Among all humankind, there is no one who is evil. It is only a bit of dust stuck on.
verses.ro: ichiretsu ni ashiki to yute nai keredo   choto no hokori ga tsuita yue nari
verses.jp_1: 一れつにあしきとゆうてないけれど
verses.jp_2: 一寸のほこりがついたゆへなり

verses.en: Hereafter, calm your minds and ponder. Make sure you will not be remorseful later.
verses.ro: konosaki wa kokoro shizumete shiyan seyo   ato de kokwai naki yoni seyo
verses.jp_1: このさきハ心しづめてしやんせよ
verses.jp_2: あとでこふくハいなきよふにせよ

verses.en: Long have you wandered on your path until now. You must be very tired of it.
verses.ro: imamade wa nagai dochu michisugara   yohodo taikutsu shita de aro na
verses.jp_1: いまゝてハながいどふちふみちすがら
verses.jp_2: よほどたいくつしたであろをな

verses.en: Finally this time, a trustworthy place of worship has begun to appear. Be convinced of it!
verses.ro: konotabi wa mo tashika naru mairisho   miete kita zoe tokushin o seyo
verses.jp_1: このたびハもふたしかなるまいりしよ
verses.jp_2: みへてきたぞへとくしんをせよ

verses.en: From now on, I shall teach you about the long journey of humankind. Ponder over it firmly!
verses.ro: korekara wa nagai dochu michisugara   toite kikasuru tokuto shiyan o
verses.jp_1: これからハながいどふちふみちすがら
verses.jp_2: といてきかするとくとしやんを

verses.en: Hereafter, I shall arrange for the settling of matters within. The mind of God is hastening it.
verses.ro: konosaki wa uchi o osameru moyodate   Kami no ho niwa kokoro sekikomu
verses.jp_1: このさきハうちをおさめるもよふだて
verses.jp_2: 神のほふにハ心せきこむ

verses.en: Please listen to what God tells you step by step, for I shall never tell you anything wrong.
verses.ro: dandan to Kami no yu koto kiite kure   ashiki no koto wa sarani yuwan de
verses.jp_1: だん／＼と神のゆふ事きいてくれ
verses.jp_2: あしきのことハさらにゆハんで

verses.en: You say that you wish to train the child for two or three more years. But she is no longer in the hands of God.
verses.ro: kono kodomo ni nen san nen shikomo to   yute iredomo Kami no tebanare
verses.jp_1: このこ共二ねん三ねんしこもふと
verses.jp_2: ゆうていれども神のてはなれ

verses.en: Ponder well: however dear she may be to you, her parent, you can do nothing if she is out of the hands of God.
verses.ro: shiyan seyo oya ga ika hodo omotemo   Kami no tebanare kore wa kanawan
verses.jp_1: しやんせよをやがいかほどをもふても
verses.jp_2: 神のてばなれこれハかなハん

verses.en: This world is mixed with wrongdoing. You must not attach yourself to bad causation.
verses.ro: kono yo wa akuji majiri de aru karani   innen tsukeru koto wa ikan de
verses.jp_1: このよふハあくしまじりであるからに
verses.jp_2: いんねんつける事ハいかんで

verses.en: You are thinking that you are already near fifty. Yet in the eyes of God you have many years ahead of you.
verses.ro: waga mi niwa mo goju ya to omoedomo   Kami no me niwa mada saki ga aru
verses.jp_2: 神のめへにハまださきがある

verses.en: Sixty more years from this year, God promises you with certainty.
verses.ro: kotoshi yori rokuju nen wa shikkari to   Kami no ho niwa shikato ukeyau
verses.jp_1: ことしより六十ねんハしいかりと
verses.jp_2: 神のほふにハしかとうけやう

verses.en: From now, replace your mind firmly. Sweep away the wrongdoing and take a young wife.
verses.ro: korekara wa kokoro shikkari irekae yo   akuji harote wakaki nyobo
verses.jp_1: これからハ心しいかりいれかへよ
verses.jp_2: あくじはろふてハかきによほふ

verses.en: This may seem difficult to do, but God will go forth and receive her without fail.
verses.ro: kore totemo mutsukashi yoni aru keredo   Kami ga deta nara morote kuru zo ya
verses.jp_1: これとてもむつかしよふにあるけれど
verses.jp_2: 神がでたならもろてくるそや

verses.en: After you have devoted yourself day by day, I shall leave you entrusted with the management of everything.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni kokoro tsukushita sono ue wa   ato no shihai o yorozu makaseru
verses.jp_1: にち／＼に心つくしたそのゑハ
verses.jp_2: あとのしはいをよろづまかせる

verses.en: Of the five, keep two at home. God will take charge of the other three.
verses.ro: go nin aru naka no ni nin wa uchi ni oke   ato san nin wa Kami no hikiuke
verses.jp_1: 五人あるなかのにゝんハうちにをけ
verses.jp_2: あと三人ハ神のひきうけ

verses.en: Look at things in the world and through all ages. Calm your mind and ponder over them.
verses.ro: yorozuyo no sekai no koto o miharashite   kokoro shizumete shiyan shite miyo
verses.jp_1: よろづよのせかいの事をみはらして
verses.jp_2: 心しづめてしやんしてみよ

verses.en: This has always been the world of God, but it is the first time that I act as a go-between.
verses.ro: imamade mo Kami no sekai de aru keredo   nakadachi suru wa ima ga hajime ya
verses.jp_1: いまゝても神のせかいであるけれど
verses.jp_2: なかだちするハ今がはじめや

verses.en: People will think this is odd. But however much they may laugh, it is of prime importance.
verses.ro: korekara wa sekai no hito wa okashigaru   nanbo warotemo kore ga daiichi
verses.jp_1: これからハせかいの人ハをかしがる
verses.jp_2: なんぼハろてもこれが大一

verses.en: Perhaps people will say: What are you doing? But the laughter of people will be God's delight.
verses.ro: sekai niwa nani goto suru to yu de aro   hito no warai o Kami ga tanoshimu
verses.jp_1: せかいにハなに事するとゆうとであろ
verses.jp_2: 人のハらいを神がたのしむ

verses.en: The self-centered mind will not do. The mind of God differs entirely.
verses.ro: meme no omou kokoro wa ikan de na   Kami no kokoro wa mina chigau de na
verses.jp_1: めへめへのをもふ心ハいかんでな
verses.jp_2: 神の心ハみなちがうでな

verses.en: I bring you together according to the causality of your previous lives and protect you. This settles the matter for all time.
verses.ro: zensho no innen yosete shugo suru   kore wa matsudai shikato osamaru
verses.jp_1: せんしよのいんねんよせてしうごふする
verses.jp_2: これハまつだいしかとをさまる

verses.en: From now, I shall begin to open a broad path. I shall make all minds in the world spirited.
verses.ro: korekara wa okwan michi o tsuke kakeru   sekai no kokoro mina isameru de
verses.jp_1: これからハをくハんみちをつけかける
verses.jp_2: せかいの心みないさめるで

verses.en: Those in high places will come at any moment, spirited in mind. The appointed time has arrived.
verses.ro: kami taru wa kokoro isande kuru hodoni   nandoki ni kuru kokugen ga kita
verses.jp_1: 上たるハ心いさんでくるほとに
verses.jp_2: なんどきにくるこくけんがきた

verses.en: After the tea is picked and the plants are trimmed, the Joyous Service will follow.
verses.ro: cha tsunde ato karitorite shimota nara   ato i deru no wa Yoki-zutome ya
verses.jp_1: ちやつんであとかりとりてしもたなら
verses.jp_2: あといでるのハよふきづとめや

verses.en: From where do you think this Service comes? The people in high places will become spirited.
verses.ro: kono Tsutome doko kara kuru to omou kana   kami taru tokoro isami kuru zo ya
verses.jp_1: このつとめとこからくるとをもうかな
verses.jp_2: 上たるところいさみくるぞや

verses.en: Step by step, the providence of God will bring about every new and marvelous working.
verses.ro: dandan to Kami no shugo to yu mono wa   mezurashi koto o mina shikakeru de
verses.jp_1: たん／＼と神のしゆごふとゆうものハ
verses.jp_2: めつらし事をみなしかけるで

verses.en: Day after day, the mind of God hastens. What are all of you thinking of it?
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no kokoro no sekikomi o   mina ichiretsu wa nanto omoteru
verses.jp_1: にち／＼に神の心のせきこみを
verses.jp_2: みないちれつハなんとをもてる

verses.en: Illness and pain of whatever kind do not exist. They are none other than the hastening and guidance of God.
verses.ro: nani nitemo yamai itami wa sarani nashi   Kami no sekikomi tebiki naru zo ya
verses.jp_1: なにゝてもやまいいたみハさらになし
verses.jp_2: 神のせきこみてびきなるそや

verses.en: The reason for My hastening, if you should ask, is that I desire performers for the Service.
verses.ro: sekikomi mo naniyue naru to yu naraba   Tsutome no ninju hoshii koto kara
verses.jp_1: せきこみもなにゆへなるとゆうならば
verses.jp_2: つとめのにんぢうほしい事から

verses.en: What do you think this Service is? It is none other than the means to universal salvation.
verses.ro: kono Tsutome nanno koto ya to omote iru   yorozu tasuke no moyo bakari o
verses.jp_1: このつとめなんの事やとをもている
verses.jp_2: よろづたすけのもよふばかりを

verses.en: Do not think this salvation is for the present time alone. It will be the Divine Record for eternity.
verses.ro: kono tasuke ima bakari towa omouna yo   kore matsudai no Koki naru zo ya
verses.jp_1: このたすけいまばかりとハをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: これまつたいのこふきなるぞや

verses.en: Just a word: you are saying that it is a fit or madness. It is not an illness but the urging of God.
verses.ro: choto hanashi nobose kanteki yute iru   yamai dewa nai Kami no sekikomi
verses.jp_1: 一寸はなしのぼせかんてきゆうている
verses.jp_2: やまいでハない神のせきこみ

verses.en: Step by step, I have taught the truth of single-heartedness with God, but you still do not understand.
verses.ro: dandan to shinjitsu Kami no ichijo o   toite kikasedo mada wakari nai
verses.jp_1: たん／＼としんぢつ神の一ちよふ
verses.jp_2: といてきかせどまだハかりない

verses.en: Though I desire to go forth into the open quickly, I cannot do so because there is no path.
verses.ro: hayabaya to omote deyo to omoedomo   michi ga note wa deru ni deraren
verses.jp_1: はや／＼とをもてでよふとをもへとも
verses.jp_2: みちがのふてハでるにでられん

verses.en: Though I desire to open this path quickly, there is no place else to open it.
verses.ro: kono michi o hayaku tsukeyo to omoedomo   hoka naru toko de tsukeru toko nashi
verses.jp_1: このみちをはやくつけよとをもへとも
verses.jp_2: ほかなるとこでつけるとこなし

verses.en: If you are sincere in desiring this path to be, ponder over everything from your innermost heart.
verses.ro: kono michi o shinjitsu omou koto naraba   mune no uchi yori yorozu shiyan se
verses.jp_1: このみちをしんぢつをもう事ならば
verses.jp_2: むねのうちよりよろづしやんせ

verses.en: What do you think this talk is about? I am hastening for the places where God's truth is conveyed.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nanno koto ya to omote iru   Kami no uchiwake basho sekikomu
verses.jp_1: このはなしなんの事やとをもている
verses.jp_2: 神のうちわけばしよせきこむ

verses.en: When this path can be seen, even a little, all minds in the world will become spirited.
verses.ro: kono michi ga choto miekaketa koto naraba   sekai no kokoro mina isami deru
verses.jp_1: このみちが一寸みゑかけた事ならば
verses.jp_2: せかいの心みないさみてる

verses.en: Listen to whatever God says! If only the cleaning of the Residence is completed,
verses.ro: nani nitemo Kami no yu koto shikato kike   yashiki no soji deketa koto nara
verses.jp_1: なにゝても神のゆう事しかときけ
verses.jp_2: やしきのそふぢでけた事なら

verses.en: It will soon be seen. Without a moment to look aside, the dust will disappear as if you were dreaming.
verses.ro: mo mieru yokome furu ma mo nai hodoni   yume mita yoni hokori chiru zo ya
verses.jp_1: もふみへるよこめふるまないほどに
verses.jp_2: ゆめみたよふにほこりちるぞや

verses.en: When this dust is completely swept away, nothing will remain but universal salvation.
verses.ro: kono hokori sukiyaka harota koto naraba   ato wa yorozu no tasuke ichijo
verses.jp_1: このほこりすきやかはろた事ならば
verses.jp_2: あとハよろづのたすけ一ちよ

verses.en: Hereafter, I shall hasten the Service step by step, preparing only for universal salvation.
verses.ro: konosaki wa dandan Tsutome sekikonde   yorozu tasuke no moyo bakari o
verses.jp_1: このさきハたん／＼つとめせきこんで
verses.jp_2: よろづたすけのもよふばかりを

verses.en: Illness and pain throughout the world: you do not know that these are the road signs or guidance of God.
verses.ro: sekaiju doko ga ashiki ya itamisho   Kami no michiose tebiki shirazu ni
verses.jp_1: せかいぢうとこがあしきやいたみしよ
verses.jp_2: 神のみちをせてびきしらすに

verses.en: There is nothing in this world that should be called illness. Whenever there is a disorder of the body, ponder deeply.
verses.ro: kono yoni yamai to yute nai hodoni   minouchi sawari mina shiyan seyo
verses.jp_1: このよふにやまいとゆうてないほどに
verses.jp_2: みのうちさハりみなしやんせよ

verses.en: Day after day, God is hastening this salvation. What are all of you thinking about it?
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no sekikomi kono tasuke   mina ichiretsu wa nanto omoteru
verses.jp_1: にち／＼に神のせきこみこのたすけ
verses.jp_2: みな一れつハなんとをもてる

verses.en: Though it is springwater that fills the pond in the high mountains, yet at its spout, it is mixed with mud.
verses.ro: takayama no oike ni waita mizu naredo   debana wa nigori gomoku majiri de
verses.jp_1: 高山のをいけにハいた水なれど
verses.jp_2: てバなハにこりごもくまぢりで

verses.en: When you calm your mind step by step and ponder, it will change into clear water.
verses.ro: dandan to kokoro shizumete shiyan suru   sundaru mizu to kawari kuru zo ya
verses.jp_1: だん／＼と心しづめてしやんする
verses.jp_2: すんだる水とかハりくるぞや

verses.en: I shall go into the water in the mountains and make it clear, whatever kind of water it may be.
verses.ro: yama naka no mizu no naka i to irikonde   ika naru mizu mo sumasu koto nari
verses.jp_1: 山なかのみづのなかいと入こんで
verses.jp_2: いかなる水もすます事なり

verses.en: You who are devoting yourselves day after day, settle the heart. Then a promising future will be yours.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni kokoro tsukusuru sono kata wa   mune o osame yo sue wa tanomoshi
verses.jp_1: にち／＼に心つくするそのかたわ
verses.jp_2: むねをふさめよすゑハたのもし

verses.en: From now, I shall plunge into the pond in the high mountains and clear it of mud, whatever kind it may be.
verses.ro: korekara wa takayama ike i tobihairi   ikana gomoku mo soji suru nari
verses.jp_1: これからハ高山いけいとびはいり
verses.jp_2: いかなごもくもそうぢするなり

verses.en: If I only remove the mud from it completely, the remaining water will be clear.
verses.ro: gomoku sai sukiyaka dashite shimota nara   ato naru mizu wa sunde aru nari
verses.jp_1: こもくさいすきやかだしてしもたなら
verses.jp_2: あとなる水ハすんであるなり

verses.en: From now on, I shall talk about Kara and Nihon. You may not understand whatever I tell you.
verses.ro: korekara wa kara to nihon no hanashi suru   nani o yu tomo wakari arumai
verses.jp_1: これからハからとにほんのはなしする
verses.jp_2: なにをゆうともハかりあるまい

verses.en: Those of Kara have entered Nihon and their willful acts cause the anger of God.
verses.ro: tojin ga nihon no jii i irikonde   mamani suru no ga Kami no rippuku
verses.jp_1: とふぢんがにほんのぢいゝ入こんで
verses.jp_2: まゝにするのが神のりいふく

verses.en: Step by step, I am preparing to save Nihon. God will deal with those of Kara as God wishes.
verses.ro: dandan to nihon tasukeru moyodate   tojin Kami no mamani suru nari
verses.jp_1: たん／＼とにほんたすけるもよふだて
verses.jp_2: とふじん神のまゝにするなり

verses.en: Hereafter, I shall make a distinction between Kara and Nihon. When it is done, the world will settle.
verses.ro: konosaki wa kara to nihon o wakeru de na   kore wakaritara sekai osamaru
verses.jp_1: このさきハからとにほんをハけるてな
verses.jp_2: これハかりたらせかいをさまる

verses.en: Until now, those in high places have not understood. They thought My teachings to be worldly common.
verses.ro: imamade wa kami taru kokoro wakaraide   sekainami ya to omote ita nari
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハ上たる心ハからいで
verses.jp_2: せかいなみやとをもていたなり

verses.en: From now, God will enter their bodies and make the distinction clear in their minds.
verses.ro: korekara wa Kami ga tainai irikonde   kokoro sumiyaka wakete miseru de
verses.jp_1: これからハ神がたいない入こんで
verses.jp_2: 心すみやかわけてみせるで

verses.en: Though you turn away those who come day by day, their number will only increase step by step.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni yorikuru hito ni kotowari o   yueba dandan naomo masu de
verses.jp_1: にち／＼によりくる人にことハりを
verses.jp_2: ゆへばだん／＼なをもまあすで

verses.en: No matter how great a number of people may come, do not worry, for it is in the hands of God.
verses.ro: ika hodono oku no hito ga kitaru tomo   nanimo anjina Kami no hikiuke
verses.jp_1: いかほどのをふくの人がきたるとも
verses.jp_2: なにもあんぢな神のひきうけ

verses.en: Marvelous is the Kanrodai of this world's beginning. It will be the cause of peace in Nihon.
verses.ro: mezurashii kono yo hajime no Kanrodai   kore ga nihon no osamari to naru
verses.jp_1: めつらしいこのよはじめのかんろたい
verses.jp_2: これがにほんのをさまりとなる

verses.en: I can see fire and water in the high mountains. Can you not see this with your own eyes?
verses.ro: takayama ni hii to mizu to ga miete aru   tare ga me nimo kore ga mien ka
verses.jp_1: 高山に火と水とがみへてある
verses.jp_2: たれがめへにもこれがみへんか

verses.en: Step by step, I have given you teachings on every matter, for I have seen what is certain.
verses.ro: dandan to ikana hanashi mo toite aru   tashikana koto ga miete aru kara
verses.jp_1: たん／＼といかなはなしもといてある
verses.jp_2: たしかな事がみゑてあるから

verses.en: Everything has been fully arranged for your happiness. Look forward to it!
verses.ro: shiyawase o yoki yoni tote jubun ni   mi ni tsuite kuru kore o tanoshime
verses.jp_1: しやハせをよきよふにとてじうぶんに
verses.jp_2: みについてくるこれをたのしめ

verses.en: If you indulge in extreme greed, the anger of God will begin to appear.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo goyoku tsukushi sono ue wa   Kami no rippuku miete kuru zo ya
verses.jp_1: なにもかもごふよくつくしそのゆへハ
verses.jp_2: 神のりいふくみへてくるぞや

verses.en: Step by step, from the fifteenth day, you will begin to see it. Good and evil will both appear.
verses.ro: dandan to ju go nichi yori miekakeru   zen to aku towa mina arawareru
verses.jp_1: たん／＼と十五日よりみゑかける
verses.jp_2: 善とあくとハみなあらハれる

verses.en: By this talk, I do not indicate anyone in particular. Become convinced, all of you, when it is seen.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doko no koto tomo yuwan de na   miete kitareba mina tokushin se
verses.jp_1: このはなしとこの事ともゆハんてな
verses.jp_2: みへてきたればみなとくしんせ

verses.en: Among the high mountains, the distinction between those of Nihon and those of Kara is also to be made by the pillar.
verses.ro: takayama no nihon no mono to tojin to   wakeru moyo mo kore mo hashira ya
verses.jp_1: 高山のにほんのものととふぢんと
verses.jp_2: わけるもよふもこれもはしらや

verses.en: In distinguishing between those of Kara and those of Nihon, I shall use fire and water to make the distinction.
verses.ro: tojin to nihon no mono to wakeru no wa   hii to mizu to o irete wakeru de
verses.jp_1: とふじんとにほんのものとハけるのハ
verses.jp_2: 火と水とをいれてハけるで

verses.en: At this time, set about quickly to clear away the structure from within the gate.
verses.ro: konotabi wa mon no uchi yori tachimono o   hayaku isoide toriharai seyo
verses.jp_1: このたびハもんのうちよりたちものを
verses.jp_2: はやくいそいでとりはらいせよ

verses.en: When you have completed the sweeping, please rope off the ground plan quickly.
verses.ro: sukiyaka ni soji shitateta koto naraba   nawamune isogi tanomi iru zo ya
verses.jp_1: すきやかにそふぢしたてた事ならば
verses.jp_2: なハむねいそぎたのみいるそや

verses.en: After you have truly finished the sweeping, your mind will be spirited by being single-hearted with God.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni soji o shitaru sono nochi wa   Kami ichijo de kokoro isamuru
verses.jp_1: しんぢつにそふぢをしたるそのゝちハ
verses.jp_2: 神一ぢよで心いさむる

verses.en: When the minds of the world are spirited step by step, peace will come to Nihon.
verses.ro: dandan to sekai no kokoro isamu nara   kore ga nihon no osamari to naru
verses.jp_1: だん／＼とせかいの心いさむなら
verses.jp_2: これがにほんのをさまりとなる

verses.en: Until now, you have understood nothing, but from now on you will see wondrous signs.
verses.ro: imamade wa nani yono koto mo wakari nai   korekara mieru fushigi aizu ga
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハなによの事もハかりない
verses.jp_2: これからみゑるふしぎあいづが

verses.en: I do not force you to come along if you do not wish to, but if you should, you will be blessed forever.
verses.ro: kon mono ni muri ni koi towa yu de nashi   tsukikuru naraba itsu made mo yoshi
verses.jp_1: こんものにむりにこいとハゆうでなし
verses.jp_2: つきくるならばいつまでもよし

verses.en: From now on, I shall speak in the metaphor of water. Be enlightened by the words "clear" and "muddy.
verses.ro: korekara wa mizu ni tatoete hanashi suru   sumu to nigori de satori toru nari
verses.jp_1: これからハ水にたとゑてはなしする
verses.jp_2: すむとにごりでさとりとるなり

verses.en: Truly, the hastening in the mind of God is to put in the central pillar quickly.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni Kami no kokoro no sekikomi wa   shin no hashira o hayaku iretai
verses.jp_1: しんぢつに神の心のせきこみわ
verses.jp_2: しんのはしらをはやくいれたい

verses.en: Though I desire to put in the pillar quickly, I cannot find where to put it because of the muddy water.
verses.ro: kono hashira hayaku ireyo to omoedomo   nigori no mizu de tokoro wakaran
verses.jp_1: このはしらはやくいれよとをもへども
verses.jp_2: にごりの水でところわからん

verses.en: Arrange to clear this water quickly. Purify it by using a filter and sand.
verses.ro: kono mizu o hayaku sumasuru moyodate   suino to suna ni kakete sumase yo
verses.jp_1: この水をはやくすまするもよふだて
verses.jp_2: すいのとすなにかけてすませよ

verses.en: Do not wonder where this filter can be found. Your heart and mouth are the sand and filter.
verses.ro: kono suino doko ni aru ya to omouna yo   mune to kuchi to ga suna to suino ya
verses.jp_1: このすいのどこにあるやとをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: むねとくちとがすなとすいのや

verses.en: If you quickly understand this talk, I shall put in the central pillar at once.
verses.ro: kono hanashi sumiyaka satori tsuita nara   sono mama ireru shin no hashira o
verses.jp_1: このはなしすみやかさとりついたなら
verses.jp_2: そのまゝいれるしんのはしらを

verses.en: If only the pillar is firmly established, the whole world will truly settle.
verses.ro: hashira sai shikkari ireta koto naraba   kono yo tashikani osamari ga tsuku
verses.jp_1: はしらさいしいかりいれた事ならば
verses.jp_2: このよたしかにをさまりがつく

verses.en: This talk requires only your enlightenment. With enlightenment will come tested proof.
verses.ro: kono hanashi satori bakari de aru hodoni   kore satoritara shoko dameshi ya
verses.jp_1: このはなしさとりばかりであるほどに
verses.jp_2: これさとりたらしよこだめしや

verses.en: I am God of Origin, who began the human beings of this world. Yet there may be no one who knows Me.
verses.ro: kono yo no ningen hajime moto no Kami   tare mo shiritaru mono wa arumai
verses.jp_1: このよふのにんけんはじめもとの神
verses.jp_2: たれもしりたるものハあるまい

verses.en: I began to teach My providence in the muddy ocean, and you have come to prosper step by step.
verses.ro: doroumi no naka yori shugo oshiekake   sore ga dandan sakan naru zo ya
verses.jp_1: どろうみのなかよりしゆごふをしへかけ
verses.jp_2: それがたん／＼さかんなるぞや

verses.en: This time, I teach single-hearted salvation, beginning once more that which never existed.
verses.ro: konotabi wa tasuke ichijo oshieru mo   kore mo nai koto hajime kakeru de
verses.jp_1: このたびハたすけ一ぢよをしゑるも
verses.jp_2: これもない事はしめかけるで

verses.en: I begin things which have never existed, because I am God, who made the origin.
verses.ro: imamade ni nai koto hajime kakeru no wa   moto koshiraeta Kami de aru kara
verses.jp_1: いまゝでにない事はじめかけるのわ
verses.jp_2: もとこしらゑた神であるから

verses.en: Day after day, the words of God pile up mountainously, stuck in My throat. I cannot speak them, though I so desire.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no hanashi ga yamayama to   tsukaete aredo toku ni tokaren
verses.jp_1: にち／＼に神のはなしがやま／＼と
verses.jp_2: つかゑてあれどとくにとかれん

verses.en: There is nothing that I cannot teach, but there is no one who listens with a purified mind.
verses.ro: nani nitemo tokaren koto wa nai keredo   kokoro sumashite kiku mono wa nai
verses.jp_1: なにゝてもとかれん事ハないけれど
verses.jp_2: 心すましてきくものハない

verses.en: If you quickly purify your mind and listen, I shall give you all of My teachings on everything.
verses.ro: sumiyaka ni kokoro sumashite kiku naraba   yorozu no hanashi mina tokikikasu
verses.jp_1: すみやかに心すましてきくならば
verses.jp_2: よろづのはなしみなときゝかす

verses.en: I have put them to a test of certainty in this world. Be convinced that there is no error.
verses.ro: kono yo no tashika tameshi ga kakete aru   kore ni machigai nai to omoe yo
verses.jp_1: このよふのたしかためしかかけてある
verses.jp_2: これにまちがいないとをもゑよ

verses.en: If this test is quickly seen, you will understand that My words are always true.
verses.ro: kono tameshi sumiyaka mieta koto naraba   ikana hanashi mo mina makoto ya de
verses.jp_1: このためしすみやかみゑた事ならば
verses.jp_2: いかなはなしもみなまことやで

verses.en: I shall teach you on any and every matter. Never take it to be false, whatever I may say.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo ikana hanashi mo toku hodoni   nani o yutemo uso to omouna
verses.jp_1: なにもかもいかなはなしもとくほどに
verses.jp_2: なにをゆうてもうそとをもうな

verses.en: It may be difficult to understand the sayings and workings of God, whom you cannot see.
verses.ro: me ni men Kami no yu koto nasu koto wa   nani o suru tomo chotto ni shiremai
verses.jp_1: めへにめん神のゆう事なす事わ
verses.jp_2: なにをするとも一寸にしれまい

verses.en: But My teachings can be seen quickly. This will be the proof that cannot be denied.
verses.ro: hayabaya to mieru hanashi de aru hodoni   kore ga tashikana shoko naru zo ya
verses.jp_1: はや／＼とみへるはなしであるほどに
verses.jp_2: これがたしかなしよこなるぞや

verses.en: When you see this, be pleased with whatever you hear. All of My teachings proceed in this way.
verses.ro: kore o mite nani o kiitemo tanoshime yo   ikana hanashi mo mina kono dori
verses.jp_1: これをみてなにをきいてもたのしめよ
verses.jp_2: いかなはなしもみなこのどふり

verses.en: If you have borrowed something from another, you will need to pay interest. Return it quickly with a word of thanks.
verses.ro: hito no mono karitaru naraba ri ga iru de   hayaku hensai re o yu nari
verses.jp_1: 人のものかりたるならばりかいるで
verses.jp_2: はやくへんさいれゑをゆうなり

verses.en: You are mistaking your child's crying at night. It is not a child's cry; it is God's persuasion.
verses.ro: ko no yonaki omou kokoro wa chigau de na   ko ga nakude nai Kami no kudoki ya
verses.jp_1: 子のよなきをもふ心ハちがうでな
verses.jp_2: こがなくでな神のくときや

verses.en: As God desires to inform you quickly, you must understand whatever occurs.
verses.ro: hayabaya to Kami ga shirashite yaru hodoni   ikana koto demo shikato kikiwake
verses.jp_1: はや／＼と神がしらしてやるほどに
verses.jp_2: いかな事でもしかときゝわけ

verses.en: Lest there be any error in the minds of you parents, you had better ponder quickly.
verses.ro: oyaoya no kokoro chigai no nai yoni   hayaku shiyan o suru ga yoi zo ya
verses.jp_1: をや／＼の心ちがいのないよふに
verses.jp_2: はやくしやんをするがよいぞや

verses.en: If you are truly of a mind to save others, there is no need for the persuasion of God.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni hito o tasukeru kokoro nara   Kami no kudoki wa nanimo nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: しんぢつに人をたすける心なら
verses.jp_2: 神のくときハなにもないぞや

verses.en: The thought that all is well if the present is well for the self alone, is entirely mistaken.
verses.ro: meme ni imasai yokuba yoki koto to   omou kokoro wa mina chigau de na
verses.jp_1: めへ／＼にいまさいよくばよき事と
verses.jp_2: をもふ心ハみなちがうでな

verses.en: However broad a way you may have set out on, you do not see the narrow lane that is in your future.
verses.ro: degake kara ikana omichi toritemo   sue ni hosomichi miete nai kara
verses.jp_1: てがけからいかなをふみちとふりても
verses.jp_2: すゑのほそみちみゑてないから

verses.en: As you human beings are shallow, you can never see where your paths will lead in the future.
verses.ro: ningen wa azanai mono de aru karani   sue no michisuji sarani wakaran
verses.jp_1: にんけんハあざないものであるからに
verses.jp_2: すゑのみちすじさらにわからん

verses.en: Do not complain about your present situation. A broad path will appear ahead of you.
verses.ro: ima no koto nanimo yu dewa nai hodoni   saki no okwan michi ga mieru de
verses.jp_1: いまの事なにもゆうでハないほどに
verses.jp_2: さきのをふくハんみちがみへるで

verses.en: Do not grieve over whatever path you are now on. Take delight in the main path that lies ahead.
verses.ro: ima no michi ikana michi demo nagekuna yo   saki no honmichi tanoshun de iyo
verses.jp_1: いまのみちいかなみちでもなけくなよ
verses.jp_2: さきのほんみちたのしゆでいよ

verses.en: If you are truly of a mind to save others single-heartedly, I shall firmly accept you, even if you say nothing.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni tasuke ichijo no kokoro nara   nani yuwai demo shikato uketoru
verses.jp_1: しんぢつにたすけ一ぢよの心なら
verses.jp_2: なにゆハいでもしかとうけとる

verses.en: Words of flattery are unwanted. If only there is sincerity in the core of your mind...
verses.ro: kuchi saki no tsuisho bakari wa iran mono   shin no kokoro ni makoto aru nara
verses.jp_1: 口さきのついしよはかりハいらんもの
verses.jp_2: しんの心にまことあるなら

verses.en: This universe is the body of God. Ponder this in all matters step by step.
verses.ro: dandan to nani goto nitemo kono yo wa   Kami no karada ya shiyan shite miyo
verses.jp_1: たん／＼となに事にてもこのよふわ
verses.jp_2: 神のからだやしやんしてみよ

verses.en: All human bodies are things lent by God. With what thought are you using them?
verses.ro: ningen wa minamina Kami no kashimono ya   nanto omote tsukote iru yara
verses.jp_1: にんけんハみな／＼神のかしものや
verses.jp_2: なんとをもふてつこているやら

verses.en: This year, I shall begin marvelous things. I shall do things you have never known before.
verses.ro: kotoshi niwa mezurashi koto o hajime kake   imamade shiranu koto o suru zo ya
verses.jp_1: ことしにハめつらし事をはじめかけ
verses.jp_2: いまゝでしらぬ事をするぞや

verses.en: Until now, you have understood everything in an ordinary way. From now on, you will understand from your innermost heart.
verses.ro: imamade wa nani yono koto mo sekainami   korekara wakaru mune no uchi yori
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハなによの事もせかいなみ
verses.jp_2: これからわかるむねのうちより

verses.en: This time, I begin the single-hearted salvation after having tested it on Myself.
verses.ro: konotabi wa tasuke ichijo ni kakaru no mo   waga mi no tameshi kakaritaru ue
verses.jp_1: このたびハたすけ一ちよにかゝるのも
verses.jp_2: わがみのためしかゝりたるうゑ

verses.en: This salvation is not brought about by formulas of worship, or by exorcism, or by calling on oracles.
verses.ro: tasuke demo ogami kito de ikude nashi   ukagai tatete iku de nakeredo
verses.jp_1: たすけでもをかみきとふでいくてなし
verses.jp_2: うかがいたてゝいくでなけれど

verses.en: At this place, I shall teach everything. Be single-hearted with God, and from your innermost heart...
verses.ro: kono tokoro yorozu no koto o tokikikasu   Kami ichijo de mune no uchi yori
verses.jp_1: このところよろつの事をときゝかす
verses.jp_2: 神いちじよでむねのうちより

verses.en: Ponder from your innermost heart to understand. Through saving others, you will be saved.
verses.ro: wakaru yo mune no uchi yori shiyan seyo   hito tasuketara waga mi tasukaru
verses.jp_1: わかるよふむねのうちよりしやんせよ
verses.jp_2: 人たすけたらわがみたすかる

verses.en: The high mountains are doing as they please with the whole world, but they cannot see the future.
verses.ro: takayama wa sekai ichiretsu omou yo   mamani suredomo saki wa mien de
verses.jp_1: 高山ハせかい一れつをもうよふ
verses.jp_2: まゝにすれともさきハみゑんで

verses.en: Step by step, I have gathered many trees, but there is none yet that is useful timber.
verses.ro: dandan to oku yosetaru kono tachiki   yoboku ni naru mono wa nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: だん／＼とをふくよせたるこのたちき
verses.jp_2: よふほくになるものハないぞや

verses.en: Though I have gathered many and varied trees, those bent or crooked are of no use.
verses.ro: ikana ki mo oku yosete wa aru keredo   igami kagami wa kore wa kanawan
verses.jp_1: いかなきもをふくよせてハあるけれど
verses.jp_2: いがみかゞみハこれわかなハん

verses.en: Sweeping the innermost heart of everyone in the world, God is hastening to show the central pillar.
verses.ro: sekaiju mune no uchi yori Shinbashira   Kami no sekikomi hayaku misetai
verses.jp_1: せかいぢうむねのうちよりしんばしら
verses.jp_2: 神のせきこみはやくみせたい

verses.en: Throughout the world, God is the broom for the sweeping of the innermost heart. Watch carefully.
verses.ro: sekaiju mune no uchi yori kono soji   Kami ga hoke ya shikato mite iyo
verses.jp_1: せかいぢうむねのうちよりこのそふぢ
verses.jp_2: 神がほふけやしかとみでいよ

verses.en: From now on, God will go forth and attend to the sweeping in the mountains.
verses.ro: korekara wa Kami ga omote i arawarete   yama i kakarite soji suru zo ya
verses.jp_1: これからハ神がをもていあらわれて
verses.jp_2: 山いかゝりてそふちするぞや

verses.en: When God accomplishes the sweeping of all humankind, you will be spirited and full of joy.
verses.ro: ichiretsu ni Kami ga soji o suru naraba   kokoro isande yokizukume ya
verses.jp_1: いちれつに神がそうちをするならば
verses.jp_2: 心いさんてよふきつくめや

verses.en: As it is God who undertakes all matters, everything will be accomplished freely and unlimitedly.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo Kami ga hikiuke suru kara wa   donna koto demo juyojizai o
verses.jp_1: なにもかも神がひきうけするからハ
verses.jp_2: どんな事でもぢうよぢさを

verses.en: At this time, after purifying the water, I desire quickly to take in the Shinbashira, who is to settle matters within.
verses.ro: konotabi wa uchi o osameru Shinbashira   hayaku iretai mizu o sumashite
verses.jp_1: このたびハうちをふさめるしんばしら
verses.jp_2: はやくいれたい水をすまして

verses.en: The central pillar of the high mountains is that of Kara. This is the prime cause of the anger of God.
verses.ro: takayama no shin no hashira wa tojin ya   kore ga daiichi Kami no rippuku
verses.jp_1: 高山のしんのはしらハとふじんや
verses.jp_2: これが大一神のりいふく

verses.en: Step by step, those in high places are doing as they please with the world. What thought is given to God's regret?
verses.ro: kami taru wa dandan sekai mamani suru   Kami no zannen nanto omou zo
verses.jp_1: 上たるハだん／＼せかいまゝにする
verses.jp_2: 神のざんねんなんとをもうぞ

verses.en: Until now, you have seen nothing I have told you. Now at last, the time has come.
verses.ro: imamade wa nani o yutemo miete nai   mo konotabi wa setsu ga kita
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハなにをゆうてもみへてない
verses.jp_2: もふこのたびハせへつうがきた

verses.en: From now on, I shall resume My hastening for the Joyous Service. This might not be easy to understand.
verses.ro: korekara wa Yoki-zutome ni mata kakaru   nanno koto yara choto ni shiremai
verses.jp_1: これからハよふきづとめにまたかゝる
verses.jp_2: なんの事やら一寸にしれまい

verses.en: I have already told you and told you what is known to Me. The teachings have been told, but you know not what they mean.
verses.ro: imamade mo shirite hanashite hanashi tomo   toite aredomo nanno koto yara
verses.jp_1: 今までもしりてはなしてはなしとも
verses.jp_2: といてあれどもなんの事やら

verses.en: Until now, you have not seen whatever I told you, because the day had not arrived.
verses.ro: koremade wa ikana hanashi o toita tote   hi ga kitarande miete nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: これまでハいかなはなしをといたとて
verses.jp_2: ひがきたらんでみへてないぞや

verses.en: From now on, as the time has come, you will see it just as I tell you.
verses.ro: korekara wa mo setsu ga kitaru kara   yueba sono mama miete kuru zo ya
verses.jp_1: これからわもふせへつうがきたるから
verses.jp_2: ゆへばそのまゝみへてくるぞや

verses.en: Listen! In the evening of the twenty-fifth day in the thirty-sixth year, God will cleanse your heart.
verses.ro: shikato kike san roku ni go no kureyai ni   mune no soji o Kami ga suru zo ya
verses.jp_1: しかときけ三六二五のくれやいに
verses.jp_2: むねのそふぢを神がするぞや

verses.en: Ponder this: no matter how clear the water may be, if you put mud into it, it will become turbid.
verses.ro: shiyan seyo nanbo sundaru mizu ya tote   doro o iretara nigoru koto nari
verses.jp_1: しやんせよなんぼすんだる水やとて
verses.jp_2: とろをいれたらにごる事なり

verses.en: Unless the muddy water is purified quickly, there is no way to put in the central pillar.
verses.ro: nigori mizu hayaku sumasan koto nitewa   shin no hashira no ireyo ga nai
verses.jp_1: にごり水はやくすまさん事にてわ
verses.jp_2: しんのはしらのいれよふがない

verses.en: If only the central pillar is quickly put in, everything will be settled firmly forever.
verses.ro: hashira sai hayaku iretaru koto naraba   matsudai shikato osamari ga tsuku
verses.jp_1: はしらさいはやくいれたる事ならば
verses.jp_2: まつたいしかとをさまりがつく

verses.en: God, who began this world, teaches the truth. Never take it to be false.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimeta Kami no shinjitsu o   toite kikasuru uso to omouna
verses.jp_1: このよふをはじめた神のしんぢつを
verses.jp_2: といてきかするうそとをもうな

verses.en: Even until now, there have been teachings, ethical and ancient, but there has been no one who knows the origin.
verses.ro: imamade mo shingaku koki aru keredo   moto o shiritaru mono wa nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: いまゝでもしんがくこふきあるけれど
verses.jp_2: もとをしりたるものハないぞや

verses.en: So should it be, for there should be no one who knows the course of the path in the muddy ocean.
verses.ro: sono hazu ya doroumi naka no michisugara   shiritaru mono wa nai hazu no koto
verses.jp_1: そのはづやどろうみなかのみちすがら
verses.jp_2: しりたるものハないはづの事

verses.en: Step by step, I shall tell you things unknown since the beginning of this world.
verses.ro: koremade wa kono yo hajimete nai koto o   dandan toite kikasu koto nari
verses.jp_1: これまでハこのよはじめてない事を
verses.jp_2: たん／＼といてきかす事なり

verses.en: Though I teach solely of things unknown, there is nothing I teach that is untrue.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo nai koto bakari toku keredo   kore ni machigota koto wa nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: なにもかもない事はかりとくけれど
verses.jp_2: これにまちごた事ハないぞや

verses.en: On the eleventh, the nine will be gone and hardship forgotten. I await the twenty-sixth of the first month.
verses.ro: ju ichi ni ku ga nakunarite shin wasure   shogatsu niju roku nichi o matsu
verses.jp_1: 十一に九がなくなりてしんわすれ
verses.jp_2: 正月廿六日をまつ

verses.en: By that time, the core will be settled and greed forgotten. Let all performers assemble and prepare for the Service.
verses.ro: kono aida shin mo tsukikuru yoku wasure   ninju sorote Tsutome koshirae
verses.jp_1: このあいだしんもつきくるよくハすれ
verses.jp_2: にんぢうそろふてつとめこしらゑ

verses.en: Day after day, the mind of God hastens to show you free and unlimited workings quickly.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no kokoro no sekikomi wa   juyojizai o hayaku misetai
verses.jp_1: にち／＼に神の心のせきこみハ
verses.jp_2: ぢうよじざいをはやくみせたい

verses.en: From now on, the performers will assemble and do the Service. This will truly settle Nihon.
verses.ro: korekara wa ninju sorote Tsutome suru   kore de tashikani nihon osamaru
verses.jp_1: これからハにんぢうそろをてつとめする
verses.jp_2: これでたしかににほんをさまる

verses.en: Since My aim is truly single-hearted salvation, there is nothing at all for you to fear.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni tasuke ichijo de aru karani   nanimo kowami wa sarani nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: しんぢつにたすけ一ぢよてあるからに
verses.jp_2: なにもこわみハさらにないぞや

verses.en: If you dare to stop all works for single-hearted salvation, the regret of God will appear as a disorder of the body.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo tasuke ichijo tomeru nara   Kami no zannen mi ni sawari tsuku
verses.jp_1: なにもかもたすけ一ぢよとめるなら
verses.jp_2: 神のさんねんみにさハりつく

verses.en: Ponder well! Never think that these preparations for universal salvation are human workings.
verses.ro: shiyan seyo yorozu tasuke no kono moyo   ningen waza to sarani omouna
verses.jp_1: しやんせよ万たすけのこのもよふ
verses.jp_2: にんけんハざとさらにをもうな

verses.en: Until now, you have not been able to understand anything. There was nothing but human thinking.
verses.ro: imamade wa nanika yorozu ga wakaraide   mina ningen no kokoro bakari de
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハなにかよろづがハからいで
verses.jp_2: みなにんけんの心ばかりで

verses.en: From now on, I shall compare the minds of those in high places with the mind of God.
verses.ro: korekara wa Kami no kokoro to kami taru no   kokoro to kokoro no hikiyawase suru
verses.jp_1: これからハ神の心と上たるの
verses.jp_2: 心と心のひきやハせする

verses.en: Do not take this talk lightly. God truly cannot bear to look on.
verses.ro: kono hanashi chotto no koto ya to omouna yo   Kami ga shinjitsu mikanetaru yue
verses.jp_1: このはなし一寸の事やとをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: 神がしんぢつみかねたるゆへ

verses.en: Know that the strength of God will be pitted against the strength of those in high places from now on.
verses.ro: korekara wa Kami no chikara to kami taru no   chikara kurabe o suru to omoe yo
verses.jp_1: これからハ神のちからと上たるの
verses.jp_2: ちからくらべをするとをもへよ

verses.en: Have your strongest come against Me. God has twice the strength.
verses.ro: ika hodono goteki araba dashite miyo   Kami no ho nimo bai no chikara o
verses.jp_1: いかほどのごふてきあらばだしてみよ
verses.jp_2: 神のほふにもばいのちからを

verses.en: As God in Truth is going out to the fore, know that every arrangement will be made.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no Kami ga omote i deru kara wa   ikana moyo mo suru to omoe yo
verses.jp_1: しんぢつの神がをもていでるからハ
verses.jp_2: いかなもよふもするとをもゑよ

verses.en: Until now, those of Kara have done as they pleased with Nihon. What can be done about the regret of God?
verses.ro: imamade wa kara ga nihon o mamani shita   Kami no zannen nanto shiyo yara
verses.jp_1: いまゝでわからがにほんをまゝにした
verses.jp_2: 神のざんねんなんとしよやら

verses.en: Hereafter, Nihon will do as it pleases with those of Kara. Be aware of it, all of you.
verses.ro: konosaki wa nihon ga kara o mamani suru   mina ichiretsu wa shochi shite iyo
verses.jp_1: このさきハにほんがからをまゝにする
verses.jp_2: みな一れつハしよちしていよ

verses.en: Root and branches of the same tree: branches will break, yet the root will prosper.
verses.ro: onaji ki no ne to eda to no koto naraba   eda wa orekuru ne wa sakai deru
verses.jp_1: をなじきのねへとゑだとの事ならバ
verses.jp_2: ゑたハをれくるねハさかいでる

verses.en: Until now, those of Kara were said to be great, but from now on they will only be broken.
verses.ro: imamade wa kara wa erai to yu taredo   korekara saki wa oreru bakari ya
verses.jp_1: いまゝでわからハゑらいとゆうたれど
verses.jp_2: これからさきハをれるはかりや

verses.en: Look at Nihon! It is thought to be tiny, but when the root appears, you will be overwhelmed with amazement.
verses.ro: nihon miyo chiisai yoni omotaredo   ne ga arawareba osore iru zo ya
verses.jp_1: にほんみよちいさいよふにをもたれど
verses.jp_2: ねがあらハればをそれいるぞや

verses.en: This power cannot be thought of as being human strength. It is the power of God which nothing can match.
verses.ro: kono chikara ningen waza to omowaren   Kami no chikara ya kore wa kanawan
verses.jp_1: このちからにんけんハさとをもハれん
verses.jp_2: 神のちからやこれハかなわん

verses.en: In this world, people are living merrily, but there is no one who knows the origin.
verses.ro: kono yo wa nigiwashi kurashi iru keredo   moto o shiritaru mono wa nai node
verses.jp_1: このよふハにぎハしくらしいるけれど
verses.jp_2: もとをしりたるものハないので

verses.en: If this origin is known in detail, there should be no cause for illness.
verses.ro: kono moto o kuwashiku shirita koto naraba   yamai no okoru koto wa nai no ni
verses.jp_1: このもとをくハしくしりた事ならバ
verses.jp_2: やまいのをこる事わないのに

verses.en: These children, living their lives knowing nothing, pitiful are they in the eyes of God.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo shirazu ni kurasu kono kodomo   Kami no me niwa ijirashiki koto
verses.jp_1: なにもかもしらずにくらすこの子共
verses.jp_2: 神のめへにハいぢらき事

verses.en: There is nothing at all which should be called illness. It is only because there are paths of the mistaken mind.
verses.ro: nani nitemo yamai to yute sarani nashi   kokoro chigai no michi ga aru kara
verses.jp_1: なにゝてもやまいとゆうてさらになし
verses.jp_2: 心ちがいのみちがあるから

verses.en: These paths are miserliness, covetousness, self-love, greed, and arrogance. They are the dusts.
verses.ro: kono michi wa oshii hoshii to kawaii to   yoku to koman kore ga hokori ya
verses.jp_1: このみちハをしいほしいとかハいと
verses.jp_2: よくとこふまんこれがほこりや

verses.en: All human beings in this world are the children of God. Listen and understand well the words of God!
verses.ro: kono yo no ningen wa mina Kami no ko ya   Kami no yu koto shikato kikiwake
verses.jp_1: このよふのにんけんハみな神のこや
verses.jp_2: 神のゆう事しかときゝわけ

verses.en: If only the dusts are cleanly swept away, then I shall work marvelous salvation.
verses.ro: hokori sai sukiyaka harota koto naraba   ato wa mezurashi tasuke suru zo ya
verses.jp_1: ほこりさいすきやかはろた事ならば
verses.jp_2: あとハめづらしたすけするぞや

verses.en: By this salvation given in accordance with the mind of sincerity, you shall be freed from illness, death, and weakening.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no kokoro shidai no kono tasuke   yamazu shinazu ni yowari naki yo
verses.jp_1: しんぢつの心しだいのこのたすけ
verses.jp_2: やますしなずによハりなきよふ

verses.en: By this salvation, to fix the natural term of life at one hundred and fifteen years is the single desire of God.
verses.ro: kono tasuke hyaku ju go sai jomyo to   sadame tsuketai Kami no ichijo
verses.jp_1: このたすけ百十五才ぢよみよと
verses.jp_2: さだめつけたい神の一ぢよ

verses.en: Day after day, the mind of God hastens. You who are close to Me, what are you thinking of it?
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no kokoro no sekikomi o   soba naru mono wa nanto omoteru
verses.jp_1: にち／＼に神の心のせきこみを
verses.jp_2: そばなるものハなんとをもてる

verses.en: For fear of those in high places, you are depressed. Fear not, for God is hastening.
verses.ro: kami taru o kowai to omote izumi iru   Kami no sekikomi kowami nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: 上たるをこわいとをもていすみいる
verses.jp_2: 神のせきこみこわみないぞや

verses.en: The tightness in your chest: do not take it as an illness. It is the hastening of God being blocked.
verses.ro: mune ashiku kore o yamai to omouna yo   Kami no sekikomi tsukaetaru yue
verses.jp_1: むねあしくこれをやまいとをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: 神のせきこみつかゑたるゆへ

verses.en: Working miracles one after another, the mind of God hastens for your salvation.
verses.ro: dandan to Kami no kokoro to yu mono wa   fushigi arawashi tasuke sekikomu
verses.jp_1: たん／＼と神の心とゆうものわ
verses.jp_2: ふしぎあらハしたすけせきこむ

verses.en: What do you think these miracles are? Sweeping the dust away, I shall complete the cleansing.
verses.ro: kono fushigi nanno koto ya to omote iru   hokori harote soji shitateru
verses.jp_1: このふしきなんの事やとをもている
verses.jp_2: ほこりはろふてそふぢしたてる

verses.en: Thereafter, the pillar will be quickly put in. When it is done, the world will settle.
verses.ro: ato naru ni hayaku hashira o ireta nara   kore de kono yo no sadame tsuku nari
verses.jp_1: あとなるにはやくはしらをいれたなら
verses.jp_2: これでこのよのさだめつくなり

verses.en: If you quickly see the truth of this talk, become convinced, everyone, whoever you may be.
verses.ro: kono hanashi hayaku mietaru koto naraba   ikana mono demo mina tokushin se
verses.jp_1: このはなしはやくみへたる事ならば
verses.jp_2: いかなものでもみなとくしんせ

verses.en: I have told you before about the test for proof, but you do not even understand what the Kanrodai is about.
verses.ro: imamade wa shoko tameshi to yue aredo   Kanrodai mo nanno koto yara
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハしよこためしとゆへあれど
verses.jp_2: かんろふだいもなんの事やら

verses.en: Having received this one four years ago, God is holding her in a tight embrace. This is the proof.
verses.ro: kono mono o yo nen izen ni mukaitori   Kami ga dakishime kore ga shoko ya
verses.jp_1: このものを四ねんいせんにむかいとり
verses.jp_2: 神がだきしめこれがしよこや

verses.en: Truly, the preparation to return her quickly is the first matter in the hastening of God.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni hayaku kayasuru moyodate   Kami no sekikomi kore ga daiichi
verses.jp_1: しんぢつにはやくかやするもよふたて
verses.jp_2: 神のせきこみこれがたい一

verses.en: Until now, I have often told you about My free and unlimited workings, but you have seen nothing yet.
verses.ro: koremade wa juyojizai to mama tokedo   nanimo mietaru koto wa nakeredo
verses.jp_1: これまでハぢうよじざいとまゝとけど
verses.jp_2: なにもみへたる事わなけれど

verses.en: From now on, I shall teach you everything beforehand. When seen, you will understand that I work freely and unlimitedly.
verses.ro: korekara wa ikana hanashi mo tokioite   sore mieta nara juyojizai ya
verses.jp_1: これからハいかなはなしもときをいて
verses.jp_2: それみゑたならじうよぢざいや

verses.en: Please do not speak about things in the past. I shall begin on the twenty-sixth day.
verses.ro: imamade no koto wa nan nimo yute kurena   niju roku nichi ni hajime kakeru de
verses.jp_1: いまゝでの事ハなんにもゆてくれな
verses.jp_2: 廿六日にはじめかけるで

verses.en: From now on, I shall make the minds of the world spirited and prepare to settle Nihon.
verses.ro: korekara wa sekai no kokoro isame kake   nihon osameru moyo suru zo ya
verses.jp_1: これからハせかいの心いさめかけ
verses.jp_2: にほんをさめるもよふするぞや

verses.en: The minds of human beings are indeed shallow. You talk only about things already visible.
verses.ro: ningen no kokoro to yu wa azanote   mietaru koto o bakari yu nari
verses.jp_1: にんけんの心とゆうハあざのふて
verses.jp_2: みへたる事をばかりゆうなり

verses.en: From now on, I shall talk only about things that have not appeared. Watch the future closely.
verses.ro: korekara wa nai koto bakari toite oku   korekara saki o tashika mite iyo
verses.jp_1: これからハない事ばかりといてをく
verses.jp_2: これからさきをたしかみていよ

verses.en: I shall begin to tell you about whatever things step by step, but never about things already visible.
verses.ro: dono yona koto mo dandan yuikakeru   mietaru koto wa sarani yuwan de
verses.jp_1: どのよふな事もたん／＼ゆいかける
verses.jp_2: みへたる事ハさらにゆハんで

verses.en: To set up quickly the central pillar of God, who began this world, is God's single desire.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimeta Kami no Shinbashira   hayaku tsuketai Kami no ichijo
verses.jp_1: このよふをはじめた神のしんばしら
verses.jp_2: はやくつけたい神の一ぢよ

verses.en: Listen and ponder step by step over the words and works of God, who is invisible to your eyes.
verses.ro: me ni men Kami no yu koto nasu koto o   dandan kiite shiyan shite miyo
verses.jp_1: めへにめん神のゆう事なす事を
verses.jp_2: たん／＼きいてしやんしてみよ

verses.en: You are thinking that the present path is at the mercy of the high places, but you are mistaken. It will be as God pleases.
verses.ro: ima no michi kami no mama ya to omote iru   kokoro chigau de Kami no mama nari
verses.jp_1: いまのみち上のまゝやとをもている
verses.jp_2: 心ちがうで神のまゝなり

verses.en: Those in high places are doing as they please with all the world. Do you not know the regret of God?
verses.ro: kami taru wa sekaiju o mamani suru   Kami no zannen kore o shiran ka
verses.jp_1: 上たるハせかいぢううをまゝにする
verses.jp_2: 神のざんねんこれをしらんか

verses.en: Until now, everything in the world has gone according to those in high places. From now on, there will be changes.
verses.ro: koremade wa yorozu sekai wa kami no mama   mo korekara wa monku kawaru zo
verses.jp_1: これまでハよろづせかいハ上のまゝ
verses.jp_2: もふこれからハもんくかハるぞ

verses.en: Since the time I began this world, I have not yet taught you everything.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimete kara wa nanimo kamo   toite kikashita koto wa nai node
verses.jp_1: このよふをはじめてからハなにもかも
verses.jp_2: といてきかした事ハないので

verses.en: Those in high places are thinking of the whole world on their own terms, but their minds are wrong.
verses.ro: kami taru wa sekaiju o waga mamani   omote iru no wa kokoro chigau de
verses.jp_1: 上たるハせかいぢううをハがまゝに
verses.jp_2: をもているのハ心ちかうで

verses.en: The trees which grow in the high mountains and the trees which grow in the low valleys are all the same.
verses.ro: takayama ni sodatsuru kii mo tanisoko ni   sodatsuru kii mo mina onaji koto
verses.jp_1: 高山にそだつる木もたにそこに
verses.jp_2: そたつる木もみなをなじ事

verses.en: All human bodies are things lent by God. Do you not know the free and unlimited workings of God?
verses.ro: ningen wa minamina Kami no kashimono ya   Kami no juyo kore o shiran ka
verses.jp_1: にんけんハみな／＼神のかしものや
verses.jp_2: 神のぢうよふこれをしらんか

verses.en: Let all of you in the world take care. There is no knowing when or where God will go.
verses.ro: ichiretsu wa minamina waga mi ki o tsuke yo   Kami ga nandoki doko e iku yara
verses.jp_2: 神がなんどきとこへいくやら

verses.en: Just a word: the hastening in the mind of God is solely to prepare to assemble useful timber.
verses.ro: choto hanashi Kami no kokoro no sekikomi wa   yoboku yoseru moyo bakari o
verses.jp_1: 一寸はなし神の心のせきこみハ
verses.jp_2: よふぼくよせるもよふばかりを

verses.en: Though there are many and varied trees, perhaps no one knows which will become useful timber.
verses.ro: dandan to oku tachiki mo aru keredo   dore ga yoboku naru ya shiremai
verses.jp_1: たん／＼とをふくたちきもあるけれど
verses.jp_2: どれがよふほくなるしれまい

verses.en: Of these timbers, it is not to be just a few. I desire a great number of timbers.
verses.ro: yoboku mo chotto no koto dewa nai hodoni   oku yoki ga hoshii koto kara
verses.jp_1: よふぼくも一寸の事でハないほどに
verses.jp_2: をふくよふきがほしい事から

verses.en: Day by day, I shall tend those trees which are to become My useful timber. Never take it to be illness.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni yoboku nitewa teiri suru   doko ga ashiki to sarani omouna
verses.jp_1: にち／＼によふほくにてわていりする
verses.jp_2: どこがあしきとさらにをもうな

verses.en: Among the trees, there will be some that I shall tend step by step and others that I shall let fall as they are.
verses.ro: onaji ki mo dandan teiri suru mo ari   sono mama kokasu kii mo aru nari
verses.jp_1: をなじきもたん／＼ていりするもあり
verses.jp_2: そのまゝこかすきいもあるなり

verses.en: This test for proof of all of My free and unlimited workings, I shall never do at any other place.
verses.ro: ika naru no juyojizai no kono tameshi   hoka naru toko de sarani sen zo ya
verses.jp_1: いかなるのぢうよじざいのこのためし
verses.jp_2: ほかなるとこでさらにせんぞや

verses.en: Until now, I have often taught you, saying that it is to be a test. Now at this time, I shall end the test.
verses.ro: imamade mo tameshi to yute toitaredo   mo konotabi wa tameshi osame ya
verses.jp_1: いまゝでもためしとゆうてといたれど
verses.jp_2: もふこのたびハためしをさめや

verses.en: This universe is the body of God. Ponder this in all matters step by step.
verses.ro: dandan to nani goto nitemo kono yo wa   Kami no karada ya shiyan shite miyo
verses.jp_1: たん／＼となに事にてもこのよふわ
verses.jp_2: 神のからだやしやんしてみよ

verses.en: At this time, as God is openly revealed, I shall teach you any and all things.
verses.ro: konotabi wa Kami ga omote i deteru kara   yorozu no koto o mina oshieru de
verses.jp_1: このたびハ神がをもていでゝるから
verses.jp_2: よろづの事をみなをしへるで

verses.en: So long as you remain unknowing that the body is a thing borrowed, you can understand nothing at all.
verses.ro: meme no minouchi yori no karimono o   shirazu ni ite wa nanimo wakaran
verses.jp_1: めへ／＼のみのうちよりのかりものを
verses.jp_2: しらずにいてハなにもわからん

verses.en: Ponder over it! There is nothing at all which should be called illness. It is but a road sign or an admonition from God.
verses.ro: shiyan seyo yamai to yute sarani nashi   Kami no michiose iken naru zo ya
verses.jp_1: しやんせよやまいとゆうてさらになし
verses.jp_2: 神のみちをせいけんなるぞや

verses.en: A slight ailment of the eyes, swellings, dizziness, and pain are but the guidance of God.
verses.ro: choto shitaru me no ashiku mo dekimono ya   nobose itami wa Kami no tebiki ya
verses.jp_1: 一寸したるめへのあしくもできものや
verses.jp_2: のぼせいたみハ神のてびきや

verses.en: Until now, among the high mountains no useful timber has yet appeared.
verses.ro: imamade wa takai yama ya to yuta tote   yoboku mieta koto wa nakeredo
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハ高い山やとゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: よふほくみへた事ハなけれど

verses.en: Hereafter, I shall make preparations to find useful timber step by step even in the high mountains.
verses.ro: konosaki wa takayama nitemo dandan to   yoboku midasu moyo suru zo ya
verses.jp_1: このさきハ高山にてもたん／＼と
verses.jp_2: よふぼくみだすもよふするぞや

verses.en: This preparation is for saving all humankind quickly. I shall make the minds of both the high and the low be spirited.
verses.ro: ichiretsu ni hayaku tasukeru kono moyo   kami shimo tomoni kokoro isamete
verses.jp_1: いちれつにはやくたすけるこのもよふ
verses.jp_2: 上下ともに心いさめで

verses.en: If the minds of the world are spirited day after day, the growth of all crops will be spirited, too.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni sekai no kokoro isamu nara   mono no ryuke wa mina isami deru
verses.jp_1: にち／＼にせかいの心いさむなら
verses.jp_2: ものゝりうけハみないさみでる

verses.en: Since My intent is single-hearted salvation in all matters, I desire to cut off the root of rebellion quickly.
verses.ro: nani nitemo tasuke ichijo de aru karani   muhon no ne o hayaku kiritai
verses.jp_1: なにゝてもたすけ一ちよであるからに
verses.jp_2: むほんねへをはやくきりたい

verses.en: The present path is covered with dust. Take up a broom and do the sweeping.
verses.ro: ima no michi hokori darake de aru karani   hoke o mochite soji o shitate
verses.jp_1: いまのみちほこりだらけであるからに
verses.jp_2: ほふけをもちてそうぢふしたて

verses.en: The path thereafter will be broad and clear. Take along with you as many others as you wish.
verses.ro: ato naru wa michi wa hirokute gomoku nashi   ikutari nari to tsurete tore yo
verses.jp_1: あとなるハみちハひろくでごもくなし
verses.jp_2: いくたりなりとつれてとふれよ

verses.en: I shall begin to speak at five on the twenty-second of the second month and teach you the causality of everything.
verses.ro: nii nii no nii no itsutsu ni hanashi kake   yorozu innen mina tokikikasu
verses.jp_1: 二二の二の五つにはなしかけ
verses.jp_2: よろついんねんみなときゝかす

verses.en: After listening to the sermons of those on the high mountains, listen to the teachings of God in Truth and ponder.
verses.ro: takayama no sekkyo kiite shinjitsu no   Kami no hanashi o kiite shiyan se
verses.jp_1: 高山のせきゝよきいてしんしつの
verses.jp_2: 神のはなしをきいてしやんせ

verses.en: Day after day, listen to the teachings of God step by step and enjoy them. It is the Divine Record.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no hanashi o dandan to   kiite tanoshime Koki naru zo ya
verses.jp_1: にち／＼に神のはなしをたん／＼と
verses.jp_2: きいてたのしめこふきなるぞや

verses.en: The present path: what kind of path do you think it is? Though it seems to you to be unclear,
verses.ro: ima no michi nanno michi ya to omote iru   nanika wakaran michi de aredomo
verses.jp_1: いまのみちなんのみちやとをもている
verses.jp_2: なにかわからんみちであれども

verses.en: I already see a broad path ahead. You are saying that it is over there, but it is already before you.
verses.ro: konosaki wa okwan michi ga miete aru   mo ako ni aru koko i kita nari
verses.jp_1: このさきハをふくハんみちがみへてある
verses.jp_2: もふあこにあるこゝいきたなり

verses.en: When do you think this day will come? On the fifth of the fifth month, it will definitely appear.
verses.ro: kono higara itsu no koto ya to omote iru   go gatsu itsuka ni tashika detekuru
verses.jp_1: このひがらいつの事やとをもている
verses.jp_2: 五月五日にたしかでゝくる

verses.en: Then a thanksgiving pilgrimage will begin. Look for it. People will come whether it be night or day.
verses.ro: sore yori mo okage hajimaru kore o miyo   yoru hiru shiren yoni naru zo ya
verses.jp_1: それよりもをかけはぢまるこれをみよ
verses.jp_2: よるひるしれんよふになるぞや

verses.en: By and by, when the sixth month comes, know that I shall grant the Proof-Amulet.
verses.ro: dandan to roku gatsu ni naru koto naraba   Shoko Mamori o suru to omoe yo
verses.jp_1: たん／＼と六月になる事ならば
verses.jp_2: しよこまむりをするとをもへよ

verses.en: After that, I shall hasten the construction step by step, and it will become busy in all matters.
verses.ro: sorekara wa dandan fushin sekikonde   nanika isogashi koto ni naru nari
verses.jp_1: それからハたん／＼ふしんせきこんで
verses.jp_2: なにかいそがし事になるなり

verses.en: From now on, the mind of God will hasten day by day. Be aware of it.
verses.ro: korekara wa Kami no kokoro wa nichinichi ni   sekikomi aru to omoikoso shire
verses.jp_1: これからハ神の心ハにち／＼に
verses.jp_2: せきこみあるとをもいこそしれ

verses.en: No matter how great My haste may be, I shall say nothing by word of mouth.
verses.ro: ika hodono oku sekikomi aru totemo   kuchi dewa nanimo yu de nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: いかほどのをふくせきこみあるとても
verses.jp_2: くちでハなにもゆうでないぞや

verses.en: I wish to let you know quickly of the many people that will come in the future.
verses.ro: konosaki wa oku miekuru hitobito o   hayaku shirashite oko to omoedo
verses.jp_1: このさきハをふくみへくる人ゞを
verses.jp_2: はやくしらしてをことをもゑど

verses.en: I see new faces coming one after another. Is there no one who can see them with his own eyes?
verses.ro: dandan to mezurashi hito ga miete aru   tare ga me nimo kore ga mien ka
verses.jp_1: だん／＼とめつらし人がみへてある
verses.jp_2: たれがめへにもこれがみゑんか

verses.en: Watch this marvelous path. There will be a mountain of stories about it from now on.
verses.ro: korekara no ato naru hanashi yamayama no   michi o mite iyo mezurashiki michi
verses.jp_1: これからのあとなるはなし山／＼の
verses.jp_2: みちをみていよめづらしきみち

verses.en: How delightful it will be! So many people will assemble, coming to ask for the gifts of heaven.
verses.ro: omoshiro ya oku no hito ga atsumarite   ten no atae to yute kuru zo ya
verses.jp_1: をもしろやをふくの人があつまりて
verses.jp_2: 天のあたゑとゆうてくるそや

verses.en: Day by day, disorders will befall you, and you will come again. But no one knows how impatiently God waits.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni mi ni sawari tsuku mata kita ka   Kami no machikane kore o shirazu ni
verses.jp_1: にち／＼にみにさハりつくまたきたか
verses.jp_2: 神のまちかねこれをしらすに

verses.en: Step by step, the performers of the Service will all assemble. Taking this as a sign, I shall begin all My workings.
verses.ro: dandan to Tsutome no ninju te ga soroi   kore o aizu ni nanimo dekakeru
verses.jp_1: だん／＼とつとめのにんぢうてがそろい
verses.jp_2: これをあいつになにもでかける

verses.en: Day after day, I desire to make the mind of God quickly known to the minds of the high places step by step.
verses.ro: nichinichi no Kami no kokoro wa dandan to   kami no kokoro ni hayaku misetara
verses.jp_1: にち／＼の神の心わだん／＼と
verses.jp_2: 上の心にはやくみせたら

verses.en: Knowing nothing, those in high places obey those of Kara. How pitiful are such minds.
verses.ro: kami taru wa nanimo shirazu ni tojin o   shitagau kokoro kore ga okashii
verses.jp_1: 上たるわなにもしらずにとふぢんを
verses.jp_2: したがう心これがをかしい

verses.en: Day after day, the mind of God impatiently awaits those of Kara to replace their minds entirely.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no kokoro no sekikomi wa   tojin korori kore o matsu nari
verses.jp_1: にち／＼に神の心のせきこみハ
verses.jp_2: とふぢんころりこれをまつなり

verses.en: Remember what followed the epidemic of the cows in the past. Let all of you in high places beware.
verses.ro: imamade no ushi no sakimichi omote miyo   kami taru tokoro mina ki o tsuke yo
verses.jp_1: いまゝでのうしのさきみちをもてみよ
verses.jp_2: 上たるところみなきをつけよ

verses.en: If only all of this comes to be seen, all the minds of the world will be spirited.
verses.ro: kore saika mina mie kitaru koto naraba   sekai no kokoro mina isami kuru
verses.jp_1: これさいかみなみへきたる事ならば
verses.jp_2: せかいの心みないさみくる

verses.en: If the minds of the world are spirited in all matters, the mind of God, also, will be spirited.
verses.ro: nani nitemo sekai no kokoro isamu nara   Kami no kokoro mo mina isamu nari
verses.jp_1: なにゝてもせかいの心いさむなら
verses.jp_2: 神の心もみないさむなり

verses.en: What do you think the path of today is about? Marvelous things will come into sight.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa ika naru michi to omou kana   mezurashi koto ga miete kuru zo ya
verses.jp_1: けふの日ハいかなるみちとをもうかな
verses.jp_2: めづらし事がみゑてくるぞや

verses.en: Step by step, all things will come into sight. Whatever your path may be, take delight in it all.
verses.ro: dandan ni nanika no koto mo miete kuru   ika naru michi mo mina tanoshime yo
verses.jp_1: だん／＼になにかの事もみへてくる
verses.jp_2: いかなるみちもみなたのしめよ

verses.en: If the hand movements of the Joyous Service are learned day by day, how delighted God will be.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Yoki-zutome no te ga tsukeba   Kami no tanoshimi ika hodono koto
verses.jp_1: にち／＼によふきづとめのてがつけば
verses.jp_2: 神のたのしゆみいかほとの事

verses.en: I impatiently await the performers of the Service to gather quickly. What are you close to Me thinking?
verses.ro: hayabaya to Tsutome no ninju machikaneru   soba na kokoro wa nani o omou ya
verses.jp_1: はや／＼とつとめのにんぢうまちかねる
verses.jp_2: そばな心わなにをふもうや

verses.en: Nothing should be called illness. Should your body be afflicted, it is God's call for your service.
verses.ro: ika naru no yamai to yute nai keredo   mi ni sawari tsuku Kami no yomuki
verses.jp_1: いかなるのやまいとゆうてないけれど
verses.jp_2: みにさわりつく神のよふむき

verses.en: This call for your service might not easily be understood, for the thoughts of God are mountainous.
verses.ro: yomuki mo nanino koto yara choto shiren   Kami no omowaku yamayama no koto
verses.jp_1: よふむきもなにの事やら一寸しれん
verses.jp_2: 神のをもわくやま／＼の事

verses.en: If all the thoughts of God about everything are taught to you, your minds will be spirited.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo Kami no omowaku nani nitemo   mina toita nara kokoro isamu de
verses.jp_1: なにもかも神のをもハくなにゝても
verses.jp_2: みなといたなら心いさむで

verses.en: When I have taught you all of My thoughts step by step, your bodies, too, will be refreshed.
verses.ro: dandan ni nanimo omowaku tokikireba   minouchi yori mo susuyaka ni naru
verses.jp_1: だん／＼になにもをもハくときゝれば
verses.jp_2: みのうちよりもすゝやかになる

verses.en: Again, I impatiently await the coming Joyous Service. What it is, is the Kagura Service.
verses.ro: matasaki no Yoki-zutome o machikaneru   nanno koto nara Kagura-zutome ya
verses.jp_1: またさきのよふきづとめをまちかねる
verses.jp_2: なんの事ならかぐらつとめや

verses.en: Though there are many people throughout the world, there is no one who knows the mind of God.
verses.ro: sekaiju oku no hito de aru keredo   Kami no kokoro o shirita mono nashi
verses.jp_1: せかいぢうをふくの人であるけれど
verses.jp_2: 神の心をしりたものなし

verses.en: This time, I shall teach you in detail all of the truth in the mind of God.
verses.ro: konotabi wa Kami no kokoro no shinjitsu o   nanika isai o mina oshieru de
verses.jp_1: このたびハ神の心のしんぢつを
verses.jp_2: なにかいさいをみなをしゑるで

verses.en: In all matters, if you come to know the truth of single-heartedness with God, you will never be overcome by Kara.
verses.ro: nani nitemo Kami ichijo o shirita nara   kara ni makeso na koto wa nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: なにゝても神一ちよをしりたなら
verses.jp_2: からにまけそな事ハないぞや

verses.en: Hereafter, My only concern will be the preparations quickly to distinguish between Kara and Nihon step by step.
verses.ro: konosaki wa kara to nihon o sumiyaka ni   dandan wakeru moyo bakari o
verses.jp_1: このさきハからとにほんをすみやかに
verses.jp_2: だん／＼ハけるもよふばかりを

verses.en: If only this distinction is made quickly, the regret of God will be cleared away.
verses.ro: kore saika hayaku wakarita koto naraba   Kami no zannen hareru koto nari
verses.jp_1: これさいかはやくわかりた事ならば
verses.jp_2: 神のざんねんはれる事なり

verses.en: If the regret of God in Truth is cleared away, all minds in the world will be spirited.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no Kami no zannen hareta nara   sekai no kokoro mina isami deru
verses.jp_1: しんぢつの神のざんねんはれたなら
verses.jp_2: せかいの心みないさみでる

verses.en: Step by step, I am solely making preparations truly to save the whole world.
verses.ro: dandan to sekaiju o shinjitsu ni   tasukeru moyo bakari suru zo ya
verses.jp_1: だん／＼とせかいぢううをしんぢつに
verses.jp_2: たすけるもよふはかりするぞや

verses.en: After that, you may stay as long as you wish, without illness, death, or weakening.
verses.ro: sono nochi wa yamazu shinazu ni yowarazu ni   kokoro shidai ni itsu made mo iyo
verses.jp_1: そのゝちハやまずしなすによハらすに
verses.jp_2: 心したいにいつまでもいよ

verses.en: Further, after the passage of long years, there will be no aging at all.
verses.ro: matasaki wa nengen tachita koto naraba   toshi o yoru me wa sarani nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: またさきハねんけんたちた事ならば
verses.jp_2: としをよるめハさらにないぞや

verses.en: Until now, you have known nothing, but from now on I shall teach you everything.
verses.ro: imamade wa nanino koto demo shirenanda   korekara saki wa mina oshieru de
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハなにの事でもしれなんだ
verses.jp_2: これからさきハみなをしゑるで

verses.en: At present, the minds of all, as well as the minds of those within, are greatly mistaken.
verses.ro: ima dewa na mina no kokoro to uchi naru no   kokoro ga oi chigai naredomo
verses.jp_1: いまてハなみなの心とうちなるの
verses.jp_2: 心かをふいちがいなれども

verses.en: From tomorrow on, I shall begin to request anything of you. You must follow the words of God.
verses.ro: asunichi wa nandemo tanomi kakeru de na   Kami no iijo ni tsukaneba naran
verses.jp_1: あすにちハなんでもたのみかけるでな
verses.jp_2: 神のいぢよにつかねばならん

verses.en: Day by day, disorders will come to your bodies. Ponder over it! God is informing you of your mistaken minds.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni mi ni sawari tsuku tokushin se   kokoro chigai o Kami ga shirasuru
verses.jp_1: にち／＼にみにさハりつくとくしんせ
verses.jp_2: 心ちがいを神がしらする

verses.en: Each of you, after pondering over the body, resolve the mind and lean on God.
verses.ro: meme no minouchi yori mo shiyan shite   kokoro sadamete Kami ni motare yo
verses.jp_1: めへ／＼のみのうちよりもしやんして
verses.jp_2: 心さだめて神にもたれよ

verses.en: The thoughts of God about all matters are profound, but you close to Me are unaware of this.
verses.ro: nani nitemo Kami no omowaku fukaku aru   soba naru mono wa sore o shirazu ni
verses.jp_1: なにゝても神のをもわくふかくある
verses.jp_2: そばなるものハそれをしらすに

verses.en: Until today, you have not been able to see any path whatever. It can be seen quickly. Ponder and resolve.
verses.ro: kyomade wa nani yono michi mo miene domo   hayaku mieru de shiyan sadame yo
verses.jp_1: けふまでハなによのみちもみへねども
verses.jp_2: はやくみゑるでしやんさだめよ

verses.en: Though I wish to have you know this path quickly, it is difficult because there is no understanding.
verses.ro: kono michi o hayaku shiraso to omoe domo   satori ga note kore ga mutsukashi
verses.jp_1: このみちをはやくしらそとをもへども
verses.jp_2: さとりがのふてこれがむつかし

verses.en: Though I have made it known by My writing brush step by step, your lack of understanding is the regret of God.
verses.ro: dandan to fude ni shirashite aru keredo   satori nai no ga Kami no zannen
verses.jp_1: たん／＼とふでにしらしてあるけれど
verses.jp_2: さとりないのが神のざんねん

verses.en: In everything, listen closely to the words of God. Everything depends on the mind of each of you.
verses.ro: nani nitemo Kami no yu koto shikato kike   mina meme no kokoro shidai ya
verses.jp_1: なにゝても神のゆう事しかときけ
verses.jp_2: みなめゑめの心しだいや

verses.en: Truly be spirited and ponder. Then lean on God and do the Joyous Service.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni kokoro isande shiyan shite   Kami ni motarete Yoki-zutome o
verses.jp_1: しんぢつに心いさんでしやんして
verses.jp_2: 神にもたれてよふきづとめを

verses.en: Do not wonder what this talk is about. It is solely about the matter of the fertilizer.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nanino koto ya to omouna yo   koe ichijo no hanashi naru zo ya
verses.jp_1: このはなしなにの事やとをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: こゑ一ぢよのはなしなるぞや

verses.en: This fertilizer: do not wonder what is effective. The mind's true sincerity is its effectiveness.
verses.ro: koe ya tote nani ga kiku towa omouna yo   kokoro no makoto shinjitsu ga kiku
verses.jp_1: こへやとてなにがきくとハをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: 心のまことしんぢつがきく

verses.en: When I have discerned your mind of sincerity, know that I shall provide any protection.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no kokoro misadame tsuita nara   ikana shugo mo suru to omoe yo
verses.jp_1: しんぢつの心みさだめついたなら
verses.jp_2: いかなしゆこふもするとをもゑよ

verses.en: Listen closely! I teach all things to everyone. I do not discriminate among any of you ever.
