verses.ro: shikato kike yorozu no koto o mina oshie   doko ni hedate wa sarani nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: しかときけよろつの事をみなをしへ
verses.jp_2: どこにへだてわさらにないぞや

verses.en: People come to Me from whatever places. It is because they all are of the original causality.
verses.ro: dono yona tokoro no hito ga detekite mo   mina innen no mono de aru kara
verses.jp_1: どのよふなところの人がでゝきても
verses.jp_2: みないんねんのものであるから

verses.en: This is the Residence where I began human beings. Because of this causality, it is here that I descended.
verses.ro: ningen o hajime dashitaru yashiki nari   sono innen de amakudarita de
verses.jp_1: にんけんをはじめだしたるやしきなり
verses.jp_2: そのいんねんであまくたりたで

verses.en: Hereafter, I shall teach all about My workings for the salvation of everyone throughout the world.
verses.ro: konosaki wa sekaiju o ichiretsu ni   tasuke shugo o mina oshieru de
verses.jp_1: このさきハせかいぢううを一れつに
verses.jp_2: たすけしゆごふをみなをしゑるで

verses.en: I shall teach all about universal salvation step by step, and solely distinguish between Kara and Nihon.
verses.ro: dandan to yorozu tasuke o mina oshie   kara to nihon o wakeru bakari ya
verses.jp_1: だん／＼とよろづたすけをみなをしへ
verses.jp_2: からとにほんをわけるばかりや

verses.en: Day after day, the path that distinguishes between Kara and Nihon: this is the single intent of God's hastening.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni kara to nihon o wakeru michi   Kami no sekikomi kore ga ichijo
verses.jp_1: にち／＼にからとにほんをわけるみち
verses.jp_2: 神のせきこみこれが一ぢよ

verses.en: If this path is quickly distinguished, everything will proceed as God intends.
verses.ro: kono michi o hayaku waketaru koto naraba   ato no yorozu wa Kami no mama nari
verses.jp_1: このみちをはやくわけたる事ならば
verses.jp_2: あとのよろづハ神のまゝなり

verses.en: Today is the beginning of marvelous things. All of you will come along with Me because of the original causality.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa nanika mezurashi hajime dashi   yorozu innen mina tsuite kuru
verses.jp_1: けふの日ハなにかめづらしはじめだし
verses.jp_2: よろづいんねんみなついてくる

verses.en: About causality: though people are numerous, never think that I discriminate among any of you.
verses.ro: innen mo oku no hito de aru karani   doko ni hedate wa aru to omouna
verses.jp_1: いんねんもをふくの人であるからに
verses.jp_2: とこにへだてハあるとをもうな

verses.en: To God, who began this world, all of you in the world are equally My beloved children.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimeta Kami no koto naraba   sekai ichiretsu mina waga ko nari
verses.jp_1: このよふを初た神の事ならば
verses.jp_2: せかい一れつみなわがこなり

verses.en: Because of My love for all My children, I exhaust My mind in every kind of way.
verses.ro: ichiretsu no kodomo ga kawai sore yue ni   iroiro kokoro tsukushi kiru nari
verses.jp_1: いちれつのこともがかハいそれゆへに
verses.jp_2: いろ／＼心つくしきるなり

verses.en: I desire to teach everything to you children quickly. Take notice of this hastening in the mind of God!
verses.ro: kono kodomo nanimo oshiete hayabaya to   Kami no kokoro no sekikomi o miyo
verses.jp_2: 神の心のせきこみをみよ

verses.en: I wait impatiently for My children to awaken to the truth. There is nothing else in the thoughts of God.
verses.ro: dandan to kodomo no shusse machikaneru   Kami no omowaku kore bakari nari
verses.jp_1: だん／＼とこどものしゆせまちかねる
verses.jp_2: 神のをもわくこればかりなり

verses.en: If I can only bring My children out into the open, I shall change Kara into Nihon.
verses.ro: kodomo sai hayaku omote i dashita nara   kara o nihon no jii ni suru nari
verses.jp_1: こどもさいはやくをもていだしたなら
verses.jp_2: からをにほんのぢいにするなり

verses.en: Make your minds truly firm, all My children! The mind of God only hastens.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni kodomo no kokoro shikato seyo   Kami no kokoro wa seku bakari ya de
verses.jp_1: しんぢつにこどもの心しかとせよ
verses.jp_2: 神の心ハせくばかりやで

verses.en: Day after day, God hastens in agony. Please, quickly make preparations for salvation.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no sekikomi kono nayami   hayaku tasukeru moyo shite kure
verses.jp_1: にち／＼に神のせきこみこのなやみ
verses.jp_2: はやくたすけるもよふしてくれ

verses.en: Thinking of the high places, those of you within are depressed. But fear not, for God assures you.
verses.ro: uchi naru wa kami o omote izumi iru   kowami nai zo ya Kami no ukeyai
verses.jp_1: うちなるハ上をふもふていづみいる
verses.jp_2: こわみないぞや神のうけやい

verses.en: The path already differs from what it once was. Hurry! Hasten to the broad path!
verses.ro: imamade to michi ga kawarite aru hodoni   hayaku sekikomi okwan no michi
verses.jp_1: いまゝでとみちがかわりてあるほどに
verses.jp_2: はやくせきこみをふくハんのみち

verses.en: You are wondering when this path will come. Come out quickly, now is the time!
verses.ro: kono michi wa itsu no koto ya to omote iru   hayaku dete miyo mo ima no koto
verses.jp_1: このみちハいつの事やとをもている
verses.jp_2: はやくてゝみよもふいまの事

verses.en: Step by step, I have informed you by My writing brush. Quickly awaken your mind to it!
verses.ro: dandan to fude ni shirashite aru hodoni   hayaku kokoro ni satori toru yo
verses.jp_1: だん／＼とふてにしらしてあるほどに
verses.jp_2: はやく心にさとりとるよふ

verses.en: If you only come to understand this quickly, your sufferings of the body will be cleared away.
verses.ro: kore saika hayaku satori ga tsuita nara   minouchi nayami suzuyaka ni naru
verses.jp_1: これさいかはやくさとりがついたなら
verses.jp_2: みのうちなやみすゞやかになる

verses.en: About the Service: first the Teodori, then the Kagura. Thus, I have opened just a narrow path.
verses.ro: Tsutome demo hajime Teodori mata Kagura   choto no hosomichi tsukete aredomo
verses.jp_1: つとめても初てをどりまたかぐら
verses.jp_2: 一寸のほそみちつけてあれども

verses.en: But weeds have gradually grown thick and the path is obscure. Quickly, the preparations to open the main path!
verses.ro: dandan to kusa ga shikorite michi shirezu   hayaku honmichi tsukeru moyo o
verses.jp_1: だん／＼とくさがしこりてみちしれす
verses.jp_2: はやくほんみちつけるもよふを

verses.en: Day after day, hasten with spirited minds. If only the main path be quickly opened...
verses.ro: nichinichi ni kokoro isande sekikome yo   hayaku honmichi tsuketa koto nara
verses.jp_1: にち／＼に心いさんでせきこめよ
verses.jp_2: はやくほんみちつけた事なら

verses.en: When this main path is truly opened, thereafter you will lead a life full of joy and promise.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni kono honmichi ga tsuita nara   sue wa tanomoshi yokizukume ya
verses.jp_1: しんぢつにこのほんみちがついたなら
verses.jp_2: すへハたのもしよふきづくめや

verses.en: Even more do I hasten to save the villagers. Please ponder quickly!
verses.ro: murakata wa naomo tasuke o sete iru   hayaku shiyan o shite kureru yo
verses.jp_1: 村かたハなをもたすけをせへている
verses.jp_2: はやくしやんをしてくれるよふ

verses.en: To God, people throughout the world are all My children. All of you equally, know that I am your Parent!
verses.ro: sekaiju Kami no ta niwa mina waga ko   ichiretsu wa mina Oya to omoe yo
verses.jp_1: せかいぢう神のたあにハみなわがこ
verses.jp_2: 一れつハみなをやとをもゑよ

verses.en: Throughout the world, I have begun what is known as sermons. When they are delivered, you may go and hear them.
verses.ro: sekaiju sekkyo to shite hajime kake   toite kikasuru kiki ni iku nari
verses.jp_1: せかいぢうせきゝよとしてはちめかけ
verses.jp_2: といてきかするきゝにいくなり

verses.en: Whatever may be said about things already seen, unless the origin is known, there can be no understanding.
verses.ro: ika hodoni mietaru koto o yuta tote   moto o shiraneba wakaru me wa nashi
verses.jp_1: いかほどにみゑたる事をゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: もとをしらねばハかるめハなし

verses.en: Step by step, I shall tell you solely about things unknown. When they appear, you will know that it is the truth.
verses.ro: dandan to nai koto bakari yute oite   sore deta naraba kore ga makoto ya
verses.jp_1: だん／＼とない事ばかりゆてをいて
verses.jp_2: それでたならばこれがまことや

verses.en: All of you children who lean on God, quickly make preparations to go out into the open.
verses.ro: ichiretsu ni Kami ni motareru kono kodomo   hayaku omote i deru moyo seyo
verses.jp_1: 一れつに神にもたれるこのこども
verses.jp_2: はやくをもていでるもよふせよ

verses.en: If you truly desire to go out into the open, calm your mind and seek the core.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni omote deyo to omou nara   kokoro shizumete shin o tazune yo
verses.jp_1: しんぢつにをもてゞよふとをもうなら
verses.jp_2: 心しづめてしんをたづねよ

verses.en: You children, when the innermost heart has been truly ascertained, you shall have all My arrangements.
verses.ro: kono kodomo shinjitsu yori mo mune no uchi   misadame tsukeba ikana moyo mo
verses.jp_1: このこどもしんぢつよりもむねのうち
verses.jp_2: みさだめつけばいかなもよふも

verses.en: Though the mind of God hastens day after day, there is no understanding in the minds of you children.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no kokoro wa sekikomedo   kodomo no kokoro wakari nai node
verses.jp_1: にち／＼に神の心わせきこめど
verses.jp_2: こともの心わかりないので

verses.en: With My children, as their number is not small, there are so many whose heart is yet without understanding.
verses.ro: kodomo demo chotto no hito dewa nai karani   oku no mune ga sarani wakaran
verses.jp_1: こともでも一寸の人でハないからに
verses.jp_2: をふくのむねがさらにハからん

verses.en: Even until now, though people speak highly of a thing called learning, no one knows of things yet unseen.
verses.ro: imamade wa gakumon nazo to yuta tote   miete nai koto sarani shiromai
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハがくもんなぞとゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: みゑてない事さらにしろまい

verses.en: Hereafter, I shall teach you any and all things yet unseen, step by step.
verses.ro: konosaki wa miete nai koto dandan to   yorozu no koto o mina toite oku
verses.jp_1: このさきハみへてない事だん／＼と
verses.jp_2: よろずの事をみなといてをく

verses.en: From now on, step by step, I shall teach you the Service unknown since this world began and train you in its hand movements.
verses.ro: korekara wa kono yo hajimete nai Tsutome   dandan oshie te o tsukeru nari
verses.jp_1: これからハこのよはじめてないつとめ
verses.jp_2: だん／＼をしへてをつけるなり

verses.en: This Service is the path of salvation for the entire world. I shall enable even a mute to speak.
verses.ro: kono Tsutome sekaiju no tasuke michi   oshi demo mono o yuwasu koto nari
verses.jp_1: このつとめせかいぢううのたすけみち
verses.jp_2: をしでもものをゆハす事なり

verses.en: Be firm day after day, you performers of the Service! Calm your minds and learn the hand movements quickly!
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Tsutome no ninju shikato seyo   kokoro shizumete hayaku te o tsuke
verses.jp_1: にち／＼につとめのにんぢうしかとせよ
verses.jp_2: 心しづめてはやくてをつけ

verses.en: What do you think this Service is about? It is solely to bring peace to the world and salvation to all.
verses.ro: kono Tsutome nanino koto ya to omote iru   sekai osamete tasuke bakari o
verses.jp_1: このつとめなにの事やとをもている
verses.jp_2: せかいをさめてたすけばかりを

verses.en: When this path is clearly seen, the root of illness will be cut off entirely.
verses.ro: kono michi ga tashika mietaru koto naraba   yamai no ne wa kirete shimau de
verses.jp_1: このみちがたしかみゑたる事ならば
verses.jp_2: やまいのねゑわきれてしまうで

verses.en: According to your mind of sincerity, I deny My protection to no one, whoever you may be.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no kokoro shidai ni izukata mo   ikana shugo mo sen to yuwan de
verses.jp_1: しんぢつの心しだいにいづかたも
verses.jp_2: いかなしゆごふもせんとゆハんで

verses.en: About the present path: God is hastening. Those of you within need not worry. Watch carefully!
verses.ro: ima no michi Kami no sekikomi uchi naru wa   anji nai zo ya shikato mite iyo
verses.jp_1: いまのみち神のせきこみうちなるハ
verses.jp_2: あんぢないぞやしかとみていよ

verses.en: I have already told you the path will be changed from what it was until now. There is no mistake in what God says.
verses.ro: koremade to michi ga kawaru to yute aru   Kami wa chigota koto wa yuwan de
verses.jp_1: これまでとみちがかわるとゆうてある
verses.jp_2: 神ハちごふた事ハゆハんで

verses.en: Hereafter, I shall not be able to tell you of this growing impatience in the mind of God, even should I so desire.
verses.ro: konosaki wa Kami no kokoro no sekikomi o   kuchi dewa domu yu ni yuwaren
verses.jp_1: このさきハ神の心のせきこみを
verses.jp_2: くちでハどふむゆうにゆハれん

verses.en: However difficult it may be, if things are left untold, there will be no chance of understanding.
verses.ro: ika hodoni mutsukashi koto to yuta tote   tokazu ni ite wa wakaru me wa nashi
verses.jp_1: いかほどにむつかし事とゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: とかすにいてハわかるめハなし

verses.en: Day by day and step by step, I shall teach you the thoughts of God. Please listen to Me.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no omowaku dandan to   toite oku zo ya kore kiite kure
verses.jp_1: にち／＼に神のをもわくだんだんと
verses.jp_2: といてをくぞやこれきいてくれ

verses.en: This path may be somewhat difficult, but it is marvelous indeed. Watch it carefully.
verses.ro: kono michi wa nanika mutsukashi mezurashii   michi de aru zo ya tashika mite iyo
verses.jp_1: このみちハなにかむつかしめつらしい
verses.jp_2: みちであるぞやたしかみていよ

verses.en: After you have completed taking this path, Kara will have become part of Nihon.
verses.ro: kono michi o torinuketara sonosaki wa   kara wa nihon no jii ni shite aru
verses.jp_1: このみちをとふりぬけたらそのさきハ
verses.jp_2: からハにほんのぢいにしてある

verses.en: When Kara becomes Nihon, this will be the passage to eternal joy.
verses.ro: kara no ji o nihon no jii ni shita naraba   kore matsudai no iki dori nari
verses.jp_1: からのぢをにほんぢいにしたならば
verses.jp_2: これまつだいのいきどふりなり

verses.en: The high places rule this world, but Heaven is also high. I shall make a distinction between the minds of the high places and the mind of God.
verses.ro: kono yo o osameru mo kami ten mo Kami   kami to Kami to no kokoro wakeru de
verses.jp_1: このよふを納も上天もかみ
verses.jp_2: 上と神との心わけるで

verses.en: Step by step, I shall tell you about things yet unseen. When they come into sight in the future, it is God!
verses.ro: dandan to mien koto oba yute oite   saki de mietara kore ga Kami ya de
verses.jp_1: だん／＼とみゑん事をばゆてをいて
verses.jp_2: さきでみゑたらこれが神やで

verses.en: No matter what people say about things already seen, if what is said is not seen in the future, perhaps there is no understanding.
verses.ro: ika hodoni mietaru koto o yuta tote   saki de mieneba wakari arumai
verses.jp_1: いかほどにみゑたる事をゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: さきでみゑねはわかりあるまい

verses.en: From now on, I shall bring understanding by making a distinction in the innermost hearts of both the high and the low all over the world.
verses.ro: korekara wa sekaiju no mune no uchi   kami shimo tomoni wakete miseru de
verses.jp_1: これからハせかいぢううのむねのうち
verses.jp_2: 上下ともにわけてみせるで

verses.en: Watch! I shall cleanse the innermost hearts of those within and all others in the world without discrimination.
verses.ro: kore o miyo sekai mo uchi mo hedate nai   mune no uchi yori soji suru zo ya
verses.jp_1: これをみよせかいもうちもへたてない
verses.jp_2: むねのうちよりそふぢするぞや

verses.en: This cleansing will be a difficult matter, but I say to you beforehand: there is nothing to be called illness.
verses.ro: kono soji mutsukashi koto de aru keredo   yamai to yu wa nai to yute oku
verses.jp_1: このそふぢむつかし事であるけれど
verses.jp_2: やまいとゆうわないとゆてをく

verses.en: Whatever pains, sufferings, tumors, fevers, or looseness of the bowels: all are from dust.
verses.ro: dono yona itami nayami mo dekemono ya   netsu mo kudari mo mina hokori ya de
verses.jp_1: どのよふないたみなやみもでけものや
verses.jp_2: ねつもくだりもみなほこりやで

verses.en: Not since I began this world have I taught everything to those in high places.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimete karani nanimo kamo   kami e oshieta koto wa arumai
verses.jp_1: このよふを初てからになにもかも
verses.jp_2: 上ゑをしへた事ハあるまい

verses.en: This time, if I should inform those in high places about the truth of any and all matters,
verses.ro: konotabi wa nanika yorozu o kami taru e   shirashite oita koto de aru nara
verses.jp_1: このたびハなにかよろづを上たるゑ
verses.jp_2: しらしてをいた事であるなら

verses.en: Then, some among them may ponder. And if they all gather and speak to one another,
verses.ro: sorekara wa naka niwa shiyan suru mo aro   mina yoriyote hanashi shita nara
verses.jp_1: それからハなかにハしやんするもあろ
verses.jp_2: みなよりよふてはなししたなら

verses.en: Some among them will understand and truly feel hopeful over the teachings.
verses.ro: sono naka ni shinjitsu kokoro tanomoshii   omote shiyan o suru mono mo aru
verses.jp_1: そのなかにしんぢつ心たのもしい
verses.jp_2: をもてしやんをするものもある

verses.en: When this path reaches through to the high places, God will reveal free and unlimited workings at once.
verses.ro: kono michi o kami e torita koto naraba   Kami no juyo suguni arawasu
verses.jp_1: このみちを上ゑとふりた事ならば
verses.jp_2: 神のぢうよふすぐにあらわす

verses.en: I have not yet shown you any of the free and unlimited workings of God, who began this world.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimeta Kami no juyo o   misetaru koto wa sarani nai node
verses.jp_1: このよふを初た神のぢうよふを
verses.jp_2: みせたる事ハさらにないので

verses.en: In everything, as long as you know nothing, you remain as you are. But if I let you know of God's free and unlimited workings,
verses.ro: nani nitemo shiran aida wa sono mama ya   Kami no juyo shirashitaru nara
verses.jp_1: なにゝてもしらんあいだハそのまゝや
verses.jp_2: 神のぢうよふしらしたるなら

verses.en: On hearing of it, all of you in the world must ponder. Any and all matters are according to the mind.
verses.ro: kore kiite mina ichiretsu wa shiyan seyo   nanika yorozu wa kokoro shidai ya
verses.jp_1: これきいてみな一れつわしやんせよ
verses.jp_2: なにかよろつハ心しだいや

verses.en: Today, nothing can be seen, but be watchful! In the sixth month, everything will begin to appear.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa nani ga mieru ya nai keredo   roku gatsu o miyo mina dekakeru de
verses.jp_1: けふの日ハなにがみへるやないけれど
verses.jp_2: 六月をみよみなでかけるで

verses.en: Until now, the high mountains have been boastful while the low valleys withered.
verses.ro: imamade wa takai yama ya to yute iru   tanisoko nitewa shiken bakari o
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハ高い山やとゆうている
verses.jp_2: たにそこにてハしけんばかりを

verses.en: From now on, I shall teach both the high mountains and the low valleys about the beginnings of origin.
verses.ro: korekara wa takayama nitemo tanisoko mo   moto hajimari o yute kikasuru
verses.jp_1: これからわ高山にてもたにそこも
verses.jp_2: もとはじまりをゆうてきかする

verses.en: The beginning of this universe was a muddy ocean. Therein were only loaches.
verses.ro: kono yo no hajimari dashi wa doro no umi   sono naka yori mo dojo bakari ya
verses.jp_1: このよふのはぢまりだしハとろのうみ
verses.jp_2: そのなかよりもどちよばかりや

verses.en: What do you think these loaches were? They were the very seeds of human beings.
verses.ro: kono dojo nanino koto ya to omote iru   kore ningen no tane de aru zo ya
verses.jp_1: このどぢよなにの事やとをもている
verses.jp_2: これにんけんのたねであるそや

verses.en: God drew them up and consumed them all, and through providence brought them up into human beings step by step.
verses.ro: kono mono o Kami ga hikiage kute shimote   dandan shugo ningen to nashi
verses.jp_1: このものを神がひきあけくてしもて
verses.jp_2: だん／＼しゆごふにんけんとなし

verses.en: From that time on, God's providence has been by no means an easy matter.
verses.ro: soreyori mo Kami no shugo to yu mono wa   nami taitei na koto de nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: それよりも神のしゆことゆうものわ
verses.jp_2: なみたいていな事でないぞや

verses.en: Do not think of this talk as being trivial. I desire to save all people in the world.
verses.ro: kono hanashi chotto no koto ya to omouna yo   sekai ichiretsu tasuketai kara
verses.jp_1: このはなし一寸の事やとをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: せかい一れつたすけたいから

verses.en: Know that the mind of God is truly filled with deep concerns for you day after day.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no kokoro no shinjitsu wa   fukai omowaku aru to omoe yo
verses.jp_1: にち／＼に神の心のしんぢつわ
verses.jp_2: ふかいをもわくあるとをもへよ

verses.en: Until now, to God's regret, Nihon has been dominated, obeying those of Kara.
verses.ro: imamade wa nihon ga kara ni shitagote   mamani shirareta Kami no zannen
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハにほんかからにしたごふて
verses.jp_2: まゝにしられた神のざんねん

verses.en: Watch the workings of God given in return! No one will be able to imitate Me, whoever one may be.
verses.ro: kono kayashi Kami no hataraki kore o miyo   ikana mono demo mane wa dekemai
verses.jp_1: このかやし神のはたらきこれをみよ
verses.jp_2: いかなものでもまねわでけまい

verses.en: No matter how strong they may be, if God should withdraw, they will be powerless.
verses.ro: ika hodono goteki taru to yuta tote   Kami ga shirizoku kore kanaimai
verses.jp_1: いかほどのごふてきたるとゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: 神がしりぞくこれかないまい

verses.en: It is the same as this for everyone in all matters. Know that God will work freely and unlimitedly.
verses.ro: nani nitemo mina ichiretsu wa kono dori   Kami ga juyo suru to omoe yo
verses.jp_1: なにゝてもみな一れつハこのどふり
verses.jp_2: 神がぢうよふするとをもゑよ

verses.en: Ponder well! No matter how young, old, or weak you may be, I shall give you My free and unlimited workings according to your mind.
verses.ro: shiyan seyo wakai toshiyori yowaki demo   kokoro shidai ni ikana juyo
verses.jp_1: しやんせよハかいとしよりよハきでも
verses.jp_2: 心しだいにいかなぢうよふ

verses.en: Even until now, though you have lived in the same way, none of you has known of God's free and unlimited workings.
verses.ro: imamade mo onaji kurashite itaru tomo   Kami no juyo shirita mono nashi
verses.jp_1: いまゝでもをなぢくらしていたるとも
verses.jp_2: 神のぢうよふしりたものなし

verses.en: From now on, I shall teach you about any and all matters. Make certain you make no errors of the mind.
verses.ro: korekara wa yorozu no koto o mina tokude   kokoro chigai no nai yoni seyo
verses.jp_1: これからハよろづの事をみなとくで
verses.jp_2: 心ちがいのないよふにせよ

verses.en: Until now, there has been much talk of rebirth as oxen or horses, but there has been no one who knows his past or future.
verses.ro: imamade wa gyuba to yu wa mama aredo   ato saki shireta koto wa arumai
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハぎうばとゆうハまゝあれど
verses.jp_2: あとさきしれた事ハあるまい

verses.en: This time, I shall make your future known in this life: look at the disorder of the body!
verses.ro: konotabi wa saki naru koto o kono yo kara   shirashite oku de mi ni sawari miyo
verses.jp_1: このたびハさきなる事を此よから
verses.jp_2: しらしてをくでみにさハりみよ

verses.en: In this world, however much you may be concerned about yourself, you are helpless against the anger of God.
verses.ro: kono yo wa ika hodo waga mi omotemo   Kami no rippuku kore wa kanawan
verses.jp_1: このよふハいかほどハがみをもふても
verses.jp_2: 神のりいふくこれハかなハん

verses.en: None of you needs self-centered concern. God will distinguish between each of you.
verses.ro: meme ni waga mi shiyan wa iran mono   Kami ga sorezore miwake suru zo ya
verses.jp_1: めへ／＼にハがみしやんハいらんもの
verses.jp_2: 神がそれ／＼みわけするぞや

verses.en: Among those living in the same residence, know that there are both god and buddha.
verses.ro: hito yashiki onaji kurashite iru uchi ni   Kami mo hotoke mo aru to omoe yo
verses.jp_1: 一やしきをなじくらしているうちに
verses.jp_2: 神もほとけもあるとをもへよ

verses.en: If you see this, be convinced, whoever you may be: God will distinguish between good and evil.
verses.ro: kore o mite ikana mono demo tokushin se   zen to aku to o wakete miseru de
verses.jp_1: これをみていかなものでもとくしんせ
verses.jp_2: 善とあくとをわけてみせるで

verses.en: Ponder over this talk, all of you in the world. There is no mind the same as another.
verses.ro: kono hanashi mina ichiretsu wa shiyan seyo   onaji kokoro wa sarani arumai
verses.jp_1: このはなしみな一れつハしやんせよ
verses.jp_2: をなじ心わさらにあるまい

verses.en: Even between parent and child, husband and wife, and brothers and sisters: their minds all differ from one another.
verses.ro: oyako demo fufu no naka mo kyodai mo   mina meme ni kokoro chigau de
verses.jp_1: をやこでもふう／＼のなかもきよたいも
verses.jp_2: みなめへ／＼に心ちがうで

verses.en: Indicating no one in the world in particular, I say to you: dust in the mind causes disorders of the body.
verses.ro: sekaiju doko no mono towa yuwan de na   kokoro no hokori mi ni sawari tsuku
verses.jp_1: せかいぢうどこのものとハゆハんでな
verses.jp_2: 心のほこりみにさハりつく

verses.en: Ponder over your sufferings of the body and then ponder the mind that leans on God.
verses.ro: minouchi no nayamu koto oba shiyan shite   Kami ni motareru kokoro shiyan se
verses.jp_1: みのうちのなやむ事をばしやんして
verses.jp_2: 神にもたれる心しやんせ

verses.en: It does not matter how difficult your condition may be, for God desires to reveal free and unlimited workings quickly.
verses.ro: dono yona mutsukashi koto to yuta tote   Kami no juyo hayaku misetai
verses.jp_1: どのよふなむつかし事とゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: 神のぢうよふはやくみせたい

verses.en: Until now, there has been no one who knows the truth of God's free and unlimited workings.
verses.ro: imamade wa Kami no juyo shinjitsu o   shiritaru mono wa sarani nai node
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハ神のぢうよふしんぢつを
verses.jp_2: しりたるものさらにないので

verses.en: From now on, no matter how serious your illness may be, nothing is incurable. It depends on your mind.
verses.ro: korekara wa ikana mutsukashi yamai demo   kokoro shidai ni naorande nashi
verses.jp_1: これからハいかなむつかしやまいでも
verses.jp_2: 心したいになをらんでなし

verses.en: If God accepts your mind of sincerity, I shall work freely and unlimitedly in any matter.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no kokoro o Kami ga uketoreba   ikana juyo shite miseru de na
verses.jp_1: しんぢつの心を神がうけとれば
verses.jp_2: いかなぢうよふしてみせるてな

verses.en: You close to Me, quickly become enlightened in this teaching of the truth of God.
verses.ro: kora hodono Kami no shinjitsu kono hanashi   soba naru mono wa hayaku satore yo
verses.jp_1: こらほどの神のしんぢつこのはなし
verses.jp_2: そばなるものハはやくさとれよ

verses.en: If you quickly become enlightened in this one matter, everything will proceed accordingly.
verses.ro: kore saika hayaku satori ga tsuita nara   nani ni tsuitemo mina kono dori
verses.jp_1: これさいかはやくさとりがついたなら
verses.jp_2: なにゝついてもみなこのどふり

verses.en: Until today, I have never hastened you in any way. Now, I hasten you toward the broad path.
verses.ro: kyomade wa nani yono koto mo sekane domo   mo sekikomu de okwan no michi
verses.jp_1: けふまでハなによの事もせかねとも
verses.jp_2: もふせきこむでをふくハんのみち

verses.en: Never think this path is worldly common. It is the beginning of the Divine Record for eternity.
verses.ro: kono michi wa sekainami towa omouna yo   kore matsudai no Koki hajimari
verses.jp_1: このみちハせかいなみとハをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: これまつだいのこふきはぢまり

verses.en: I do not say where the performers will be found. All will come because of disorders of the body.
verses.ro: kono ninju doko ni aru towa yuwan de na   minouchi sawari mina kuru de aro
verses.jp_1: このにんぢうとこにあるとハゆハんでな
verses.jp_2: みのうちさハりみなくるであろ

verses.en: These disorders are from My guidance, admonition, or anger. Ponder, each of you.
verses.ro: kono sawari tebiki iken mo rippuku mo   mina meme ni shiyan shite miyo
verses.jp_1: このさハりてびきいけんもりいふくも
verses.jp_2: みなめへ／＼にしやんしてみよ

verses.en: What are your thoughts on hearing this talk? I appeal to you repeatedly out of My deep love for you.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nanto omote kiite iru   kawai amarite kudoku koto nari
verses.jp_1: このはなしなんとをもふてきいている
verses.jp_2: かハいあまりてくどく事なり

verses.en: However I may express My admonition or anger, I shall never say that you will not be saved.
verses.ro: dono yoni iken rippuku yuta tote   kore tasuken to sarani yuwan de
verses.jp_1: どのよふにいけんりいふくゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: これたすけんとさらにゆハんで

verses.en: Think of you humans admonishing your children. The anger, too, comes from love.
verses.ro: ningen no waga ko no iken omote miyo   hara no tatsu no mo kawai yue kara
verses.jp_1: にんけんのハがこのいけんをもてみよ
verses.jp_2: はらのたつのもかハいゆへから

verses.en: Ponder and come follow Me with firm resolve. There is a path of hope in the future.
verses.ro: shiyan shite kokoro sadamete tsuitekoi   sue wa tanomoshi michi ga aru zo ya
verses.jp_1: しやんして心さためてついてこい
verses.jp_2: すゑハたのもしみちがあるぞや

verses.en: Until now, because the day had not yet come, I have overlooked your mistaken minds.
verses.ro: imamade wa kokoro chigai wa arita tote   hi ga kitarande miyurushite ita
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハ心ちがいわありたとて
verses.jp_2: ひがきたらんてみゆるしていた

verses.en: This time, by all means, I shall sweep clean your innermost heart. Be forewarned!
verses.ro: konotabi wa nandemo kademo mune no uchi   soji o suru de mina shochi seyo
verses.jp_1: このたびはなんでもかでもむねのうち
verses.jp_2: そうちをするでみなしよちせよ

verses.en: The reason for this sweeping of your innermost heart is that the intent of God is deep.
verses.ro: mune no uchi soji o suru to yu no mo na   Kami no omowaku fukaku aru kara
verses.jp_1: むねのうちそふぢをするとゆうのもな
verses.jp_2: 神のをもハくふかくあるから

verses.en: Unless the sweeping is thoroughly accomplished, you will not understand the truth of My heart.
verses.ro: kono soji sukiyaka shitate sen koto ni   mune no shinjitsu wakari nai kara
verses.jp_1: このそふぢすきやかしたてせん事に
verses.jp_2: むねのしんぢつわかりないから

verses.en: When you have truly come to understand My mind, I shall teach you the hand movements of the beginning of this world.
verses.ro: kono kokoro shin kara wakari tsuita nara   kono yo hajimari te o tsukeru nari
verses.jp_1: この心しんからわかりついたなら
verses.jp_2: このよはぢまりてをつけるなり

verses.en: Take no short cuts. Have no greed or arrogance. Come out to the single and straight main path.
verses.ro: chikamichi mo yoku mo koman nai yoni   tada hitosuji no honmichi ni deyo
verses.jp_1: ちかみちもよくもこふまんないように
verses.jp_2: たゞ一すぢのほんみちにでよ

verses.en: When you have come onto this path, this will be the Divine Record forever in Nihon.
verses.ro: kono michi ni tsuitaru naraba itsu made mo   kore nippon no Koki naru no ya
verses.jp_1: このみちについたるならばいつまても
verses.jp_2: これにいほんのこふきなるのや

verses.en: When the Divine Record is made in Nihon, I shall by all means manage Kara as I please.
verses.ro: nihon nimo Koki ga deketa koto naraba   nandemo kara o mamani suru nari
verses.jp_1: にほんにもこふきがでけた事ならば
verses.jp_2: なんでもからをまゝにするなり

verses.en: I have not spoken yet about the truth of those things that came after I began this world.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimete kara no shinjitsu o   mada imamade wa yuta koto nashi
verses.jp_1: このよふをはぢめてからのしんぢつを
verses.jp_2: またいまゝでハゆうた事なし

verses.en: This talk will be difficult to understand, but if it is left untold, no one will know.
verses.ro: kono hanashi mutsukashi koto de aru keredo   yuwazu ni ireba tare mo shiran de
verses.jp_1: このはなしむつかし事であるけれど
verses.jp_2: ゆハずにいればたれもしらんで

verses.en: Step by step, I shall tell you of any and all matters. Calm your mind and listen closely!
verses.ro: dandan to dono yona koto mo yute kikasu   kokoro shizumete shikato kiku nari
verses.jp_1: たん／＼とどのよな事もゆてきかす
verses.jp_2: 心しずめてしかときくなり

verses.en: Until now, there has been talk about various magical rites. From now on, they shall have no effect.
verses.ro: imanade wa ika naru ho to yuta tote   mo korekara wa ho wa kikande
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハいかなるほふとゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: もふこれからハほふハきかんで

verses.en: In the past, such magical rites have been taught to the branches, but watch the future.
verses.ro: koremade wa edasaki nitewa ho nazo to   oshiete aredo saki o mite iyo
verses.jp_1: これまてハゑださきにてわほふなぞと
verses.jp_2: をしへてあれどさきをみていよ

verses.en: Nihon has known nothing until now, but look forward to the future path.
verses.ro: nihon niwa imamade nanimo shirai demo   korekara saki no michi o tanoshume
verses.jp_1: にほんにハいまゝでなにもしらいでも
verses.jp_2: これからさきのみちをたのしゆめ

verses.en: About magical rites: do not wonder who is making them effective. They are worked by God, who began this world.
verses.ro: ho ya tote tare ga suru towa omouna yo   kono yo hajimeta Kami no nasu koto
verses.jp_1: ほふやとてたれがするとハをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: このよ初た神のなす事

verses.en: However difficult matters may be, if only your sincerity is accepted by God...
verses.ro: dono yona mutsukashi koto to yuta tote   Kami ga shinjitsu uketorita nara
verses.jp_1: どのよふなむつかし事とゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: 神がしんちつうけとりたなら

verses.en: Until now, there has been talk about Kara and Nihon, but from now on there will only be Nihon.
verses.ro: imamade wa kara ya nihon to yutaredo   korekara saki wa nihon bakari ya
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハからやにほんとゆうたれど
verses.jp_2: これからさきハにほんばかりや

verses.en: The branches may look big, but they are weak and break when handled. Watch the future.
verses.ro: edasaki wa oki ni miete akan mono   kamaeba oreru saki o mite iyo
verses.jp_1: ゑださきハをふきにみへてあかんもの
verses.jp_2: かまへばをれるさきをみていよ

verses.en: The origin may seem small, but the root is great. In all things, know the origin!
verses.ro: moto naru wa chiisai yo de ne ga erai   dono yona koto mo moto o shiru nari
verses.jp_1: もとなるハちいさいよふでねがえらい
verses.jp_2: とのよな事も元をしるなり

verses.en: Do not think that incantations or magical arts are great. The mind's sincerity is the true art.
verses.ro: jitsu ya tote ho ga erai to omouna yo   kokoro no makoto kore ga shinjitsu
verses.jp_1: ぢつやとてほふがへらいとをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: こゝろのまことこれがしんぢつ

verses.en: As you humans are shallow, you say that all marvels are magic.
verses.ro: ningen wa azanai mono de aru karani   mezurashi koto o ho nazo to yu
verses.jp_1: にんけんハあざないものであるからに
verses.jp_2: めづらし事をほふなぞとゆう

verses.en: Even until now, though God is openly revealed, there is yet no one who knows the truth.
verses.ro: imamade wa Kami ga araware detaru tote   mada shinjitsu o shirita mono nashi
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハ神があらハれでたるとて
verses.jp_2: まだしんぢつをしりたものなし

verses.en: Hereafter, when I have taught you the truth of all things,
verses.ro: konosaki wa dono yona koto mo shinjitsu o   oshiete oita koto de aru nara
verses.jp_1: このさきハどのよな事もしんじつを
verses.jp_2: をしへてをいた事であるなら

verses.en: Then, I shall show you God's free and unlimited workings in all matters.
verses.ro: sorekara wa Kami no hataraki nanimo kamo   juyojizai o shite miseru de na
verses.jp_1: それからハ神のはたらきなにもかも
verses.jp_2: ぢうよじざいをしてみせるでな

verses.en: When God in Truth begins to work, the minds of all in the world will be purified.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no Kami no hataraki shikaketara   sekai ichiretsu kokoro sumikiru
verses.jp_1: しんぢつの神のはたらきしかけたら
verses.jp_2: せかい一れつ心すみきる

verses.en: What are your thoughts concerning My workings? I shall give returns when I accept your minds.
verses.ro: hataraki mo ika naru koto to omou kana   kokoro uketori shidai kayashi o
verses.jp_1: はたらきもいかなる事とをもうかな
verses.jp_2: 心うけとりしだいかやしを

verses.en: What do you think these returns are about? They will reach you though you be a thousand leagues away.
verses.ro: kono kayashi nanino koto ya to omou kana   michinori sen ri hedate aritemo
verses.jp_1: このかやしなにの事やとをもうかな
verses.jp_2: みちのりせんりへだてありても

verses.en: Whatever you may say or think, I shall give returns as soon as I accept your minds.
verses.ro: kono koto wa nani o yutemo omotemo   uketori shidai suguni kayashi o
verses.jp_1: この事ハなにをゆうてもをもふても
verses.jp_2: うけとりしだいすぐにかやしを

verses.en: Do not wonder what these returns are about. I shall give returns for both good and evil.
verses.ro: kono kayashi nanno koto ya to omouna yo   zen aku tomoni mina kayasu de na
verses.jp_1: このかやしなんの事やとをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: せんあくともにみなかやすてな

verses.en: Whether you speak good or think evil, I shall give returns at once as you deserve.
verses.ro: yoki koto o yutemo ashiki omotemo   sono mama suguni kayasu koto nari
verses.jp_1: よき事をゆうてもあしきをもふても
verses.jp_2: そのまゝすくにかやす事なり

verses.en: If you begin to see this, My purification will reach any and everyone in the whole world.
verses.ro: kono koto o miekita naraba ichiretsu wa   donna mono demo mina sumiwataru
verses.jp_1: この事をみへきたならば一れつわ
verses.jp_2: どんなものでもみなすみわたる

verses.en: Today, though nothing is seen, look toward the eighth month. Then everything will be seen.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa nani ga mieru ya nai keredo   hachi gatsu o miyo mina mieru de na
verses.jp_1: けふの日ハなにがみへるやないけれど
verses.jp_2: 八月をみよみなみへるでな

verses.en: Perhaps you cannot foresee what is going to appear. From the high mountains, a broad path will open.
verses.ro: mieru no mo nanino koto yara shiremai na   takai yama kara okwan no michi
verses.jp_1: みへるのもなにの事やらしれまいな
verses.jp_2: 高い山からをふくハんのみち

verses.en: I have been preparing to open this path, but those of you close to Me know nothing of it.
verses.ro: kono michi o tsukeyo tote ni shikoshirae   soba naru mono wa nanimo shirazu ni
verses.jp_1: このみちをつけよふとてにしこしらへ
verses.jp_2: そばなるものハなにもしらすに

verses.en: Those who come here to summon or to investigate, come because it is God's intent.
verses.ro: kono toko e yobi ni kuru no mo detekuru mo   Kami no omowaku aru kara no koto
verses.jp_1: このとこへよびにくるのもでゝくるも
verses.jp_2: 神のをもハくあるからの事

verses.en: Knowing nothing about this, you close to Me think of it only in worldly terms.
verses.ro: sono koto o nanimo shirazu ni soba naru wa   sekainami naru koto o omote
verses.jp_1: その事をなにもしらすにそばなるハ
verses.jp_2: せかいなみなる事をふもをて

verses.en: Do not think of anything in worldly terms. There is a new and marvelous path for you.
verses.ro: nani nitemo sekainami towa omouna yo   nanika mezurashi michi ga aru zo ya
verses.jp_1: なにゝてもせかいなみとハをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: なにかめつらしみちがあるぞや

verses.en: Though years have passed since the beginning of this world, there is yet no one who knows the truth.
verses.ro: dandan to kono yo hajimete hi wa tatedo   tare ka shinjitsu shirita mono nashi
verses.jp_1: だん／＼とこのよはぢめてひハたてど
verses.jp_2: たれかしんぢつしりたものなし

verses.en: No matter how the mind of God hastens, the minds of all of you are yet inattentive.
verses.ro: ika hodoni Kami no kokoro wa seta tote   mina no kokoro wa mada ukkari to
verses.jp_1: いかほどに神の心わせゑたとて
verses.jp_2: みなの心ハまたうゝかりと

verses.en: Quickly, try the pondering and then hasten. Why are you not preparing to dig up the root?
verses.ro: hayabaya to shiyan shite mite sekikome yo   ne horu moyo nande shiteden
verses.jp_1: はや／＼としやんしてみてせきこめよ
verses.jp_2: ねへほるもよふなんでしてでん

verses.en: There is no one who knows the way to dig up the root, the truth of this world.
verses.ro: kono yo no shinjitsu ne no horikata o   shiritaru mono wa sarani nai node
verses.jp_1: このよふのしんぢつねへのほりかたを
verses.jp_2: しりたるものハさらにないので

verses.en: If you have but truly dug up this root, this path will become truly promising.
verses.ro: kono ne o shinjitsu horita koto naraba   makoto tanomoshi michi ni naru no ni
verses.jp_1: このねへをしんぢつほりた事ならば
verses.jp_2: ま事たのもしみちになるのに

verses.en: When you have passed through this path, completing the digging, both the high and the low will be spirited.
verses.ro: kono michi o horikiri tori nuketa nara   kami shimo tomoni kokoro isamu ni
verses.jp_1: このみちをほりきりとふりぬけたなら
verses.jp_2: 上下ともに心いさむに

verses.en: From now on, I shall make every effort solely for the preparations to make everyone in the world spirited.
verses.ro: korekara wa nandemo sekai ichiretsu o   isameru moyo bakari suru zo ya
verses.jp_1: これからハなんでもせかい一れつを
verses.jp_2: いさめるもよふばかりするそや

verses.en: I shall teach you step by step so that there will be nothing unknown in Nihon.
verses.ro: dandan to nani goto nitemo nihon niwa   shiran koto owa nai to yu yoni
verses.jp_1: だん／＼となに事にてもにほんにハ
verses.jp_2: しらん事をわないとゆうよに

verses.en: I desire to teach the whole world about all matters. The intention of God is truly deep.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo sekaiju e oshietai   Kami no omowaku fukaku aru no ni
verses.jp_1: なにもかもせかいぢうゝへをしへたい
verses.jp_2: 神のをもわくふかくあるのに

verses.en: Unaware of this, all the world thinks My teachings are somehow dangerous.
verses.ro: sore shirazu sekaiju wa ichiretsu ni   nando abunaki yoni omote
verses.jp_1: それしらすせかいぢうゝハ一れつに
verses.jp_2: なんどあぶなきよふにをもふて

verses.en: Whatever I say, it is the word of God. What danger can there be?
verses.ro: dono yona koto demo Kami no yu koto ya   nanno abunaki koto ga aru zo ya
verses.jp_1: とのよふな事でも神のゆう事や
verses.jp_2: なんのあぶなき事があるそや

verses.en: Though people speak about any and all matters, there is no understanding.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo yorozu no koto o dandan to   yute inagara wakaritaru nashi
verses.jp_1: なにもかもよろずの事をだん／＼と
verses.jp_2: ゆうていながらわかりたるなし

verses.en: From now on, please quickly make preparations truly to purify your innermost heart.
verses.ro: korekara wa dozo shinjitsu mune no uchi   hayaku sumasuru moyo shite kure
verses.jp_1: これからハどうぞしんぢつむねのうち
verses.jp_2: はやくすまするもよふしてくれ

verses.en: As there are a great number of people in the world, to purify all of them will be difficult.
verses.ro: sekaiju oku no hito de aru karani   kore sumasuru ga mutsukashii koto
verses.jp_1: せかいぢうをふくの人てあるからに
verses.jp_2: これすまするがむつかしい事

verses.en: However difficult it may be, see the truth through your own mind!
verses.ro: ika hodoni mutsukashi koto to yuta tote   waga kokoro yori shinjitsu o miyo
verses.jp_1: いかほどにむつかし事とゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: わが心よりしんちつをみよ

verses.en: When the mind is made pure and open to reason, the truth will be seen of its own accord.
verses.ro: kono kokoro sumushi wakarita koto naraba   sono mama mieru koto de aru nari
verses.jp_1: この心すむしわかりた事ならば
verses.jp_2: そのまゝみゑる事であるなり

verses.en: There may be no one at all who knows the true working of God day after day.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no shinjitsu hataraki o   shiritaru mono wa sarani arumai
verses.jp_1: にち／＼に神のしんぢつはたらきを
verses.jp_2: しりたるものハさらにあるまい

verses.en: In whatever matters, I shall show you marvels through the free and unlimited workings of God.
verses.ro: nani nitemo Kami no juyo to yu mono wa   mezurashi koto o shite miseru de na
verses.jp_1: なにゝても神のぢうよとゆうものハ
verses.jp_2: めづらし事をしてみせるでな

verses.en: Whatever marvels you may see, they are none other than the workings of God.
verses.ro: dono yona mezurashi koto to yuta tote   Kami no suru koto nasu koto bakari
verses.jp_1: とのよふなめつらし事とゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: 神のする事なす事はかり

verses.en: Until now, you have known nothing, but now a narrow path is coming into your sight.
verses.ro: imamade wa nani yono koto mo shirenanda   choto miekaketa hosoi michisuji
verses.jp_1: いままでハなによの事もしれなんだ
verses.jp_2: 一寸みへかけたほそいみちすじ

verses.en: If you follow this path step by step, you will surely see the main path ahead.
verses.ro: kono michi o dandan shitoi iku naraba   nandemo muko ni mieru honmichi
verses.jp_1: このみちをだん／＼しといいくならば
verses.jp_2: なんてもむこにみへるほんみち

verses.en: Until now, you have come through a path where there was no distinction between Kara and Nihon.
verses.ro: koremade ni torite kitaru michisuji wa   kara mo nihon mo wakari nai node
verses.jp_1: これまでにとふりてきたるみちすぢハ
verses.jp_2: からもにほんもわかりないので

verses.en: Hereafter, however highly Kara is regarded, in no case will Nihon be overcome.
verses.ro: konosaki wa nanbo kara ya to yuta tote   nihon ga makeru tameshi nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: このさきハなんぼからやとゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: にほんがまけるためしないそや

verses.en: I shall let you dig up the root of this world's origin. If you have the strength, do your best to dig it up.
verses.ro: kono yo no moto hajimari no ne o horaso   chikara aru nara horikirite miyo
verses.jp_1: このよふのもとはじまりのねをほらそ
verses.jp_2: ちからあるならほりきりてみよ

verses.en: If only you have dug up this root completely, no one will be your match, whoever one may be.
verses.ro: kono ne o horikiri saika shitaru nara   dono yona mono mo kanau mono nashi
verses.jp_1: このねへをほりきりさいかしたるなら
verses.jp_2: どのよなものもかなうものなし

verses.en: Listen carefully: whatever you may say or think, or wherever you may say or think,
verses.ro: shikato kike kuchi de yutemo omotemo   doko de yutemo omotaru tote
verses.jp_1: しかときけくちでゆうてもをもふても
verses.jp_2: どこでゆうてもをもふたるとて

verses.en: I shall give a return just as you deserve. Beware, all of you, for God may withdraw!
verses.ro: sono mamani kayashi to yu wa kono koto ya   Kami ga shirizoku mina shochi seyo
verses.jp_1: そのまゝにかやしとゆうハこの事や
verses.jp_2: 神がしりぞくみなしよちせよ

verses.en: This time, I shall begin to tell you something marvelous. Calm your minds and please listen.
verses.ro: konotabi wa mezurashi koto o yui kakeru   kokoro shizumete kore kiite kure
verses.jp_1: このたひハめづらし事をゆいかける
verses.jp_2: 心しずめてこれきいてくれ

verses.en: Everything is what God says or does. I shall never cause trouble to you who are close to Me.
verses.ro: nani goto mo Kami no suru koto yu koto ya   soba ni shinpai kakeru koto nashi
verses.jp_1: なに事も神のする事ゆう事や
verses.jp_2: そばにしんバいかける事なし

verses.en: All of you, please calm your minds and become truly convinced of this talk.
verses.ro: kono hanashi dodo shinjitsu ichiretsu wa   kokoro shizumete shochi shite kure
verses.jp_1: このはなしどふどしんぢつ一れつわ
verses.jp_2: 心しづめてしよちしてくれ

verses.en: What do you think this path is? It is the true path that will settle this world.
verses.ro: kono michi wa doyu koto ni omou kana   kono yo osameru shinjitsu no michi
verses.jp_1: このみちハどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp_2: このよをさめるしんぢつのみち

verses.en: When the distinction between fire and water in the high places is made, joyousness will settle of its own accord.
verses.ro: kami taru no hii to mizu to o waketa nara   hitori osamaru yokizukume ni
verses.jp_1: 上たるの火と水とをわけたなら
verses.jp_2: ひとりをさまるよふきづくめに

verses.en: Know that the distinction between fire and water will be made by the performance of the Joyous Service at this place.
verses.ro: kono hi mizu wakeru to yu wa kono tokoro   Yoki-zutome o suru to omoe yo
verses.jp_1: この火水わけるとゆうハこのところ
verses.jp_2: よふきづとめをするとをもゑよ

verses.en: I shall do marvelous things, the same as My beginning of this world.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajime kaketa mo onaji koto   mezurashi koto o shite miseru de na
verses.jp_1: このよふをはじめかけたもをなぢ事
verses.jp_2: めずらし事をしてみせるでな

verses.en: I shall begin a Service which has never existed since I began this world, and assuredly settle the world.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimete karani nai Tsutome   mata hajime kake tashika osameru
verses.jp_1: このよふをはじめてからにないつとめ
verses.jp_2: またはじめかけたしかをさめる

verses.en: There may be no one at all who knows the truth of the mind of Tsukihi of this universe.
verses.ro: kono yo no Tsukihi no kokoro shinjitsu o   shiritaru mono wa sarani arumai
verses.jp_1: このよふの月日の心しんぢつを
verses.jp_2: しりたるものわさらにあるまい

verses.en: Until now, you have been saying that you cannot see a god with your own eyes, whatever kind of god he may be.
verses.ro: koremade wa ika naru Kami to yuta tote   me ni mien to yute ita nari
verses.jp_1: これまでハいかなる神とゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: めゑにみへんとゆうていたなり

verses.en: This time, truly revealing whatever gods there may be, I shall speak to you.
verses.ro: konotabi wa dono yona Kami mo shinjitsu ni   araware dashite hanashi suru nari
verses.jp_1: このたびわとのよな神もしんぢつに
verses.jp_2: あらハれだしてはなしするなり

verses.en: From this time on, whatever you say or think will appear just as you say or think. This is the wonder.
verses.ro: imakara wa nani o yutemo omotemo   sono mama mieru kore ga fushigi ya
verses.jp_1: いまからハなにをゆうてもをもふても
verses.jp_2: そのまゝみへるこれがふしぎや

verses.en: At the sign of the wheat harvest, all things will begin to appear. Hurry and begin the Joyous Service.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo aki o aizu ni mie kakeru   Yoki-zutome ni hayaku kakare yo
verses.jp_1: なにもかもあきをあいづにみへかける
verses.jp_2: よふきづとめにはやくかゝれよ

verses.en: There are a great number of people living throughout the world, but their minds are all as if in a haze.
verses.ro: sekaiju oku kurasuru sono uchi wa   ichiretsu wa mina moya no gotoku ya
verses.jp_1: せかいぢうをふくくらするそのうちわ
verses.jp_2: 一れつハみなもやのごとくや

verses.en: Day by day, your innermost heart will be purified and understanding will come. You will come to see the truth as you mature.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni sumushi wakarishi mune no uchi   sejin shidai miete kuru zo ya
verses.jp_1: にち／＼にすむしわかりしむねのうち
verses.jp_2: せゑぢんしたいみへてくるぞや

verses.en: When this path is clearly seen, take delight. Your future will be promising.
verses.ro: kono michi ga tashika mietaru koto naraba   konosaki tashika tanoshun de iyo
verses.jp_1: このみちがたしかみへたる事ならば
verses.jp_2: このさきたしかたのしゆでいよ

verses.en: Step by step, hasten with spirited minds. I am hurrying to have you go out to the main path.
verses.ro: dandan to kokoro isande sekikome yo   hayaku honmichi isogi deru zo ya
verses.jp_1: たん／＼と心いさんでせきこめよ
verses.jp_2: はやくほんみちいそぎでるぞや

verses.en: When God has accepted the sincerity in the minds of the ten performers of the Service,
verses.ro: shinjitsu no Tsutome no ninju ju nin no   kokoro o Kami ga uketorita nara
verses.jp_1: しんぢつのつとめの人ぢう十人の
verses.jp_2: 心を神がうけとりたなら

verses.en: Thereafter, I shall teach you all of the thoughts of God on every matter step by step.
verses.ro: sorekara wa dono yona koto mo dandan to   Kami no omowaku mina tokikikasu
verses.jp_1: それからハどのよな事もたん／＼と
verses.jp_2: 神のをもわくみなときゝかす

verses.en: Though the mind of God hastens day after day, to what avail if the ten performers do not assemble?
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no kokoro wa seta tote   ninju ju nin soroi nakeneba
verses.jp_1: にち／＼に神の心わせゑたとて
verses.jp_2: 人ぢう十人そろいなけねば

verses.en: Take warning: fire, water, and wind will withdraw from the three deemed as right-hand men among the ten.
verses.ro: ju nin no naka ni san nin kataude wa   hii mizu kaze tomo shirizoku to shire
verses.jp_1: 十人のなかに三人かたうでわ
verses.jp_2: 火水風ともしりそくとしれ

verses.en: Whatever happens, it is the work of God. Never think it is an illness.
verses.ro: dono yona koto demo Kami no suru koto ya   kore o yamai to sarani omouna
verses.jp_1: どのよふな事でも神のする事や
verses.jp_2: これをやまいとさらにをもうな

verses.en: I work all matters because I truly desire to let you know of the free and unlimited workings of God.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo shinjitsu Kami no juyo o   shirashitai kara shite miseru de na
verses.jp_1: なにもかもしんぢつ神のぢふよふを
verses.jp_2: しらしたいからしてみせるでな

verses.en: Until now, no matter what path you may have been on, I kept still because the day had not yet come.
verses.ro: koremade wa ika naru michi o toritemo   hi ga kitarande izumi ita nari
verses.jp_1: これまでハいかなるみちをとふりても
verses.jp_2: ひがきたらんでいづみいたなり

verses.en: Hereafter, I shall tell you the real truth of all matters step by step.
verses.ro: konosaki wa dono yona koto mo dandan to   honshinjitsu o yute kikasuru
verses.jp_1: このさきハどのよな事もたん／＼と
verses.jp_2: ほんしんぢつをゆうてきかする

verses.en: Until now, people have worshipped and prayed to a great many gods.
verses.ro: imamade wa ika naru Kami mo yamayama ni   ogami kito to yuta naredomo
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハいかなる神も山／＼に
verses.jp_2: をがみきとふとゆうたなれども

verses.en: Should there be anyone who knows the origin, God permits you to seek and inquire.
verses.ro: kono moto o shiritaru mono ga aru naraba   tazune ite miyo Kami ga yurusuru
verses.jp_1: このもとをしりたるものかあるならば
verses.jp_2: たづねいてみよ神がゆるする

verses.en: In the future when the main path is opened, I shall teach you everything step by step.
verses.ro: matasaki wa dono yona koto mo dandan to   honmichi tsuketa koto de aru nara
verses.jp_1: またさきハとのよな事もたん／＼と
verses.jp_2: ほんみちつけた事であるなら

verses.en: I shall begin to tell you solely of that which had never existed before, and teach you the Service for universal salvation.
verses.ro: imamade ni nai koto bakari yui kakete   yorozu tasuke no Tsutome oshieru
verses.jp_1: いまゝでにない事ばかりゆいかけて
verses.jp_2: よろづたすけのつとめをしへる

verses.en: Among the ten performers of this Service, there are those who take the role of the Parent of the beginnings of origin.
verses.ro: kono Tsutome ju nin ninju sono naka ni   moto hajimari no Oya ga iru nari
verses.jp_1: このつとめ十人にんぢうそのなかに
verses.jp_2: もとはじまりのをやがいるなり

verses.en: I drew forth Izanagi and Izanami and taught them the providence of how to begin human beings.
verses.ro: Izanagi to Izanamii to o hikiyosete   ningen hajime shugo oshieta
verses.jp_1: いざなぎといざなみいとをひきよせて
verses.jp_2: にんけんはぢめしゆごをしゑた

verses.en: At the origin were a fish and a serpent in the muddy ocean. I drew them up and began the first couple.
verses.ro: kono moto wa doroumi naka ni uo to mi to   sore hikidashite fufu hajimeta
verses.jp_1: このもとハどろうみなかにうをとみと
verses.jp_2: それひきだしてふう／＼はちめた

verses.en: In the beginnings of origin, this universe was a muddy ocean. Therein were only loaches.
verses.ro: kono yo no moto hajimari wa doro no umi   sono naka yori mo dojo bakari ya
verses.jp_1: このよふの元はじまりハとろのうみ
verses.jp_2: そのなかよりもどぢよばかりや

verses.en: Among them were a fish and a serpent. Looking closely, I saw that they had human faces.
verses.ro: sono uchi ni uo to mii to ga majiriiru   yoku misumaseba ningen no kao
verses.jp_1: そのうちにうをとみいとがまちりいる
verses.jp_2: よくみすませばにんげんのかを

verses.en: Seeing this, an idea came to none other than the sincere mind of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: sore o mite omoi tsuita wa shinjitsu no   Tsukihi no kokoro bakari naru zo ya
verses.jp_1: それをみてをもいついたハしんぢつの
verses.jp_2: 月日の心ばかりなるそや

verses.en: If I should add instruments to them and teach them My providence step by step,
verses.ro: kono mono ni dogu o yosete dandan to   shugo oshieta koto de aru nara
verses.jp_1: このものにどふくをよせてたん／＼と
verses.jp_2: しゆこふをしゑた事であるなら

verses.en: These instruments being Kunisazuchi and Tsukiyomi, if I should put them into their bodies,
verses.ro: kono dogu Kunisazuchii to Tsukiyomi to   kore minouchi e shikomitaru nara
verses.jp_1: このどふくくにさづちいと月よみと
verses.jp_2: これみのうちゑしこみたるなら

verses.en: And call together Kumoyomi, Kashikone, %Otonobe, and Taishokuten,
verses.ro: Kumoyomi to Kashikonee to Otonobe   Taishokuten to yoseta koto nara
verses.jp_1: くもよみとかしこねへとをふとのべ
verses.jp_2: たいしよく天とよせた事なら

verses.en: Then, after holding counsel, God came to the firm decision to begin this world.
verses.ro: sorekara wa tashika sekai o hajime yo to   Kami no sodan shimari tsuitari
verses.jp_1: それからハたしかせかいを初よと
verses.jp_2: かみのそふだんしまりついたり

verses.en: Since that time, the providence of God has been by no means an easy matter.
verses.ro: korekara wa Kami no shugo to yu mono wa   nami taitei na koto de nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: これからわ神のしゆごとゆうものハ
verses.jp_2: なみたいていなことでないそや

verses.en: It is indeed difficult to explain how I began things which had never existed.
verses.ro: imamade ni nai koto bakari hajimeru wa   nani o yu no mo mutsukashiki koto
verses.jp_1: いまゝてにない事ばかりはちめるわ
verses.jp_2: なにをゆうのもむつかしき事

verses.en: There may be no one who knows the truth of the beginning of this world.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajime kaketaru shinjitsu o   tare ka shiritaru mono wa arumai
verses.jp_1: このよふをはちめかけたるしんぢつを
verses.jp_2: たれかしりたるものハあるまい

verses.en: From now on, I shall tell you everything step by step. Never take it to be false.
verses.ro: korekara wa dono yona koto mo dandan to   yute kikasuru uso to omouna
verses.jp_1: これからハとのよな事もたん／＼と
verses.jp_2: ゆうてきかするうそとをもうな

verses.en: I began human beings, taking a fish and a serpent as seed and seedbed.
verses.ro: ningen o hajime kaketa wa uo to mi to   kore nawashiro to tane ni hajimete
verses.jp_1: にんけんをはぢめかけたハうをとみと
verses.jp_2: これなわしろとたねにはじめて

verses.en: Tsukihi entered their bodies and taught them the providence step by step.
verses.ro: kono mono ni Tsukihi tainai irikonde   dandan shugo oshie konda de
verses.jp_1: このものに月日たいない入こんで
verses.jp_2: たん／＼しゆごをしゑこんだで

verses.en: The number of children was nine hundred million, ninety-nine thousand, nine hundred and ninety-nine.
verses.ro: kono kokazu kuoku kuman ni kusen nin   kuhyaku kuju ni ku nin naru zo ya
verses.jp_1: このこかす九をく九まんに九せん人
verses.jp_2: 九百九十に九人なるそや

verses.en: The children were conceived in three days and three nights, and there Izanami stayed for three years and three months.
verses.ro: kono nin o mikka miyosa ni yadoshi komi   san nen mi tsuki todomarite ita
verses.jp_1: この人を三か三よさにやどしこみ
verses.jp_2: 三ねん三月とゝまりていた

verses.en: The first children born were five bu tall and grew taller gradually.
verses.ro: soreyori mo umare dashita wa go bu kara ya   go bu go bu to shite sejin o shita
verses.jp_1: それよりもむまれだしたハ五分からや
verses.jp_2: 五分五分としてせへぢんをした

verses.en: By this providence once taught, the children were conceived in the same body three times.
verses.ro: kono mono ni ichido oshieta kono shugo   onaji tainai sando yadorita
verses.jp_1: このものに一どをしゑたこのしゆごふ
verses.jp_2: をなぢたいない三どやどりた

verses.en: The true and real God of this universe is Tsukihi. The others are all instruments.
verses.ro: kono yo no shinjitsu no Kami Tsukihi nari   ato naru wa mina dogu naru zo ya
verses.jp_1: このよふのしんぢつの神月日なり
verses.jp_2: あとなるわみなどふくなるそや

verses.en: Drawing them forth one after another, I used them to begin human beings and gave to each a sacred name.
verses.ro: ningen o hajime yo tote dandan to   yosete tsukota kore ni kamina o
verses.jp_1: にんけんをはしめよふとてたん／＼と
verses.jp_2: よせてつこふたこれに神なを

verses.en: Izanagi and Izanami are the prime instruments. They are the basis of the Grand Shrine of Teshoko.
verses.ro: Izanagi to Izanamii to ga ichi no Kami   kore Teshoko no Daijingu nari
verses.jp_1: いざなぎといざなみいとが一の神
verses.jp_2: これてしよこの大じんくゝなり

verses.en: In the days to come, I shall teach you everything step by step. It will be solely about things you have never known.
verses.ro: matasaki wa nanika dandan toku keredo   imamade shiran koto bakari ya de
verses.jp_1: またさきハなにかたん／＼とくけれど
verses.jp_2: いまゝてしらん事ばかりやで

verses.en: Hereafter, whatever I say will be solely about the beginnings of human beings.
verses.ro: konosaki wa nani o yutemo ningen o   hajime kaketaru koto bakari ya de
verses.jp_1: このさきハなにをゆうてもにんげんを
verses.jp_2: はぢめかけたる事ばかりやで

verses.en: This is the Residence where I began this world. Therein lives the original Parent of human beginnings.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajime dashitaru yashiki nari   ningen hajime moto no Oya nari
verses.jp_1: このよふをはぢめだしたるやしきなり
verses.jp_2: にんけんはじめもとのをやなり

verses.en: Discerning this, Tsukihi descended from the desire to teach about all matters.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori sore o misumashi amakudari   nanika yorozu o shirashitai kara
verses.jp_1: 月日よりそれをみすましあまくだり
verses.jp_2: なにかよろづをしらしたいから

verses.en: Truly, the thought in the mind of Tsukihi is to receive the shrine of each.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni Tsukihi no kokoro omou niwa   meme no yashiro morota koto nara
verses.jp_1: しんぢつに月日の心をもうにわ
verses.jp_2: めへ／＼のやしろもろた事なら

verses.en: Then I would teach exactly as I wish, freely and unlimitedly at any time.
verses.ro: soreyori mo juyojizai ni itsu nari to   omou mama naru hanashi shiyo mono
verses.jp_1: それよりもぢうよぢざいにいつなりと
verses.jp_2: をもうまゝなるはなしゝよもの

verses.en: Even until now, though having firmly received the Shrine of Tsukihi, I have been keeping still.
verses.ro: imamade mo Tsukihi no yashiro shikkari to   morote aredomo izumi ita nari
verses.jp_1: いまゝでも月日のやしろしいかりと
verses.jp_2: もろてあれどもいづみいたなり

verses.en: This time, I shall surely reveal Myself openly and tell you the truth of all matters.
verses.ro: konotabi wa tashika omote i arawarete   nanika yorozu o mina yute kikasu
verses.jp_1: このたびハたしかをもていあらハれて
verses.jp_2: なにかよろつをみなゆてきかす

verses.en: Until now, since I kept Myself behind a bamboo screen, nothing was able to be seen.
verses.ro: imamade wa misu no uchira ni itaru kara   nani yono koto mo miete nakeredo
verses.jp_1: いままでハみすのうぢらにいたるから
verses.jp_2: なによの事もみへてなけれど

verses.en: This time, as I have come out into brightness, everything will be seen quickly.
verses.ro: konotabi wa akai tokoro i detaru kara   dono yona koto mo suguni mieru de
verses.jp_1: このたびハあかいところいでたるから
verses.jp_2: とのよな事もすぐにみゑるで

verses.en: What do you think of these red clothes? Tsukihi dwells within.
verses.ro: kono akai kimono o nanto omote iru   naka ni Tsukihi ga komori iru zo ya
verses.jp_1: このあかいきものをなんとをもている
verses.jp_2: なかに月日がこもりいるそや

verses.en: Even until now, though everything was under the rule of Tsukihi, things were overlooked because the day had not yet come.
verses.ro: imamade mo Tsukihi no mama de aru naredo   hi ga kitarande miyurushite ita
verses.jp_1: いまゝでも月日のまゝであるけれど
verses.jp_2: ひがきたらんでみゆるしていた

verses.en: Now that the time is sufficiently full, I shall manage everything as I intend.
verses.ro: konotabi wa mo jubun ni hi mo kitari   nanika yorozu o mamani suru nari
verses.jp_1: このたびハもふぢうふんにひもきたり
verses.jp_2: なにかよろづをまゝにするなり

verses.en: Unaware of this, what is the thinking of the high mountains who are managing everything as they please?
verses.ro: sore shirazu takayama nitewa nanimo kamo   nanto omote mamani suru zo ya
verses.jp_1: それしらす高山にてハなにもかも
verses.jp_2: なんとをもふてまゝにするぞや

verses.en: In any concerns, never think that there is a human mind at this place.
verses.ro: nani goto mo kono tokoro niwa ningen no   kokoro wa sarani aru to omouna
verses.jp_1: なに事もこのところにハにんけんの
verses.jp_2: 心ハさらにあるとをもうな

verses.en: Whatever I may say or write by the tip of My brush, it is none other than directions from the mind of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o yu nimo fudesaki mo   Tsukihi no kokoro sashizu bakari de
verses.jp_1: どのよふな事をゆうにもふでさきも
verses.jp_2: 月日の心さしすばかりで

verses.en: Whatever the high mountains may say or think, it is all from their human thoughts.
verses.ro: takayama wa nani o yutemo omou nimo   mina ningen no kokoro bakari de
verses.jp_1: 高山ハなにをゆうてもをもうにも
verses.jp_2: みなにんけんのこころばかりで

verses.en: They banned the name given by Tsukihi. What do you think of this regret of Mine?
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori tsuketa namai o toriharai   kono zannen o nanto omou zo
verses.jp_1: 月日よりつけたなまいをとりはらい
verses.jp_2: このさんねんをなんとをもうぞ

verses.en: Know that in truth the anger and regret of Tsukihi are not small matters.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no Tsukihi rippuku zannen wa   yoi naru koto de nai to omoe yo
verses.jp_1: しんちづの月日りいふくさんねんわ
verses.jp_2: よいなる事でないとをもゑよ

verses.en: Until now, the high mountains, boastful, have thrived and done as they pleased in every matter.
verses.ro: imamade wa takai yama ya to habikarite   nanika yorozu o mamani shitaredo
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハ高い山やとはびかりて
verses.jp_2: なにかよろづをまゝにしたれど

verses.en: But from now on, I, Tsukihi, shall do as I please instead. Copy what I do if you can.
verses.ro: korekara wa Tsukihi kawarite mamani suru   nanika no koto o mane o shite miyo
verses.jp_1: これからハ月日かハりてまゝにする
verses.jp_2: なにかの事をまねをしてみよ

verses.en: Whatever I may say or do at this place, it is none other than the thought of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kono tokoro nani o yu nimo nasu koto mo   Tsukihi no omou koto bakari ya de
verses.jp_1: このところなにをゆうにもなす事も
verses.jp_2: 月日のをもう事ばかりやで

verses.en: From now on, I shall work solely on preparations to clear away the regret from the mind of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: korekara wa Tsukihi no kokoro zannen o   harasuru moyo bakari suru zo ya
verses.jp_1: これからハ月日の心ざんねんを
verses.jp_2: はらするもよふばかりするそや

verses.en: Hereafter, whatever dust may be stirred up, never think it is an illness.
verses.ro: konosaki wa dono yona hokori tatsu totemo   kore o yamai to sarani omouna
verses.jp_1: このさきハどのよなほこりたつとても
verses.jp_2: これをやまいとさらにをもうな

verses.en: I shall give returns for the regrets of Tsukihi piled mountainously high until now.
verses.ro: imamade mo Tsukihi zannen yamayama ni   tsumorite aru o kayashi suru zo ya
verses.jp_1: いまゝでも月日さんねん山／＼に
verses.jp_2: つもりてあるをかやしするぞや

verses.en: Even until now, though I spoke of My returns, you have been wondering what it could mean.
verses.ro: imamade mo kayashi to yute toitaredo   nanno koto ya to omote ita nari
verses.jp_1: いまゝでもかやしとゆうてといたれど
verses.jp_2: なんの事やとをもていたなり

verses.en: This is what My returns mean in truth. Beware, all of you on the high mountains!
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni kayashi to yu wa kono koto ya   takayama wa mina shochi shite iyo
verses.jp_1: しんぢつにかやしとゆうハこの事や
verses.jp_2: 高山ハみなしよちしていよ

verses.en: This world was a muddy ocean. Therein was Tsukihi alone.
verses.ro: kono yo wa doroumi naka no koto narushi   naka ni Tsukihi ga itaru made nari
verses.jp_1: このよふわどろうみなかの事なるし
verses.jp_2: なかに月日がいたるまでなり

verses.en: An idea came to Tsukihi: how promising it would be to begin a world.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori shinjitsu omoi tsuitaru wa   nanto sekai o hajime kaketara
verses.jp_1: 月日よりしんぢつをもいついたるわ
verses.jp_2: なんとせかいをはじめかけたら

verses.en: It was difficult to begin a world which did not exist. I prepared to find what could be used as instruments.
verses.ro: nai sekai hajime kakeru wa mutsukashii   nanto dogu o midasu moyo o
verses.jp_1: ないせかいはじめかけるハむつかしい
verses.jp_2: なんとどふぐをみたすもよふを

verses.en: Looking carefully within, I found loaches, a fish and a serpent, and other creatures, too.
verses.ro: misumaseba naka ni dojo mo uo mii mo   hoka naru mono mo miete aru nari
verses.jp_1: みすませばなかにどぢよもうをみいも
verses.jp_2: ほかなるものもみへてあるなり

verses.en: I called them together and conferred with them to begin My providence for human beings.
verses.ro: sono mono o mina hikiyosete danjiyai   ningen shugo hajime kaketara
verses.jp_1: そのものをみなひきよせてたんぢやい
verses.jp_2: にんけんしゆごはぢめかけたら

verses.en: In order to begin a world which did not exist, I, Tsukihi, devoted Myself at every step.
verses.ro: nai sekai hajime yo tote kono Tsukihi   dandan kokoro tsukushi taru yue
verses.jp_1: ないせかいはじめよふとてこの月日
verses.jp_2: たん／＼心つくしたるゆへ

verses.en: There is no one who knows of this path. What do you think of this regret of Tsukihi?
verses.ro: kono michi o shiritaru mono wa sarani nashi   Tsukihi zannen nanto omou zo
verses.jp_1: このみちをしりたるものハさらになし
verses.jp_2: 月日ざんねんなんとをもうぞ

verses.en: So much thought has gone into beginning this world, how deep is the regret in the mind of Tsukihi!
verses.ro: kora hodoni omote hajimeta kono sekai   Tsukihi no kokoro nanto zannen
verses.jp_1: こらほどにをもてはじめたこのせかい
verses.jp_2: 月日の心なんとざんねん

verses.en: Only through the exhaustive efforts of Tsukihi, made step by step, have you become the humans you are.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori dandan kokoro tsukushi kiri   sono yue naru no ningen de aru
verses.jp_1: 月日よりたん／＼心つくしきり
verses.jp_2: そのゆへなるのにんけんである

verses.en: Unaware of this, the high mountains at present are rampant and doing as they please.
verses.ro: sore shirazu ima no tokoro wa takayama wa   mina habikarite mamani shite iru
verses.jp_1: それしらす今のところハ高山ハ
verses.jp_2: みなはびかりてまゝにしている

verses.en: This is the greatest regret of Tsukihi. There is no knowing what I may give in return.
verses.ro: kono Tsukihi daiichi kore ga zannen na   donna kayashi o suru ya shiren de
verses.jp_1: この月日大一これがざんねんな
verses.jp_2: どんなかやしをするやしれんで

verses.en: In this world, landslides, thunder, earthquakes, and great winds are all from the anger of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kono sekai yamague nazo mo kaminari mo   jishin okaze Tsukihi rippuku
verses.jp_1: このせかい山ぐゑなそもかみなりも
verses.jp_2: ぢしんをふかぜ月日りいふく

verses.en: Beware, you grand shrines and high mountains whoever! There is no knowing when Tsukihi will rush out.
verses.ro: dono yona taisha takayama yudan shina   nandoki Tsukihi tondederu yara
verses.jp_1: どのよふなたいしや高山ゆたんしな
verses.jp_2: なんとき月日とんてゞるやら

verses.en: Let all of you in the world take care, for Tsukihi will never hold back!
verses.ro: ichiretsu wa minamina waga mi ki o tsuke yo   Tsukihi enryo wa sarani nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: 一れつハみな／＼わがみきをつけよ
verses.jp_2: 月日ゑんりよわさらにないぞや

verses.en: Having warned you about all matters as much as I can, Tsukihi will begin to work.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo seeippai ni kotowarite   sorekara kakaru Tsukihi shigoto o
verses.jp_1: なにもかもせへいゝバいにことわりて
verses.jp_2: それからかゝる月日しことを

verses.en: In whatever things, bear no grudges. It is all a matter of your self-reproach.
verses.ro: dono yona koto mo urami ni omouna yo   mina meme no miurami de aru
verses.jp_1: とのよふな事もらみにをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: みなめへ／＼のみうらみである

verses.en: I have told you this talk repeatedly step by step. Please understand it thoroughly.
verses.ro: kono hanashi dandan kudoki tsumete aru   kore shikkari to kikiwakete kure
verses.jp_1: このはなしたん／＼くどきつめてある
verses.jp_2: これしいかりときゝわけてくれ

verses.en: All humankind, everything depends on the heart of each of you. Know that Tsukihi is discerning it.
verses.ro: ichiretsu wa mina meme no mune shidai   Tsukihi miwakete iru to omoe yo
verses.jp_1: 一れつハみなめへ／＼のむねしたい
verses.jp_2: 月日みハけているとをもゑよ

verses.en: Once Tsukihi has truly discerned your mind, I shall give you a return as soon as I have accepted it.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori shinjitsu kokoro misadamete   uketori shidai kayashi suru nari
verses.jp_1: 月日よりしんぢつ心みさだめて
verses.jp_2: うけとりしたいかやしするなり

verses.en: Until now, whatever you have said or thought, it was only from the human mind.
verses.ro: imamade wa nani o yutemo omotemo   mina ningen no kokoro bakari de
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハなにをゆうてもをもふても
verses.jp_2: みなにんけんの心はかりで

verses.en: From now on, whether you do good or evil, I shall give you a return at once accordingly.
verses.ro: korekara wa yoki koto shite mo ashiki demo   sono mama suguni kayashi suru nari
verses.jp_1: これからハよき事してもあしきでも
verses.jp_2: そのまゝすぐにかやしするなり

verses.en: Until now, I have looked on with understanding, but from now on there will be no allowances.
verses.ro: imamade wa nanika satori mo aritakedo   mo korekara wa satori nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハなにかさとりもありたけど
verses.jp_2: もふこれからハさとりないぞや

verses.en: The true Parent of this universe is Tsukihi. It is I who protect you in everything.
verses.ro: kono yo no shinjitsu no Oya Tsukihi nari   nanika yorozu no shugo suru zo ya
verses.jp_1: このよふのしんぢつのをや月日なり
verses.jp_2: なにかよろづのしゆこするぞや

verses.en: Hereafter, nothing I say will be false. Take all My words to be true and understand them.
verses.ro: konosaki wa nani o yutemo uso wa nai   mina shinjitsu to omote kikiwake
verses.jp_1: このさきハなにをゆうてもうそハない
verses.jp_2: みなしんぢつとをもてきゝわけ

verses.en: Everything there is, was begun by the sincere thoughts of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: dono yona koto demo Tsukihi shinjitsu ni   omote hajimeta koto bakari ya de
verses.jp_1: どのよふな事でも月日しんぢつに
verses.jp_2: をもてはじめた事ばかりやで

verses.en: Until now, when there was illness, you turned to doctors and medicine. Though all of you have worried,
verses.ro: imamade wa yamai to yueba isha kusuri   mina shinpai o shitaru naredomo
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハやまいとゆへばいしやくするり
verses.jp_2: みなしんバいをしたるなれども

verses.en: From now on, I shall save you from any pains, sufferings, or tumors by the Breath and the Hand Dance.
verses.ro: korekara wa itami nayami mo dekimono mo   Iki Teodori de mina tasukeru de
verses.jp_1: これからハいたみなやみもてきものも
verses.jp_2: いきてをどりでみなたすけるで

verses.en: Though you have never known such salvation until now, from now on, try it and see!
verses.ro: kono tasuke imamade shiranu koto naredo   korekara saki wa tameshi shite miyo
verses.jp_1: このたすけいまゝでしらぬ事なれど
verses.jp_2: これからさきハためしゝてみよ

verses.en: No matter how serious the illness may be, I shall save you by the truth of Breath.
verses.ro: dono yona mutsukashiki naru yamai demo   shinjitsu naru no Iki de tasukeru
verses.jp_1: どのよふなむつかしきなるやまいでも
verses.jp_2: しんぢつなるのいきでたすける

verses.en: When Tsukihi has ascertained your mind's sincerity, know that I shall grant you every kind of protection.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori shinjitsu kokoro misadamete   ikana shugo mo suru to omoe yo
verses.jp_1: 月日よりしんじつ心みさためて
verses.jp_2: いかなしゆこふもするとをもゑよ

verses.en: Your newborns shall be free from smallpox and measles. They shall live on without illness or death.
verses.ro: umare ko hoso hashika mo sen yoni   yamazu shinazu ni kurasu koto nara
verses.jp_1: むまれこふほふそはしかもせんよふに
verses.jp_2: やますしなすにくらす事なら

verses.en: Listen carefully: whatever free and unlimited workings I may do, it is all from the mind of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: shikato kike ikana juyo suru totemo   Tsukihi no kokoro bakari naru zo ya
verses.jp_1: しかときけいかなぢうよふするとても
verses.jp_2: 月日の心ばかりなるぞや

verses.en: Though even until now I have made most of My appeals, still more needs to be said of Tsukihi's thoughts.
verses.ro: imamade mo taite kudoki mo toitaredo   mada yuitaran Tsukihi omowaku
verses.jp_1: いまゝでもたいてくどきもといたれど
verses.jp_2: まだゆいたらん月日をもわく

verses.en: At this time, because the regret of Tsukihi has piled up so high, you shall hear all of it.
verses.ro: konotabi wa nanika Tsukihi no zannen o   tsumori aru kara mina yute oku
verses.jp_1: このたびハなにか月日のざんねんを
verses.jp_2: つもりあるからみなゆうてをく

verses.en: Since the single-hearted salvation is being stopped at this place, I cannot bear but to give a return.
verses.ro: kono tokoro tasuke ichijo tomerarete   nandemo kayashi sezu ni iraren
verses.jp_1: このところたすけ一ぢよとめられて
verses.jp_2: なんてもかやしせすにいられん

verses.en: In this return, I shall clear away the grand shrines and high mountains. Let all of you be aware!
verses.ro: kono kayashi taisha takayama toriharai   mina ichiretsu wa shochi shite iyo
verses.jp_1: このかやしたいしや高山とりはらい
verses.jp_2: みな一れハしよちしていよ

verses.en: What are you thinking on hearing this talk? Flames of heaven, rains of fire, and tidal waves in the seas...
verses.ro: kono hanashi nanto omote kiite iru   tenbi hi no ame umi wa tsunami ya
verses.jp_1: このはなしなんとをもふてきいている
verses.jp_2: てんび火のあめうみわつなみや

verses.en: Such is the great anxiety in the mind of Tsukihi. What is the whole world thinking?
verses.ro: kora hodono Tsukihi no kokoro shinpai o   sekaiju wa nanto omoteru
verses.jp_1: こらほどの月日の心しんバいを
verses.jp_2: せかいぢうハなんとをもてる

verses.en: Though I appeal to you in sorrow over and over, I shall save you if you become of a sincere mind.
verses.ro: dandan to kudoki nageki wa toku keredo   shinjitsu naru no kokoro tasukeru
verses.jp_1: たん／＼とくどきなけきハとくけれど
verses.jp_2: しんぢつなるの心たすける

verses.en: Whoever you are, you are all My children. Awaken to the anxiety in the mind of Tsukihi!
verses.ro: dono yona mono mo ichiretsu waga ko nari   Tsukihi no kokoro shinpai o miyo
verses.jp_1: どのよふなものも一れつハかこなり
verses.jp_2: 月日の心しんばいをみよ

verses.en: Everything in this universe is all by Tsukihi. All human bodies are things lent by Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kono yo wa ichiretsu wa mina Tsukihi nari   ningen wa mina Tsukihi kashimono
verses.jp_1: このよふハ一れつハみな月日なり
verses.jp_2: にんけんハみな月日かしもの

verses.en: If this truth is known all over the world, no one will remain selfish or greedy.
verses.ro: sekaiju kono shinjitsu o shirita nara   goki goyoku dasu mono wa nai
verses.jp_1: せかいぢうこのしんぢつをしりたなら
verses.jp_2: ごふきごふよくだすものわない

verses.en: If only My mind is truly understood, there will be nothing fearful or dangerous.
verses.ro: kokoro sai shinjitsu yori mo wakaritara   nanimo kowami mo abunaki mo nai
verses.jp_1: こゝろさいしんぢつよりもわかりたら
verses.jp_2: なにもこわみもあふなきもない

verses.en: But you erased everything Tsukihi taught. What remains is only the human mind.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori oshieru koto wa mina keshite   ato wa ningen gokoro bakari de
verses.jp_1: 月日よりをしゑる事ハみなけして
verses.jp_2: あとハにんけん心ばかりで

verses.en: Even until now, though I wished to teach you the truth of the beginning of this world,
verses.ro: imamade mo kono yo hajimeta shinjitsu o   oshiete oko to omota naredomo
verses.jp_1: いまゝでもこのよはじめたしんぢつを
verses.jp_2: をしへてをことをもたなれども

verses.en: And though the mind of Tsukihi hastens day after day, know that I am waiting for the appointed time.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori nichinichi kokoro sekikomedo   kokugen machite iru to omoe yo
verses.jp_1: 月日よりにち／＼心せきこめど
verses.jp_2: こくげんまちているとをもゑよ

verses.en: What are you thinking on hearing this talk? Great blessings are intended by Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nanto omote kiite iru   Tsukihi omowaku fukai riyaku o
verses.jp_1: このはなしなんとをもふてきいている
verses.jp_2: 月日をもわくふかいりやくを

verses.en: Never take this to be ordinary. Great is the intent in the workings of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kore bakari hitonami ya towa omouna yo   Tsukihi no shigoto erai omowaku
verses.jp_1: こればかり人なみやとハをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: 月日のしごとゑらいをもわく

verses.en: Though Tsukihi has often spoken of the free and unlimited workings, none of them has yet been seen.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori juyojizai to mama tokedo   mada imamade wa mieta koto nashi
verses.jp_1: 月日よりぢうよちざいとまゝとけと
verses.jp_2: まだいまゝでわみゑた事なし

verses.en: This time, when I truly show you My free and unlimited workings, know that this is truth.
verses.ro: konotabi wa juyojizai o shinjitsu ni   shite miseta nara kore ga makoto ya
verses.jp_1: このたびハぢうよぢざいをしんぢつに
verses.jp_2: してみせたならこれかまことや

verses.en: Whatever is done, it is all by Tsukihi, truly from My single intent to save you.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o suru no mo mina Tsukihi   shinjitsu yori no tasuke ichijo
verses.jp_1: とのよふな事をするのもみな月日
verses.jp_2: しんぢつよりのたすけ一ぢよ

verses.en: The conception of a baby is by Tsukihi. Giving birth to it, also, is by the work of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: tainai e yadoshi komu no mo Tsukihi nari   umare dasu no mo Tsukihi sewadori
verses.jp_1: たいないゑやどしこむのも月日なり
verses.jp_2: むまれだすのも月日せわどり

verses.en: This time, as I am revealed, I shall truly show you all of My workings in every matter.
verses.ro: konotabi wa dono yona koto mo shinjitsu ni   mina arawarete shite miseru de na
verses.jp_1: このたびハどのよな事もしんぢつに
verses.jp_2: みなあらわれてしてみせるでな

verses.en: Be convinced when you see this, whoever you may be: My free and unlimited workings are according to your mind.
verses.ro: kore o mite ikana mono demo tokushin se   kokoro shidai ni ikana juyo
verses.jp_1: これをみていかなものでもとくしんせ
verses.jp_2: 心したいにいかなぢうよふ

verses.en: Whatever I may work, I shall work all things according to your mind of sincerity.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o suru no mo shinjitsu no   kokoro shidai ni mina shite miseru
verses.jp_1: どのよふな事をするのもしんぢつの
verses.jp_2: 心したいにみなしてみせる

verses.en: Thirty-eight years ago, Tsukihi descended because of the causality of origin.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori sanju hachi nen izen nite   amakudari taru moto no innen
verses.jp_1: 月日より三十八ねんいぜんにて
verses.jp_2: あまくだりたる元のいんねん

verses.en: Because this causality exists, Tsukihi desires to tell you all the truth in detail.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori sono innen ga aru yue ni   nanika isai o hanashitai kara
verses.jp_1: 月日よりそのいんねんがあるゆへに
verses.jp_2: なにかいさいをはなしたいから

verses.en: Unaware of this, those in the high places think My teachings all to be worldly common.
verses.ro: kami taru wa sore o shirazu ni nani goto mo   sekainami ya to omote iru nari
verses.jp_1: 上たるハそれをしらすになに事も
verses.jp_2: せかいなみやとをもているなり

verses.en: As this place is the Jiba of Origin, there is nothing unknown about the beginning.
verses.ro: kono tokoro moto naru Jiba no koto naraba   hajimari dashi o shiran koto nashi
verses.jp_1: このところ元なるぢばの事ならば
verses.jp_2: はぢまりだしをしらん事なし

verses.en: Though Tsukihi desires to make this truth quickly known to the high places,
verses.ro: kami taru e kono shinjitsu o hayabaya to   shirashite yaro to Tsukihi omoedo
verses.jp_1: 上たるゑこのしんぢつをはや／＼と
verses.jp_2: しらしてやろと月日をもゑど

verses.en: Unaware of this, those in the high places are thinking only about their selfish concerns.
verses.ro: kami taru wa sore o shirazu ni meme no   waga mi shiyan o bakari omote
verses.jp_1: 上たるハそれをしらすにめへ／＼の
verses.jp_2: わがみしやんをばかりをもをて

verses.en: Because Tsukihi sees a dreadful and dangerous path opening before you step by step,
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa dandan mieru michisuji ni   kowaki abunaki michi ga aru node
verses.jp_1: 月日にハたん／＼みへるみちすぢに
verses.jp_2: こわきあふなきみちがあるので

verses.en: Know that Tsukihi worries and is anxious to tell you quickly about that path.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori sono michi hayaku shiraso to   omote shinpai shite iru to koso
verses.jp_1: 月日よりそのみちはやくしらそふと
verses.jp_2: をもてしんバいしているとこそ

verses.en: Just as you humans worry about your children, I worry over your dreadful and dangerous path.
verses.ro: ningen no waga ko omou mo onaji koto   kowaki abunaki michi o anjiru
verses.jp_1: にんけんのわが子をもうもをなぢ事
verses.jp_2: こわきあふなきみちをあんぢる

verses.en: Unaware of this, all of you everywhere are living your lives without heed.
verses.ro: sore shirazu mina ichiretsu wa meme ni   mina ukkari to kurashi iru nari
verses.jp_1: それしらすみな一れハめへ／＼に
verses.jp_2: みなうゝかりとくらしいるなり

verses.en: Know that Tsukihi rules over everything in this world without exception.
verses.ro: kono sekai nanika yorozu o ichiretsu ni   Tsukihi shihai o suru to omoe yo
verses.jp_1: このせかいなにかよろすづを一れつに
verses.jp_2: 月日しはいをするとをもゑよ

verses.en: What do you think this talk is about? Watch the path which lies ahead.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doyu koto ni omou kana   korekara saki no michi o mite iyo
verses.jp_1: このはなしどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp_2: これからさきのみちをみていよ

verses.en: However high the mountains, floodwaters will reach them. Yet in the low valleys there will be no danger.
verses.ro: dono yona takai yama demo mizu ga tsuku   tanisoko ya tote abunage wa nai
verses.jp_1: どのよふな高い山でも水がつく
verses.jp_2: たにそこやとてあふなけわない

verses.en: As it is Tsukihi who rules over all, never say that this is large or that is small.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo Tsukihi shihai o suru kara wa   oki chiisai yu de nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: なにもかも月日しはいをするからハ
verses.jp_2: をふきちいさいゆうでないぞや

verses.en: Even until now, from My desire for useful timber, I have searched most everywhere.
verses.ro: koremade mo nandemo yogi hoshii kara   taitei tazune itaru naredomo
verses.jp_2: たいていたづねいたるなれども

verses.en: This time, in the low valleys I see promising trees in abundance.

verses.jp_1: このたびハをびやたすけのしんぢつを
verses.jp_2: はやくたすけを月日せけども

verses.jp_2: そばの心わなんでいづむど

verses.jp_1: こらほどにをもう月日のしんぢつを

verses.jp_1: いまゝてのみちのすがらとゆうものハ
verses.jp_2: とふゆうみちもしりたものなし

verses.jp_1: これからハとのよなみちもたん／＼と
verses.jp_2: よろづみちすじみなゆてきかす

verses.jp_1: 月日よりなにもみちすじきいたなら
verses.jp_2: このざんねんハむりてあるまい

verses.jp_2: あとのところはよふきづくめや

verses.jp_1: にち／＼によふきづくめとゆうのわな
verses.jp_2: いかなる事やたれもしろまい

verses.jp_1: なにもかもよふきとゆうハみなつとめ
verses.jp_2: めづらし事をみなをしゑるで

verses.jp_1: たん／＼とつとめをしへるこのもよふ
verses.jp_2: むねのうちよりみなそふぢする

verses.en: Thereafter, your mind will become spirited day by day, and I shall teach you the hand movements for every Service.
verses.ro: ato naru wa nichinichi kokoro isamu de na   yorozu no Tsutome tee o tsukeru de
verses.jp_1: あとなるハにち／＼心いさむでな
verses.jp_2: よろづのつとめてへをつけるで

verses.en: What do you think this Service is? It is from My single intent to save you in childbirth and from smallpox.
verses.ro: kono Tsutome doyu koto ni omou kana   obiya hoso no tasuke ichijo
verses.jp_1: このつとめどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp_2: をびやほふそのたすけ一ぢよふ

verses.en: What do you think this salvation is about? I shall teach the Service to free you from smallpox.
verses.ro: kono tasuke ika naru koto to omou kana   hoso sen yono Tsutome oshieru
verses.jp_1: このたすけいかなる事とをもうかな
verses.jp_2: ほふそせんよのつとめをしへる

verses.en: By this Service which teaches the path quickly, all minds in the world will be purified.
verses.ro: kono michi o hayaku oshieru kono Tsutome   sekai ichiretsu kokoro sumasuru
verses.jp_1: このみちをはやくをしへるこのつとめ
verses.jp_2: せかい一れつ心すまする

verses.en: How are you hearing this talk? It is solely about the preparations for the salvation of the world.

verses.jp_1: このはなしどふゆう事にきいている
verses.jp_2: せかいたすけるもよふばかりを

verses.en: Of whatever salvation, you are assured, because your true Parent lives.

verses.jp_1: どのようなたすけするのもしんちつの
verses.jp_2: をやがいるからみなひきうける
