verses.jp_1: この事をこれをまことにをもうなら
verses.jp_2: まことしんぢつ心したいや

verses.en: If only your mind becomes truly pure, nothing at all will ever be in error.
verses.ro: kokoro sai shinjitsu sunda koto naraba   donna koto demo chigau koto nashi
verses.jp_1: 心さいしんぢつすんだ事ならば
verses.jp_2: どんな事でもちがう事なし

verses.en: Until now, no matter how great was Tsukihi's concern, no understanding was in the minds of you close to Me.

verses.jp_1: いまゝでハ月日いかほどをもふても
verses.jp_2: そばの心にわかりないので

verses.en: From now on, whatever Service I may teach, it is not from a human mind.
verses.ro: korekara wa dono yona Tsutome oshieru mo   ningen naru no kokoro dewa nai
verses.jp_1: これからハどのよなつとめをしへるも
verses.jp_2: にんけんなるの心でわない

verses.en: Tsukihi will teach on every kind of thing, things never known since I began this world.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori dono yona koto mo oshieru de   kono yo hajimete nai koto bakari
verses.jp_1: 月日よりどのよな事もをしゑるで
verses.jp_2: このよはぢめてない事はかり

verses.en: Tsukihi never speaks about thoughts conceived in the minds of human beings.

verses.jp_1: にんけんの心てをもうよふな事
verses.jp_2: 月日わなにもゆうてないそや

verses.en: Tsukihi will teach about every matter to all humankind equally, and the world will be filled with joy.

verses.jp_1: 月日にハとのよな事も一れつに
verses.jp_2: みなにをしへてよふきづくめに

verses.en: If only human beings throughout the world have purified their minds and lead lives joyously...
verses.ro: sekaiju mina ichiretsu wa sumikirite   yokizukume ni kurasu koto nara
verses.jp_1: せかいぢうみな一れつハすみきりて
verses.jp_2: よふきづくめにくらす事なら

verses.en: When the mind of Tsukihi is truly spirited, so will be all human beings.
verses.ro: Tsukihi nimo tashika kokoro ga isamu nara   ningen naru mo mina onaji koto
verses.jp_1: 月日にもたしか心がいさむなら
verses.jp_2: にんけんなるもみなをなし事

verses.en: When the minds of all the world are spirited, Tsukihi and human beings will be one in mind.

verses.jp_1: このよふのせかいの心いさむなら
verses.jp_2: 月日にんけんをなじ事やで

verses.en: The mountainous regret of Tsukihi piled up day by day: to clear it away is My desire.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Tsukihi zannen yamayama to   tsumorite aru o harashitai kara
verses.jp_1: にち／＼に月日さんねん山／＼と
verses.jp_2: つもりてあるをはらしたいから

verses.en: This talk, given step by step, is about the intention of Tsukihi: to bring forth universal salvation.

verses.jp_1: このはなし月日をもわくだん／＼と
verses.jp_2: なにかよろづのたすけなるのわ

verses.jp_1: しんちつの心したいにとのよふな
verses.jp_2: つとめするのもみなたすけやで

verses.jp_1: 月日にハせかいぢうゝハみなわが子
verses.jp_2: たすけたいとの心ばかりで

verses.en: Despite this, to My regret, they attempted to stop Me and, after that, even to forbid.

verses.jp_1: そのところさしとめられてさんねんな
verses.jp_2: まだそのゝちハとりはらいまで

verses.en: Because of this, the Salvation Service cannot be performed. Oh, the regret in the mind of Tsukihi!
verses.ro: soreyue ni Tasuke-zutome ga deken kara   Tsukihi no kokoro nanto zannen
verses.jp_1: それゆへにたすけづとめがでけんから
verses.jp_2: 月日の心なんとさんねん

verses.en: As for the Service, it is Tsukihi who teaches you the hand movements step by step. It is not from a human mind.

verses.jp_1: つとめでも月日たん／＼てをふしゑ
verses.jp_2: にんけんなるの心でわない

verses.en: Whatever I may do, never think that it is from the human mind.

verses.jp_1: とのよふな事をするのもにんけんの
verses.jp_2: 心あるとハさらにをもうな

verses.en: At this place, every talk is by Tsukihi and every preparation is by Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kono tokoro ikana hanashi mo Tsukihi nari   donna moyo mo mina Tsukihi ya de
verses.jp_1: このところいかなはなしも月日なり
verses.jp_2: どんなもよふもみな月日やで

verses.en: Whatever disorder may come to you, never think that it is from the human mind.
verses.ro: ika naru no sawari tsuitemo ningen no   kokoro wa sarani aru to omouna
verses.jp_1: いかなるのさハりついてもにんけんの
verses.jp_2: 心わさらにあるとをもうな

verses.en: Since it is Tsukihi who began this world, there is nothing unknown to Me.

verses.jp_1: このよふをはじめだしたる月日なら
verses.jp_2: どんな事でもしらぬ事なし

verses.en: The innermost heart of everyone in the world is all reflected to Tsukihi.
verses.ro: sekaiju ichiretsu naru no mune no uchi   Tsukihi no ho e mina utsuru nari
verses.jp_1: せかいぢう一れつなるのむねのうち
verses.jp_2: つきひのほふゑみなうつるなり

verses.jp_1: それしらすみなにんけんの心とて
verses.jp_2: わがみしやんをばかりをもふて

verses.en: Hereafter, I shall teach you everything about the true path step by step.
verses.ro: konosaki wa mina dandan to shinjitsu no   michi o oshieru koto de aru kara
verses.jp_1: このさきハみなだん／＼としんぢつの
verses.jp_2: みちをふしゑる事であるから

verses.en: The beginning of this world was by Tsukihi. I began to teach everything fully in detail.

verses.jp_1: このよふのはじまりだしハ月日なり
verses.jp_2: なにかいさいをみなをしゑかけ

verses.en: Until then, there was no one who knew. There were only the thoughts of Tsukihi.

verses.jp_1: それまでハたれかしりたるものハなし
verses.jp_2: なにか月日のしやんばかりで

verses.en: Even until today, I have been telling you that everything is by Tsukihi, but still you do not understand.

verses.jp_1: けふまでもなによの事も月日やと
verses.jp_2: ゆうてあれどもまだわからんで

verses.en: Listen! Though I have already told you the truth of My beginning of this world,

verses.jp_1: しかときけこのよはじめたしんちつと
verses.jp_2: ゆうてはなしハといてあれども

verses.en: There is no one in the world who knows. Whatever I say is difficult for you to understand.

verses.jp_1: せかいにハたれかしりたるものハなし
verses.jp_2: なにをいうてもハかりがたない

verses.jp_1: そのはづやこのよはじめてない事を

verses.jp_1: このよふのはじまりだしのしんぢつを
verses.jp_2: しらしてをかん事にをいてわ

verses.en: Even until now, I have often taught about My single intent to save you, but you have not known the real truth.

verses.jp_1: いまゝてもたすけ一ぢよとまゝとけど
verses.jp_2: ほんしんぢつをしらぬ事から

verses.en: Whatever I say, it is the word of Tsukihi. If only you would listen to My words as the truth...

verses.jp_1: どのよふな事でも月日ゆう事や
verses.jp_2: これしんぢつとをもてきくなら

verses.jp_1: どのよふな事もたん／＼ゆてきかす
verses.jp_2: これをまことゝをもてきゝわけ

verses.jp_1: このはなしどふゆう事にをもうかな

verses.jp_2: みな一れつハしよちせゑねば

verses.jp_1: どのよふなたすけするにも人なみの
verses.jp_2: よふなる事ハゆうでないから

verses.jp_2: そんな事をハゆうでないそや

verses.jp_2: しんぢつよりのたすけするそや

verses.en: What do you think this salvation is about? I am preparing the amulet to protect you from smallpox.

verses.jp_1: このたすけどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp_2: ほふそせんよのまむりこしらゑ

verses.en: Another salvation: My free and unlimited workings for the time of childbirth, either to delay or to quicken.

verses.jp_2: のばしなりともはやめなりとも

verses.jp_2: よいなる事とさらにをもうな

verses.en: I must have you know My true intent in beginning this world.

verses.jp_2: はじめだしたるところなるそや

verses.en: This Parent, who began human beings, lives. This is the truth.

verses.jp_2: どこのものでもさらにあるまい

verses.en: Though I speak in this way about things which do not exist, it is all the real truth.

verses.jp_1: このよふなない事ばかりゆうのハな
verses.jp_2: これがしんぢつみなまことやで

verses.en: Even until now, when I began this world which did not exist, I began by teaching things unknown.

verses.jp_1: いまゝでもないせかいをばはじめたハ
verses.jp_2: しらぬ事をばをしゑはじめて

verses.en: This time also, I begin to teach again, speaking only of things which do not exist and things unknown.

verses.jp_1: このたびもまたない事や知らぬ事
verses.jp_2: ばかりゆううてまたをしへかけ

verses.en: This is the intention of Tsukihi: to teach everything which no one has ever known.
verses.ro: dono yona mono demo shiranu koto bakari   kore o oshieru Tsukihi omowaku
verses.jp_1: どのよふなものでもしらぬ事ばかり
verses.jp_2: これをふしへる月日をもわく

verses.en: By teaching everything solely about the unknown step by step, Tsukihi will save the world.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa dandan shiranu koto bakari   nanimo oshiete sekai tasukeru
verses.jp_1: 月日にハたん／＼しらぬ事ばかり
verses.jp_2: なにもをしへてせかいたすける

verses.en: So great is Tsukihi's concern, but those in the world are aware of nothing.

verses.jp_1: こらほどにをもう月日のしんばいを

verses.jp_1: 心さい月日しんぢつうけとれば
verses.jp_2: どんなたすけもみなうけやうで

verses.jp_2: をやがいるから月日ゆうのや

verses.jp_2: しりたるものハさらにあるまい

verses.en: So should it be, for this is the first time that Tsukihi has entered a body and speaks.
verses.ro: sono hazu ya Tsukihi tainai irikonde   hanashi suru no wa ima hajime ya de
verses.jp_1: そのはづや月日たいない入りこんで
verses.jp_2: はなしするのハいまはじめやで

verses.en: To Tsukihi, who can see everything in this world, nothing is unknown.
verses.ro: kono sekai ichiretsu mieru Tsukihi nara   doko no koto demo shiranu koto nashi
verses.jp_1: このせかい一れつみゑる月日なら
verses.jp_2: とこの事でもしらぬ事なし

verses.en: Watching each and everyone of you, Tsukihi will discern the good and evil.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori mina sorezore to misadamete   zen to aku to o miwake suru zo ya
verses.jp_1: 月日よりみなそれ／＼とみさだめて
verses.jp_2: 善とあくとをみハけするぞや

verses.en: If you wonder why Tsukihi is so persistent, it is because I pity you when evil appears.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori nande kono yoni kudoi nara   ashiki mieru ga kinodoku na kara
verses.jp_1: 月日よりなんでこのよにくどいなら
verses.jp_2: あしきみへるがきのどくなから

verses.en: If your debts pile up step by step, a path of oxen and horses will finally appear.
verses.ro: dandan to on ga kasanari sono ue wa   gyuba to mieru michi ga aru kara
verses.jp_1: たん／＼とをんかかさなりそのゆへハ
verses.jp_2: きゆばいみへるみちがあるから

verses.en: But Tsukihi will save all of you, whoever you may be, if only your sincerity is accepted.
verses.ro: dono yona mono demo Tsukihi shinjitsu o   uketorita nara mina tasukeru de
verses.jp_1: とのよふなものでも月日しんぢつを
verses.jp_2: うけとりたならみなたすけるで

verses.en: Until now, no matter what I had told you, you have not been able to see anything.
verses.ro: imamade wa donna hanashi o shitaru tomo   nanimo mietaru koto wa nakeredo
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハどんなはなしをしたるとも
verses.jp_2: なにもみゑたる事ハなけれど

verses.en: Even until now, all things have already appeared, but you have not known their true origin.
verses.ro: koremade mo mina miekitaru koto naredo   honmoto naru o shiran koto kara
verses.jp_1: これまてもみなみへきたる事なれど
verses.jp_2: ほんもとなるをしらん事から

verses.en: Thunder, earthquakes, great winds, and floods: these are from the regret and anger of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kaminari mo jishin okaze mizutsuki mo   kore wa Tsukihi no zanen rippuku
verses.jp_1: かみなりもぢしんをふかぜ水つきも
verses.jp_2: これわ月日のざねんりいふく

verses.en: Because no one has ever understood this matter, this time Tsukihi will tell you about them beforehand.
verses.ro: kono koto o imamade tare mo shiran kara   konotabi Tsukihi saki e shirasuru
verses.jp_1: この事をいまゝでたれもしらんから
verses.jp_2: このたび月日さきゑしらする

verses.en: To Tsukihi, each of you, one and all, is a child of Mine. I am filled with love for you.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa mina ichiretsu wa waga ko nari   kawai ippai omote iredomo
verses.jp_1: 月日にハみな一れつハわが子なり
verses.jp_2: かハいゝばいをもていれとも

verses.en: But the innermost heart of everyone of you is covered with piles of dust.
verses.ro: ichiretsu wa mina meme no mune no uchi   hokori ippai tsumori aru kara
verses.jp_1: 一れつハみなめへ／＼のむねのうち
verses.jp_2: ほこりいゝばいつもりあるから

verses.en: Unless this dust is cleanly swept away, the deep concern of Tsukihi will be to naught.
verses.ro: kono hokori sukiyaka soji sen koto ni   Tsukihi ika hodo omotaru tote
verses.jp_1: このほこりすきやかそふぢせん事に
verses.jp_2: 月日いかほどをもふたるとて

verses.en: Tsukihi is anxious about your dreadful and dangerous course. Yet none of you is aware.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori kowaki abunaki michisuji o   anjite iredo meme shirazu ni
verses.jp_1: 月日よりこわきあふなきみちすじを
verses.jp_2: あんぢていれどめへ／＼しらすに

verses.en: On however high a place you may be, everyone is a child of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: dono yona takai tokoro to yuta tote   Tsukihi no ta ni mina waga ko ya de
verses.jp_1: とのよふなたかいところとゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: 月日のたあにみなわがこやで

verses.en: Knowing nothing of it, you try to stop your Parent's work, even to take things away. What manner is this?
verses.ro: sore shirazu Oya no suru koto sashitomete   mata toriharote kore wa ikaga zo
verses.jp_1: それしらずをやのする事さしとめて
verses.jp_2: またとりはろてこれハいかゞぞ

verses.en: Though until now Tsukihi has never come out into the open no matter what occurred,
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa imamade donna koto ya tote   araware detaru koto wa nakeredo
verses.jp_1: 月日にハいまゝでどんな事やとて
verses.jp_2: あらわれでたる事わなけれど

verses.en: This time, unless your innermost heart is made thoroughly clear, the preparations to follow cannot be made.
verses.ro: konotabi wa mune no uchi yori sukiyaka ni   harasan koto ni ato no moyo o
verses.jp_1: このたびハむねのうちよりすきやかに
verses.jp_2: はらさん事にあとのもよふを

verses.en: Thereafter, I shall need only to proceed with the means to save all of you, whoever you may be.
verses.ro: kono ato wa dono yona mono mo ichiretsu ni   tasuketai to no shudan bakari o
verses.jp_1: このあとハとのよなものも一れつに
verses.jp_2: たすけたいとのしゆだんはかりを

verses.en: Hereafter, when I begin My work of single-hearted salvation, everyone of you will only be spirited.
verses.ro: konosaki wa tasuke ichijo ni kakaritara   dono yona mono mo isamu bakari ya
verses.jp_1: このさきハたすけ一ぢよにかゝりたら
verses.jp_2: どのよなものもいさむばかりや

verses.en: Whatever Tsukihi has once said will never become false through all time.
verses.ro: nani goto mo Tsukihi ichido yuta koto   chigai so naru koto wa nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: なに事も月日一どふゆうた事
verses.jp_2: ちがいそふなる事わないぞや

verses.en: Even until now, I have taught you so tediously, yet there is no understanding in your minds.
verses.ro: imamade mo akudoi hodo mo toite aru   naredo kokoro ni wakari nai kara
verses.jp_1: いまゝてもあくどいほともといてある
verses.jp_2: なれと心にわかりないから

verses.en: Listen! You are mistaken in thinking of Me as being human, the same as you.
verses.ro: shikato kike onaji ningen naru yoni   omote iru no wa kore wa chigau de
verses.jp_1: しかときけをなじにんけんなるよふに
verses.jp_2: をもているのハこれハちがうで

verses.en: To begin teaching about all matters, one must be the Parent of Origin.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o oshiete kakaru no mo   moto naru Oya de nakuba ikan de
verses.jp_1: どのような事をふしへてかゝるのも
verses.jp_2: もとなるをやてなくばいかんで

verses.en: Even until now, in all the teachings I have given you, I began them by this truth.
verses.ro: imamade mo nani o oshiete kitaru no mo   mina kono dori hajime kaketa de
verses.jp_1: いまゝてもなにをふしへてきたるのも
verses.jp_2: みなこのどふりはじめかけたで

verses.en: If there should be another parent who began human beings, go and seek to find where.
verses.ro: ningen o hajimeta Oya ga mo ichi nin   doko ni aru nara tazune ite miyo
verses.jp_1: にんけんをはじめたをやがも一にん
verses.jp_2: どこにあるならたつねいてみよ

verses.en: Though I speak in this way of unknown things step by step, it is the truth.
verses.ro: kono yona shiranu koto oba dandan to   yute iredomo kore ga makoto ya
verses.jp_1: このよふなしらぬ事をばだん／＼と
verses.jp_2: ゆうていれどもこれがまことや

verses.en: Day after day, teaching you of the unknown and of things yet to be is the pleasure of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni shiranu koto o ya nai koto o   kore oshieru ga Tsukihi tanoshimi
verses.jp_1: にち／＼にしらぬ事をやない事を
verses.jp_2: これをしへるが月日たのしみ

verses.en: You have heard of the Gift of Heaven to be given to the Parent of this world's human beginnings.
verses.ro: kono yo no ningen hajime Oya naru ni   ten no atae wa aru to kikedomo
verses.jp_1: このよふのにんけんはじめをやなるに
verses.jp_2: 天のあたゑハあるときけども

verses.en: You may not know what this talk is about. Tsukihi wishes to bestow the Food of Heaven.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nanino koto yara choto shiren   Tsukihi jikimotsu yaro to yu no ya
verses.jp_1: このはなしなにの事やら一寸しれん
verses.jp_2: 月日ぢきもつやろとゆうのや

verses.en: Further about this talk: place a flat vessel on the Kanrodai.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doyu koto de aro nara   Kanrodai ni hirabachi o nose
verses.jp_1: このはなしどふゆう事であろをなら
verses.jp_2: かんろふたいにひらばちをのせ

verses.en: Hereafter, bodily disorders will appear here and there. Know that it is the care being given by Tsukihi.
verses.ro: konosaki wa atchi kotchi ni mi ni sawari   Tsukihi teiri o suru to omoe yo
verses.jp_1: このさきハあゝちこゝちにみにさハり
verses.jp_2: 月日ひていりをするとをもゑよ

verses.en: When you come, compare your disorder with this place. If the condition is the same, quickly begin the sweeping.
verses.ro: kitaru nara waga mi sawari to hikiyawase   onaji koto nara hayaku soji o
verses.jp_1: きたるならわがみさハりとひきやハせ
verses.jp_2: をなじ事ならはやくそふぢふ

verses.en: Walk over where you have swept, and you will come to a standstill. There, the Kanrodai...
verses.ro: soji shita tokoro o aruki tachidomari   sono tokoro yori Kanrodai o
verses.jp_1: そふぢしたところをあるきたちとまり
verses.jp_2: そのところよりかんろふだいを

verses.en: When it is done, assemble the performers and quickly begin the Service. Your minds will be spirited.
verses.ro: shitaru nara soreyori Tsutome te o soroi   hayaku kakare yo kokoro isamu de
verses.jp_1: したるならそれよりつとめてをそろい
verses.jp_2: はやくかゝれよ心いさむで

verses.en: Indeed, wherever else you may seek it, it will never be found. It is the central pillar of Nihon.
verses.ro: kore bakari doko tazunetemo nai hodoni   kore nippon no shin no hashira ya
verses.jp_1: こればかりどこたづねてもないほどに
verses.jp_2: これにいほんのしんのはしらや

verses.en: If only this comes surely into being, there will be no one whoever to fear.
verses.ro: kore saika tashika miekita koto naraba   donna mono demo osoru mono nashi
verses.jp_1: これさいかたしかみへきた事ならば
verses.jp_2: とんなものでもをそるものなし

verses.en: In any case, unless you are able to see the proof of the truth, I cannot set out on My next preparations.
verses.ro: nani yu mo shinjitsu naru no shoko ga   mien koto niwa ato no moyo o
verses.jp_1: なにゆうもしんぢつなるのしよこふが
verses.jp_2: みゑん事にわあとのもよふを

verses.en: On however high a place you may be, I shall talk to you freely.
verses.ro: dono yona takai tokoro no mono ya tote   juyoshidai ni hanashi suru nari
verses.jp_1: とのよふな高いところのものやとて
verses.jp_2: ぢうよしだいにはなしするなり

verses.en: Until now, whatever I said, you thought it had come from the mind of a human being.
verses.ro: imamade wa nani o yutemo ningen no   kokoro no yoni omote itaredo
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハなにをゆうてもにんけんの
verses.jp_2: 心のよふにをもていたれど

verses.en: This time, whatever I may say, never think that it comes from a human mind.
verses.ro: konotabi wa nani o yutemo ningen no   kokoro aru towa sarani omouna
verses.jp_1: このたびハなにをゆうてもにんけんの
verses.jp_2: 心あるとハさらにをもうな

verses.en: Please listen closely to whatever I say. Never is there mixed the least bit of a human mind.
verses.ro: dono yona koto demo shikato kiite kure   ningen gokoro sarani mazen de
verses.jp_1: どのよふな事でもしかときいてくれ
verses.jp_2: にんけん心さらにまぜんで

verses.en: Tsukihi is going to tell you clearly about all matters. Listen to Me, please.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori dono yona koto mo shikkari to   yuikakeru de na kore kiite kure
verses.jp_1: 月日よりどのよな事もしいかりと
verses.jp_2: ゆいかけるでなこれきいてくれ

verses.en: I desire that the two persons received as shrines by Tsukihi each be given a separate room.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori yashiro to naru o futari tomo   betsuma hedatete oite morotara
verses.jp_1: 月日よりやしろとなるを二人とも
verses.jp_2: べつまへだてゝをいてもろたら

verses.en: Then, in whatever you pray, your salvation will be assured. Watch closely!
verses.ro: nani yu mo soreyori shikato ukeyote   tasuke suru zo ya shikato mite iyo
verses.jp_1: なにゆうもそれよりしかとうけよふて
verses.jp_2: たすけするぞやしかとみていよ

verses.en: This is the basis by which any salvation will be assured hereafter.
verses.ro: konosaki wa dono yona tasuke suru no mo na   mina ukeyau no moto de aru kara
verses.jp_1: このさきハどのよなたすけするのもな
verses.jp_2: みなうけやうのもとであるから

verses.en: Do not disregard anything I say. Listen closely and comply with it, please.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o yutemo kesan yo   tashika kikisumi shochi shite kure
verses.jp_1: どのよふな事をゆうてもけさんよふ
verses.jp_2: たしかきゝすみしよちしてくれ

verses.en: Hereafter, however serious your illness may be, I assure you salvation in every case.
verses.ro: konosaki wa donna mutsukashi yamai demo   mina ukeyote tasuke suru zo ya
verses.jp_1: このさきハどんなむつかしやまいでも
verses.jp_2: みなうけよふてたすけするぞや

verses.en: Though there should be nothing called illness in human beings, no one knows the beginning of this world.
verses.ro: ningen ni yamai to yute nai keredo   kono yo hajimari shirita mono nashi
verses.jp_1: にんけんにやまいとゆうてないけれど
verses.jp_2: このよはじまりしりたものなし

verses.en: Because of My desire to have you know this, I began doctors and medicine for weeding and fertilizing.
verses.ro: kono koto o shirashitai kara dandan to   shuri ya koe ni isha kusuri o
verses.jp_1: この事をしらしたいからたん／＼と
verses.jp_2: しゆりやこゑにいしやくすりを

verses.en: From now on, I shall teach you everything about all matters. Listen closely to whatever I say.
verses.ro: korekara wa nanika yorozu o mina toku de   donna koto demo shikato kiku nari
verses.jp_1: これからハなにかよろづをみなとくで
verses.jp_2: どんな事でもしかときくなり

verses.en: Though even until now I have taught most of My teachings, there remains a truth yet untold.
verses.ro: koremade mo taite hanashi mo toitaredo   mada yute nai shinjitsu no koto
verses.jp_1: これまでもたいてはしもといたれど
verses.jp_2: まだゆうてないしんぢつの事

verses.en: What do you think I shall say from today on? The mind of Tsukihi truly hastens.
verses.ro: kyokara wa dono yona koto o yu yara na   Tsukihi no kokoro makoto sekikomi
verses.jp_1: けふからハどのよな事をゆうやらな
verses.jp_2: 月日の心まことせきこみ

verses.en: What is it that I hasten day after day? It is solely the preparation for Tsukihi to rush out.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni nani sekikomu to yu naraba   Tsukihi tobideru moyo bakari o
verses.jp_1: にち／＼になにせきこむとゆうならば
verses.jp_2: 月日とびでるもよふばかりを

verses.en: Listen closely to this talk and understand it well. There is no knowing what I shall do.
verses.ro: kono hanashi shikkari kiite shochi seyo   donna koto oba suru ya shiren de
verses.jp_1: このはなししいかりきいてしよちせよ
verses.jp_2: どんな事をばするやしれんで

verses.en: Please understand well what I say about the conditions of the path ahead. This is the request of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: konosaki no michi no yodai shikkari to   kikiwakete kure Tsukihi tanomi ya
verses.jp_1: このさきのみちのよふだいしいかりと
verses.jp_2: きゝわけてくれ月日たのみや

verses.en: When you hear that Tsukihi has rushed out, quickly bring out the Kanrodai.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori tobideta koto o kiita nara   Kanrodai o hayaku dasu yo
verses.jp_1: 月日よりとびでた事をきいたなら
verses.jp_2: かんろふだいをばやくだすよふ

verses.en: Prepare your minds for the place of the Jiba, the place where the Kanrodai is to be set up.
verses.ro: Kanrodai sueru tokoro o shikkari to   Jiba no tokoro o kokoro zumori o
verses.jp_1: かんろたいすへるところをしいかりと
verses.jp_2: ぢばのところを心づもりを

verses.en: If only this is surely settled, there will be no danger in anything at all.
verses.ro: kore saika tashika sadamete oita nara   donna koto demo abunaki wa nai
verses.jp_1: これさいかたしかさだめてをいたなら
verses.jp_2: とんな事でもあふなきハない

verses.en: Just a word on where Tsukihi will rush out: to the high and the distant places.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori tobideru tokoro choto hanashi   takai tokoro ya toi tokoro i
verses.jp_1: 月日よりとびでるところ一寸はなし
verses.jp_2: 高いところやとふいところい

verses.en: When people hear of this story, there will be talk among everyone of Tsukihi's greatness.
verses.ro: sono hanashi kiitaru naraba ichiretsu wa   nanto Tsukihi wa erai mono ya to
verses.jp_1: そのはなしきいたるならば一れつわ
verses.jp_2: なんと月日ハゑらいものやと

verses.en: Step by step, everyone in the world will speak of it. When that day comes, your heart will be brightened.
verses.ro: sekaiju mina dandan to yu de aro   sono hi kitareba mune ga hareru de
verses.jp_1: せかいぢうみなたん／＼とゆうてあろ
verses.jp_2: その日きたればむねかはれるで

verses.en: From thirty-eight years ago until now, the regret in your heart: how pitiful it is.
verses.ro: imamade wa sanju hachi nen izen kara   mune no zannen makoto kinodoku
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハ三十八ねんいせんから
verses.jp_2: むねのさんねんまこときのどく

verses.en: At this time, I shall make all things clearly known to everyone in the world.
verses.ro: konotabi wa dono yona koto mo shikkari to   mina ichiretsu ni shirasu koto nari
verses.jp_1: このたびハどのよな事もしいかりと
verses.jp_2: みな一れつにしらす事なり

verses.en: What do you think it is that I shall make known? I shall make the Parent of Origin clearly known.
verses.ro: shirasuru mo nani shirasuru to omou kana   moto naru Oya o tashika shirasuru
verses.jp_1: しらするもなにしらするとをもうかな
verses.jp_2: もとなるをやをたしかしらする

verses.en: Though I begin to speak to make such a thing known, perhaps no one knows what it is about.
verses.ro: kono yona koto o yuikake shirasuru mo   nanno koto yara tare mo shiromai
verses.jp_1: このよふな事をゆいかけしらするも
verses.jp_2: なんの事やらたれもしろまい

verses.en: I begin to make the truth known to all humankind from My desire to save this world.
verses.ro: kono yo o ichiretsu naru ni shinjitsu o   tasuketai kara shirashi kakeru de
verses.jp_1: このよふを一れつなるにしんちつを
verses.jp_2: たすけたいからしらしかけるで

verses.en: Now that I shall work salvation unknown until now, it is necessary to make the origin known.
verses.ro: imamade ni nai tasuke oba suru kara wa   moto o shirasan koto ni oite wa
verses.jp_1: いまゝでにないたすけをばするからハ
verses.jp_2: もとをしらさん事にをいてわ

verses.en: To teach you things unknown until now, I shall make the Parent of Origin clearly known.
verses.ro: imamade mo shiranu koto oba oshieru wa   moto naru Oya o tashika shirasuru
verses.jp_1: いまゝでもしらぬ事をばをしへるハ
verses.jp_2: もとなるをやふたしかしらする

verses.en: When you come to know the Parent of Origin clearly, I shall give you My assurance on anything whatever.
verses.ro: moto naru no Oya o tashikani shirita nara   donna koto demo mina hikiukeru
verses.jp_1: 元なるのをやふたしかにしりたなら
verses.jp_2: とんな事でもみなひきうける

verses.en: Do not wonder who speaks these words. They are from none other than the mind of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kono hanashi tare ga yu towa omouna yo   Tsukihi no kokoro bakari naru zo ya
verses.jp_1: このはなしたれがゆうとハをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: 月日の心ばかりなるぞや

verses.en: Look all over the world and through all ages. You will find many kinds of illnesses so-called.
verses.ro: yorozuyo no sekai ichiretsu miwatase yo   yamai to yu mo iroiro ni aru
verses.jp_1: よろづよのせかい一れつみハたせよ
verses.jp_2: やまいとゆうもいろ／＼にある

verses.en: This time, no matter how serious your illness may be, I shall teach you the family recipe for your assured salvation.
verses.ro: konotabi wa donna mutsukashi yamai demo   ukeyote tasuke kaden oshieru
verses.jp_1: このたびハどんなむつかしやまいでも
verses.jp_2: うけよてたすけかでんをしゑる

verses.en: From now on, I shall tell you clearly about the ingredients. Please understand well, whatever I say.
verses.ro: korekara wa tashikani yakumi yute kikasu   nani o yutemo shochi shite kure
verses.jp_1: これからハたしかにやくみゆてきかす
verses.jp_2: なにをゆうてもしよちしてくれ

verses.en: Your suffering at this time must be trying. But look forward to the promise in your future.
verses.ro: konotabi no nayamu tokoro wa tsurakaro   ato no tokoro no tanoshimi o miyo
verses.jp_1: このたびのなやむところハつらかろふ
verses.jp_2: あとのところのたのしみをみよ

verses.en: Before it occurred, I had given you as much notice as I was able. Ponder over it.
verses.ro: sakiyori ni seeippai ni kotowari ga   yute aru zo ya shiyan shite miyo
verses.jp_1: さきよりにせへいゝばいにことハりが
verses.jp_2: ゆうてあるぞやしやんしてみよ

verses.en: In whatever I do, I give you notice of it beforehand and then begin My workings.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o suru nimo saki i yori   kotowarita ue kakaru shigoto ya
verses.jp_1: どのよふな事をするにもさきいより
verses.jp_2: ことわりたゆへかゝるしことや

verses.en: What do you think of this talk? It is because I desire you to know the free and unlimited workings of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doyu koto ni omou kana   Tsukihi juyo shirashitai yue
verses.jp_1: このはなしどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp_2: 月日ぢうよふしらしたいゆゑ

verses.en: Though the mind of Tsukihi sincerely hastens to have you know this one truth quickly,
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni kono ichijo o hayabaya to   Tsukihi no kokoro sete iredomo
verses.jp_1: しんぢつにこの一ぢよふはや／＼と
verses.jp_2: 月日の心せへていれども

verses.en: No matter how much Tsukihi pleads with you close to Me, no one understands. Oh, how I regret.
verses.ro: soba naru ni ika hodo Tsukihi tanondemo   kikiwake ga nai nanto zannen
verses.jp_1: そばなるにいかほど月日たのんでも
verses.jp_2: きゝわけがないなんとさんねん

verses.en: Whatever I say, never think that I am speaking about things in the present.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o yutemo ima no koto   nani o yu towa sarani omouna
verses.jp_1: どのよふな事をゆうてもいまの事
verses.jp_2: なにをゆうとハさらにをもうな

verses.en: Whatever I may tell you step by step, it is solely about things which are to be.
verses.ro: dandan to nanino hanashi o suru nimo na   saki naru koto o bakari yute oku
verses.jp_1: だん／＼となにのはなしをするにもな
verses.jp_2: さきなる事をばかりゆてをく

verses.en: To say what I shall speak about from now on: it will be solely about the Kanrodai.
verses.ro: korekara wa nanino hanashi o suru naraba   Kanrodai no hanashi ichijo
verses.jp_1: これからハなにのはなしをするならば
verses.jp_2: かんろふだいのはなし一ぢよ

verses.en: What is called the Kanrodai at the present time is but a mere model.
verses.ro: ima naru no Kanrodai to yu no wa na   choto no shinagata made no koto ya de
verses.jp_1: いまなるのかんろふだいとゆうのハな
verses.jp_2: 一寸のしながたまでの事やで

verses.en: From now on, I shall teach you clearly, step by step, solely about the preparations for the Kanrodai.
verses.ro: korekara wa dandan shikato yute kikasu   Kanrodai no moyo bakari o
verses.jp_1: これからハだん／＼しかとゆてきかす
verses.jp_2: かんろふだいのもよふばかりを

verses.en: Make the base of this Stand three shaku across and six-sided with a mortise at its center.
verses.ro: kono dai o sukoshi horikomi sashiwatashi   san jaku ni shite rokkaku ni seyo
verses.jp_1: このだいをすこしほりこみさしハたし
verses.jp_2: 三尺にして六かくにせよ

verses.en: Until now, I have taught you various things, but they are all preparations for setting up this Stand.
verses.ro: imamade ni iroiro hanashi toitaru wa   kono dai sueru moyo bakari de
verses.jp_1: いまゝでにいろ／＼はなしといたるハ
verses.jp_2: このだいすへるもよふばかりで

verses.en: If only this Stand has been put firmly in place, there will be nothing fearful or dangerous.
verses.ro: kore saika shikkari suete oita nara   nanimo kowami mo abunaki mo nai
verses.jp_1: これさいかしいかりすへてをいたなら
verses.jp_2: なにもこわみもあふなきもない

verses.en: Should anyone dare to stop what is ordered by Tsukihi, his own life will be stopped.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori sashizu bakari de shita koto o   kore tometa nara waga mi tomaru de
verses.jp_1: 月日よりさしずばかりでした事を
verses.jp_2: これとめたならハがみとまるで

verses.en: When you see it, you will be truly satisfied and know that Tsukihi's teachings are indeed marvelous.
verses.ro: kore o mite makoto shinjitsu kekko to   kore wa Tsukihi no oshie naru ka yo
verses.jp_1: これをみてまことしんぢつけへこふと
verses.jp_2: これハ月日のをしゑなるかよ

verses.en: As soon as this Stand is completed, the Service will be done. Nothing will remain that cannot be realized.
verses.ro: kono dai ga deketachi shidai Tsutome suru   donna koto demo kanawan de nashi
verses.jp_1: このだいがでけたちしだいつとめする
verses.jp_2: どんな事でもかなハんでなし

verses.en: About this Stand: I do not say when or how, but when it is completed, the Service will be done.
verses.ro: kono dai mo itsu dose to yuwan de na   deketachita nara Tsutome suru zo ya
verses.jp_1: このだいもいつどふせへとゆハんでな
verses.jp_2: でけたちたならつとめするぞや

verses.en: If only this Service is begun, nothing will remain that cannot be realized.
verses.ro: kore saika Tsutome ni kakari deta naraba   nani kanawan to yu de nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: これさいかつとめにかゝりでたならば
verses.jp_2: なにかなハんとゆうでないぞや

verses.en: Watch! Tsukihi will surely bestow the Gift, the Food of Heaven, without fail.
verses.ro: kore o miyo tashikani Tsukihi jikimotsu no   atae shikkari tashika watasuru
verses.jp_1: これをみよたしかに月日ぢきもつの
verses.jp_2: あたゑしいかりたしかわたする

verses.en: In whatever matters, unless there is clear proof of the truth, it should remain questionable.
verses.ro: dono yona koto demo tashika shinjitsu no   shoko nakeneba ayaukii koto
verses.jp_1: とのよふな事でもたしかしんちつの
verses.jp_2: しよこなけねばあやうきい事

verses.en: From now on, I shall teach you everything in detail step by step. Do not go against My words.
verses.ro: korekara wa dono yona koto mo dandan to   komakashiku toku kore somukuna yo
verses.jp_1: これからハとのよな事もたん／＼と
verses.jp_2: こまかしくとくこれそむくなよ

verses.en: Do not wonder what it is that I am saying. It is solely about the preparations for the Kanrodai.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nani o yu ya to omouna yo   Kanrodai no moyo ichijo
verses.jp_1: このはなしなにをゆうやとをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: かんろふだいのもよふ一ぢよ

verses.en: This Stand is to be made one block atop another step by step. The uppermost is to be two shaku and four sun.
verses.ro: kono dai mo dandan dan to tsumiagete   mata sono ue wa ni shaku shi sun ni
verses.jp_1: このだいもたん／＼／＼とつみあけて
verses.jp_2: またそのゆへハ二尺四すんに

verses.en: Place a flat vessel on top, and I shall surely bestow the Food of Heaven.
verses.ro: sono ue e hirabachi nosete oita nara   soreyori tashika jikimotsu o yaro
verses.jp_1: そのうゑゝひらばちのせてをいたなら
verses.jp_2: それよりたしかぢきもつをやろ

verses.en: On whom do you think the Food of Heaven is to be bestowed? It is to be bestowed on the Parent who began this world.
verses.ro: jikimotsu o tare ni ataeru koto naraba   kono yo hajimeta Oya ni watasuru
verses.jp_1: ぢきもつをたれにあたへる事ならば
verses.jp_2: このよはじめたをやにわたする

verses.en: There is no one who knows the mind of the Parent who is to receive the Gift from Heaven.
verses.ro: ten yori ni atae o morau sono Oya no   kokoro o tare ka shirita mono nashi
verses.jp_1: 天よりにあたへをもらうそのをやの
verses.jp_2: 心をたれかしりたものなし

verses.en: After Tsukihi surely ascertains the mind, then the Food of Heaven will be bestowed.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori tashikani kokoro misadamete   soreyori watasu jikimotsu no koto
verses.jp_1: 月日よりたしかに心みさだめて
verses.jp_2: それよりハたすぢきもつの事

verses.en: Once Tsukihi has bestowed it, the rest is up to the mind of the Parent.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa kore o watashite oita nara   ato wa Oya yori kokoro shidai ni
verses.jp_1: 月日にハこれをハたしてをいたなら
verses.jp_2: あとハをやより心したいに

verses.en: About the Gift bestowed from Heaven after Tsukihi discerns the sincere mind:
verses.ro: shinjitsu no kokoro Tsukihi ga misadamete   ten yori watasu atae naru no wa
verses.jp_1: しんぢつの心月日がみさだめて
verses.jp_2: 天よりわたすあたゑなるのわ

verses.en: Never take it as a trivial matter. The intention of Heaven is profound.
verses.ro: choto shitaru koto towa sarani omouna yo   ten yori fukai omowaku ga aru
verses.jp_1: 一寸したる事とハさらにをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: 天よりふかいをもハくがある

verses.en: To explain what this talk is about: I shall purify the minds of those in Kara and Tenjiku.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doyu koto de aro nara   kara tenjiku mo kokoro sumashite
verses.jp_1: このはなしどふゆう事であろふなら
verses.jp_2: からてんじくも心すまして

verses.en: How will those minds be purified? Tsukihi will rush out to places near and far.
verses.ro: kono kokoro doshite sumasu koto naraba   Tsukihi tobidete atchi kotchi to
verses.jp_1: この心どふしてすます事ならば
verses.jp_2: 月日とびでゝあゝちこゝちと

verses.en: Step by step, Tsukihi will enter bodies and begin free and unlimited workings.
verses.ro: dandan to Tsukihi tainai irikonde   juyojizai o shite kakaru de na
verses.jp_1: たん／＼と月日たいない入こんで
verses.jp_2: ぢうよぢざいをしてかゝるでな

verses.en: Then, however boastful those of Kara may be, they will never rival those in Nihon.
verses.ro: shitaru nara nanbo kara ya to yuta tote   nihon no mono ni kore wa kanawan
verses.jp_1: したるならなんぼからやとゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: にほんのものにこれハかなわん

verses.en: Be convinced by the things that appear day by day. There is no knowing when or what you will hear.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni mieru tokoro de tokushin se   nandoki donna hanashi kiku yara
verses.jp_1: にち／＼にみへるところでとくしんせ
verses.jp_2: なんどきどんなはなしきくやら

verses.en: Whatever you hear, it was taught beforehand in the talks of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: dono yona hanashi kiitemo saki i yori   kore wa Tsukihi no hanashi naru no ya
verses.jp_1: どのよふなはなしきいてもさきいより
verses.jp_2: これわ月日のはなしなるのや

verses.en: From now on, Tsukihi will favor those in Nihon step by step. Watch!
verses.ro: korekara wa nihon no mono wa dandan to   Tsukihi hikitate kore o mite iyo
verses.jp_1: これからハにほんのものハたん／＼と
verses.jp_2: 月日ひきたてこれをみていよ

verses.en: I shall teach you everything about all things so that nothing will remain which you do not know.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo dono yona koto mo mina oshie   shiran koto owa nai yoni suru
verses.jp_1: なにもかもどのよな事もみなをしへ
verses.jp_2: しらん事をハないよふにする

verses.en: When the pillar is set up in Nihon, you shall no longer fall ill, die, or become weakened.
verses.ro: nihon niwa hashira o tateta koto naraba   yamazu shinazu ni yowari naki yoni
verses.jp_1: にほんにハはしらをたてた事ならば
verses.jp_2: やまずしなすによハりなきよに

verses.en: Until now, those of Kara have rampantly done as they pleased. This time, I shall give them a return.
verses.ro: imamade wa kara ya to yute habikarite   mamani shite ita kondo kayashi o
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハからやとゆうてはびかりて
verses.jp_2: まゝにしていたこんどかやしを

verses.en: By this talk, I do not tell anyone to do anything. I, Tsukihi, shall rush out and do as I please.
verses.ro: kono hanashi tare ni dose to yu de nashi   Tsukihi tobidete mamani suru nari
verses.jp_1: このはなしたれにどふせとゆうでなし
verses.jp_2: 月日とびでゝまゝにするなり

verses.en: Even until now, everyone has known the moon and the sun, but there is no one who knows the true origin.
verses.ro: koremade mo Tsukihi o shiran mono wa nai   naredo honmoto shirita mono nashi
verses.jp_1: これまでも月日をしらんものハない
verses.jp_2: なれとほんもとしりたものなし

verses.en: This time, I shall teach the truth of all matters and hasten to save you.
verses.ro: konotabi wa dono yona koto mo shinjitsu o   yute kikashite tasuke isogu de
verses.jp_1: このたびハどのよな事もしんぢつを
verses.jp_2: ゆうてきかしてたすけいそぐで

verses.en: To say when this will come: it will come as soon as the weeding of the rice fields is done.
verses.ro: kono higara itsu goro naru to yu naraba   ta no shuri o shimai shidai ni
verses.jp_1: このひがらいつころなるとゆうならば
verses.jp_2: たあのしゆりをしまいしだいに

verses.en: Then, a marvelous path will open, and the performers of the Service will all assemble.
verses.ro: sorekara wa nanika mezurashi michi ni naru   Tsutome no ninju mina yorite kuru
verses.jp_1: それからハなにかめづらしみちになる
verses.jp_2: つとめのにんぢうみなよりてくる

verses.en: Step by step and day by day, the mind will become spirited. What a rich harvest will appear in Yamato!
verses.ro: dandan to nichinichi kokoro isamu de na   nanto Yamato wa erai honen
verses.jp_1: たん／＼とにち／＼心いさむでな
verses.jp_2: なんとやまとハゑらいほふねん

verses.en: Day by day, hasten to begin the Service. You will escape any danger whatever.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni hayaku Tsutome o sekikome yo   ika naru nan mo mina nogareru de
verses.jp_1: にち／＼にはやくつとめをせきこめよ
verses.jp_2: いかなるなんもみなのがれるで

verses.en: However serious your illness may be, you will all be saved by the Service done single-heartedly.
verses.ro: dono yona mutsukashiku naru yamai demo   Tsutome ichijo de mina tasukaru de
verses.jp_1: とのよふなむつかしくなるやまいでも
verses.jp_2: つとめ一ぢよてみなたすかるで

verses.en: As to the Service to be done, it is none other than the Service of the Kanrodai.
verses.ro: Tsutome demo doyu Tsutome suru naraba   Kanrodai no Tsutome ichijo
verses.jp_1: つとめでもどふゆうつとめするならば
verses.jp_2: かんろふだいのつとめいちゞよ

verses.en: What do you think this Stand is? It is the Parent of Nihon.
verses.ro: kono dai o doyu koto ni omou kana   kore nippon no Oya de aru zo ya
verses.jp_1: このたいをどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp_2: これにいほんのをやであるぞや

verses.en: If you but sincerely think this to be true, Tsukihi will discern it and assure anything whatever.
verses.ro: kore saika makoto shinjitsu omou nara   Tsukihi miwakete mina hikiukeru
verses.jp_1: これさいかまことしんぢつをもうなら
verses.jp_2: 月日みハけてみなひきうける

verses.en: Since I, Tsukihi, give My assurance, there will not be even a single error in a thousand.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori hikiuke suru to yu kara wa   sen ni hitotsu mo chigau koto nashi
verses.jp_1: 月日よりひきうけするとゆうからわ
verses.jp_2: せんに一つもちがう事なし

verses.en: How are you hearing this talk? It is about the Service of the Kanrodai.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doyu koto ni kiite iru   Kanrodai no Tsutome naru no wa
verses.jp_1: このはなしどふゆう事にきいている
verses.jp_2: かんろふだいのつとめなるのわ

verses.en: Do not think of this Service as being trivial. I desire as many as thirty-six people.
verses.ro: choto shitaru Tsutome naru towa omounayo   sanju roku nin nin ga hoshii de
verses.jp_1: 一寸したるつとめなるとハをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: 三十六人にんがほしいで

verses.en: In time, I shall need nineteen performers for the Kagura Service, including those for the musical instruments.
verses.ro: sono uchi ni narimono irete ju ku nin   Kagura-zutome no ninju hoshii de
verses.jp_1: そのうちになりものいれて十九人
verses.jp_2: かぐらづとめの人ぢうほしいで

verses.en: Truly settle your mind and ponder. I make this a firm request of you, My intermediaries.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni kokoro sadamete shiyan seyo   toritsugi no hito shikato tanomu de
verses.jp_1: しんぢつに心さだめてしやんせよ
verses.jp_2: とりつぎの人しかとたのむで

verses.en: To construct this Stand, Tsukihi is making preparations for the performers step by step.
verses.ro: kono dai o koshirae yo tote dandan ni   Tsukihi ninju no moyo suru nari
verses.jp_1: このだいをこしらゑよとてたん／＼に
verses.jp_2: 月日人ぢうのもよふするなり

verses.en: When the performers are fully assembled, the Stand, also, will be completed of its own accord.
verses.ro: ninju ga shikato yoritaru koto naraba   sono mama dai mo dekeru koto ya de
verses.jp_1: 人ぢうがしかとよりたる事ならば
verses.jp_2: そのまゝだいもでける事やで

verses.en: To explain what this path is about: Tsukihi will teach them the hand movements of the Service, and then,
verses.ro: kono michi wa doyu koto de aru naraba   Tsukihi Tsutome no tee o oshiete
verses.jp_1: このみちハどふゆう事であるならば
verses.jp_2: 月日つとめのてゑをふしへて

verses.en: When Tsukihi takes them forth all over the world, the Stand will be completed of itself.
verses.ro: soreyori mo Tsukihi ichiretsu sekaiju   tsurete deta nara hitori dekeru de
verses.jp_1: それよりも月日一れつせかゑぢう
verses.jp_2: つれてゞたならひとりでけるで

verses.en: If only this is surely completed, the Service each month will be done without error.
verses.ro: kore saika tashikani deketa koto naraba   tsukizuki Tsutome chigau koto nashi
verses.jp_1: これさいかたしかにでけた事ならば
verses.jp_2: 月々つとめちがう事なし

verses.en: If only the Service is done without error, the Gift of Heaven, also, will be given without fail.
verses.ro: Tsutome sai chigawan yoni natta nara   ten no atae mo chigau koto nashi
verses.jp_1: つとめさいちがハんよふになあたなら
verses.jp_2: 天のあたゑもちがう事なし

verses.en: This path is a path of true sincerity and is difficult to follow. Everyone must ponder well.
verses.ro: kono michi wa makoto shinjitsu mutsukashii   michi de aru zo ya mina shiyan seyo
verses.jp_1: このみちハまことしんぢつむつかしい
verses.jp_2: みちであるぞやみなしやんせよ

verses.en: You may not know where these performers are. Tsukihi will discern them and draw them all forth.
verses.ro: kono ninju doko ni aru yara shiromai na   Tsukihi miwakete mina hikiyoseru
verses.jp_1: この人ぢうどこにあるやらしろまいな
verses.jp_2: 月日みわけてみなひきよせる

verses.en: No matter where these people may be, Tsukihi will do this by free and unlimited workings.
verses.ro: dono yona tokoro no mono to yuta tote   Tsukihi juyo shite miseru de na
verses.jp_1: どのよふなところのものとゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: 月日ぢうよふしてみせるでな

verses.en: After the performers are assembled step by step, I shall discern their sincerity and assign their roles.
verses.ro: dandan to ninju sorota sono ue de   shinjitsu o mite yakuwari o suru
verses.jp_1: だん／＼と人ぢうそろふたそのゆへで
verses.jp_2: しんぢつをみてやくわりをする

verses.en: To explain what the roles are to be: ten for the Kagura and others for the musical instruments.
verses.ro: yakuwari mo doyu koto de aru naraba   Kagura ju nin ato i narimono
verses.jp_1: やくハりもどふゆう事であるならば
verses.jp_2: かぐら十人あといなりもの

verses.en: If only this assemblage is quickly completed, nothing will remain that cannot be achieved.
verses.ro: kore saika hayaku shikkari sorota nara   donna koto demo deken koto nashi
verses.jp_1: これさいかはやくしいかりそろたなら
verses.jp_2: どんな事でもでけん事なし

verses.en: From today, I shall change the topic step by step and speak solely of things you have not known before.
verses.ro: kyokara wa dandan monku kawaru de na   imamade shiran koto bakari yu
verses.jp_1: けふからハだん／＼もんくかハるでな
verses.jp_2: いまゝでしらん事ばかりゆう

verses.en: Even until now, there have been various paths, but there is nothing that has not been taught by Tsukihi.
verses.ro: imamade mo dono yona michi mo aru keredo   Tsukihi oshien koto wa nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: いまゝでもどのよなみちもあるけれど
verses.jp_2: 月日をしへん事わないぞや

verses.en: Though Tsukihi has already taught you most everything step by step,
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori taite nanimo dandan to   oshiete kitaru koto de aredomo
verses.jp_1: 月日よりたいてへなにもだん／＼と
verses.jp_2: をしゑてきたる事であれども

verses.en: This time, I shall teach you further all the truths yet unknown to you.
verses.ro: konotabi wa mata sono ue no shiran koto   nanimo shinjitsu mina yute kikasu
verses.jp_1: このたびハまたそのゆへのしらん事
verses.jp_2: なにもしんぢつみなゆてきかす

verses.en: Until now, those of Kara have been boastfully thriving, but they also have been taught by Tsukihi.
verses.ro: koremade wa kara ya to yute habikarita   kore mo Tsukihi ga oshie kitaru de
verses.jp_1: これまでハからやとゆうてはびかりた
verses.jp_2: これも月日がをしへきたるで

verses.en: This time, returning to the origin, Tsukihi will clearly reveal the whole root of the tree.
verses.ro: konotabi wa Tsukihi moto e to tachikairi   ki no ne shikkari mina arawasu de
verses.jp_1: このたびハ月日元ゑとたちかいり
verses.jp_2: 木のねしいかりみなあらハすで

verses.en: There is perhaps no one anywhere who clearly knows the origin of this world.
verses.ro: kono yono moto o shikkari shirita mono   doko no mono demo sarani arumai
verses.jp_1: このよふの元をしいかりしりたもの
verses.jp_2: どこのものでもさらにあるまい

verses.en: If you but clearly know this origin, you will always be assured, wherever you may go.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni kono moto saika shikkari to   shiritaru naraba doko i ita tote
verses.jp_1: しんぢつにこの元さいかしいかりと
verses.jp_2: しりたるならばどこいいたとて

verses.en: What do you think on hearing this talk? I desire to train My intermediaries in this.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nanto omote kiite iru   kore toritsugi ni shikomitai no ya
verses.jp_1: このはなしなんとをもふてきいている
verses.jp_2: これとりつぎにしこみたいのや

verses.en: All that Tsukihi desires is to have the whole world know the origin of human beings.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o Tsukihi no omou niwa   ningen moto o kore sekaiju e
verses.jp_1: どのよふな事を月日のをもうにハ
verses.jp_2: にんけんもとをこれせかゑぢうへ

verses.en: If this truth becomes quickly known to all humankind, My talks will be understood.
verses.ro: hayabaya to kono shinjitsu o ichiretsu ni   shirashitaru nara hanashi wakaru de
verses.jp_1: はや／＼とこのしんちつを一れつに
verses.jp_2: しらしたるならはなしハかるで

verses.en: No matter how I strive to explain My teachings, unless I teach you the origin...
verses.ro: ika hodoni hanashi o toite kikashitemo   moto o shirashite okan koto niwa
verses.jp_1: いかほどにはなしをといてきかしても
verses.jp_2: もとをしらしてをかん事にハ

verses.en: If only I have taught you the origin clearly, you will understand everything I say.
verses.ro: moto saika shikkari yute oita nara   nani o yutemo mina kikiwakeru
verses.jp_1: もとさいかしいかりゆうてをいたなら
verses.jp_2: なにをゆうてもみなきゝハける

verses.en: The earth and heaven of this world is your real Parent. Out of this, human beings were born.
verses.ro: kono yo no jii to ten towa jitsu no Oya   soreyori deketa ningen de aru
verses.jp_1: このよふのぢいと天とハぢつのをや
verses.jp_2: それよりでけたにんけんである

verses.en: From now on, I shall tell you solely of things unknown to both Kara and Nihon. Listen closely!
verses.ro: korekara wa kara mo nihon mo shiran koto   bakari yu zo ya shikato kiku nari
verses.jp_1: これからハからもにほんもしらん事
verses.jp_2: ばかりゆうぞやしかときくなり

verses.en: I wish to train you all in everything so that you need not say that you do not know.
verses.ro: dono yona koto mo shiran to yuwan yo   mina ichiretsu ni shikomitai kara
verses.jp_1: どのよふな事もしらんとゆハんよふ
verses.jp_2: みな一れつにしこみたいから

verses.en: Day after day, the concern in the mind of Tsukihi is the innermost hearts of a great number of people.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Tsukihi no kokoro omou niwa   oku no hito no mune no uchi oba
verses.jp_1: にち／＼に月日の心をもうにわ
verses.jp_2: をゝくの人のむねのうちをば

verses.en: How can I have you understand My mind? I so desire that your minds be purified quickly.
verses.ro: kono kokoro doshita naraba wakaru yara   dodo hayaku ni kore o waketai
verses.jp_1: この心どふしたならばわかるやら
verses.jp_2: どふどはやくにこれをわけたい

verses.en: When all the world is truly purified from the innermost heart, it will be Tsukihi's delight.
verses.ro: sekaiju shinjitsu yori mo mune no uchi   wakarita naraba Tsukihi tanoshimi
verses.jp_1: せかいぢうしんぢつよりもむねのうち
verses.jp_2: わかりたならば月日たのしみ

verses.en: When all humankind is purified from the innermost heart, Tsukihi will, then,
verses.ro: sorekara wa ichiretsu naru no mune no uchi   wakarita naraba Tsukihi soreyori
verses.jp_1: それからハ一れつなるのむねのうち
verses.jp_2: わかりたならば月日それより

verses.en: Make your minds spirited step by step and day by day, and teach joyousness to all of you.
verses.ro: dandan to nichinichi kokoro isame kake   yokizukume o mina ni oshiete
verses.jp_1: だん／＼とにち／＼心いさめかけ
verses.jp_2: よふきづくめをみなにをしへて

verses.en: When the innermost hearts of a great number of people all over the world have been purified,
verses.ro: sekaiju oku no hito no mune no uchi   mina sumashitaru koto de aru nara
verses.jp_1: せかいぢうをふくの人のむねのうち
verses.jp_2: みなすましたる事であるなら

verses.en: Then the mind of Tsukihi will spring forth spiritedly, and I shall teach you everything about all matters.
verses.ro: soreyori mo Tsukihi no kokoro isami dete   donna koto demo mina oshieru de
verses.jp_1: それよりも月日の心いさみでゝ
verses.jp_2: どんな事でもみなをしゑるで

verses.en: Tsukihi desires to teach the truth of everything to all humankind equally.
verses.ro: dono yona koto demo Tsukihi shinjitsu ni   mina ichiretsu ni oshietai no ya
verses.jp_1: とのような事でも月日しんぢつに
verses.jp_2: みな一れつにをしゑたいのや

verses.en: Tsukihi desires you to have a sincere mind because I wish to train you in all matters.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no kokoro ga hoshii Tsukihi niwa   donna koto demo shikomitai kara
verses.jp_1: しんぢつの心がほしい月日にわ
verses.jp_2: どんな事でもしこみたいから

verses.en: In what do you think I wish to train you by this talk? For the countless courses of paths from now on.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nani o shikomu to omou kana   korekara saki no yorozu michisuji
verses.jp_1: このはなしなにをしこむとをもうかな
verses.jp_2: これからさきのよろづみちすじ

verses.en: Until today, you have not been able to see anything. But when the time draws near, things will be seen naturally.
verses.ro: kyomade wa nani yono koto mo mienedomo   hi ga chikazukeba hitori mieru de
verses.jp_1: けふまてハなによの事もみへねども
verses.jp_2: ひがちかづけばひとりみへるで

verses.en: Do not think of anything as an illness. Everything is the care of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: dono yona koto mo yamai to omouna yo   nanika yorozu wa Tsukihi teiri ya
verses.jp_1: とのよふな事もやまいとをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: なにかよろづハ月日ていりや

verses.en: As the mind of Tsukihi hastens day after day, there is no knowing what I am preparing.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori nichinichi kokoro sekikonde   donna moyo o suru ya shiren de
verses.jp_1: 月日よりにち／＼心せきこんで
verses.jp_2: どんなもよふをするやしれんで

verses.en: You may not know what My hastening is about. It is solely about the preparations for the Kanrodai.
verses.ro: sekikomi mo nanino koto yara shiromai na   Kanrodai no moyo bakari o
verses.jp_1: せきこみもなにの事やらしろまいな
verses.jp_2: かんろふだいのもよふばかりを

verses.en: In your days, if a disorder comes to the body, know that it is the care of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni minouchi sawari tsuita nara   kore wa Tsukihi no teiri naru ka yo
verses.jp_1: にち／＼にみのうちさハりついたなら
verses.jp_2: これハ月日のていりなるかよ

verses.en: Looking throughout the world step by step, I feel pity for you, so I desire to make changes.
verses.ro: dandan to misumasu tokoro sekaiju   kinodoku na kara monku kaetai
verses.jp_1: だん／＼とみすますところせかいぢう
verses.jp_2: きのどくなからもんくかへたい

verses.en: Ponder: whatever is said by mouth, if there is no sure proof, it will not do.
verses.ro: shiyan seyo kuchi de nani goto yuta tote   tashikana shoko nakuba ikan de
verses.jp_1: しやんせよくちでなに事ゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: たしかなしよこなくばいかんで

verses.en: This is proof: Tsukihi has entered this body and gives directions freely and unlimitedly.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori tainai yori mo irikonde   juyojizai no sashizu shoko ya
verses.jp_1: 月日よりたいないよりも入こんで
verses.jp_2: ぢうよぢざいのさしずしよこや

verses.en: Because of this, I begin things, speaking solely about that which has never existed anywhere.
verses.ro: soreyue ni imamade doko ni nai koto o   bakari yuute hajime kakeru de
verses.jp_1: それゆへにいまゝでどこにない事を
verses.jp_2: ばかりゆううてはじめかけるで

verses.en: Though I speak solely about things which have never existed, they are all the teachings of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: imamade mo nai koto bakari yu no mo na   kore mo Tsukihi no mina oshie ya de
verses.jp_1: いまゝでもない事ばかりゆうのもな
verses.jp_2: これも月日のみなをしへやで

verses.en: The matter of the Kanrodai at this time is also that which has been unknown before.
verses.ro: konotabi no Kanrodai to yu no mo na   kore mo imamade shiran koto ya de
verses.jp_1: このたびのかんろふだいとゆうのもな
verses.jp_2: これもいまゝでしらん事やで

verses.en: Whatever is said, it is all by Tsukihi. I speak because I desire to teach you things unknown.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o yu no mo mina Tsukihi   shiran koto oba oshietai kara
verses.jp_1: どのよふな事をゆうのもみな月日
verses.jp_2: しらん事をばをしゑたいから

verses.en: That I place the Kanrodai in this Residence is the proof that I began human beings.
verses.ro: kono yashiki Kanrodai o sueru no wa   ningen hajime kaketa shoko
verses.jp_1: このやしきかんろふだいをすへるのハ
verses.jp_2: にんけんはじめかけたしよこふ

verses.en: Beginning everything in this way, I shall purify the minds of the whole world.
verses.ro: nani goto mo mina kono tori hajime kake   sekaiju no kokoro sumasuru
verses.jp_1: なに事もみなこのとふりはちめかけ
verses.jp_2: せかいぢううの心すまする

verses.en: Day by day, I shall make every effort solely for the preparations to make everyone in the world spirited.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni nandemo sekai ichiretsu o   isameru moyo bakari suru zo ya
verses.jp_1: にち／＼になんでもせかい一れつを
verses.jp_2: いさめるもよふばかりするぞや

verses.en: As the minds of the world are spirited step by step, the growth of all crops, also, will be spirited.
verses.ro: dandan to sekai no kokoro isamu nara   ryuke morotomo mina isami deru
verses.jp_1: だん／＼とせかいの心いさむなら
verses.jp_2: りうけもろともみないさみでる

verses.en: To explain how these minds are to be spirited: Tsukihi will go forth, taking My workers along.
verses.ro: kono kokoro doshite isamu koto naraba   Tsukihi ninsoku tsurete deru zo ya
verses.jp_1: この心どふしていさむ事ならば
verses.jp_2: 月日にんそくつれてゞるぞや

verses.en: Until then, you will all hear of various things here and there and one after another.
verses.ro: soremade ni atchi kotchi to dono yona   hanashi dandan mina kiku de aro
verses.jp_1: それまでにあゝちこふちとどのよふな
verses.jp_2: はなしだん／＼みなきくであろ

verses.en: Whatever you hear, I told of it all beforehand. Ponder over it.
verses.ro: dono yona hanashi kiku no mo mina saki i   yute aru zo ya shiyan shite miyo
verses.jp_1: どのよふなはなしきくのもみなさきい
verses.jp_2: ゆうてあるぞやしやんしてみよ

verses.en: You may be wondering what Tsukihi is speaking about step by step, but the future is promising.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa nani o dandan yuwareru to   omou de aro saki no tanoshimi
verses.jp_1: 月日にハなにをだん／＼ゆハれると
verses.jp_2: をもうてあろをさきのたのしみ

verses.en: Above all, the mind of Tsukihi desires a Divine Record for Nihon.
verses.ro: nani goto mo Tsukihi no kokoro omou niwa   nihon ni Koki hoshii koto kara
verses.jp_1: なに事も月日の心をもうにわ
verses.jp_2: にほんにこふきほしい事から

verses.en: If the Divine Record is surely made in Nihon and spread widely, Kara will do as I wish.
verses.ro: nihon nimo Koki o tashika koshiraete   sore hirometara kara wa mama nari
verses.jp_1: にほんにもこふきをたしかこしらへて
verses.jp_2: それひろめたらからハまゝなり

verses.en: What are you all thinking of this talk? It concerns all of you, the people of Nihon.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nanto omote mina no mono   nihon no mono wa mina waga koto ya
verses.jp_1: このはなしなんとをもふてみなのもの
verses.jp_2: にほんのものハみなわが事や

verses.en: Unaware of this, what are you in the high places thinking? You cannot understand My heart. Oh, the regret of Tsukihi...
verses.ro: sore shirazu nanto omote kami taru wa   mune ga wakaran Tsukihi zannen
verses.jp_1: それしらずなんとをもふて上たるハ
verses.jp_2: むねがわからん月日さんねん

verses.en: Whatever Divine Record is accomplished at this place, it will be a treasure for Nihon.
verses.ro: kono tokoro dono yona Koki shitaru tomo   kore wa nihon no takara naru zo ya
verses.jp_1: このところどのよなこふきしたるとも
verses.jp_2: これハにほんのたからなるぞや

verses.en: All humankind, settle your minds and ponder. Prepare quickly to wait for the Divine Record.
verses.ro: ichiretsu no kokoro sadamete shiyan seyo   hayaku Koki o matsu yoni seyo
verses.jp_1: 一れつの心さだめてしやんせよ
verses.jp_2: はやくこふきをまつよふにせよ

verses.en: When the true Divine Record has been accomplished, Tsukihi will spread everything whatever.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no Koki ga deketa koto naraba   donna koto demo Tsukihi hiromeru
verses.jp_1: しんぢつのこふきがでけた事ならば
verses.jp_2: どんな事でも月日ひろめる

verses.en: Though I say that Tsukihi will spread it, the minds of all of you may not understand.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori hirome o suru to yuta tote   mina no kokoro wa shochi dekemai
verses.jp_1: 月日よりひろめをするとゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: みなの心ハしよちでけまい

verses.en: In this regard, I firmly request you, My inter-mediaries. Please comply.
verses.ro: soreyue ni toritsugi yori ni shikkari to   tanomi oku kara shochi shite iyo
verses.jp_1: それゆへにとりつきよりにしいかりと
verses.jp_2: たのみをくからしよちしていよ

verses.en: When the day of the appointed time comes, there will be no knowing when or where Tsukihi will go.
verses.ro: kono higara kokugen kitaru koto naraba   nandoki Tsukihi doko i iku yara
verses.jp_1: このひがらこくけんきたる事ならば
verses.jp_2: なんどき月日どこいゝくやら

verses.en: Day by day, calm your minds firmly, My intermediaries, and begin quickly.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni toritsugi no hito shikkari to   kokoro shizumete hayaku kakare yo
verses.jp_1: にち／＼にとりつぎの人しいかりと
verses.jp_2: 心しづめてはやくかゝれよ

verses.en: What are all of you thinking of this path? It is not easy to understand it.
verses.ro: kono michi wa doyu koto ni mina no mono   omote iru yara choto ni wakaran
verses.jp_1: このみちハどふゆう事にみなのもの
verses.jp_2: をもているやら一寸にわからん

verses.en: By all means, Tsukihi will complete this path, holding fast to the mind of sincerity.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa nandemo kademo shinjitsu o   kokoro shikkari torinukeru de
verses.jp_1: 月日にハなんでもかでもしんぢつを
verses.jp_2: 心しいかりとふりぬけるで

verses.en: When this path has reached the high places, I shall do My free and unlimited workings.
verses.ro: kono michi o kami e nuketaru koto naraba   juyojizai no hataraki o suru
verses.jp_1: このみちを上ゑぬけたる事ならば
verses.jp_2: ぢうよぢざいのはたらきをする

verses.en: When Tsukihi begins the workings, however strongly a person may oppose Me,
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori kono hataraki o shikaketara   ikana goteki taru to yutemo
verses.jp_1: 月日よりこのはたらきをしかけたら
verses.jp_2: いかなこふてきたるとゆうても

verses.en: He will truly understand and be purified in mind, and will lean on the Parent in all matters.
verses.ro: kokoro yori shinjitsu wakari sumikirite   donna koto demo Oya ni motareru
verses.jp_1: 心よりしんぢつハかりすみきりて
verses.jp_2: とんな事でもをやにもたれる

verses.en: Hereafter, I shall set out to make the whole world brim with joy.
verses.ro: konosaki wa sekaiju wa dokomade mo   yokizukume ni mina shite kakaru
verses.jp_1: このさきハせかへぢううハどこまでも
verses.jp_2: よふきづくめにみなしてかゝる

verses.en: Take each course of this path as your own matter and ponder.
verses.ro: dandan to kono michisuji no yotai wa   mina waga koto to omote shiyan se
verses.jp_1: たん／＼とこのみちすじのよふたいハ
verses.jp_2: みなハが事とをもてしやんせ

verses.en: If a severe tightening of the chest comes upon you, it is the hastening of the mind of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: muna saki e kibishiku tsukae kitaru nara   Tsukihi no kokoro sekikomi de aru
verses.jp_1: むなさきへきびしくつかへきたるなら
verses.jp_2: 月日の心せきこみである

verses.en: Hereafter, all of you may receive disorders of the body step by step.
verses.ro: konosaki wa ichiretsu naru ni dandan to   minouchi sawari mina tsuku de aro
verses.jp_1: このさきハ一れつなるにだん／＼と
verses.jp_2: みのうちさハりみなつくであろ

verses.en: Whatever disorder you may receive, do not worry, for there is a great intention in the mind of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: dono yona sawari tsuitemo anjina yo   Tsukihi no kokoro erai omowaku
verses.jp_1: どのよふなさハりついてもあんぢなよ
verses.jp_2: 月日の心ゑらいをもわく

verses.en: Though a disorder may come to the body, I am making a distinction in each of your minds.
verses.ro: minouchi ni sawari tsuitemo meme no   kokoro sorezore mina wakeru de na
verses.jp_1: みのうちにさハりついてもめへ／＼の
verses.jp_2: 心それ／＼みなわけるでな

verses.en: I shall distinguish those thoughts which are sincere from those which are concerned with only the self.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni omou kokoro to meme no   shiyan bakari o omoi iru to o
verses.jp_1: しんぢつにをもう心とめゑ／＼の
verses.jp_2: しやんばかりをふもいゝるとを

verses.en: Whatever kind of mind you may have, Tsukihi will at this time make the distinction clear.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa dono yona kokoro iru mono mo   konotabi shikato wakete miseru de
verses.jp_1: 月日にハどのよな心いるものも
verses.jp_2: このたびしかとわけてみせるで

verses.en: Tsukihi clearly sees what kind of mind you have and will at this time make the distinction in all.
verses.ro: dono yona kokoro mo shikato mite iru de   Tsukihi konotabi mina wakeru de na
verses.jp_1: どのよふな心もしかとみているで
verses.jp_2: 月日このたびみなわけるでな

verses.en: Words of flattery are unwanted. Tsukihi looks for the sincerity of the mind.
verses.ro: kuchi saki no tsuisho bakari wa iran mono   kokoro no makoto Tsukihi mite iru
verses.jp_1: 口さきのついしよばかりハいらんもの
verses.jp_2: 心のまこと月日みている

verses.en: Even until now, though I have given you My teachings in various talks, the real truth has not been seen.
verses.ro: koremade mo iroiro hanashi toitaredo   honshinjitsu ga miete nai no de
verses.jp_1: これまでもいろ／＼はなしといたれど
verses.jp_2: ほんしんぢつがみゑてないので

verses.en: Today, whatever talks I may give, I shall never tell you anything that will become false.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa nanino hanashi o shitaru tomo   chigau yo naru koto wa yuwanedo
verses.jp_1: けふの日ハなにのはなしをしたるとも
verses.jp_2: ちがうよふなる事ハゆハねど

verses.en: What Tsukihi has once said will never become false through all time.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori ichido yute oita nara   itsu ni naritemo chigau koto nashi
verses.jp_1: 月日より一どふゆうてをいたなら
verses.jp_2: いつになりてもちがう事なし

verses.en: Unaware of this, even all of you close to Me think My words to be worldly common.
verses.ro: sore shirazu soba no kokoro wa tare nitemo   sekainami naru yoni omote
verses.jp_1: それしらすそばの心ハたれにても
verses.jp_2: せかいなみなるよふにをもふて

verses.en: From your suffering at this time, be convinced, you and all the others.
verses.ro: konotabi no nayamu tokoro de tokushin se   mina no kokoro mo meme kokoro mo
verses.jp_1: このたびのなやむところでとくしんせ
verses.jp_2: みなの心もめゑ／＼心も

verses.en: There is no error in My free and unlimited workings, but there must be understanding in everyone's mind.
verses.ro: kono koto o juyojizai wa chigawanedo   mina no kokoro ni shochi nakeneba
verses.jp_1: この事をぢうよぢざいハちがハねど
verses.jp_2: みなの心にしよちなけねば

verses.en: When understanding comes to all of you, Tsukihi will assuredly save you.
verses.ro: ichiretsu ni shochi o shitaru koto naraba   Tsukihi ukeyote tashika tasukeru
verses.jp_1: 一れつにしよちをしたる事ならば
verses.jp_2: 月日うけよてたしかたすける

verses.en: What do you think of this salvation? You will be able to go out of doors in three days.
verses.ro: kono tasuke doyu koto ni omou kana   mikka me niwa soto i deru yo
verses.jp_1: このたすけどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp_2: 三かめへにハそといでるよふ

verses.en: Even until now, though I called Myself Tsukihi and gave you My teachings step by step,
verses.ro: koremade mo Tsukihi to yute dandan to   hanashi mo toite kitaru naredomo
verses.jp_1: これまでも月日とゆうてだん／＼と
verses.jp_2: はなしもといてきたるなれども

verses.en: Still, perhaps you cannot understand the core matter. At this time, I shall reveal all things whatever.
verses.ro: mada shin no tokoro wa sarani wakarumai   konotabi donna koto mo arawasu
verses.jp_1: まだしんのところハさらにハかるまい
verses.jp_2: このたびどんな事もあらわす

verses.en: Even with My talks, if I give them at the same place, you might take them as being from a human mind.
verses.ro: hanashi demo onashi tokoro de yu naraba   nando ningen gokoro naru yo
verses.jp_1: はなしでもをなしところでゆうならば
verses.jp_2: なんどにんけん心なるよふ

verses.en: So as not to cause you such pitiful thoughts, I shall give My talks at a different place this time.
verses.ro: mina no mono omou kokoro wa kinodoku ya   konotabi tokoro kaete hanashi o
verses.jp_1: みなのものをもう心ハきのどくや
verses.jp_2: このたびところかへてはなしを

verses.en: On hearing it, be convinced, whoever you may be: the free and unlimited workings of Tsukihi always work in this way.
verses.ro: kore kiite ikana mono demo tokushin se   Tsukihi juyo mina kono dori
verses.jp_1: これきいていかなものでもとくしんせ
verses.jp_2: 月日ぢうよふみなこのどふり

verses.en: Tsukihi enters this body and speaks freely and unrestrictedly, but perhaps you are not convinced of it.
verses.ro: tainai e Tsukihi irikomi juyo o   yute iredomo shochi arumai
verses.jp_1: たいないへ月日入こみぢうよふを
verses.jp_2: ゆうていれどもしよちあるまい

verses.en: Henceforth, after giving you as much notice step by step as I am able, I shall begin.
verses.ro: konosaki wa seeippai ni dandan to   kotowarita ue kakaru koto nari
verses.jp_1: このさきハせゑいゝバいにたん／＼と
verses.jp_2: ことハりたゆへかゝる事なり

verses.en: Though I say Tsukihi makes things manifest, it is only after giving every notice of it step by step.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori araware deru to yuta tote   dandan nanimo kotowarita ue
verses.jp_1: 月日よりあらハれでるとゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: たん／＼なにもことわりたゆへ

verses.en: You are thinking that the suffering at this time is from illness, but the thought is wrong.
verses.ro: konotabi no nayamite iru o yamai ya to   omote iru no wa kore wa chigau de
verses.jp_1: このたびのなやみているをやまいやと
verses.jp_2: をもているのハこれハちがうで

verses.en: Never think it is from illness or the like, but from the desire for you to know the free and unlimited workings of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kore bakari yamai nazo towa omouna yo   Tsukihi juyo shirashitai yue
verses.jp_1: こればかりやまいなぞとハをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: 月日ぢうよふしらしたいゆへ

verses.en: I inform you of all matters whatever because I have an intention for the future.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo dono yona koto mo shirasuru wa   saki no omowaku aru kara no koto
verses.jp_1: なにもかもとのよな事もしらするハ
verses.jp_2: さきのをもわくあるからの事

verses.en: To explain what this talk is about: Tsukihi will take charge of everything in the future.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doyu koto de aru naraba   saki no yorozu wa Tsukihi hikiuke
verses.jp_1: このはなしどふゆう事てあるならば
verses.jp_2: さきのよろづハ月日ひきうけ

verses.en: I, Tsukihi, will take charge because she is causally related to the origin.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori hikiuke suru to yu no mo na   moto no innen aru kara no koto
verses.jp_1: 月日よりひきうけするとゆうのもな
verses.jp_2: もとのいんねんあるからの事

verses.en: To explain what the causality is about: she is an instrument of origin in the beginning of human beings.
verses.ro: innen mo doyu koto de aru naraba   ningen hajime moto no dogu ya
verses.jp_1: いんねんもどふゆう事であるならば
verses.jp_2: にんけんはぢめもとのどふぐや

verses.en: Tsukihi will train this person in all matters and bring about marvelous salvation.
verses.ro: kono mono ni Tsukihi yorozu no shikomi suru   sore de mezurashi tasuke suru no ya
verses.jp_1: このものに月日よろづのしこみする
verses.jp_2: それでめづらしたすけるのや

verses.en: Do not think of this lightly. It will become the Divine Record of Nihon.
verses.ro: kono koto wa chotto no koto ya to omouna yo   kore wa nihon no Koki naru no ya
verses.jp_1: この事わ一寸事やとをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: これハにほんのこふきなるのや

verses.en: If you had only known earlier that she should have been returned home to be saved completely...
verses.ro: are inde kora hodo nanimo sukiyaka ni   tasukaru koto o hayaku shiritara
verses.jp_1: あれいんでこらほどなにもすきやかに
verses.jp_2: たすかる事をはやくしりたら

verses.en: Unaware of it, you would not return her, but tried to care for her there.
verses.ro: sore shirazu dodo inasazu kono toko de   yojo sashite okoto omota de
verses.jp_1: それしらずどふどいなさすこのとこで
verses.jp_2: よふぢよさしてをことをもたで

verses.en: If you had known this earlier, there would have been no suffering or anxiety.
verses.ro: konna koto hayaku shiritaru koto naraba   setsunami mo nashi shinpai mo nashi
verses.jp_1: こんな事はやくしりたる事ならば
verses.jp_2: せつなみもなししんバいもなし

verses.en: Because you humans are shallow-minded, you did not heed the words of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: ningen wa azanai mono de aru karani   Tsukihi yuwareru koto o somuita
verses.jp_1: にんけんハあざないものであるからに
verses.jp_2: 月日ゆハれる事をそむいた

verses.en: From now on, you must firmly lean on Tsukihi in all matters whatever.
verses.ro: korekara wa donna koto demo Tsukihi niwa   motare tsukaneba naran koto ya de
verses.jp_1: これからハどんな事でも月日にハ
verses.jp_2: もたれつかねばならん事やで

verses.en: In doing anything, so long as you lean on Tsukihi, there will be no danger.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o suru nimo Tsukihi ni wa   motarete ireba abunaki wa nai
verses.jp_1: どのよふな事をするにも月日にて
verses.jp_2: もたれていればあふなけハない

verses.en: Your unawareness of such a splendid path as this has led to your remorse.
verses.ro: kono yona kekko naru no michisuji o   shirazu ni ita ga ato no kokwai
verses.jp_1: このよふなけへこふなるのみちすしを
verses.jp_2: しらすにいたがあとのこふくハい

verses.en: Hereafter, whatever you are told, you should never go against what Tsukihi says.
verses.ro: konosaki wa dono yona koto o yuwaretemo   Tsukihi yuwareru koto wa somukan
verses.jp_1: このさきハどのよな事をゆハれても
verses.jp_2: 月日ゆハれる事ハそむかん

verses.en: The chest of the one taken as a shrine by Tsukihi is blocked. What do you think of it?
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori yashiro to naru no muna saki no   tsukaete aru o nanto omou zo
verses.jp_1: 月日よりやしろとなるのむなさきの
verses.jp_2: つかゑてあるをなんとをもうぞ

verses.en: Do not think of this blocking as being ordinary. The mind of Tsukihi is truly anxious.
verses.ro: kono tsukae hitonami naru to omouna yo   Tsukihi no kokoro makoto shinpai
verses.jp_1: このつかへ人なみなるとをもうなよ

verses.en: Unaware of this, all of you everywhere are doing your own work only with self-centered thoughts.
verses.ro: sore shirazu mina ichiretsu wa meme ni   waga mi shiyan de shigoto bakari o
verses.jp_1: それしらずみな一れつハめへ／＼に
verses.jp_2: わがみしやんでしことばかりを

verses.en: Tsukihi sees all paths whatever, but no one in the world thinks about it.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa dono yona michi mo miete aru   sekaiju wa sore o omowazu
verses.jp_1: 月日にハどのよなみちもみへてある
verses.jp_2: せかいぢううハそれをふもハす

verses.en: Ponder over this path, all My children! There is no knowing what kind of path will appear.
verses.ro: kono michi o kodomo ichiretsu shiyan seyo   dono yona michi ga aru ya shiren de
verses.jp_1: このみちをこども一れつしやんせよ
verses.jp_2: どのよなみちがあるやしれんで

verses.en: I shall inform you of everything in advance. Make sure you will not be remorseful later.
verses.ro: dono yona koto demo saki e shirashi oku   ato de kokwai naki yoni seyo
verses.jp_1: どのよふな事でもさきへしらしをく
verses.jp_2: あとでこふくハいなきよふにせよ

verses.en: All of you may be wondering why I say such things. It is from My love for My children.
verses.ro: konna koto nani o yu ya to mina no mono   omou de aro kodomo kawaii
verses.jp_1: こんな事なにをゆうやとみなのもの
verses.jp_2: をもうであろふこどもかハいゝ

verses.en: All My many children in the world, is there not a way I can make you understand from your innermost heart?
verses.ro: sekaiju oku no kodomo mune no uchi   wakaru moyo ga kore wa nai ka yo
verses.jp_1: せかいぢうをふくの子共むねのうち
verses.jp_2: わかるもよふがこれハないかよ

verses.en: I tell you these things so repeatedly because I fear the path you are taking.
verses.ro: kono yona koto o kudokudo yu no mo na   michi o anjite iru moyo kara
verses.jp_1: このよふな事をくど／＼ゆうのもな
verses.jp_2: みちをあんぢているもよふから

verses.en: From now on, I shall tell you about everything. Never think of it as being false.
verses.ro: korekara wa dono yona koto mo yute kikasu   kore o kanarazu uso to omouna
verses.jp_1: これからハとのよな事もゆてきかす
verses.jp_2: これをかならすうそとをもうな

verses.en: Hear Me clearly on the present work of Tsukihi! I shall do nothing evil.
verses.ro: konotabi no Tsukihi no shigoto shikato kike   ashiki no yona koto wa sen zo ya
verses.jp_1: このたびの月日のしごとしかときけ
verses.jp_2: あしきのよふな事わせんぞや

verses.en: I began the work because I desired to teach you marvelous salvation by all means.
verses.ro: dodo shite mezurashi tasuke oshietasa   sokode kakarita shigoto naru zo ya
verses.jp_1: どふどしてめつらしたすけをしへたさ
verses.jp_2: そこでかゝりたしごとなるぞや

verses.en: Firmly replace the mind you have had until now and become of the mind filled with joy.
verses.ro: imamade to kokoro shikkari irekaete   yokizukume no kokoro naru yo
verses.jp_1: いまゝでと心しいかりいれかへて
verses.jp_2: よふきつくめの心なるよふ

verses.en: You may be wondering how to become of such a mind. If Tsukihi enters the body,
verses.ro: kono kokoro doshite naru to omou kara   Tsukihi tainai irikonda nara
verses.jp_1: この心どふしてなるとをもうかな
verses.jp_2: 月日たいない入こんだなら

verses.en: Day by day, the mind will be spirited of itself and become the mind filled with joy.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni hitori kokoro ga isamu nari   yokizukume no kokoro naru yo
verses.jp_1: にち／＼にひとり心がいさむなり
verses.jp_2: よふきづくめの心なるよふ

verses.en: Making the mind spirited day by day, Tsukihi will work to make the world be filled with joy.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori nichinichi kokoro isame kake   yokizukume ni shite kakaru de na
verses.jp_1: 月日よりにち／＼心いさめかけ
verses.jp_2: よふきつくめにしてかゝるでな

verses.en: What are your thoughts on hearing this talk? It is solely the preparation for single-hearted salvation.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nanto omote kiite iru   tasuke ichijo no moyo bakari o
verses.jp_1: このはなしなんとをもふてきいている
verses.jp_2: たすけ一ぢよのもよふばかりを

verses.en: Tsukihi sees everything. Whatever I say, you must comply with it.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori donna koto demo mite iru de   nani o yutemo mina shochi seyo
verses.jp_1: 月日よりどんな事でもみているで
verses.jp_2: なにをゆうてもみなしよちせよ

verses.en: From this year forward, if you, husband and wife, live on for seventy more years, neither falling ill nor weakening,
verses.ro: kotoshikara shichiju nen wa fufu tomo   yamazu yowarazu kurasu koto nara
verses.jp_1: ことしから七十ねんハふう／＼とも
verses.jp_2: やまずよハらすくらす事なら

verses.en: There can perhaps be no greater happiness. Look forward to it as coming true.
verses.ro: soreyori no tanoshimi naru wa arumai na   kore o makoto ni tanoshunde iyo
verses.jp_1: それよりのたのしみなるハあるまいな
verses.jp_2: これをまことにたのしゆんでいよ

verses.en: Tsukihi will speak solely about things which have never existed before at any place. Listen with this understanding.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa imamade doko ni nai koto o   bakari yu zo ya shochi shite kike
verses.jp_1: 月日にハいまゝでどこにない事を
verses.jp_2: ばかりゆうぞやしよちしてきけ

verses.en: Though I speak solely about such things that do not exist, watch the future: everything is the truth.
verses.ro: kono yona nai koto bakari yu keredo   saki o mite iyo mina makoto ya de
verses.jp_1: このよふなない事ばかりゆうけれど
verses.jp_2: さきをみていよみなまことやで

verses.en: Since I do new and marvelous things in any case, whatever I say is about things that do not yet exist.
verses.ro: nani bun ni mezurashi koto o suru kara wa   ikana hanashi mo nai koto bakari
verses.jp_1: なにぶんにめづらし事をするからハ
verses.jp_2: いかなはなしもない事ばかり

verses.en: I speak solely of those things that do not exist, but watch the future: the wonders you shall see.
verses.ro: dono yoni nai koto bakari yuta tote   saki o mite iyo mieru fushigi ya
verses.jp_1: とのよふにない事ばかりゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: さきをみていよみゑるふしぎや

verses.en: Your suffering at this time must be trying, but the future will bring delight to your mind.
verses.ro: ima naru no nayamite iru wa tsurakeredo   korekara saki wa kokoro danoshimi
verses.jp_1: いまなるのなやみているわつらけれど
verses.jp_2: これからさきハ心だのしみ

verses.en: I give you these talks repeatedly because they are to be the Divine Record for eternity.
verses.ro: kono yona hanashi kudokudo yu no mo na   kore wa matsudai Koki naru no ya
verses.jp_1: このよふなはなしくと／＼ゆうのもな
verses.jp_2: これハまつたいこふきなるのや

verses.en: Tsukihi is revealed at this place and time and speaks about all matters, so that,
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori konotabi koko de arawarete   donna koto omo hanashi suru no wa
verses.jp_1: 月日よりこのたびこゝであらハれて
verses.jp_2: とんな事をもはなしするのハ

verses.en: By teaching you about whatever matters step by step, I shall make all of the Divine Record of Nihon.
verses.ro: dono yona koto mo dandan shirashitasa   nihon no Koki mina koshiraeru
verses.jp_1: とのような事もたん／＼しらしたさ
verses.jp_2: にほんのこふきみなこしらゑる

verses.en: The very beginning of this world was at Shoyashiki village of Yamabe county in Yamato province.
verses.ro: kono yo no hajimari dashi wa Yamato nite   Yamabe kori no Shoyashiki nari
verses.jp_1: このよふのはじまりたしハやまとにて
verses.jp_2: やまべこふりのしよやしきなり

verses.en: There, at the place known as the Nakayama Residence, appear instruments of human beginnings.
verses.ro: sono uchi ni Nakayama uji to yu yashiki   ningen hajime dogu mieru de
verses.jp_1: そのうちになかやまうぢとゆうやしき
verses.jp_2: にんけんはじめどふくみへるで

verses.en: These instruments are Izanagi, Izanami, Kunisazuchi, and Tsukiyomi.
verses.ro: kono dogu Izanagiii to Izanami to   Kunisazuchii to Tsukiyomi to nari
verses.jp_1: このどふぐいざなぎいゝといざなみと
verses.jp_2: くにさづちいと月よみとなり

verses.en: Discerning this, Tsukihi descended and began preparations to train them in all matters.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori sore o misumashi amakudari   nanika yorozu o shikomu moyo o
verses.jp_1: 月日よりそれをみすましあまくたり
verses.jp_2: なにかよろづをしこむもよふを

verses.en: At this place, whatever is done and however it is done, all is by Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kono tokoro nani o suru nimo dono yona   koto o suru no mo mina Tsukihi nari
verses.jp_1: このところなにをするにもとのよふな
verses.jp_2: 事をするのもみな月日なり

verses.en: Whatever I say, it is all by Tsukihi. You, who are close to Me, imitate Me if you can.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o yu nimo mina Tsukihi   soba naru mono wa mane o shite miyo
verses.jp_1: とのよふな事をゆうにもみな月日
verses.jp_2: そばなるものハまねをしてみよ

verses.en: From the time I began this world until today, I have not yet told the real truth.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimete karani kyomade wa   honshinjitsu o yuta koto nashi
verses.jp_1: このよふをはじめてからにけふまでハ
verses.jp_2: ほんしんぢつをゆうた事なし

verses.en: Today, the time has come when I must tell you the truth of all matters.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa dono yona koto mo shinjitsu o   yuwaneba naran yoni naru kara
verses.jp_1: けふの日ハどのよな事もしんぢつを
verses.jp_2: ゆハねばならんよふになるから

verses.en: Whatever is said, do not wonder. It is said just as Tsukihi intends.
verses.ro: meme ni nani o yu towa omouna yo   Tsukihi no omou yoni yu no ya
verses.jp_1: めへ／＼になにをゆうとハをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: 月日のをもうよふにゆうのや

verses.en: Whenever you return, never think that it is caused by your individual minds.
verses.ro: nandoki ni kairite kitemo meme no   kokoro aru towa sarani omouna
verses.jp_1: なんどきにかいりてきてもめへ／＼の
verses.jp_2: 心あるとハさらにをもうな

verses.en: Everyone, whoever one may be, will return, convinced from the heart. Wait and see.
verses.ro: dono yona mono mo shin kara tokushin o   sashite kairu de kore o mite iyo
verses.jp_1: どのよふなものもしんからとくしんを
verses.jp_2: さしてかいるでこれをみていよ

verses.en: However powerful or clever one may be, no one can resist the mind of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: ika hodono goteki taru mo hatsume demo   Tsukihi no kokoro kore wa kanawan
verses.jp_1: いかほとのこふてきたるもはつめても
verses.jp_2: 月日の心これハかなハん

verses.en: From today, discerning the heart of everyone in this world, Tsukihi will begin the cleansing.
verses.ro: kyokara wa sekai o Tsukihi misadamete   mune no soji ni kakaru koto nari
verses.jp_1: けふからハせかいを月日みさだめて
verses.jp_2: むねのそふぢにかゝる事なり

verses.en: In this cleansing, there shall be no discrimination between those within and the world. I shall manifest all of the mind of each of you.
verses.ro: kono soji uchi mo sekai mo hedate nai   meme no kokoro mina arawasu de
verses.jp_1: このそふぢうちもせかいもへだてない
verses.jp_2: めゑ／＼の心みなあらわすで

verses.en: Until now, to the mountainous regret of God, much dust is piled in your heart.
verses.ro: imamade wa Kami no zannen yamayama to   mune ni hokori ga tsumori aredomo
verses.jp_1: いまゝでわ神のさんねん山／＼と
verses.jp_2: むねにほこりがつもりあれども

verses.en: It is sad. The day has not yet arrived. I cannot speak about anything, though it is My desire.
verses.ro: nasake nai higara mo chitto kitaran de   dono yona koto mo yu ni yuwaren
verses.jp_1: なさけないひがらもちいときたらんで
verses.jp_2: どのよな事もゆうにゆハれん

verses.en: This time, Tsukihi truly cannot bear to look on. I shall manifest all things whatever.
verses.ro: konotabi wa Tsukihi shinjitsu mikaneru de   dono yona koto mo mina arawasu de
verses.jp_1: このたびハ月日しんぢつみかねるで
verses.jp_2: どのよな事もみなあらハすで

verses.en: Today, however thriving selfishness and willful acts may be, know that Tsukihi may withdraw.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa ika hodo waga mi habikarite   mamani shita tote Tsukihi shirizoku
verses.jp_1: けふの日ハいかほとわがみはびかりて
verses.jp_2: まゝにしたとて月日しりぞく

verses.en: To say what this talk is about: it is equally about Nihon, Kara, and Tenjiku.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nanino koto oba yu naraba   nihon mo kara mo tenjiku no koto
verses.jp_1: このはなしなにの事をばゆうならば
verses.jp_2: にほんもからもてんぢくの事

verses.en: Know that from now on Tsukihi will cleanse everyone in the whole world.
verses.ro: korekara wa sekaiju o ichiretsu ni   Tsukihi soji o suru de shochi se
verses.jp_1: これからハせかいぢううを一れつに
verses.jp_2: 月日そふぢをするでしよちせ

verses.en: Even until now, though Tsukihi has tried to the utmost to reason with you step by step,
verses.jp_1: これまでもせへいゝばいにことハりを
verses.jp_2: 月日だん／＼ゆうてあれども

verses.en: Since I only told you by the spoken word, no one was able to understand clearly.
verses.ro: kuchi saki de yutaru made wa tare nitemo   tashika shochi o suru mono wa nai
verses.jp_1: くちさきでゆうたるまでハたれにても
verses.jp_2: たしかしよちをするものハない

verses.en: Even until now, though I, Tsukihi, have been exerting My mind for you to the utmost step by step,
verses.ro: imamade mo Tsukihi no kokoro dandan to   seeippai ni tsukushi iredomo
verses.jp_1: いまゝでも月日の心だん／＼と
verses.jp_2: せへいゝばいにつくしいれども

verses.en: There is no one in the world who knows of it. This time, Tsukihi cannot bear it.
verses.ro: sekai niwa tare ka shiritaru mono wa nashi   domu konotabi Tsukihi zehi nai
verses.jp_1: せかいにハたれかしりたるものハなし
verses.jp_2: とふむこのたび月日せひない

verses.en: Therefore, I give you notice throughout the world unto its farthest places: Tsukihi shall withdraw!
