verses.ro: soreyue ni sekaiju o dokomade mo   kotowarite oku Tsukihi shirizoku
verses.jp_1: それゆへにせかいぢううをとこまても
verses.jp_2: ことハりてをく月日しりぞく

verses.en: To explain what talk I shall give today: it is solely about the beginning of My useful timber.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa nanino hanashi o suru naraba   yogi no hajime koto bakari yu
verses.jp_1: けふの日ハなにのはなしをするならば
verses.jp_2: よふ木のはぢめ事ばかりゆう

verses.en: About this timber: I do not indicate anyone in particular. From one trunk, there are eight branches.
verses.ro: yogi demo nin wa tare tomo yuwane domo   moto wa ippon eda wa hachi hon
verses.jp_1: よふぎでもにんわたれともゆハねども
verses.jp_2: もとハ壹ほんゑだわ八ほん

verses.en: The urgent desire to graft this tree quickly, oppresses the breast of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kono kii o hayaku tsugitai sekikomi de   Tsukihi no mune ga tsukaekiru nari
verses.jp_1: この木をはやくつぎたいせきこみで
verses.jp_2: 月日のむねがつかゑきるなり

verses.en: If one branch of this tree is securely grafted, the others will all quickly settle.
verses.ro: kono kii mo hito eda shikato tsuida nara   ato naru wa mina hayaku sadamaru
verses.jp_1: このきいも一ゑだしかとついだなら
verses.jp_2: あとなるハみなはやくさだまる

verses.en: Listen carefully to whatever Tsukihi says: once you have settled it in the mind,
verses.ro: nanimo kamo Tsukihi yu koto shikato kike   kokoro ni sadame tsuketa koto nara
verses.jp_1: なにもかも月日ゆう事しかときけ
verses.jp_2: 心にさだめつけた事なら

verses.en: Then the sufferings of the body will disappear. The mind will be but spirited step by step.
verses.ro: soreyori mo minouchi nayami sarani nashi   dandan kokoro isamu bakari ya
verses.jp_1: それよりもみのうちなやみさらになし
verses.jp_2: だん／＼心いさむばかりや

verses.en: Unaware of this, the mind of everyone, whoever one may be, bespeaks only the worldly common.
verses.ro: sore shirazu mina no kokoro wa tare nitemo   sekainami naru koto bakari yu
verses.jp_1: それしらすみなの心ハたれにても
verses.jp_2: せかいなみなる事ばかりゆう

verses.en: Do not think of this place as being worldly common. There is only the mind of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kono tokoro sekainami towa omouna yo   Tsukihi no kokoro bakari naru zo ya
verses.jp_1: このところせかいなみとハをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: 月日の心ばかりなるぞや

verses.en: This regret in the mind of Tsukihi today: know that it is not a small matter.
verses.ro: konnichi no Tsukihi no kokoro zannen wa   yoi naru koto de nai to omoe yo
verses.jp_1: 今日の月日の心さんねんわ
verses.jp_2: よいなる事てないとをもゑよ

verses.en: Because of the shallowness of human beings, there is no one who knows what Tsukihi does.
verses.ro: ningen wa azanai mono de aru karani   Tsukihi suru koto shirita mono nashi
verses.jp_1: にんけんハあざないものであるからに
verses.jp_2: 月日する事しりたものなし

verses.en: Tsukihi has already given you notice about each and every matter step by step. Do you understand?
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa nanika yorozu o dandan to   kotowarite aru kore ga shochi ka
verses.jp_1: 月日にハなにかよろつをだん／＼と
verses.jp_2: ことハりてあるこれがしよちか

verses.en: Even until now, though I have repeatedly appealed to you about the regret of Tsukihi,
verses.ro: imamade mo nanika Tsukihi no zannen o   taitei kudoki tsumete aredomo
verses.jp_1: いまゝでもなにか月日のさんねんを
verses.jp_2: たいていくどきつめてあれども

verses.en: There is no one in the world who knows. Look at the regret in the mind of Tsukihi!
verses.ro: sekai niwa tare ka shiritaru mono wa nashi   Tsukihi no kokoro zannen o miyo
verses.jp_1: せかいにハたれかしりたるものハなし
verses.jp_2: 月日の心ざんねんをみよ

verses.en: At this time, I am giving you notice again, on top of My previous notices and appeals.
verses.ro: konotabi wa kotowarita ue mada kudoki   sono ue naru no kotowari de aru
verses.jp_1: このたびハことハりたゆへまだくどき
verses.jp_2: そのゆへなるのことわりである

verses.en: Alas, no matter how many notices I give and appeals I make, there is no one who understands.
verses.ro: ika hodoni kudoki kotowari yuta tote   tare ka kikiwake suru mono wa nai
verses.jp_1: いかほどにくどきことハりゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: たれかきゝわけするものハない

verses.en: So the days come and go step by step, but at no time is there anyone who is able to understand My intention.
verses.ro: soreyue ni dandan higara tatsu keredo   itsu ka kore ya to wakaru me wa nashi
verses.jp_1: それゆへにだん／＼ひがらたつけれと
verses.jp_2: いつかこれやとわかるめハなし

verses.en: Today, as the time has already come, Tsukihi will set out. Everyone, beware!
verses.ro: kyonohi wa mo setsu ga kitaru kara   Tsukihi dekakeru mina shochi seyo
verses.jp_1: けふの日ハもふせへつゝがきたるから
verses.jp_2: 月日でかけるみなしよちせよ

verses.en: Now I shall tell you about the course of the path ahead. No one knows what I shall say.
verses.ro: konosaki no michi no sugara o yute kikasu   ikana koto oba yu ya shiromai
verses.jp_1: このさきのみちのすがらをゆてきかす
verses.jp_2: いかな事をばゆうやしろまい

verses.en: Day after day, whatever I say will be seen just as I say. This is the wonder.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni nani o yutemo sono mamani   miete kuru no ga kore wa fushigi ya
verses.jp_1: にち／＼になにをゆうてもそのまゝに
verses.jp_2: みゑてくるのがこれわふしぎや

verses.en: You do not know the things I shall say. That is why I give you notices on everything repeatedly.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o yu yara shiren de na   sokode nandemo kotowari bakari
verses.jp_1: とのよふな事をゆうやらしれんでな
verses.jp_2: そこでなんでもことハりばかり

verses.en: My notices are not to be taken lightly. There is no knowing what will be seen.
verses.ro: kotowari mo chotto no koto dewa nai hodoni   ikana koto oga miete kuru yara
verses.jp_1: ことハりも一寸の事でハないほどに
verses.jp_2: いかな事をがみゑてくるやら

verses.en: Since there is no knowing what will be seen, I feel deep pity for you.
verses.ro: dono yona koto ga mieru ya shiren de na   makoto kinodoku omote iredomo
verses.jp_1: どのよふな事がみゑるやしれんてな
verses.jp_2: まこときのどくをもていれども

verses.en: The time when things will be seen: this cannot be known. The mind of Tsukihi is filled to the brim.
verses.ro: nandoki ni mieru koto yara kore shiren   Tsukihi no kokoro tsumikirite aru
verses.jp_1: なんときにみゑる事やらこれしれん
verses.jp_2: 月日の心つみきりてある

verses.en: Great is the worry in the mind of Tsukihi. Yet you close to Me know nothing of it.
verses.ro: kora hodoni Tsukihi no kokoro shinpai o   soba naru mono wa nanimo shirazu ni
verses.jp_1: こらほどに月日の心しんばいを
verses.jp_2: そばなるものハなにもしらずに

verses.en: You close to Me think of your own work alone. But when things are seen, everything will change.
verses.ro: soba naru wa shigoto bakari o omote iru   mietaru naraba monku kawaru zo
verses.jp_1: そばなるハしことばかりをふもている
verses.jp_2: みへたるならばもんくかハるぞ

verses.en: I shall inform you of everything in advance. Make sure you will not be remorseful later.
verses.ro: dono yona koto demo saki e shirashi oku   ato de kokwai naki yoni seyo
verses.jp_1: どのよふな事でもさきゑしらしをく
verses.jp_2: あとてこふくハいなきよふにせよ

verses.en: To God, who began this world, all things whatever are seen.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimeta Kami no koto naraba   dono yona koto mo mina miete aru
verses.jp_1: このよふを初た神の事ならば
verses.jp_2: とのよな事もみなみゑてある

verses.en: This time, as all matters are brimming over, there is no time at all to waver.
verses.ro: konotabi wa dono yona koto mo tsumikirite   mo sashinuki wa sarani deken de
verses.jp_1: このたびハとのよな事もつみきりて
verses.jp_2: もふさしぬきハさらにてけんで

verses.en: Until now, no matter what I had said to you, I have still been holding back.
verses.ro: imamade wa donna koto oba yuta tote   mada jikkuri to shitaru naredomo
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハとんな事をばゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: またちいくりとしたるなれども

verses.en: Today, do not be off your guard even to look aside! There is no knowing what will happen or when.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa yokome furu ma mo yudan shina   nandoki donna koto ga aru yara
verses.jp_1: けふの日ハよこめふるまもゆたんしな
verses.jp_2: なんどきとんな事があるやら

verses.en: The truth recorded by My writing brush: lo, it is seen! Your minds will be spirited.
verses.ro: imamade ni fude ni tsuketaru kotowari ga   sa miete kita kokoro isamu de
verses.jp_1: いまゝでにふでにつけたることハりが
verses.jp_2: さあみゑてきた心いさむで

verses.en: If only this is seen, all of you will be filled with joy, whoever you may be.
verses.ro: kore saika miekita naraba ichiretsu wa   donna mono demo yokizukume ya
verses.jp_1: これさいかみへきたならば一れつわ
verses.jp_2: とんなものでもよふきつくめや

verses.en: All of you in the world, please understand these thoughts quickly. It is Tsukihi's request.
verses.ro: kono kokoro dozo hayaku ni ichiretsu wa   shochi shite kure Tsukihi tanomi ya
verses.jp_1: この心どふぞはやくに一れつわ
verses.jp_2: しよちしてくれ月日たのみや

verses.en: From today, I shall begin to speak of marvelous things. Perhaps you have no idea of what I shall say.
verses.ro: kyokara wa mezurashi koto o yuikakeru   nani o yu tomo choto ni shiremai
verses.jp_1: けふからハめづらし事をゆいかける
verses.jp_2: なにをゆうとも一寸にしれまい

verses.en: Whatever I say in this talk, do not turn away. The intention of God is great.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nani o yutemo somukuna yo   Kami no onowaku erai koto ya de
verses.jp_1: このはなしなにをゆうてもそむくなよ
verses.jp_2: 神のをもわくゑらい事やで

verses.en: My talks from now will be on the way to clear away the mountainous regret of God.
verses.ro: korekara no ato naru hanashi yamayama no   Kami no zannen harasu moyo o
verses.jp_1: これからのあとなるはなし山／＼の
verses.jp_2: 神のさんねんはらすもよふを

verses.en: Hereafter, however serious an illness there may be, I shall save you all by the Breath and the Hand Dance.
verses.ro: konosaki wa nanbo mutsukashi yamai demo   Iki to Teodori mina tasukeru de
verses.jp_1: このさきハなんほむつかしやまいても
verses.jp_2: いきとてをどりみなたすけるで

verses.en: However serious an illness there may be, never say that it will not be cured.
verses.ro: dono yona mutsukashiku naru yamai demo   kore naoran to yu de nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: どのよふなむつかしくなるやまいでも
verses.jp_2: これなをらんとゆうでないぞや

verses.en: Until today, as the day of the appointed time had not arrived, things were not all as I had said.
verses.ro: kyomade wa higara kokugen kitaran de   nanika chigai mo arita naredomo
verses.jp_1: けふまでわひがらこくけんきたらんで
verses.jp_2: なにかちがいもありたなれとも

verses.en: But now, I shall give you My teachings on every matter step by step. In nothing shall there be an error.
verses.ro: dandan to ikana koto omo toite oku   donna koto demo chigau koto nashi
verses.jp_1: だん／＼といかな事をもといてをく
verses.jp_2: どんな事てもちがう事なし

verses.en: Though the course of your path until now has truly been one of hardship,
verses.ro: koremade no michi no sugara to yu mono wa   makoto nanju na michi de aredomo
verses.jp_1: これまてのみちのすがらとゆうものハ
verses.jp_2: まことなんぢうなみちであれとも

verses.en: In the path ahead, everything will raise your spirits. What a marvelous path it will be!
verses.ro: konosaki no michi wa nandemo ki ga isamu   donna mezurashi michi ga aru yara
verses.jp_1: このさきのみちハなんてもきがいさむ
verses.jp_2: どんなめつらしみちがあるやら

verses.en: Though you may see Me rush out by leaps and bounds, never be anxious of mind.
verses.ro: tonton to tobideru koto o mita totemo   kokoro anji wa suru ya nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: とん／＼ととびてる事をみたとても
verses.jp_2: 心あんちハするやないぞや

verses.en: Afterward, Tsukihi will take all matters in hand and will assure you a life full of joy everlasting.
verses.ro: ato naru wa yorozu Tsukihi ga hikiukete   itsuitsu made mo yokizukume ni
verses.jp_1: あとなるハよろづ月日がひきうけて
verses.jp_2: いつ／＼までもよふきつくめに

verses.en: Until now, whatever talks I had given you, you thought they were about the future far away.
verses.ro: imamade wa nani yono hanashi shitaru tomo   itsu no koto naru yoni omote
verses.jp_1: いまゝてわなによのはなししたるとも
verses.jp_2: いつの事なるよふにをもふて

verses.en: But, lo, how frightful! It appears even as you hear of it. You cannot be off your guard in anything.
verses.ro: yare kowaya kiku yori hayaku mo mieta   donna koto demo yudan deken de
verses.jp_1: やれこわやきくよりはやくもふみへた
verses.jp_2: どんな事てもゆたんでけんで

verses.en: Hereafter, I shall make your minds spirited day by day. All things will be just as I say.
verses.ro: konosaki o nichinichi kokoro isameru de   donna koto demo yueba sono mama
verses.jp_1: このさきをにち／＼心いさめるで
verses.jp_2: どんな事でもゆへばそのまゝ

verses.en: However difficult things may appear, I shall save you all by the Joyous Service.
verses.ro: dono yoni mutsukashiku yo mieta tote   Yoki-zutome de mina tasukeru de
verses.jp_1: どのよふにむつかしくよふみへたとて
verses.jp_2: よふきつとめてみなたすけるで

verses.en: There is no knowing what workings I shall do from now on. In accordance with your minds, I shall do anything, however great.
verses.ro: korekara wa dono yona shigoto suru yara na   kokoro shidai ni donna koto demo
verses.jp_1: これからわどのよなしことするやらな
verses.jp_2: 心したいにとんな事でも

verses.en: Tsukihi will clear away all the mind's regret step by step, whatever it may be.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa dandan kokoro zannen o   donna koto demo mina harasu de na
verses.jp_1: 月日にわだん／＼心ざんねんを
verses.jp_2: どんな事てもみなはらすでな

verses.en: Whatever is said, it is all by Tsukihi. There is no knowing the workings I shall do.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o yu no mo mina Tsukihi   ikana shigoto o suru ya shiren de
verses.jp_1: とのよふな事をゆうのもみな月日
verses.jp_2: いかなしごとをするやしれんで

verses.en: Whatever appears, it is all by Tsukihi. Do not think I have a human mind.
verses.ro: ika naru no koto ga mieru mo mina Tsukihi   ningen gokoro aru to omouna
verses.jp_1: いかなるの事がみゑるもみな月日
verses.jp_2: にんけん心あるとをもうな

verses.en: From today, I shall hasten all matters. No one knows the workings I shall do.
verses.ro: kyokara wa dono yona koto mo sekikonde   donna hataraki suru ya shiromai
verses.jp_1: けふからハどのよな事もせきこんで
verses.jp_2: どんなはたらきするやしろまい

verses.en: These thoughts of Tsukihi are spoken through Her: the mouth is human, the mind is that of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: ima naru no Tsukihi no omou koto naru wa   kuchi wa ningen kokoro Tsukihi ya
verses.jp_1: いまなるの月日のをもう事なるわ
verses.jp_2: くちわにんけん心月日や

verses.en: Listen! I, Tsukihi, am borrowing Her mouth wholly, and I, Tsukihi, am lending My mind wholly.
verses.ro: shikato kike kuchi wa Tsukihi ga mina karite   kokoro wa Tsukihi mina kashite iru
verses.jp_1: しかときけくちハ月日がみなかりて
verses.jp_2: 心ハ月日みなかしている

verses.en: If you are harboring doubts over this, Tsukihi will give a full return in whatever matters.
verses.ro: kore bakari urami aru nara dono yona   koto mo Tsukihi ga mina kayasu de na
verses.jp_1: こればかりうらみあるならとのよふな
verses.jp_2: 事も月日かみなかやすてな

verses.en: Whatever is said, it is all by Tsukihi. Never is there mixed the least bit of a human mind.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o yu no mo mina Tsukihi   ningen gokoro sarani mazen de
verses.jp_1: どのよふな事をゆうのもみな月日
verses.jp_2: にんけん心さらにまぜんで

verses.en: However difficult you think matters to be, you need not worry. Tsukihi takes charge.
verses.ro: ika hodoni mutsukashi yoni omota tote   Tsukihi hikiuke anji nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: いかほどにむつかしよふにをもたとて
verses.jp_2: 月日ひきうけあんちないぞや

verses.en: All of you in the world, look forward to the path ahead. If only the regret of God is all cleared away...
verses.ro: konosaki no michi o tanoshime ichiretsu wa   Kami no zannen harashitaru nara
verses.jp_1: このさきのみちをたのしめ一れつわ
verses.jp_2: 神のさんねんはらしたるなら

verses.en: When I set out to cleanse your heart day by day, there will be none able to resist Me.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni mune no soji ni kakaritara   donna mono demo kanau mono nashi
verses.jp_1: にち／＼にむねのそふぢにかゝりたら
verses.jp_2: どんなものでもかなうものなし

verses.en: What do you think this cleansing is about? Tsukihi will enter the bodies of all.
verses.ro: kono soji doyu koto ni omou kana   Tsukihi tainai mina irikomu de
verses.jp_1: このそふぢどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp_2: 月日たいないみな入こむで

verses.en: Where do you think this talk is about? I shall fully manifest My workings in the high places.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doko no koto ya to omou kana   takai tokoro de mina arawasu de
verses.jp_1: このはなしとこの事やとをもうかな
verses.jp_2: 高いところでみなあらわすで

verses.en: Ponder over everything Tsukihi says. There is not an error in anything I say.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo Tsukihi yu koto shiyan seyo   nani o yutemo kore chigawan de
verses.jp_1: なにもかも月日ゆう事しやんせよ
verses.jp_2: なにをゆうてもこれちがわんで

verses.en: As I desire to purify the mind of everyone throughout the world, there is no knowing what Tsukihi will do.
verses.ro: sekaiju ichiretsu kokoro sumashitasa   donna koto oba Tsukihi suru yara
verses.jp_1: せかいぢう一れつ心すましたさ
verses.jp_2: どんな事をば月日するやら

verses.en: Whatever I do, it is solely from Tsukihi's single desire to save you.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o suru no mo Tsukihi niwa   tasuketai to no ichijo bakari de
verses.jp_1: とのよふな事をするのも月日には
verses.jp_2: たすけたいとの一ちよはかりで

verses.en: All of you in the world, keep your eyes firmly on the future. The cleansing of the heart will be accomplished of itself.
verses.ro: konosaki o tashika mite iyo ichiretsu wa   mune no soji ga hitori dekeru de
verses.jp_1: このさきをたしかみていよ一れつわ
verses.jp_2: むねのそふちがひとりでけるで

verses.en: When this cleansing is thoroughly done, I shall begin at once to prepare for the Amulet.
verses.ro: kono soji sukiyaka shitaru koto naraba   sono mama suguni Mamori goshirae
verses.jp_1: このそふちすきやかしたる事ならば
verses.jp_2: そのまゝすぐにまむりごしらゑ

verses.en: The mind of Tsukihi hastens daily for such a path to be, but no one is aware of it.
verses.ro: kono michi o Tsukihi no kokoro nichinichi ni   sekikonde iru tare mo shirazu ni
verses.jp_1: このみちを月日の心にち／＼に
verses.jp_2: せきこんでいるたれもしらずに

verses.en: If you come onto this path quickly, all of you will be spirited, whoever you may be.
verses.ro: kono michi e hayaku tsuitaru koto naraba   donna mono demo mina isamu de na
verses.jp_1: このみちゑはやくついたる事ならば
verses.jp_2: どんなものでもみないさむてな

verses.en: Do not wonder who is giving this talk. It is solely the mind of Tsukihi speaking.
verses.ro: kono hanashi tare ga suru towa omouna yo   Tsukihi no kokoro bakari yu no ya
verses.jp_1: このはなしたれがするとハをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: 月日の心はかりゆうのや

verses.en: It is because I desire to make the truth of this world known by all means to the entire world.
verses.ro: kono yo no shinjitsu naru o sekaiju e   doshite nari to shirashitai yue
verses.jp_1: このよふのしんちつなるをせかへちうへ
verses.jp_2: とふしてなりとしらしたいゆへ

verses.en: Though until today I have let the days go by and held back in whatever matters,
verses.ro: kyomade wa ichi nichi narito hi o nobashi   dono yona koto mo shikae iredomo
verses.jp_1: けふまでわ一日なりとひをのばし
verses.jp_2: とのよな事もしかゑいれども

verses.en: This time, as the day is pressing, I cannot hold back even for a moment.
verses.ro: konotabi wa mo hi ga tsumari kiru kara wa   domu shikaeru koto wa deken de
verses.jp_1: このたびハもふひがつまりきるからハ
verses.jp_2: どふむしかゑる事ハでけんで

verses.en: Whatever you hear and whenever you hear of it, it is the regret and anger of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: nandoki ni dono yona koto o kiita tote   kore wa Tsukihi no zanen rippuku
verses.jp_1: なんどきにとのよな事をきいたとて
verses.jp_2: これハ月日のざねんりいふく

verses.en: To Tsukihi, everyone is My child, whoever you may be. Though I have been watching over you with nothing but love,
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa dono yona mono mo waga ko nari   kawai bakari de mite wa iredomo
verses.jp_1: 月日にわどのよなものもわが子なり
verses.jp_2: かわいばかりでみてハいれども

verses.en: And though each of you throughout the world has been pondering until now,
verses.ro: imamade wa sekaiju wa ichiretsu ni   meme shiyan o shite wa iredomo
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハせかいぢううハ一れつに
verses.jp_2: めゑ／＼しやんをしてわいれども

verses.en: To My sorrow, no matter how deeply you have pondered, you have no mind to save others.
verses.ro: nasake nai dono yoni shiyan shita totemo   hito o tasukeru kokoro nai node
verses.jp_1: なさけないとのよにしやんしたとても
verses.jp_2: 人をたすける心ないので

verses.en: From now, Tsukihi requests you, everyone in the world, to replace your mind firmly.
verses.ro: korekara wa Tsukihi tanomi ya ichiretsu wa   kokoro shikkari irekaete kure
verses.jp_1: これからハ月日たのみや一れつわ
verses.jp_2: 心しいかりいれかゑてくれ

verses.en: To explain what kind of mind it is to be: it is none other than to save the world single-heartedly.
verses.ro: kono kokoro doyu koto de aru naraba   sekai tasukeru ichijo bakari o
verses.jp_1: この心どふゆう事であるならば
verses.jp_2: せかいたすける一ちよばかりを

verses.en: Hereafter, if all of you throughout the world save one another in every matter,
verses.ro: konosaki wa sekaiju wa ichiretsu ni   yorozu tagaini tasuke suru nara
verses.jp_1: このさきハせかいぢううハ一れつに
verses.jp_2: よろづたがいにたすけするなら

verses.en: Know that Tsukihi will accept that mind and will provide any salvation whatever.
verses.ro: Tsukihi nimo sono kokoro oba uketorite   donna tasuke mo suru to omoe yo
verses.jp_1: 月日にもその心をばうけとりて
verses.jp_2: どんなたすけもするとをもゑよ

verses.en: What do you think this salvation is? It is My assurance of your freedom from smallpox.
verses.ro: kono tasuke doyu koto ni omou kana   hoso sen yoni tashika ukeyau
verses.jp_1: このたすけどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp_2: ほふそせんよにたしかうけやう

verses.en: Another salvation I desire to teach: an equally abundant harvest everywhere at all times.
verses.ro: mata tasuke ryuke ichiretsu dokomade mo   itsumo hosaku oshietai kara
verses.jp_1: またゝすけりうけ一れつどこまでも
verses.jp_2: いつもほふさくをしゑたいから

verses.en: To train you in such a path quickly is My desire, but there is no understanding in anyone's mind.
verses.ro: kono michi o hayaku shikomo to omoedomo   ichiretsu kokoro wakari nai node
verses.jp_1: このみちをはやくしこもとをもゑども
verses.jp_2: 一れつ心わかりないので

verses.en: I do not discriminate among any of you in the world. Please ponder, each of you.
verses.ro: sekaiju doko ni hedate wa nai hodoni   ichiretsu shiyan shite kureru yo
verses.jp_1: せかいぢうどこにへだてわないほどに
verses.jp_2: 一れつしやんしてくれるよふ

verses.en: If a true resolve comes to your mind, and you do not turn away from the words of God,
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni kokoro ni sadame mina tsuite   Kami no yu koto somuki nakereba
verses.jp_1: しんぢつに心にさだめみなついて
verses.jp_2: 神のゆう事そむきなければ

verses.en: Then Tsukihi will firmly accept this mind and directly hasten your salvation.
verses.ro: soreyori mo Tsukihi no kokoro shikkari to   uketori shidai tasuke sekikomu
verses.jp_1: それよりも月日の心しいかりと
verses.jp_2: うけとりしだいたすけせきこむ

verses.en: Do not think of this salvation as being trivial. It is the principal matter of the Divine Record of Nihon.
verses.ro: kono tasuke chotto no koto ya to omouna yo   kore wa nihon no ichi no Koki ya
verses.jp_1: このたすけ一寸の事やとをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: これわにほんの一のこふきや

verses.en: If only I show this quickly and clearly, however high your place may be...
verses.ro: kore saika hayaku shikkari miseta nara   dono yona takai tokoro naru tomo
verses.jp_1: これさいかはやくしいかりみせたなら
verses.jp_2: とのよな高いところなるとも

verses.en: This indeed is not human workings. No one will be able to turn away from the free and unlimited workings of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kore bakari ningen waza de nai karani   Tsukihi juyo somuki dekemai
verses.jp_1: こればかりにんけんハさでないからに
verses.jp_2: 月日ぢうよふそむきでけまい

verses.en: When it is shown, however high your place may be, you will not be able to imitate it. Ponder this.
verses.ro: shitaru nara ika hodo takai tokoro demo   mane wa dekemai shiyan shite miyo
verses.jp_1: したるならいかほと高いところても
verses.jp_2: まねハてけまいしやんしてみよ

verses.en: Though Tsukihi desires to show proof quickly against illness, death, and weakening,
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori yamazu shinazu ni yowaran no   hayaku shoko daso to omoedo
verses.jp_1: 月日よりやますしなすによわらんの
verses.jp_2: はやくしよこふだそとをもへど

verses.en: All of you everywhere doubt Me and take My words as being worldly common.
verses.ro: ichiretsu wa mina utagote tare nitemo   sekainami ya to omote iru node
verses.jp_1: 一れつハみなうたごふてたれにても
verses.jp_2: せかいなみやとをもているので

verses.en: There is not at all a human mind at this place. There are only the thoughts of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kono tokoro ningen gokoro sarani nashi   Tsukihi no omou koto bakari ya de
verses.jp_1: このところにんけん心さらになし
verses.jp_2: 月日のをもう事ばかりやで

verses.en: But there is no one who knows this. That there is no understanding is the regret of God.
verses.ro: sono koto o tare demo shiranu koto ya kara   wakari nai no ga Kami no zannen
verses.jp_1: その事をたれてもしらぬ事やから
verses.jp_2: わかりないのが神のさんねん

verses.en: Is there not a way that the minds of all of you can be truly purified?
verses.ro: kono kokoro dozo shinjitsu ichiretsu no   kokoro sumasuru moyo nai ka yo
verses.jp_1: この心どふぞしんちつ一れつの
verses.jp_2: 心すまするもよふないかよ

verses.en: If only your minds quickly become open to reason, I shall show you the proof at once.
verses.ro: kokoro sai hayaku wakarita koto naraba   sono mama suguni shoko dasu no ni
verses.jp_1: 心さいはやくハかりた事ならば
verses.jp_2: そのまゝすぐにしよこだすのに

verses.en: Until now, I have listened to all kinds of falsehood, but from now on I shall hear them no more.
verses.ro: imamade wa dono yona uso mo kiite ita   mo korekara wa uso wa kikan de
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハとのよなうそもきいていた
verses.jp_2: もふこれからハうそハきかんで

verses.en: From now on, if you speak falsely, you yourself will become false. Beware!
verses.ro: korekara wa uso o yu tara sono mono ga   uso ni naru nomo kore ga shochi ka
verses.jp_1: これからハうそをゆうたらそのものが
verses.jp_2: うそになるのもこれがしよちか

verses.en: Tsukihi dislikes falsehood and flattery. If you persist, Tsukihi will withdraw.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa uso to tsuisho kore kirai   konosaki naru wa Tsukihi shirizoku
verses.jp_1: 月日にハうそとついしよこれきらい
verses.jp_2: このさきなるわ月日しりぞく

verses.en: Therefore, I have postponed yet another day, overlooking almost all of them.
verses.ro: soreyue ni ichi nichi narito hi o nobashi   taitei nanimo miyurushite ita
verses.jp_1: それゆへに一日なりとひをのばし
verses.jp_2: たいていなにもみゆるしていた

verses.en: I say that I desire to show the proof quickly at this time. What do you think of My words?
verses.ro: konotabi no hayaku shoko dashitai to   yute iru no o nanto omou zo
verses.jp_1: このたびのはやくしよこふだしたいと
verses.jp_2: ゆうているのをなんとをもうぞ

verses.en: What do you think the proof is to be? I have put a clear test on the body.
verses.ro: shoko mo doyu koto ni omou kana   minouchi yori ni tashika tameshi o
verses.jp_1: しよこふもとふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp_2: みのうちよりにたしかためしを

verses.en: About this test: know that the regret of Tsukihi is no small matter.
verses.ro: kono tameshi makoto Tsukihi no zannen wa   yoi naru koto de nai to omoe yo
verses.jp_1: このためしまこと月日のさんねんわ
verses.jp_2: よいなる事でないとをもゑよ

verses.en: A body that had no disorder anywhere: Tsukihi bent it and caused you much trouble.
verses.ro: minouchi ni doko ni fusoku no nai mono ni   Tsukihi igamete kuro kaketa de
verses.jp_1: みのうちにとこにふそくのないものに
verses.jp_2: 月日いがめてくろふかけたで

verses.en: The time was thirty-nine years ago. Since then, I have given you worries, troubles, and suffering.
verses.ro: nengen wa sanju ku nen mo izen nite   shinpai kuro nayami kaketa de
verses.jp_1: ねんけんハ三十九ねんもいせんにて
verses.jp_2: しんばいくろふなやみかけたで

verses.en: Because of it, you doubt all the words of Tsukihi. It is not unreasonable.
verses.ro: soreyue ni Tsukihi yu koto nani goto mo   utagote iru kore muri de nai
verses.jp_1: それゆへに月日ゆう事なに事も
verses.jp_2: うたこふているこれむりでない

verses.en: This time, I am preparing to clear up your innermost heart. This is the first matter.
verses.ro: konotabi wa kono mune no uchi sukiyaka ni   harasu moyo ya kore ga daiichi
verses.jp_1: このたびハ此むねのうちすきやかに
verses.jp_2: はらすもよふやこれがだい一

verses.en: Unless your mind is turned toward Tsukihi, any talk will be to no avail.
verses.ro: kono kokoro Tsukihi no ho e shikkarito   tsuken koto niwa donna hanashi mo
verses.jp_1: この心月日のほふゑしいかりと
verses.jp_2: つけん事にハどんなはなしも

verses.en: Everything that has been done is all by Tsukihi, but there is perhaps no one who knows this.
verses.ro: ika naru no koto o shitaru mo mina Tsukihi   konna koto oba tare mo shiromai
verses.jp_1: いかなるの事をしたるもみな月日
verses.jp_2: こんな事をばたれもしろまい

verses.en: Today, there will be no time even to look aside. I shall show you the proof quickly.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa yokome furu ma mo nai hodoni   hayaku shoko dashite miseru de
verses.jp_1: けふの日ハよこめふるまもないほどに
verses.jp_2: はやくしよこふだしてみせるで

verses.en: When you see it, be convinced, whoever you are. All of My talks proceed in this way.
verses.ro: kore mitara donna mono demo tokushin se   nanino hanashi mo mina kono dori
verses.jp_1: これみたらとんなものでもとくしんせ
verses.jp_2: なにのはなしもみなこのどふり

verses.en: My regret up till now is not something that can be told in words.
verses.ro: imamade no kono zannen to yu mono wa   kuchi de yu yona koto de nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: いまゝでのこのさんねんとゆうものわ
verses.jp_2: くちでゆうよな事てないぞや

verses.en: Until now, I have passed through a mountain of regrets. If I clear them away at this time,
verses.ro: imamade wa yamayama zanen torinuke   konotabi kore o harashi taru nara
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハ山／＼さねんとふりぬけ
verses.jp_2: このたびこれをはらしたるなら

verses.en: Thereafter, whatever illness or whatever else may be troubling you, you shall be saved from them all.
verses.ro: ato naru wa donna yamai mo ika naru no   koto de aro ga mina tasukeru de
verses.jp_1: あとなるハどんなやまいもいかなるの
verses.jp_2: 事であろふがみなたすけるで

verses.en: If I should make the origin of human beings known to the whole world,
verses.ro: kono yo no ningen moto o sekaiju   shirashite oita koto de aru nara
verses.jp_1: このよふのにんけんもとをせかいちう
verses.jp_2: しらしてをいた事であるなら

verses.en: Then I shall provide any salvation whatever. With but a word, I shall save you all.
verses.ro: sorekara wa donna tasuke mo suru hodoni   hito koto made de mina tasukeru de
verses.jp_1: それからハどんなたすけもするほとに
verses.jp_2: 一事までゝみなたすけるで

verses.en: Until now, though I have repeatedly taught the truth step by step, you do not understand the core.
verses.ro: koremade wa dandan kudoki kotowari o   yute aredomo shin ga wakaran
verses.jp_1: これまでハたん／＼くどきことハりを
verses.jp_2: ゆうてあれどもしんかわからん

verses.en: To explain what this core is: the pondering of your heart is the primary concern.
verses.ro: kono shin wa doyu koto de aro nara   mune no shiyan o kore ga daiichi
verses.jp_1: このしんハどふゆう事であろふなら
verses.jp_2: むねのしやんをこれがたいゝち

verses.en: If the heart and the mouth differ in any matter, never will it accord with the mind of God.
verses.ro: nani nitemo mune to kuchi to ga chigote wa   Kami no kokoro ni kore wa kanawan
verses.jp_1: なにゝてもむねとくちとがちこふてハ
verses.jp_2: 神の心にこれハかなわん

verses.en: If your sincerity does not accord with the mind of God, in vain is devotion, however great it may be.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ga Kami no kokoro ni kanawaneba   ika hodo kokoro tsukushitaru tomo
verses.jp_1: しんちつが神の心にかなハねば
verses.jp_2: いかほど心つくしたるとも

verses.en: On this one matter, whoever may come and however he may plead, it cannot be accepted. Tsukihi will withdraw.
verses.ro: kore bakari ika hodo tare ga sodan mo   totemo kanawan Tsukihi shirizoku
verses.jp_1: こればかりいかほどたれがそふたんも
verses.jp_2: とてもかなハん月日しりぞく

verses.en: In any matter, listen closely to the words of God. In whatever I say, there is never a mistake.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo Kami no yu koto shikato kike   nani o yutemo chigau koto nashi
verses.jp_1: なにもかも神のゆう事しかときけ
verses.jp_2: なにをゆうてもちがう事なし

verses.en: I truly desire to teach you marvelous salvation. That is why I tell you everything whatever.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni mezurashi tasuke oshietasa   sokode dono yona koto mo yu no ya
verses.jp_1: しんちつにめつらしたすけをしへたさ
verses.jp_2: そこでとのよな事もゆうのや

verses.en: I desire to teach you everything that has been unknown since I began this world.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimete karani nai koto o   donna koto omo oshietai kara
verses.jp_1: このよふを初てからにない事を
verses.jp_2: どんな事をもをしへたいから

verses.en: You must clearly understand the truth concerning the real origin of this world.
verses.ro: kono yo no honmoto naru no shinjitsu o   shikkari shochi seneba ikan de
verses.jp_1: このよふのほんもとなるのしんちつを
verses.jp_2: しいかりしよちせねばいかんで

verses.en: There is perhaps no one anywhere who knows this origin clearly.
verses.ro: kono moto o shikkari shirite iru mono wa   doko no mono demo sarani arumai
verses.jp_1: このもとをしいかりしりているものハ
verses.jp_2: とこのものでもさらにあるまい

verses.en: At this time, I shall tell you the real truth. Whatever I say, you must understand clearly.
verses.ro: konotabi wa honshinjitsu o yute kikasu   nani o yutemo shikato shochi se
verses.jp_1: このたびハほんしんちつをゆてきかす
verses.jp_2: なにをゆうてもしかとしよちせ

verses.en: Among the instruments used in the beginning of human beings at this Residence, Izanagi and Izanami,
verses.ro: kono yashiki ningen hajime dogu wa na   Izanagiii to Izanami to nari
verses.jp_1: このやしきにんけんはじめどふぐハな
verses.jp_2: いざなぎいゝといざなみとなり

verses.en: Tsukiyomi, Kunisazuchi, Kumoyomi, and Kashikone are the primary instruments.
verses.ro: Tsukiyomi to Kunisazuchii to Kumoyomi to   Kashikonee to ga ichi no dogu ya
verses.jp_1: 月よみとくにさづちいとくもよみと
verses.jp_2: かしこねへとが一のとふぐや

verses.en: Then, the one called Otonobe is the primary instrument for the crops.
verses.ro: soreyori mo Otonobee to yu no wa na   kore wa ryuke no ichi no dogu ya
verses.jp_1: それよりもをふとのべへとゆうのハな
verses.jp_2: これわりゆけの一のどふくや

verses.en: Next, the one called Taishokuten is the scissors of the world.
verses.ro: tsugi naru wa Taishokuten to yu no wa na   kore wa sekai no hasami naru zo ya
verses.jp_1: つきなるハたいしよく天とゆうのハな
verses.jp_2: これわせかいのはさみなるぞや

verses.en: Until this time, calling together all the instruments, I have passed through every kind of path.
verses.ro: koremade wa dogu issai mina yosete   dono yona michi mo torinuketa de
verses.jp_1: これまでハどふぐいゝさいみなよせて
verses.jp_2: とのよなみちもとふりぬけたで

verses.en: Hereafter, I shall distinguish the instruments called together and hasten preparations to train them.
verses.ro: konosaki wa yoseta dogu o miwake shite   shikomu moyo o isogu bakari ya
verses.jp_1: このさきハよせたどふぐをみハけして
verses.jp_2: しこむもよふをいそぐばかりや

verses.en: Do not wonder where they can be found. Here are two, both eleven years old.
verses.ro: kono mono wa doko ni aru ya to omouna yo   toshi wa ju ichi ni nin iru zo ya
verses.jp_1: このものハとこにあるやとをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: としわ十一二人いるぞや

verses.en: One is an instrument used to begin human beings. The other is for the providence for all crops.
verses.ro: kono nin wa ningen hajime kaketaru to   ryuke issai shugo dogu ya
verses.jp_1: この人ハにんけんはじめかけたると
verses.jp_2: りうけいゝさいしゆごふどふぐや

verses.en: Today, I shall speak about any and all matters. Whatever I say, understand Me, please.
verses.ro: kyonohi ni dono yona koto mo yu hodoni   nani o yutemo shochi shite kure
verses.jp_1: けふの日にどのよな事もゆうほどに
verses.jp_2: なにをゆうてもしよちしてくれ

verses.en: Even until now, there were many intentions of God, but as the day had not come, I have held back.
verses.ro: imamade mo Kami no omowaku mama aredo   hi ga kitaran de shikae itaru de
verses.jp_1: いまゝでも神のをもハくまゝあれど
verses.jp_2: ひがきたらんでしかゑいたるで

verses.en: But as the day is pressing step by step, I shall give you all of My teachings.
verses.ro: dandan to mo hi ga tsumari kiru kara wa   donna koto demo yute oku zo ya
verses.jp_1: だん／＼ともふひがつまりきるからハ
verses.jp_2: どんな事でもゆうてをくぞや

verses.en: Until now, people everywhere have been alike. Whatever I said, all was doubted.
verses.ro: koremade wa doko no hito demo onaji koto   nani o yutemo mina utagote
verses.jp_1: これまでハどこの人でもをなじ事
verses.jp_2: なにをゆうてもみなうたごふて

verses.en: This time, it is the real truth. If you turn away from it, I shall give you a return at once.
verses.ro: konotabi wa honshinjitsu de aru karani   kore somuitara suguni kayasu de
verses.jp_1: このたびハほんしんぢつであるからに
verses.jp_2: これそむいたらすぐにかやすで

verses.en: In the world, there are those who desire rain, but perhaps no one knows its origin.
verses.ro: sekai niwa ame o hoshii to omota tote   kono moto naru o tare mo shiromai
verses.jp_1: せかいにわあめをほしいとをもたとて
verses.jp_2: このもとなるをたれもしろまい

verses.en: I shall begin to tell you clearly about this origin. If only you would understand all that I say...
verses.ro: kono moto o shikkari yute kakaru kara   donna koto demo shochi suru nara
verses.jp_1: このもとをしいかりゆうてかゝるから
verses.jp_2: どんな事でもしよちするなら

verses.en: Today, a talk never given since this world began: please listen to whatever I say.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa kono yo hajimete nai hanashi   nani o yutemo kore kiite kure
verses.jp_1: けふの日ハこのよはじめてないはなし
verses.jp_2: なにをゆうてもこれきいてくれ

verses.en: Though you are saying that this world is the world of God, you do not know the core of all matters.
verses.ro: kono yo wa Kami no sekai to yui nagara   donna koto demo shin wa shiran de
verses.jp_1: このよふわ神のせかいとゆいながら
verses.jp_2: どんな事でもしんわしらんで

verses.en: I shall truly manifest this core. When you see it, be convinced, all of you.
verses.ro: kono shin o makoto shinjitsu shite miseru   kore mita naraba mina tokushin se
verses.jp_1: このしんをまことしんぢつしてみせる
verses.jp_2: これみたならばみなとくしんせ

verses.en: Whatever is done, it is all by Tsukihi. Whatever is said, also, is all by Tsukihi.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o suru no mo mina Tsukihi   nani o yu no mo mina Tsukihi ya de
verses.jp_1: どのよふな事をするのもみな月日
verses.jp_2: なにをゆうのもみな月日やで

verses.en: This time, I shall manifest all things which have never existed since the world began.
verses.ro: konotabi wa kono yo hajimete nai koto o   donna koto demo mina arawasu de
verses.jp_1: このたびハこのよはじめてない事を
verses.jp_2: どんな事でもみなあらわすで

verses.en: Tsukihi is dwelling within the body. There is no knowing what workings I shall do.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa tainai yori mo komori ite   donna shigoto o suru ya shiren de
verses.jp_1: 月日にわたいないよりもこもりいて
verses.jp_2: どんなしごとをするやしれんで

verses.en: Whatever you may dream, it is all by Tsukihi. The reality seen, also, is all by Tsukihi.
verses.ro: dono yona yume o miru no mo mina Tsukihi   makoto miru no mo mina Tsukihi ya de
verses.jp_1: どのよふなゆめをみるのもみな月日
verses.jp_2: まことみるのもみな月日やで

verses.en: Never yet have I spoken about the origin of water in this world.
verses.ro: kono yo no mizu no moto naru koto oba na   mada koremade wa yuta koto nashi
verses.jp_1: このよふの水のもとなる事をばな
verses.jp_2: まだこれまでわゆうた事なし

verses.en: This time, on the real truth of water, there is no knowing what kind of talk I shall give.
verses.ro: konotabi wa honshinjitsu no mizu no koto   donna hanashi o suru ya shiren de
verses.jp_1: このたびハほんしんぢつの水の事
verses.jp_2: どんなはなしをするやしれんで

verses.en: I shall begin to tell you about this origin clearly, but I cannot tell it as long as you think in common worldly ways.
verses.ro: kono moto o tashikani yute kakaru kara   sekainami naru koto de yuwaren
verses.jp_1: この元をたしかにゆうてかゝるから
verses.jp_2: せかいなみなる事でゆハれん

verses.en: From today, I shall begin to tell you about all matters whatever. Listen carefully to whatever I say.
verses.ro: kyokara wa dono yona koto mo yuikakeru   nani o yutemo shikato kiku nari
verses.jp_1: けふからわどのよな事もゆいかける
verses.jp_2: なにをゆうてもしかときくなり

verses.en: Day by day and step by step, those on the high mountains will come to Me to request or inquire whatever things.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni takayama nitewa dandan to   donna koto oba tanomi tazuneru
verses.jp_1: にち／＼に高山にてわだん／＼と
verses.jp_2: どんな事をばたのみたつねる

verses.en: When this comes to be, there will be no danger in any matters whatever.
verses.ro: kore saika mie kita naraba dono yona   koto mo abunaki sarani nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: これさいかみゑきたならばどのよふな
verses.jp_2: 事もあふなきさらにないぞや

verses.en: Today, there is no knowing what talks I shall give. Please understand whatever I say.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa nanino hanashi o suru yara na   donna koto demo shochi shite kure
verses.jp_1: けふの日ハなにのはなしをするやらな
verses.jp_2: どんな事でもしよちしてくれ

verses.en: I shall make everything in the mind of each of you clearly manifest on your body.
verses.ro: meme no kokoro minouchi dono yona   koto demo shikato mina arawasu de
verses.jp_1: めへ／＼の心みのうちどのよふな
verses.jp_2: 事でもしかとみなあらわすで

verses.en: Whoever you may be, when this is seen, the cleansing of the heart will be truly accomplished of itself.
verses.ro: kore mitara donna mono demo shinjitsu ni   mune no soji ga hitori dekeru de
verses.jp_1: これみたらどんなものでもしんぢつに
verses.jp_2: むねのそふちがひとりてけるで

verses.en: This time, I shall bring all things clearly out into the open and demonstrate My working.
verses.ro: konotabi wa donna koto demo sukiyaka ni   araware dashite mina shite miseru
verses.jp_1: このたびハどんな事でもすきやかに
verses.jp_2: あらわれだしてみなしてみせる

verses.en: There is perhaps no one who knows what exists inside the body.
verses.ro: tainai ni nani ga aru yara dono yona   mono demo shirita mono wa arumai
verses.jp_1: たいないになにがあるやらどのよふな
verses.jp_2: ものでもしりたものわあるまい

verses.en: About this talk: look at the workings of Tsukihi! There is no knowing what I shall do in accordance with your mind.
verses.ro: kono hanashi Tsukihi no shigoto kore o miyo   kokoro shidai ni nani o suru yara
verses.jp_1: このはなし月日のし事これをみよ
verses.jp_2: 心しだいになにをするやら

verses.en: Today, being aware of nothing, all people remain in a common worldly state.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa nanimo shirazu ni tare nitemo   sekainami naru koto de aredomo
verses.jp_1: けふの日ハなにもしらすにたれにても
verses.jp_2: せかいなみなる事であれども

verses.en: But what path will be seen tomorrow? The core of your mind will become apparent.
verses.ro: asunichi wa doyu michi o miru yara na   shin no kokoro ga arawarete kuru
verses.jp_1: あすにちハどふゆうみちをみるやらな
verses.jp_2: しんの心があらわれてくる

verses.en: When this mind is fully apparent, no one will ever be able to turn away.
verses.ro: kono kokoro araware detaru koto naraba   tare mo somuki wa sarani dekemai
verses.jp_1: この心あらわれでたる事ならば
verses.jp_2: たれもそむきわさらにてけまい

verses.en: When this is seen, all of you, whoever you may be, will bow your head and truly ponder.
verses.ro: kore mitara donna mono demo shinjitsu ni   atama katagete mina shiyan suru
verses.jp_1: これみたらどんなものでもしんちつに
verses.jp_2: あたまかたけてみなしやんする

verses.en: Now ponder! If only the settling of this mind is definitely accomplished...
verses.ro: sa shiyan kono kokoro sai shikkari to   sadame tsuitaru koto de aru nara
verses.jp_1: さあしやんこの心さいしいかりと
verses.jp_2: さだめついたる事であるなら

verses.en: This talk is solely from the mind of Tsukihi. Do not think I have a human mind.
verses.ro: kono hanashi Tsukihi no kokoro bakari ya de   ningen gokoro aru to omouna
verses.jp_1: このはなし月日の心ばかりやで
verses.jp_2: にんけん心あるとをもうな

verses.en: If all of you in the world pray with this thought sincerely held, you shall receive any blessing, whatever it may be.
verses.ro: kono koto o mina ichiretsu wa shinjitsu ni   omote tanomeba donna koto demo
verses.jp_1: この事をみな一れつハしんちつに
verses.jp_2: をもてたのめばどんな事でも

verses.en: Until today, you have worried about many things. But from tomorrow, a broad path will open.
verses.ro: kyomade wa nanika shinpai shita naredo   asunichi kara wa okwan no michi
verses.jp_1: 一けふまでわなにかしんばいしたなれど
verses.jp_2: あすにちからわをふくハんのみち

verses.en: Until now, because I foresaw all the paths of hardship, My words were filled with warnings.
verses.ro: imamade wa donna nanju na michisuji mo   miete aru kara kotowari bakari
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハどんななんぢうなみちすちも
verses.jp_2: みへてあるからことわりばかり

verses.en: Hereafter, as it is Tsukihi who firmly assures you, there will be no danger in anything at all.
verses.ro: konosaki wa tashika ukeyau Tsukihi niwa   donna koto demo abunaki wa nai
verses.jp_1: このさきハたしかうけやう月日にハ
verses.jp_2: どんな事でもあふなきハない

verses.en: Whatever tidings you may hear step by step, rejoice all the world. They are the workings of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: dandan to donna hanashi o kiita tote   sekai tanoshime Tsukihi hataraki
verses.jp_1: たん／＼とどんなはなしをきいたとて
verses.jp_2: せかいたのしめ月日はたらき

verses.en: The work that Tsukihi will go forth to do from now on: perhaps no one knows what it will be.
verses.ro: korekara wa Tsukihi dekakeru hataraki ni   nani o suru tomo tare mo shiromai
verses.jp_1: これからわ月日でかけるはたらきに
verses.jp_2: なにをするともたれもしろまい

verses.en: Day after day, looking throughout the world, I feel pity for all My children.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni sekai no tokoro misumaseba   ichiretsu kodomo ijirashii koto
verses.jp_1: にち／＼にせかいのところみすませば
verses.jp_2: 一れつこどもいぢらしい事

verses.en: All the efforts of Tsukihi made step by step are solely to hasten preparations for your salvation.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa dandan donna koto demo na   tasukeru moyo seku bakari ya de
verses.jp_1: 月日にわたん／＼どんな事でもな
verses.jp_2: たすけるもよふせくはかりやで

verses.en: Until now, I have given you nothing but warnings. From now on, there will be warnings no longer.
verses.ro: koremade wa kotowari bakari yute oita   mo korekara wa kotowari wa nai
verses.jp_1: これまでハことわりはかりゆてをいた
verses.jp_2: もふこれからハことハりわない

verses.en: Until today, being aware of nothing, you have used only the human mind and worried yourselves.
verses.ro: kyomade wa nanimo shirazu ni ningen no   kokoro bakari de shinpai o shita
verses.jp_1: けふまでわなにもしらすににんけんの
verses.jp_2: 心ばかりでしんはいをした

verses.en: From now, firmly replace that mind, lean on God, and do the Joyous Service.
verses.ro: korekara wa kokoro shikkari irekaete   Kami ni motarete Yoki-zutome o
verses.jp_1: これからハ心しいかりいれかへて
verses.jp_2: 神にもたれてよふきつとめを

verses.en: When it is done, I shall directly reveal blessings clearly. Watch for them.
verses.ro: shitaru nara sono mama suguni shikkari to   riyaku arawasu kore o mite kure
verses.jp_1: したるならそのまゝすくにしいかりと
verses.jp_2: りやくあらわすこれをみてくれ

verses.en: If only the blessings are clearly seen, thereafter all will be the Kanrodai for all time.
verses.ro: kore saika tashika riyaku ga mieta nara   ato wa itsu demo mina Kanrodai
verses.jp_1: これさいかたしかりやくがみへたなら
verses.jp_2: あとわいつてもみなかんろふだい

verses.en: Hereafter, you shall not be able to turn away from whatever words Tsukihi once says.
verses.ro: konosaki wa Tsukihi ichido yuta koto   donna koto demo somuki dekemai
verses.jp_1: このさきわ月日一どふゆうた事
verses.jp_2: どんな事でもそむきでけまい

verses.en: If you erase the words of Tsukihi, I shall withdraw at once. Beware!
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori yutaru koto o kesu naraba   suguni shirizoku shochi shite iyo
verses.jp_1: 月日よりゆうたる事をけすならば
verses.jp_2: すぐにしりぞくしよちしていよ

verses.en: Until now, in the minds of those within and those of the world, there has been no true understanding.
verses.ro: imamade wa uchi mo sekai mo shinjitsu no   kokoro ni wakari sarani nai node
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハうちもせかいもしんちつの
verses.jp_2: 心にわかりさらにないので

verses.en: For Tsukihi, this is the greatest regret. If I could somehow make your minds clear...
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa daiichi kore ga zannen na   nanto kore oba sumashitaru nara
verses.jp_1: 月日にハ大一これがざんねんな
verses.jp_2: なんとこれをばすましたるなら

verses.en: How can I bring understanding to your minds? In any case I must admonish you.
verses.ro: kono kokoro doshita naraba wakaru yara   nandemo iken seneba naran de
verses.jp_1: この心どふしたならばわかるやら
verses.jp_2: なんてもいけんせねならんで

verses.en: This admonition is not just for a few. As it concerns the hearts of so many, it is indeed difficult.
verses.ro: iken demo chotto no hito dewa nai karani   oku no mune ga kore wa mutsukashi
verses.jp_1: いけんでも一寸の人でわないからに
verses.jp_2: をふくのむねがこれわむつかし

verses.en: However difficult it may be, I shall admonish My children, one and all.
verses.ro: ika hodoni mutsukashi koto to yuta tote   meme no kodomo iken suru zo ya
verses.jp_1: いかほどにむつかし事とゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: めへ／＼のこどもいけんするぞや

verses.en: What is the best way to accomplish it? By all means, I shall manifest the regret of God.
verses.ro: kono moyo doshita naraba yokaro zo   nandemo Kami no zanen arawasu
verses.jp_1: このもよふどふしたならばよかろふぞ
verses.jp_2: なんでも神のさねんあらわす

verses.en: Day by day and step by step, the dust piles up and fills the heart of God.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Kami no mune niwa dandan to   hokori ippai tsumori aredomo
verses.jp_1: にち／＼に神のむねにハたん／＼と
verses.jp_2: ほこりいゝばいつもりあれども

verses.en: This dust is difficult to sweep away. But if you only begin the Service...
verses.ro: kono hokori soji suru no wa mutsukashii   Tsutome nari tomo kakaritaru nara
verses.jp_1: このほこりそふぢするのハむつかしい
verses.jp_2: つとめなりともかゝりたるなら

verses.en: If only your minds are truly accepted by God, I shall sweep away any dust whatever.
verses.ro: kokoro sai shinjitsu Kami ga uketoreba   donna hokori mo soji suru nari
verses.jp_1: 心さいしんぢつ神がうけとれば
verses.jp_2: どんなほこりもそふぢするなり

verses.en: If only the innermost hearts of all humankind are swept clean,
verses.ro: ichiretsu no mune no uchi sai sukiyaka ni   soji shitateta koto de aru nara
verses.jp_1: いちれつのむねのうちさいすきやかに
verses.jp_2: そふちしたてた事であるなら

verses.en: Then, the whole world will be spirited and joyousness will come of its own accord.
verses.ro: sorekara wa sekaiju wa ki ga isamu   yokizukume ni hitori naru zo ya
verses.jp_1: それからわせかいぢううハきがいさむ
verses.jp_2: よふきづくめにひとりなるぞや

verses.en: Listen! From the high mountains to the low valleys, I see no one but Tsukihi's children.
verses.ro: shikato kike takayama nitemo tanisoko mo   mireba Tsukihi no kodomo bakari ya
verses.jp_1: しかときけ高山にてもたにそこも
verses.jp_2: みれば月日のこどもばかりや

verses.en: You human beings must all love your children. From this, please think of the regret of God.
verses.ro: ningen mo ichiretsu kodomo kawaikaro   Kami no zannen kore omote kure
verses.jp_1: にんけんも一れつこともかハいかろ
verses.jp_2: 神のさんねんこれをもてくれ

verses.en: Hitherto, no matter what had been seen, God only looked on, keeping still.
verses.ro: koremade wa dono yona koto o mita totemo   Kami no ho niwa jitto mite ita
verses.jp_1: これまてハどのよな事をみたとても
verses.jp_2: 神のほふにハぢいとみていた

verses.en: This time, as the day is pressing, I shall speak out on everything, whatever it may be.
verses.ro: konotabi wa mo hi ga tsunde aru kara na   donna koto demo mina yu hodoni
verses.jp_1: このたびわもふひがつんであるからな
verses.jp_2: どんな事でもみなゆうほどに

verses.en: Though Tsukihi looks all over the world, there is no one who knows the origin.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa sekaiju o miwatasedo   moto hajimari o shirita mono nashi
verses.jp_1: 月日にわせかいぢううをみハたせど
verses.jp_2: もとはじまりをしりたものなし

verses.en: Desiring to teach this origin to the world by all means, Tsukihi has become revealed.
verses.ro: kono moto o dozo sekai e oshietasa   sokode Tsukihi ga arawarete deta
verses.jp_1: このもとをどふぞせかいへをしへたさ
verses.jp_2: そこで月日があらわれてゞた

verses.en: About the regret of Tsukihi at this time: know that it is not a small matter.
verses.ro: konotabi no Tsukihi zanen to yu mono wa   yoi naru koto de nai to omoe yo
verses.jp_1: このたびの月日ざねんとゆうものわ
verses.jp_2: よいなる事でないとをもゑよ

verses.en: Tsukihi desires to teach this truth throughout the world by all means.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa kono shinjitsu o sekaiju e   doshite nari to oshietai kara
verses.jp_1: 月日にハこのしんぢつをせかへぢうゑ
verses.jp_2: どふしてなりとをしへたいから

verses.en: Unaware of it, you erase all the words of Tsukihi, and all that remains is rampant human thinking.
verses.ro: sore shirazu Tsukihi yu koto mina keshite   ato wa ningen gokoro habikaru
verses.jp_1: それしらず月日ゆう事みなけして
verses.jp_2: あとわにんけん心はびかる

verses.en: Hereafter, I shall clear away all the regret and anger of Tsukihi. Are you aware of it?
verses.ro: konosaki wa Tsukihi no zanen rippuku o   mina harasu de na kore ga shochi ka
verses.jp_1: このさきハ月日のざねんりいふくを
verses.jp_2: みなはらすでなこれがしよちか

verses.en: After the regret and anger of Tsukihi are cleared away, I shall open a marvelous path.
verses.ro: Tsukihi nimo zanen rippuku harashitara   ato wa mezurashi michi o tsukeru de
verses.jp_1: 月日にもざねんりいふくはらしたら
verses.jp_2: あとハめづらしみちをつけるで

verses.en: What do you think this path is to be? It is solely mutual help among all people in all matters.
verses.ro: kono michi wa doyu koto ni omou kana   yorozu tagaini tasuke bakari o
verses.jp_1: このみちハどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp_2: よろづたがいにたすけばかりを

verses.en: If all the world comes to help one another, Tsukihi will accept all your minds.
verses.ro: sekaiju tagaini tasuke suru naraba   Tsukihi mo kokoro mina hikiukeru
verses.jp_1: せかいぢうたがいにたすけするならば
verses.jp_2: 月日も心みなひきうける

verses.en: If Tsukihi accepts your minds, I shall work in all matters whatever.
verses.ro: Tsukihi nimo kokoro hikiuke suru kara wa   donna koto demo hataraki o suru
verses.jp_1: 月日にも心ひきうけするからわ
verses.jp_2: どんな事でもはたらきをする

verses.en: What do you think this working is to be? It is solely to distinguish between good and evil.
verses.ro: hataraki mo doyu koto ni omou kana   zen to aku to o wakeru bakari ya
verses.jp_1: はたらきもどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp_2: 善とあくとをわけるばかりや

verses.en: Until today, whatever wrongdoing there is said to be, perhaps none of you has known of it on your body.
verses.ro: kyomade wa donna akuji to yuta tote   waga mi ni shirita mono wa arumai
verses.jp_1: けふまでわどんなあくじとゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: わがみにしりたものハあるまい

verses.en: God will teach you the truth about this. Ponder over it, all of you.
verses.ro: kono kokoro Kami ga shinjitsu yute kikasu   mina ichiretsu wa shiyan shite kure
verses.jp_1: この心神がしんぢつゆてきかす
verses.jp_2: みないちれつわしやんしてくれ

verses.en: All of you throughout the world are brothers and sisters. There should be no one called an outsider.
verses.ro: sekaiju ichiretsu wa mina kyodai ya   tanin to yu wa sarani nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: せかいぢういちれつわみなきよたいや
verses.jp_2: たにんとゆうわさらにないぞや

verses.en: That there is no one who knows the origin of this is the very cause of the regret of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kono moto o shiritaru mono wa nai node na   sore ga Tsukihi no zanen bakari ya
verses.jp_1: このもとをしりたるものハないのでな
verses.jp_2: それが月日のざねんばかりや

verses.en: Those living in the high mountains and those living in the low valleys: their souls are all the same.
verses.ro: takayama ni kurashite irumo tanisoko ni   kurashite irumo onashi tamahii
verses.jp_1: 高山にくらしているもたにそこに
verses.jp_2: くらしているもをなしたまひい

verses.en: Furthermore, the instruments you use daily are all things lent by Tsukihi.
verses.ro: soreyori mo dandan tsukau dogu wa na   mina Tsukihi yori kashimono naru zo
verses.jp_1: それよりもたん／＼つかうどふぐわな
verses.jp_2: みな月日よりかしものなるぞ

verses.en: Unaware of this, the thought in the minds of all human beings is that there are the high and the low.
verses.ro: sore shirazu mina ningen no kokoro dewa   nando takabiku aru to omote
verses.jp_1: それしらすみなにんけんの心でわ
verses.jp_2: なんどたかびくあるとをもふて

verses.en: By all means, Tsukihi desires to make the truth of this matter clearly understood by the whole world.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa kono shinjitsu o sekaiju e   dozo shikkari shochi sashitai
verses.jp_1: 月日にハこのしんぢつをせかいぢうへ
verses.jp_2: どふぞしいかりしよちさしたい

verses.en: If only this is clearly understood, the root of rebellion will be cut off.
verses.ro: kore saika tashikani shochi shita naraba   muhon no ne wa kirete shimau ni
verses.jp_1: これさいかたしかにしよちしたならば
verses.jp_2: むほんのねへわきれてしまうに

verses.en: Tsukihi sincerely desires only to end the wars among those on the high mountains.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori shinjitsu omou takayama no   tatakai saika osametaru nara
verses.jp_1: 月日よりしんぢつをもう高山の
verses.jp_2: たゝかいさいかをさめたるなら

verses.en: By what means can they be ended? If only you set forth on the Joyous Service...
verses.ro: kono moyo doshita naraba osamaro   Yoki-zutome ni detaru koto nara
verses.jp_1: このもよふどふしたならばをさまろふ
verses.jp_2: よふきづとめにでたる事なら

verses.en: Do not wonder from whose mind these words come. They are solely from the mind of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kono kokoro tare ga yu towa omouna yo   Tsukihi no kokoro bakari naru zo ya
verses.jp_1: この心たれがゆうとハをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: 月日の心ばかりなるぞや

verses.en: It is difficult to do this Service because of the high mountains, but God gives you firm assurance.
verses.ro: kono Tsutome takayama nitewa mutsukashii   Kami ga shikkari hikiuke o suru
verses.jp_1: このつとめ高山にてハむつかしい
verses.jp_2: 神がしいかりひきうけをする

verses.en: This time, in all matters, I shall truly give you My firm assurance and shall work.
verses.ro: konotabi wa donna koto demo shinjitsu ni   tashika ukeyai hataraki o suru
verses.jp_1: このたびわどんな事でもしんちつに
verses.jp_2: たしかうけやいはたらきをする

verses.en: When God goes forth and works throughout the world, there will be nothing to fear in doing any Service.
verses.ro: Kami ga dete sekaiju o hatarakeba   donna Tsutome mo kowami nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: 神がでゝせかいぢううをはたらけば
verses.jp_2: どんなつとめもこハみないぞや

verses.en: Listen! Though the high mountains, boastful, have done as they pleased to the low valleys,
verses.ro: shikato kike takayama ya tote tanisoko o   mamani shirareta koto de aredomo
verses.jp_1: しかときけ高山やとてたにそこを
verses.jp_2: まゝにしられた事であれども

verses.en: From now on, Tsukihi shall come out in their place. Let them try to do as they please if they dare.
verses.ro: korekara wa Tsukihi kawari ni deru hodoni   mamani shiyo nara sureba shite miyo
verses.jp_1: これからわ月日かハりにでるほどに
verses.jp_2: まゝにしよならすればしてみよ

verses.en: Everything will be different from what it has been until now. From now on, it will be as God intends.
verses.ro: imamade to nanika monku ga chigau de na   korekara saki wa Kami no mama ya de
verses.jp_1: いまゝでとなにかもんくがちがうてな
verses.jp_2: これからさきハ神のまゝやで

verses.en: Perhaps no one knows the intention of Tsukihi in descending from Heaven.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori amakudari taru kokoro na   nanno koto yara tare mo shiromai
verses.jp_1: 月日よりあまくだりたる心な
verses.jp_2: なんの事やらたれもしろまい

verses.en: First, to help those who grow crops, I desired to teach you on the matter of the fertilizer.
verses.ro: daiichi wa ryuke tsukuru o tasuketasa   koe ichijo o oshietai kara
verses.jp_1: 大一わりゆうけつくるをたすけたさ
verses.jp_2: こゑ一ぢよふをしへたいから

verses.en: Do not wonder why the fertilizer is effective. If only God accepts your mind...
verses.ro: koe demo na doshite kiku to omouna yo   kokoro o Kami ga uketorita nara
verses.jp_1: こゑてもなどふしてきくとをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: こゝろを神がうけとりたなら

verses.en: Though God has been speaking the truth until now, even those within only have doubts.
verses.ro: imamade wa shinjitsu Kami ga yute aredo   uchi kara shitemo utagau bakari
verses.jp_1: いまゝてハしんぢつ神がゆてあれど
verses.jp_2: うちからしてもうたがうはかり

verses.en: This time, do not doubt whatever I say. If you doubt, Tsukihi will withdraw.
verses.ro: konotabi wa nani o yutemo utagau na   kore utagaeba Tsukihi shirizoku
verses.jp_1: 此のたびハなにをゆうてもうたがうな
verses.jp_2: これうたがへば月日しりぞく

verses.en: I repeat this to you tediously. If you doubt, you will truly repent it.
verses.ro: kono koto wa akudoi hodomo yute oku   kore utagaeba makoto kokwai
verses.jp_1: この事ハあくどいほともゆうてをく
verses.jp_2: これうたがへばまことこふくハい

verses.en: What Tsukihi has once said will never become false through all time.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori ichido yute oita koto   itsu ni naritemo chigau koto nashi
verses.jp_1: 月日より一どふゆうてをいた事
verses.jp_2: いつになりてもちがう事なし

verses.en: Until now, all of you have only doubted whatever Tsukihi said, always erasing it by your words.
verses.ro: imamade wa Tsukihi nani goto yuta tote   mina utagote yuikesu bakari
verses.jp_1: いまゝでわ月日なに事ゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: みなうたごふてゆいけすばかり

verses.en: For Tsukihi, this is the greatest regret. I shall correct this matter by all means.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa daiichi kore ga zannen na   nandemo kore o shikato kimeru de
verses.jp_1: 月日にハ大一これがざんねんな
verses.jp_2: なんでもこれをしかときめるで

verses.en: From now on, you must not turn away from whatever Tsukihi says. You must lean on God.
verses.ro: korekara wa Tsukihi yu koto nani goto mo   somukan yoni Kami ni motare yo
verses.jp_1: これからハ月日ゆう事なに事も
verses.jp_2: そむかんよふに神にもたれよ

verses.en: Then I, God, shall truly give you My firm assurance and shall work.
verses.ro: shitaru nara Kami no ho nimo shinjitsu ni   tashika hikiuke hataraki o suru
verses.jp_1: したるなら神のほふにもしんちつに
verses.jp_2: たしかひきうけはたらきをする

verses.en: As Tsukihi persuades you to such a degree, if your mind is in error, I shall withdraw at once.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa kora hodo kudoki tsumeru kara   kokoro chigaeba suguni shirizoku
verses.jp_1: 月日にハこらほどくどきつめるから
verses.jp_2: 心ちがゑばすぐにしりぞく

verses.en: If your mind is truly sincere, there will never be a failure in any salvation.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni kokoro ni makoto aru naraba   donna tasuke mo chigau koto nashi
verses.jp_1: しんちつに心にまことあるならば
verses.jp_2: どんなたすけもちがう事なし

verses.en: Hereafter, in order that there be no failure in the fertilizer for the crops, please understand Me clearly.
verses.ro: konosaki wa ryuke no koe o chigawan yo   dozo shikkari shochi shite kure
verses.jp_1: このさきハりゆけのこへをちがハんよ
verses.jp_2: どふぞしいかりしよちしてくれ

verses.en: From today, I shall begin to tell you the thoughts of Tsukihi on all matters whatever.
verses.ro: kyokara wa Tsukihi no omou koto oba na   dono yona koto mo mina yuikakeru
verses.jp_1: けふからわ月日のをもう事をばな
verses.jp_2: どのよな事もみなゆいかける

verses.en: Though even until now I have told you almost everything, I have not yet told you Tsukihi's intention.
verses.ro: imamade mo taite hanashi mo toitaredo   Tsukihi omowaku mada yute nai
verses.jp_1: いまゝでもたいてはなしもといたれど
verses.jp_2: 月日をもハくまだゆうてない

verses.en: From now on, whatever talks I may give, never think that they are false.
verses.ro: korekara wa donna hanashi o shitaru tomo   kore o kanarazu uso to omouna
verses.jp_1: これからハどんなはなしをしたるとも
verses.jp_2: これをかならすうそをもうな

verses.en: There is no knowing what I shall say, for the mind of Tsukihi hastens.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o yu yara shiren de na   Tsukihi no kokoro sete iru kara
verses.jp_1: どのよふな事をゆうやらしれんてな
verses.jp_2: 月日の心せゑているから

verses.en: What do you think My thoughts are about? They are about Nihon, Kara, and Tenjiku.
verses.ro: kono kokoro doyu koto ni omou kana   nihon mo kara mo tenjiku made mo
verses.jp_1: この心どふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp_2: にほんもからもてんちくまでも

verses.en: Though there are many leagues in between, I shall work even in a single night.
verses.ro: kono aida michinori yohodo aru keredo   ichiya no ma nimo hataraki o suru
verses.jp_1: このあいだみちのりよほどあるけれど
verses.jp_2: いちやのまにもはたらきをする

verses.en: What are you humans thinking of this talk? Your bodies are things lent by Tsukihi and you are all children of Mine.
verses.ro: kono hanashi ningen nanto omote iru   Tsukihi kashimono mina waga kodomo
verses.jp_1: このはなしにんけんなんとをもている
verses.jp_2: 月日かしものみなわがこども

verses.en: So long as Tsukihi keeps still, there will be no hope of a settling.
verses.ro: itsumade mo Tsukihi jikkuri shite ireba   itsu ni naritemo osamaru me nashi
verses.jp_1: いつまでも月日ぢいくりしていれば
verses.jp_2: いつになりてもをさまるめなし

verses.en: Therefore, Tsukihi will go forth to work. There is no one who knows where I shall go.
verses.ro: soreyue ni Tsukihi dekakeru hataraki ni   doko e deru yara shirita mono nashi
verses.jp_1: それゆへに月日でかけるはたらきに
verses.jp_2: とこへでるやらしりたものなし

verses.en: I say that I shall purify all minds throughout the world. Never think of it as a small matter.
verses.ro: sekaiju kokoro sumasu to yu kara wa   chotto no koto ya to sarani omouna
verses.jp_1: せかいぢう心すますとゆうからわ
verses.jp_2: 一寸の事やとさらにをもうな

verses.en: In whatever matters, if the innermost heart of each of you is purified, there will be no danger.
verses.ro: dono yona koto demo meme mune no uchi   sumashita naraba abunaki wa nai
verses.jp_1: どのよふな事てもめへ／＼むねのうち
verses.jp_2: すましたならばあふなきわない

verses.en: Day after day, the thought of Tsukihi is only to wait for a large number of people to come to Me step by step.
verses.ro: dandan to Tsukihi nichinichi omowaku wa   oku no hito o matsu bakari ya de
verses.jp_1: たん／＼と月日にち／＼をもハくわ
verses.jp_2: をふくの人をまつばかりやで

verses.en: The reason I am waiting for these people is that I desire to save all of My children in the world.
verses.ro: kono hito o doyu koto de matsu naraba   ichiretsu waga ko tasuketai kara
verses.jp_1: この人をどふゆう事でまつならば
verses.jp_2: 一れつわがこたすけたいから

verses.en: You cannot know what a marvelous path will come into sight this year.
verses.ro: kotoshi niwa donna mezurashi michisuji ga   miete kuru yara kore shiren de na
verses.jp_1: ことしにハどんなめづらしみちすじが
verses.jp_2: みゑてくるやらこれしれんてな

verses.en: No matter how I try to tell you the truth by words, there is no one who understands.
verses.ro: kuchi saki de nanbo shinjitsu yuta tote   tare ka kikiwake suru mono wa nai
verses.jp_1: 口さきでなんほしんちつゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: たれかきゝわけするものハない

verses.en: Therefore, Tsukihi will at this time demonstrate the truth for you in all matters.
verses.ro: soreyue ni Tsukihi konotabi dono yona   koto mo shinjitsu mina shite miseru
verses.jp_1: それゆへに月日このたびどのよふな
verses.jp_2: 事もしんちつみなしてみせる

verses.en: Whatever I do, never think that there is any human mind mixed in it.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o shitaru mo ningen no   kokoro majiru to sarani omouna
verses.jp_1: どのよふな事をしたるもにんけんの
verses.jp_2: 心まぢるとさらにをもうな

verses.en: Tsukihi cannot bear to look on any longer. That is why I shall work in all matters.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa amari shinjitsu mikaneru de   sokode dono yona koto mo suru no ya
verses.jp_1: 月日にハあまりしんぢつみかねるで
verses.jp_2: そこでとのよな事もするのや

verses.en: However strong or youthful you may be, never think that such a condition is reliable.
verses.ro: ika hodono goteki tarumo wakaki demo   kore o tayori to sarani omouna
verses.jp_1: いかほどのごうてきたるもハかきても
verses.jp_2: これをたよりとさらにをもうな

verses.en: At this time, God is openly revealed and speaks to you freely without restriction.
verses.ro: konotabi wa Kami ga omote i arawarete   juyojizai ni hanashi suru kara
verses.jp_1: このたびハ神がをもていあらハれて
verses.jp_2: ぢうよぢざいにはなしするから

verses.en: As I shall work in truth in all matters, your innermost heart will, of itself, be made clear.
verses.ro: donoyo na koto mo shinjitsu suru kara wa   mune no uchi yori hitori sumikiru
verses.jp_1: どのよふな事もしんぢつするからハ
verses.jp_2: むねのうちよりひとりすみきる

verses.en: Until now, all humankind has been pondering only with the human mind.
verses.ro: imamade wa ichiretsu wa mina ningen no   kokoro bakari de shiyan shitaredo
verses.jp_1: いまゝでわ一れつハみなにんけんの
verses.jp_2: 心ばかりてしやんしたれど

verses.en: This time, there is no need at all to ponder with the human mind on any matter.
verses.ro: konotabi wa dono yona koto mo ningen no   kokoro shiyan wa sarani iran de
verses.jp_1: このたびわどのよな事もにんけんの
verses.jp_2: 心しやんわさらにいらんで

verses.en: I shall tell you any and everything. Whatever I say, never take it to be false.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo dono yona koto mo yute oku   nani o yutemo uso to omouna
verses.jp_1: なにもかもとのよな事もゆうてをく
verses.jp_2: なにをゆうてもうそとをもうな

verses.en: Whatever kind of people may be rampant on the high mountains, no one knows the truth.
verses.ro: takayama de dono yona mono ga habikaru mo   kono shinjitsu o tare mo shiromai
verses.jp_1: 高山でとのよなものがはびかるも
verses.jp_2: このしんちつをたれもしろまい

verses.en: Wherever you may be, Tsukihi clearly sees your innermost heart.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa donna tokoro ni iru mono mo   mune no uchi oba shikato mite iru
verses.jp_1: 月日にわどんなところにいるものも
verses.jp_2: むねのうちをばしかとみている

verses.en: If your innermost heart accords with the mind of Tsukihi, I shall exert Myself in your favor forever.
verses.ro: mune no uchi Tsukihi kokoro ni kanotara   itsu made nari to shikato funbaru
verses.jp_1: むねのうち月日心にかのふたら
verses.jp_2: いつまでなりとしかとふんばる

verses.en: The mind of Tsukihi hastens day after day. Yet there is no understanding in the minds of you close to Me.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori nichinichi kokoro sekikomedo   soba no kokoro ni wakari nai node
verses.jp_1: 月日よりにち／＼心せきこめど
verses.jp_2: そばの心にわかりないので

verses.en: What do you think My hastening is about? If you grow crops, you may be in need of water.
verses.ro: sekikomi mo nanino koto ya to omou kana   ryuke tsukureba mizu ga hoshikaro
verses.jp_1: せきこみもなにの事やとをもうかな
verses.jp_2: りゆけつくれば水がほしかろ

verses.en: In the minds of all of you, with what thoughts are you pondering over this talk?
verses.ro: kono hanashi mina ichiretsu no kokoro niwa   nanto omote shiyan shite iru
verses.jp_1: このはなしみな一れつの心にわ
verses.jp_2: なんとをもふてしやんしている

verses.en: Tsukihi desires first to help you in your needs. That is why I speak of all things whatever.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa daiichi kore o tasuketasa   sokode dono yona koto mo yu no ya
verses.jp_1: 月日にわ大一これをたすけたさ
verses.jp_2: そこでどのよな事もゆうのや

verses.en: No matter how Tsukihi tries to persuade you of all matters, no one listens to My words as the truth.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo Tsukihi ika hodo kudoitemo   makoto ni kiite kureru mono nashi
verses.jp_1: なにもかも月日いかほどくどいても
verses.jp_2: まことにきいてくれるものなし

verses.en: Therefore, the regret and anger of Tsukihi have piled up like a mountain.
verses.ro: soreyue ni Tsukihi no zanen rippuku ga   yamayama tsumori kasanarite aru
verses.jp_1: それゆへに月日のざねんりいふくが
verses.jp_2: 山／＼つもりかさなりてある

verses.en: Until now, as the month and day has not yet come, I have been keeping still.
verses.ro: imamade wa Tsukihi kitaran soreyue ni   jitto shite ita koto de aredomo
verses.jp_1: いまゝでわ月日きたらんそれゆへに
verses.jp_2: ぢいとしていた事であれども

verses.en: This time, as the time is pressing, I shall quickly begin any work whatever.
verses.ro: konotabi wa mo hi ga tsunde aru kara na   donna shigoto mo hayaku kakaru de
verses.jp_1: このたびわもふひがつんであるからな
verses.jp_2: とんなしごともはやくかゝるで

verses.en: Hereafter, on whatever path you may find yourself, never bear a grudge against others. Reproach yourself.
verses.ro: konosaki wa dono yona michi ga aru totemo   hito o uramina waga mi urami ya
verses.jp_1: このさきわどのよなみちがあるとても
verses.jp_2: 人をうらみなハがみうらみや

verses.en: This talk is not for a particular place. It is for the high mountains as well as for the low valleys.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doko no koto tomo yuwan de na   takayama nitemo tanisoko made mo
verses.jp_1: このはなしとこの事ともゆハんでな
verses.jp_2: 高山にてもたにそこまても

verses.en: Everything I say is from My desire to save you. That is the reason for My various and repeated persuasions.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o yu no mo tasuketasa   sokode iroiro kudoki tsumeta de
verses.jp_1: どのよふな事をゆうのもたすけたさ
verses.jp_2: そこていろ／＼くどきつめたで

verses.en: Hereafter, know that in whatever I say and in whatever matters, I say nothing evil.
verses.ro: konosaki wa nani o yutemo dono yona   koto demo ashiki koto wa yuwan de
verses.jp_1: このさきわなにをゆうてもとのよふな
verses.jp_2: 事でもあしき事わゆハんで

verses.en: The reason I admonished you step by step is only that I hasten for your true salvation.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no tasuke bakari o seku karani   sokode dandan iken shita no ya
verses.jp_1: しんぢつのたすけばかりをせくからに
verses.jp_2: そこでたん／＼いけんしたのや

verses.en: Once your mind has become truly purified, I shall quickly teach you the means to salvation.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni kokoro sumashita sono ue wa   tasukeru moyo hayaku oshieru
verses.jp_1: しんぢつに心すましたそのゆへわ
verses.jp_2: たすけるもよふはやくをしへる

verses.en: To explain what this salvation is about: it is the Service for the protection against smallpox.
verses.ro: kono tasuke doyu koto de aru naraba   hoso sen yono Mamori Tsutome o
verses.jp_1: このたすけどふゆう事であるならば
verses.jp_2: ほふそせんよのまむりつとめを

verses.en: Another salvation: I desire quickly to give you the Proof-Amulet that protects you from illness, death, and weakening.
verses.ro: mata tasuke yamazu shinazu ni yowaran no   Shoko Mamori o hayaku yaritai
verses.jp_1: またたすけやますしなずによハらんの
verses.jp_2: しよこまむりをはやくやりたい

verses.en: As I am hastening universal salvation, I shall work in all matters according to your mind.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo yorozu tasuke o seku karani   kokoro shidai ni donna koto demo
verses.jp_1: なにもかもよろづたすけをせくからに
verses.jp_2: 心したいにどんな事ても

verses.en: All humankind, everything depends on the heart of each of you. There is nothing that cannot be realized.
verses.ro: ichiretsu wa mina meme no mune shidai   donna koto oga kanawan de nashi
verses.jp_1: 一れつわみなめへ／＼のむねしだい
verses.jp_2: どんな事をがかなハんてなし

verses.en: About the prayer for rain, though God has not said anything yet in truth,
verses.ro: amagoi mo imamade Kami ga shinjitsu ni   nanimo yutaru koto wa nakeredo
verses.jp_1: あまごいもいまゝで神がしんぢつに
verses.jp_2: なにもゆうたる事わなけれど

verses.en: This time, if you come seeking to Me, I shall tell you all the truth of all matters.
verses.ro: konotabi wa dono yona koto mo shinjitsu o   tazune kuru nara mina yute kikasu
verses.jp_1: このたびハとのよな事もしんぢつを
verses.jp_2: たづねくるならみなゆてきかす

verses.en: Whatever it may be, Tsukihi will never say that it cannot be realized. It all depends on the mind of each of you.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa nani kanawan to yuwan de na   mina meme no kokoro shidai ya
verses.jp_1: 月日にハなにかなハんとゆハんてな
verses.jp_2: みなめへ／＼の心したいや

verses.en: Whatever you may dream, it is by Tsukihi. Whatever is said, also, is all by Tsukihi.
verses.ro: dono yona yume o miru no mo Tsukihi nari   nani o yu no mo mina Tsukihi ya de
verses.jp_1: どのよふなゆめをみるのも月日なり
verses.jp_2: なにをゆうのもみな月日やで

verses.en: The mind of Tsukihi hastens day after day, but the minds of you close to Me are only depressed.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori nichinichi kokoro sekikomedo   soba no kokoro wa izumu bakari de
verses.jp_1: 月日よりにち／＼心せきこめと
verses.jp_2: そばの心わいづむばかりで

verses.en: Why are you depressed? It is because those in high places know nothing.
verses.ro: izumu no mo doshite izumu koto naraba   kami niwa nanimo shiran yue nari
verses.jp_1: いつむのもどふしていつむ事ならば
verses.jp_2: 上にハなにもしらんゆへなり

verses.en: Unaware of this, the whole world follows them in all matters and is depressed.
verses.ro: sekai niwa sore o shirazu ni nani goto mo   mina shitagote izumi iru nari
verses.jp_1: せかいにハそれをしらすになに事も
verses.jp_2: みなしたこふていつみいるなり

verses.en: For Tsukihi, this is the greatest regret. That is why I do whatever things.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa daiichi kore ga zannen na   sokode dono yona koto mo suru no ya
verses.jp_1: 月日にわ大一これがさんねんな
verses.jp_2: そこでどのよな事もするのや

verses.en: The mind of Tsukihi hastens day after day, but I cannot tell of it in words, even should I so desire.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori nichinichi kokoro seta tote   kuchi dewa domu yu ni yuwaren
verses.jp_1: 月日よりにち／＼心せゑたとで
verses.jp_2: くちでわとふむゆうにゆハれん

verses.en: That is why I put the fragrance even into your dreams. Quickly ponder over it, please.
verses.ro: soreyue ni yume de nari tomo nioigake   hayaku shiyan o shite kureru yo
verses.jp_1: それゆへにゆめでなりともにをいがけ
verses.jp_2: はやくしやんをしてくれるよふ

verses.en: This regret of Tsukihi is not something that can be told in words.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa kono zannen to yu mono wa   kuchi de yu yona koto de nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: 月日にハこのざんねんとゆうものわ
verses.jp_2: くちてゆうよな事でないぞや

verses.en: Until today, in My talks on whatever matters, I have taught you various things step by step.
verses.ro: kyomade wa donna hanashi mo dandan to   iroiro toite kitaru naredomo
verses.jp_1: けふまでわどんなはなしもたん／＼と
verses.jp_2: いろ／＼といてきたるなれども

verses.en: But as the day of the appointed time has not yet come, you have seen nothing.
verses.ro: nani yu mo higara kokugen kitaran de   nanimo mietaru koto wa nai node
verses.jp_1: なにゆうもひがらこくけんきたらんで
verses.jp_2: なにもみゑたる事わないので

verses.en: That is why all of you doubt and erase by your words whatever Tsukihi says.
verses.ro: soreyue ni nani o Tsukihi ga yuta tote   mina utagote yuikesu bakari
verses.jp_1: それゆへになにを月日がゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: みなうたごふてゆいけすばかり

verses.en: For Tsukihi, this is the greatest regret. By all means, I shall clearly reveal what I have said.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa daiichi kore ga zannen na   nandemo kore o shikato arawasu
verses.jp_1: 月日にハ大一これがさんねんな
verses.jp_2: なんでもこれをしかとあらわす

verses.en: Though until now there was never a time that whatever I said was immediately seen,
verses.ro: imamade wa donna koto oba yuta tote   suguni mietaru koto wa nakeredo
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハどんな事をばゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: すぐにみゑたる事わなけれど

verses.en: This time, within three days, no one knows what you will hear in the talk of the world step by step.
verses.ro: konotabi wa mikka no uchi ni dandan to   sekai no hanashi nani o kiku yara
verses.jp_1: このたびわ三かのうちにたん／＼と
verses.jp_2: せかいのはなしなにをきくやら

verses.en: From now on, Tsukihi will work day after day. There is no knowing what work I shall do.
verses.ro: korekara wa nichinichi Tsukihi hataraku de   donna shigoto o suru ya shiren de
verses.jp_1: これからハにち／＼月日はたらくで
verses.jp_2: とんなしごとをするやしれんで

verses.en: Never think in the least that curses, demons, or evil spirits exist in this world.
verses.ro: kono yo ni kamai tsukimono bakemono mo   kanarazu aru to sarani omouna
verses.jp_1: このよふにかまいつきものばけものも
verses.jp_2: かならすあるとさらにをもうな

verses.en: I shall clear away all the regret of Tsukihi which has piled up mountainously until now.
verses.ro: imamade ni Tsukihi zannen yamayama to   tsumorite aru o mina harasu de na
verses.jp_1: いまゝでに月日ざんねん山／＼と
verses.jp_2: つもりてあるをみなはらすでな

verses.en: To explain how it will be cleared away: I, Tsukihi, shall do all that I intend.
verses.ro: kono harashi doshite harasu koto naraba   Tsukihi no kokoro mina shite miseru
verses.jp_1: このはらしどふしてはらす事ならば
verses.jp_2: 月日の心みなしてみせる

verses.en: Many days have passed since I began this world. Yet perhaps you do not know the truth of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: kyomade wa kono yo hajimete hi wa tatedo   Tsukihi shinjitsu mada shiromai na
verses.jp_1: けふまでハこのよはじめてひわたてど
verses.jp_2: 月日しんちつまだしろまいな

verses.en: Whatever is done, is done by Tsukihi. Whatever happens, know that it is not an illness.
verses.ro: dono yona koto demo Tsukihi suru koto ya   ikana koto demo yamai dewa nai
verses.jp_1: とのよふな事でも月日する事や
verses.jp_2: いかな事でもやまいでわない

verses.en: Whatever I do to the body, it is not an illness but the care of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: minouchi ni dono yona koto o shita totemo   yamai dewa nai Tsukihi teiri ya
verses.jp_1: みのうちにとのよな事をしたとても
verses.jp_2: やまいでわない月日ていりや

verses.en: The world is saying that it is cholera, but it is Tsukihi informing you of the regret.
verses.ro: sekai niwa korera to yute iru keredo   Tsukihi zannen shirasu koto nari
verses.jp_1: せかいにハこれらとゆうているけれど
verses.jp_2: 月日さんねんしらす事なり

verses.en: Everywhere in the world, people are the same: they only have depressed minds.
verses.ro: sekaiju doko no hito demo onaji koto   izumu bakari no kokoro naredomo
verses.jp_1: せかいぢうどこの人でもをなぢ事
verses.jp_2: いつむばかりの心なれとも

verses.en: From now on, firmly replace the mind and become the mind of joyousness.
verses.ro: korekara wa kokoro shikkari irekaete   yokizukume no kokoro naru yo
verses.jp_1: これからハ心しいかりいれかへて
verses.jp_2: よふきづくめの心なるよふ

verses.en: The reason Tsukihi began human beings was the desire to see you lead a joyous life.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa ningen hajime kaketa no wa   yokiyusan ga mitai yue kara
verses.jp_1: 月日にわにんけんはじめかけたのわ
verses.jp_2: よふきゆさんがみたいゆへから

verses.en: Because the world does not know this truth, everyone sinks only deeper into depression.
verses.ro: sekai niwa kono shinjitsu o shiran kara   mina dokomade mo izumu bakari de
verses.jp_1: せかいにハこのしんぢつをしらんから
verses.jp_2: みなどこまでもいつむはかりで

verses.en: Tsukihi desires to bring joyousness to all. If anyone dares to stop this, the regret will grow enormous.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori yokizukume to yu no o na   kore tometa nara zanen eronaru
verses.jp_1: 月日よりよふきづくめとゆうのをな
verses.jp_2: これとめたならさねんゑろなる

verses.en: I request you to understand this talk clearly and to ponder quickly.
verses.ro: kono hanashi dozo shikkari kikiwakete   hayaku shiyan o shite kureru yo
verses.jp_1: このはなしどふぞしいかりきゝハけて
verses.jp_2: はやくしやんをしてくれるよふ

verses.en: Until now, I taught you by the name Tsukihi, but from today I shall use another name.
verses.ro: imamade wa Tsukihi to yute toitaredo   mo kyokara wa namai kaeru de
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハ月日とゆうてといたれど
verses.jp_2: もふけふからハなまいかゑるで

verses.en: Until today, though the grand shrines and high mountains have thrived and done as they pleased,
verses.ro: kyomade wa taisha takayama habikarite   mamani shite ita koto de aredomo
verses.jp_1: けふまでハたいしや高山はびかりて
verses.jp_2: まゝにしていた事であれとも

verses.en: From now on, I, the Parent, shall do as I please instead. Defy Me and I shall give a return at once.
verses.ro: korekara wa Oya ga kawarite mamani suru   kore somuitara suguni kayasu de
verses.jp_1: これからわをやがかハりてまゝにする
verses.jp_2: これそむいたらすぐにかやすで

verses.en: Know that the regret of the Parent even before today has not been slight.
verses.ro: kyomade mo Oya no zanen to yu mono wa   chotto no koto dewa nai to omoe yo
verses.jp_1: けふまてもをやのさねんとゆうものわ
verses.jp_2: 一寸の事でわないとをもゑよ

verses.en: Yet at this time, the world is only rampant in all matters, knowing nothing.
verses.ro: konotabi mo mada sekai niwa nani goto mo   habikaru bakari nanimo shirazu ni
verses.jp_1: このたびもまだせかいにハなに事も
verses.jp_2: はびかるばかりなにもしらすに

verses.en: With you humans, also, your children are dear to you. Think of this and ponder, please.
verses.ro: ningen mo kodomo kawai de aro ga na   sore o omote shiyan shite kure
verses.jp_1: にんけんもこ共かわいであろをがな
verses.jp_2: それをふもをてしやんしてくれ

verses.en: Day after day, the concern of the Parent is only about the means to save you.
verses.ro: nichinichi ni Oya no shiyan to yu mono wa   tasukeru moyo bakari omoteru
verses.jp_1: にち／＼にをやのしやんとゆうものわ
verses.jp_2: たすけるもよふばかりをもてる

verses.en: Unaware of this, everyone in the world thinks that I am intending something evil.
verses.ro: sore shirazu mina sekaiju wa ichiretsu ni   nando ashiki no yoni omote
verses.jp_1: それしらすみなせかいぢうハ一れつに
verses.jp_2: なんとあしきのよふにをもふて

verses.en: In all matters, think well about the Parent's regret, always being opposed by My own children.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo Oya no zannen yoku omoe   kodomo bakari ni iken shirarete
verses.jp_1: なにもかもをやのさんねんよくをもへ
verses.jp_2: こ共はかりにいけんしられて

verses.en: From now on, as the Parent is revealed, I shall not take opposition from wherever it may come.
verses.ro: korekara wa donna tokoro no iken demo   Oya ga dete iru ukeru koto nashi
verses.jp_1: これからわどんなところのいけんでも
verses.jp_2: をやがでゝいるうける事なし

verses.en: This opposition: if anyone becomes rampant and directs it at Me, I shall withdraw at once.
verses.ro: kono iken dono yona mono ga habikarite   yu to omoeba suguni shirizoku
verses.jp_1: このいけんとのよなものがはひかりて
verses.jp_2: ゆふとをもゑばすぐにしりぞく

verses.en: Whatever I may work, I shall give you as much notice in advance as I possibly can.
verses.ro: dono yona shigoto suru nimo saki i yori   seeippai ni kotowarite oku
verses.jp_1: とのよふなしごとするにもさきいより
verses.jp_2: せへいゝはいにことわりてをく

verses.en: Until today, though you have been worrying about all matters day after day,
verses.ro: kyomade wa donna koto omo nichinichi ni   shinpai shitaru koto de aredomo
verses.jp_1: けふまてハどんな事をもにち／＼に
verses.jp_2: しんばいしたる事であれども

verses.en: From tomorrow on, whatever you see and whatever you hear will only give you delight.
verses.ro: asukara wa donna koto oba mita totemo   nani o kiite mo tanoshimi bakari
verses.jp_1: あすからわどんな事をばみたとても
verses.jp_2: なにをきいてもたのしみばかり
