verses.en: Though until this time the high mountains have given directives on every matter,
verses.ro: koremade wa takayama kara wa nanimo kamo   donna sashizu mo uketa naredomo
verses.jp_1: これまでハ高山からわなにもかも
verses.jp_2: どんなさしすもうけたなれとも

verses.en: Hereafter, it is the Parent who will direct. Nothing said against Me shall I ever accept.
verses.ro: konosaki wa dono yona koto o yuwaretemo   Oya no sashizu ya sarani uken de
verses.jp_1: このさきハとのよな事をゆハれても
verses.jp_2: をやのさしすやさらにうけんで

verses.en: Until now, as the day has not yet come, I have been keeping still on whatever matters.
verses.ro: imamade wa higara mo chitto kitaran de   donna koto demo jitto shite ita
verses.jp_1: いまゝでわひがらもちいときたらんで
verses.jp_2: とんな事てもちいとしていた

verses.en: But today, the time is fully pressing. I shall directly do whatever things as I intend.
verses.ro: mo kyo wa hi ga jubun ni tsunde aru   donna koto demo sono mamani suru
verses.jp_1: もふけふハひがぢうふんにつんである
verses.jp_2: とんな事でもそのまゝにする

verses.en: From now on, everything will be as the Parent intends. Just a word and it will be realized without fail.
verses.ro: korekara wa Oya no omou koto bakari   hito koto yueba kore chigawan de
verses.jp_1: これからハをやのをもふう事はかり
verses.jp_2: 一事ゆゑばこれちがわんで

verses.en: Throughout the world unto its farthest places, no one knows what will happen.
verses.ro: sekaiju ichiretsu wa mina dokomade mo   donna koto oga aru ya shiren de
verses.jp_1: せかいぢう一れつハみなとこまても
verses.jp_2: どんな事をがあるやしれんで

verses.en: Whatever may happen, there will be nothing to fear, depending on your mind of sincerity.
verses.ro: dono yona koto ga aritemo shinjitsu no   kokoro shidai ni kowai koto nashi
verses.jp_1: どのよふな事がありてもしんちつの
verses.jp_2: 心したいにこわい事なし

verses.en: If only the mind is purified completely, there will be nothing but delight in everything.
verses.ro: kokoro sai sukiyaka sunda koto naraba   donna koto demo tanoshimi bakari
verses.jp_1: 心さいすきやかすんたことならば
verses.jp_2: どんな事てもたのしみばかり

verses.en: If you are of mind to doubt this talk, beware of the paths you may come upon.
verses.ro: kono hanashi utagau kokoro aru naraba   shochi shite iyo donna michi yara
verses.jp_1: このはなしうたがう心あるならば
verses.jp_2: しよちしていよとんなみちやら

verses.en: Everyone throughout the world is a child dear to the Parent. There is no knowing what I may say out of My deep love for you.
verses.ro: sekaiju wa Oya no ta niwa mina kodomo   kawai amarite nani o yu yara
verses.jp_1: せかいぢうわをやのたあにハみなこ共
verses.jp_2: かわいあまりてなにをゆうやら

verses.en: In this world, whether it be in the high mountains or the low valleys, everyone is a child of Mine, the Parent.
verses.ro: kono sekai takayama nitemo tanisoko mo   Oya no ta niwa kodomo bakari ya
verses.jp_1: このせかい高山にてもたにそこも
verses.jp_2: をやのたにわこ共はかりや

verses.en: This time, by all means, I must have you know the mind of your true Parent.
verses.ro: konotabi wa nandemo kademo shinjitsu no   Oya no kokoro o shirashitai kara
verses.jp_1: このたびわなんてもかてもしんぢつの
verses.jp_2: をやの心をしらしたいから

verses.en: If only you have understood it clearly, your life will be filled with joy forever.
verses.ro: kore saika tashikani shochi shita naraba   itsu made ite mo yokizukume ya
verses.jp_1: これさいかたしかにしよちしたならば
verses.jp_2: いつまでいてもよふきつくめや

verses.en: Please become firmly convinced of this path. The Parent requests this of all humankind.
verses.ro: kono michi wa Oya ga tanomiya ichiretsu wa   dozo shikkari shochi shite kure
verses.jp_1: このみちハをやがたのみや一れつわ
verses.jp_2: どふそしいかりしよちしてくれ

verses.en: Though until today we have passed through every kind of path step by step,
verses.ro: kyomade mo dono yona michi mo dandan to   torinukete wa kitaru naredomo
verses.jp_1: けふまでもどのよなみちもたん／＼と
verses.jp_2: とふりぬけてわきたるなれども

verses.en: The path from now on will be entirely new and marvelous. If we pass through this path,
verses.ro: korekara no michi wa nandemo mezurashii   kono michi tori nuketa koto nara
verses.jp_1: これからのみちハなんてもめつらしい
verses.jp_2: このみちとふりぬけた事なら

verses.en: Then the mind of the Parent will spring forth spiritedly, and I shall begin any and every working.
verses.ro: sorekara wa Oya no kokoro ga isami dete   donna koto demo hajime kakeru de
verses.jp_1: それからハをやの心がいさみでゝ
verses.jp_2: とんな事でもはじめかけるで

verses.en: If only I begin the workings, everyone, whoever one may be, will lean on the Parent.
verses.ro: kore saika hajime kaketaru koto naraba   donna mono demo Oya ni motareru
verses.jp_1: これさいかはぢめかけたる事ならば
verses.jp_2: とんなものてもをやにもたれる

verses.en: I have been preparing to open this path, but perhaps no one is yet aware of it.
verses.ro: kono michi o tsukeyo tote ni shikoshirae   donna mono demo mada shiromai na
verses.jp_1: このみちをつけよふとてにしこしらゑ
verses.jp_2: とんなものてもまたしろまいな

verses.en: Now begin! In the course of this path from now on, no danger will come to anyone, whoever one may be.
verses.ro: sa kakare mo korekara no michisuji wa   donna mono demo abunaki wa nai
verses.jp_1: さあかゝれもふこれからのみちすじハ
verses.jp_2: とんなものでもあふなきわない

verses.en: Though until now I have brought anxiety to those within about various matters,
verses.ro: imamade wa uchi no mono nimo iroiro ni   shinpai kakete kitaru naredomo
verses.jp_1: いまゝでわうちのものにもいろ／＼に
verses.jp_2: しんばいかけてきたるなれども

verses.en: From tomorrow on, the Parent will go forth a step ahead of you and give a return for every matter.
verses.ro: asukara wa Oya ga ichihana deru hodoni   donna koto demo kayashi shite yaru
verses.jp_1: あすからハをやが一はなでるほとに
verses.jp_2: とんな事てもかやしゝてやる

verses.en: Today, you must explain My talks to others in detail step by step. The time has at last come.
verses.ro: sa kyo wa nanino hanashi mo dandan to   komakashiku yue mo setsu ya
verses.jp_1: さあけふわなにのはなしもだん／＼と
verses.jp_2: こまかしくゆへもふせへつうや

verses.en: There will be no understanding about anything unless you tell them. Tell them everything, all in detail.
verses.ro: nani nitemo yuwazu ni ite wa wakaran de   nanika isai o mina yute kikase
verses.jp_1: なにゝてもゆハすにいてハわからんで
verses.jp_2: なにかいさいをみなゆてきかせ

verses.en: Perhaps you do not know what this talk is about. Tell them all about the workings of the Parent.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nanino koto yara shiromai na   Oya no hataraki mina yute oke
verses.jp_1: このはなしなにの事やらしろまいな
verses.jp_2: をやのはたらきみなゆうてをけ

verses.en: Perhaps you do not know what My workings are. I shall make all minds in the world be revealed.
verses.ro: hataraki mo nanino koto yara shiromai na   sekai no kokoro mina arawasu de
verses.jp_1: はたらきもなにの事やらしろまいな
verses.jp_2: せかいの心みなあらわすで

verses.en: To explain how they are to be revealed: each of you will speak it by your own mouth.
verses.ro: kore oba na araware dasu to yu no mo na   meme no kuchi de mina yuikakeru
verses.jp_1: これをはなあらハれだすとゆうのもな
verses.jp_2: めゑめゑのくちでみなゆいかける

verses.en: Whatever kind of thing it may be, when you speak it by your own mouth, it may be impossible to deny.
verses.ro: dono yona koto demo waga mi kuchi i yori   yu koto naraba zehi wa arumai
verses.jp_1: どのよふな事てもわがみくちいより
verses.jp_2: ゆう事ならばぜひハあるまい

verses.en: From now on, even if each of you keeps silent, the Parent will enter you and make you begin to speak out.
verses.ro: korekara wa meme ni nanimo yuwai demo   Oya ga irikomi yute kakaru de
verses.jp_1: これからハめゑめになにもゆハいでも
verses.jp_2: をやが入こみゆうてかゝるで

verses.en: Hereafter, I shall truly begin to sweep clean the heart of everyone of you, whoever you may be.
verses.ro: konosaki wa donna mono demo shinjitsu ni   mune no soji o mina shite kakaru
verses.jp_1: このさきハどんなものでもしんちつに
verses.jp_2: むねのそふちをみなしてかゝる

verses.en: How do you think this sweeping is to be done? There is no knowing how I shall admonish you.
verses.ro: kono soji doshite suru to omou kana   donna iken o suru ya shiren de
verses.jp_1: このそふぢどふしてするとをもうかな
verses.jp_2: とんないけんをするやしれんで

verses.en: Whatever happens, do not worry. Everything that happens is an admonition by the Parent.
verses.ro: dono yona koto ga aritemo anjina yo   nanika yorozu wa Oya no iken ya
verses.jp_1: とのよふな事がありてもあんちなよ
verses.jp_2: なにかよろすわをやのいけんや

verses.en: No matter how I try to tell you the truth by words, there is no understanding. Oh, the regret of the Parent...
verses.ro: kuchi saki de nanbo shinjitsu yuta tote   kikiwake ga nai Oya no zannen
verses.jp_1: くちさきでなんぼしんぢつゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: きゝわけがないをやのさんねん

verses.en: Therefore, the Parent will enter the body. There is no knowing what I shall do.
verses.ro: soreyue ni Oya ga tainai irikonde   donna koto oba suru ya shiren de
verses.jp_1: それゆへにをやがたいない入こんで
verses.jp_2: とんな事をばするやしれんで

verses.en: However trying your condition may be, it is not an illness but the regret of the Parent.
verses.ro: dono yona setsunai koto ga aritemo na   yamai dewa nai Oya no zanen ya
verses.jp_1: とのよふなせつない事がありてもな
verses.jp_2: やまいでわないをやのさねんや

verses.en: I do not direct this talk at a particular place. You are all children of Mine, the Parent.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doko no koto tomo yuwan de na   Oya no ta niwa mina waga ko ya de
verses.jp_1: このはなしどこの事ともゆハんてな
verses.jp_2: をやのたあにわみなわがこやで

verses.en: When the regret of the true Parent comes out, perhaps no one knows the way to settle it.
verses.ro: shinjitsu no Oya no zannen deta naraba   kono osamekata tare mo shiromai
verses.jp_1: しんぢつのをやのさんねんでたならば
verses.jp_2: このをさめかたたれもしろまい

verses.en: But if you are truly sincere, I shall teach you everything whatever.
verses.ro: kore oba na makoto shinjitsu aru naraba   donna koto demo yute kikasuru
verses.jp_1: これをばなまことしんぢつあるならば
verses.jp_2: どんな事でもゆうてきかする

verses.en: There is no knowing what I shall say, but should you reject it, I shall withdraw at once.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o yu yara shiren de na   kore somuitara suguni shirizoku
verses.jp_1: どのよふな事をゆうやらしれんでな
verses.jp_2: これそむいたらすぐにしりぞく

verses.en: Until now, I was stopped from whatever I did. There was nothing but rejection.
verses.ro: koremade wa nani o shita tote tomerarete   somuku bakari no koto de aru kara
verses.jp_1: これまでハなにをしたとてとめられて
verses.jp_2: そむくばかりの事であるから

verses.en: Today, whatever I may do or whatever I may say, do not reject it.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa dono yona koto o shita totemo   nani o yutemo somuki naki yo
verses.jp_1: けふの日ハとのよな事をしたとても
verses.jp_2: なにをゆうてもそむきなきよふ

verses.en: I earnestly request you to take this path. The Parent assures you, so there is no need for worry.
verses.ro: kono michi wa kuregure tanomi oku hodoni   Oya ga hikiuke anji nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: このみちハくれ／＼たのみをくほとに
verses.jp_2: をやがひきうけあんぢないぞや

verses.en: Do not wonder what this is about. I need musical instruments for the Service quickly.
verses.ro: kono koto wa nanino koto ya to omouna yo   Tsutome narimono hayaku hoshii de
verses.jp_1: この事ハなにの事やとをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: つとめなりものはやくほしいで

verses.en: Now today, whatever you may do, you need not worry, for the Parent assures you.
verses.ro: mo kyo wa donna koto oba shita totemo   nanimo anjina Oya no ukeyai
verses.jp_1: もふけふわどんな事をばしたとても
verses.jp_2: なにもあんぢなをやのうけやい

verses.en: Until now, because they know nothing, those in high places have always forbidden and opposed Me.
verses.ro: imamade wa kami niwa nanimo shiran kara   sashitome bakari iken shitaredo
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハ上にわなにもしらんから
verses.jp_2: さしとめはかりいけんしたれど

verses.en: This time, no one will be able to stand against Me. From anyone who is of mind to defy, the Parent will withdraw!
verses.ro: konotabi wa donna mono demo kanawan de   yu kokoro nara Oya ga shirizoku
verses.jp_1: このたびハどんなものでもかなハんで
verses.jp_2: ゆう心ならをやがしりぞく

verses.en: On this matter, hasten to resolve your minds firmly and begin quickly.
verses.ro: kono koto o hayaku kokoro o shikkari to   sadame o tsukete hayaku kakare yo
verses.jp_1: この事をはやく心しいかりと
verses.jp_2: さだめをつけてはやくかゝれよ

verses.en: Hasten to prepare everything for the Service. Fear nothing, for the Parent gives you assurance.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo hayaku Tsutome no shikoshirae   Oya no ukeyai kowami nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: なにもかもはやくつとめのしこしらへ
verses.jp_2: をやのうけやいこわみないぞや

verses.en: On this matter, resolve your minds and ponder. I am in haste to assemble the performers.
verses.ro: kore oba na kokoro sadamete shiyan shite   hayaku ninju no moyo isogu de
verses.jp_1: これをはな心さだめてしやんして
verses.jp_2: はやくにんぢうのもよふいそぐで

verses.en: If you quickly unite your minds and do the Service correctly, the world will settle.
verses.ro: hayabaya to kokoro sorote shikkari to   Tsutome suru nara sekai osamaru
verses.jp_1: はや／＼と心そろをてしいかりと
verses.jp_2: つとめするならせかいをさまる

verses.en: Until today, I have been biding My time, refraining from speaking out on whatever matters.
verses.ro: kyomade wa nanino koto demo jikkuri to   yuwazu ni itaru koto de aredomo
verses.jp_1: けふまでわなにの事でもちいくりと
verses.jp_2: ゆハすにいたる事であれども

verses.en: But today, I shall speak out on any and every matter. Please think of the regret of the Parent.
verses.ro: mo kyo wa nandemo kademo yu hodoni   Oya no zannen kore omote kure
verses.jp_1: もふけふわなんでもかでもゆうほどに
verses.jp_2: をやのざんねんこれをもてくれ

verses.en: Until today, you have been thinking that whatever I said was from a human mind.
verses.ro: kyomade wa nani o yutemo ningen no   kokoro no yoni omote itaredo
verses.jp_1: けふまてハなにをゆうてもにんけんの
verses.jp_2: 心のよふにをもていたれど

verses.en: But now, whatever I may say, do not think in the least that I have a human mind.
verses.ro: sa ima wa nani o yutemo ningen no   kokoro aru towa sarani omouna
verses.jp_1: さあいまわなにをいうてもにんけんの
verses.jp_2: 心あるとハさらにをもうな

verses.en: You do not know what I shall say, but whatever I may say, please comply.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o yu yara shiren de na   nani o yutemo shochi shite kure
verses.jp_1: とのよふな事をゆうやらしれんでな
verses.jp_2: なにをゆうてもしよちしてくれ

verses.en: This time, whatever test I may put you through, resolve your mind firmly by it.
verses.ro: konotabi wa donna tameshi o suru yara na   kore de shikkari kokoro sadame yo
verses.jp_1: このたびハどんなためしをするやらな
verses.jp_2: これでしいかり心さだめよ

verses.en: I do not indicate anyone in particular by this talk. It is for each of you to resolve the mind.
verses.ro: kono hanashi tare ga koto tomo yuwan de na   mina meme no kokoro sadame ya
verses.jp_1: このはなしたれが事ともゆハんてな
verses.jp_2: みなめゑ／＼の心さだめや

verses.en: However trying your condition may be, the Parent will work to the utmost. Take heart!
verses.ro: ika hodoni setsunai koto ga aritemo na   Oya ga funbaru shochi shite iyo
verses.jp_1: いかほどにせつない事がありてもな
verses.jp_2: をやがふんばるしようちしていよ

verses.en: From now on, please be firmly convinced of the words of the Parent. There is no need to worry.
verses.ro: korekara wa Oya no yu koto shikkari to   shochi shite kure anji nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: これからハをやのゆう事しいかりと
verses.jp_2: しよちしてくれあんぢないぞや

verses.en: From tomorrow, the Parent will begin the workings. Perhaps there will be no one able to defy Me.
verses.ro: asukara wa Oya ga hataraki suru hodoni   donna mono demo somuki dekemai
verses.jp_1: あすからハをやがはたらきするほどに
verses.jp_2: どんなものでもそむきでけまい

verses.en: Forty-three years ago, the Parent became revealed and has been teaching even until now.
verses.ro: imamade mo yonju san nen izen kara   Oya ga araware hajime kaketa de
verses.jp_1: いまゝでも四十三ねんいせんから
verses.jp_2: をやがあらハれはじめかけたで

verses.en: Yet until today, despite My many regrets, I have been keeping still.
verses.ro: kyomade wa taite zanen mo iku tabi mo   jitto shite ita koto de aredomo
verses.jp_1: けふまてハたいてさねんもいくたびも
verses.jp_2: ちいとしていた事であれども

verses.en: Now today, though I have been holding back, the stomach of Tsukihi has burst open.
verses.ro: sa kyo wa Tsukihi no hara ga hajiketa de   shikaete itaru koto de aredomo
verses.jp_1: さあけふハ月日のはらがはぢけたで
verses.jp_2: しかゑていたる事であれども

verses.en: Until now, with the thought that you are neighbors, I have been quiet in restraint.
verses.ro: imamade wa mura ya to omote jikkuri to   mada osamarite itaru naredomo
verses.jp_1: いまゝでわ村やとをもてちいくりと
verses.jp_2: まだをさまりていたるなれとも

verses.en: But this time, I shall discern your mind, whoever you are, and begin to work at once.
verses.ro: konotabi wa dono yona kokoro iru mono mo   misadame tsukete suguni hataraku
verses.jp_1: このたびハとのよな心いるものも
verses.jp_2: みさだめつけてすぐにはたらく

verses.en: Though regret is so piled up within Me, I shall save all of you according to your minds.
verses.ro: kora hodoni zanen tsumorite aru keredo   kokoro shidai ni mina tasukeru de
verses.jp_1: こらほどにさねんつもりてあるけれど
verses.jp_2: 心しだいにみなたすけるで

verses.en: However high My regret is piled, I shall work, holding fast to the utmost.
verses.ro: ika hodoni zanen tsumorite aru totemo   funbari kirite hataraki o suru
verses.jp_1: いかほどにさねんつもりてあるとても
verses.jp_2: ふんばりきりてはたらきをする

verses.en: Today, there is no knowing what I may say. I shall reveal all the regret of the Parent.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa nani o yu yara shiren de na   Oya no zannen mina arawasu de
verses.jp_1: けふの日ハなにをゆうやらしれんでな
verses.jp_2: をやのざんねんみなあらわすで

verses.en: Though until now no one has known the truth of the human mind,
verses.ro: imamade wa hito no kokoro no shinjitsu o   shiritaru mono wa sarani nakeredo
verses.jp_1: いまゝでわ人の心のしんちつを
verses.jp_2: しりたるものハさらになけれど

verses.en: Now today, whoever you may be, I shall clearly reveal your true innermost heart.
verses.ro: sa kyo wa donna mono demo shinjitsu no   mune no uchi oba tashika arawasu
verses.jp_1: さあけふハどんなものでもしんちつの
verses.jp_2: むねのうちをばたしかあらハす

verses.en: If only it is revealed entirely, the sweeping of the heart will be accomplished of itself.
verses.ro: kore saika mina arawashita koto naraba   mune no soji ga hitori dekeru de
verses.jp_1: これさいかみなあらハした事ならば
verses.jp_2: むねのそふぢがひとりでけるで

verses.en: From today on, whatever talks I shall begin and whatever I shall say, please comply.
verses.ro: kyokara wa donna hanashi o shikaketemo   nani o yutemo shochi shite kure
verses.jp_1: けふからハとんなはなしをしかけても
verses.jp_2: なにをゆうてもしよちしてくれ

verses.en: There is no knowing what I shall say step by step. I shall carry out My intentions on whatever things.
verses.ro: dandan to nani o yu yara kore shiren   donna koto demo omowaku o suru
verses.jp_1: たん／＼となにをゆうやらこれしれん
verses.jp_2: とんな事てもをもわくをする

verses.en: From forty-three years ago until now, I have caused your leg torment. This is My worry.
verses.ro: imamade wa yonju-san nen izen kara   ashi o nayameta kore ga shinpai
verses.jp_1: いまゝてハ四十三ねんいせんから
verses.jp_2: あしをなやめたこれがしんはい

verses.en: This time, by all means, I shall restore it just as it was before.
verses.ro: konotabi wa nandemo kademo kore oba na   moto no tori ni shite kayasu de na
verses.jp_1: このたびハなんでもかでもこれをはな
verses.jp_2: もとのとふりにしてかやすでな

verses.en: In this talk, whatever Tsukihi may say concerning any matter, do not oppose it.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nani o Tsukihi ga yuta tote   donna koto demo somuki naki yo
verses.jp_1: このはなしなにを月日がゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: どんな事てもそむきなきよふ

verses.en: From now on, the Parent will request just one matter of you. I shall speak of nothing else.
verses.ro: korekara no Oya no tanomi wa kore bakari   hoka naru koto wa nanimo yuwan de
verses.jp_1: これからのをやのたのみハこればかり
verses.jp_2: ほかなる事わなにもゆハんで

verses.en: What do you think this request is? It is solely about the Service.
verses.ro: kono koto o nani o tanomu to omou kana   Tsutome ichijo no koto bakari ya de
verses.jp_1: この事をなにをたのむとをもうかな
verses.jp_2: つとめ一ぢよの事ばかりやで

verses.en: This Service is the beginning of this world. If only this is realized...
verses.ro: kono Tsutome kore ga kono yo no hajimari ya   kore sai kanota koto de aru nara
verses.jp_1: このつとめこれがこのよのはぢまりや
verses.jp_2: これさいかのた事であるなら

verses.en: Now today, you close to Me, let your minds not be opposed to the Parent's words on any matter.
verses.ro: sa kyo wa Oya no yu koto nani goto mo   soba no kokoro ni somuki naki yo
verses.jp_1: さあけふハをやのゆう事なに事も
verses.jp_2: そはの心にそむきなきよふ

verses.en: If the minds of you close to Me are in error, there will be no help. That is why I speak so repeatedly.
verses.ro: soba naru no kokoro chigaeba zehi ga nai   sokode kudokudo yute oku zo ya
verses.jp_1: そはなるの心ちがゑばぜひがない
verses.jp_2: そこでくど／＼ゆうてをくぞや

verses.en: Today, though there is yet no one in the world who knows any and everything,
verses.ro: kyonohi wa nani yono koto mo sekai niwa   shiritaru hito wa sarani nakeredo
verses.jp_1: けふの日ハなによの事もせかいにハ
verses.jp_2: しりたる人ハさらになけれど

verses.en: It is clearly seen in the eyes of the Parent. Perhaps no one is yet aware of what it might be.
verses.ro: Oya no me ni shikkari miete aru hodoni   donna koto yara tare mo shiromai
verses.jp_1: をやのめにしいかりみへてあるほどに
verses.jp_2: とんな事やらたれもしろまい

verses.en: It is solely about things unknown from the time I began this world until now.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimete kara ni imamade wa   tare demo shiranu koto bakari ya de
verses.jp_1: このよふをはじめてからにいまゝてハ
verses.jp_2: たれてもしらぬ事ばかりやで

verses.en: I desire to teach them to you. That is why I am doing all that I do step by step.
verses.ro: sono koto o oshietai kara dandan to   sokode dono yona koto mo suru no ya
verses.jp_1: その事をふしゑたいからたん／＼と
verses.jp_2: そこでとのよな事もするのや

verses.en: After telling you any and everything about all matters, the Parent will work.
verses.ro: nanimo kamo dono yona koto mo yute oite   sorekara Oya ga hataraki o suru
verses.jp_1: なにもかもとのよな事もゆてをいて
verses.jp_2: それからをやがはたらきをする

verses.en: You might not know what this working is. The whole universe is the body of the Parent.
verses.ro: hataraki mo donna koto yara shiromai na   sekaiju wa Oya no karada ya
verses.jp_1: はたらきもとんな事やらしろまいな
verses.jp_2: せかいちうハをやのからだや

verses.en: I desire that you know the regret of the Parent up to now. So at this time, I shall reveal all of it.
verses.ro: imamade no Oya no zannen shirashitasa   sokode konotabi mina shite miseru
verses.jp_1: いまゝてのをやのざんねんしらしたさ
verses.jp_2: そこでこのたびみなしてみせる

verses.en: There is no knowing what I am going to do. Take notice, each and everyone of you.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o suru yara shiren de na   mina ichiretsu wa shochi shite iyo
verses.jp_1: とのよふな事をするやらしれんてな
verses.jp_2: みな一れつハしよちしていよ

verses.en: What are all of you thinking of this talk about My regret and appeals at this time?
verses.ro: konotabi no zanen kudoki no kono hanashi   mina ichiretsu wa nanto omoteru
verses.jp_1: このたびのさねんくときのこのはなし
verses.jp_2: みな一れつわなんとをもてる

verses.en: The origin of it is forty-three years ago. It is then that I began a great test.
verses.ro: kono moto wa yonju san nen izen kara   erai tameshi ga kakete aru zo ya
verses.jp_1: このもとわ四十三ねんいぜんから
verses.jp_2: ゑらいためしがかけてあるぞや

verses.en: If only this matter is clearly understood, there will be nothing that cannot be realized.
verses.ro: kore saika shikkari shochi shita naraba   donna koto oga kanawan de nashi
verses.jp_1: これさいかしいかりしよちしたならば
verses.jp_2: とんな事をがかなわんでなし

verses.en: As I desire to save all people of the whole world, this test is of great importance.
verses.ro: sekaiju o mina ichiretsu o tasuketasa   sokode tameshi ga erai koto ya de
verses.jp_1: せかいちうをみな一れつをたすけたさ
verses.jp_2: そこでためしがゑらい事やで

verses.en: Until today, while going through every kind of path, I have been keeping still.
verses.ro: kyomade wa dono yona michi mo torinuke   jitto shite ita koto de aredomo
verses.jp_1: けふまでわとのよなみちもとふりぬけ
verses.jp_2: ぢいとしていた事であれども

verses.en: Now at last, I shall stop at nothing in beginning to reveal the truth. Be aware of it, all of you.
verses.ro: mo kyo wa nandemo kademo shinjitsu o   shite kakaru de na shochi shite iyo
verses.jp_1: もふけふハなんでもかでもしんぢつを
verses.jp_2: してかゝるでなしよちしていよ

verses.en: The path will change entirely from what it has been until now. All of you, settle your minds.
verses.ro: imamade to michi ga korori to kawaru de na   mina ichiretsu wa kokoro sadame yo
verses.jp_1: いまゝでとみちがころりとかハるでな
verses.jp_2: みな一れつわ心さためよ

verses.en: This path does not discriminate between those within and the others. It is to sweep the heart of everyone in the world.
verses.ro: kono michi wa uchi mo sekai mo hedate nai   sekaiju no mune no soji ya
verses.jp_1: このみちハうちもせかいもへたてない
verses.jp_2: せかいちううのむねのそふぢや

verses.en: From the time I began this world until today, I have not yet told the real truth.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimete karani kyomade wa   honshinjitsu o yuta koto nashi
verses.jp_1: このよふをはじめてからにけふまでわ
verses.jp_2: ほんしんぢつをゆうた事なし

verses.en: Today, I shall begin to tell you the real truth. Please understand it clearly.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa honshinjitsu o yuikakeru   dozo shikkari shochi shite kure
verses.jp_1: けふの日ハほんしんちつをゆいかける
verses.jp_2: とふぞしいかりしよちしてくれ

verses.en: This talk is solely about the great test from forty-three years ago.
verses.ro: kono hanashi yonju san nen izen kara   erai tameshi ga kore ga ichijo
verses.jp_1: このはなし四十三ねんいせんから
verses.jp_2: ゑらいためしがこれが一ちよ

verses.en: What do you think this test is about? It is solely about the preparations to hasten the Service.
verses.ro: kono tameshi nanino koto ya to omou kana   Tsutome ichijo seku moyo ya de
verses.jp_1: このためしなにの事やとをもうかな
verses.jp_2: つとめ一ぢよせくもよふやで

verses.en: What do you think about this Service? Prepare for the performers including the musical instruments.
verses.ro: kono Tsutome doyu koto ni omou kana   narimono irete ninju no moyo
verses.jp_1: このつとめどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp_2: なりもの入て人ちうのもよふ

verses.en: Ponder over this Service, whoever you are. If you dare to stop it, your life will be stopped.
verses.ro: kono Tsutome donna mono demo shiyan seyo   kore tometa nara waga mi tomaru de
verses.jp_1: このつとめどんなものでもしやんせよ
verses.jp_2: これとめたならわがみとまるで

verses.en: It is the same as the way I began this world. I began human beings that never existed.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajime kaketa mo onaji koto   nai ningen o hajime kaketa de
verses.jp_1: このよふをはじめかけたもをなぢ事
verses.jp_2: ないにんけんをはちめかけたで

verses.en: If only this is begun, I shall assure you any salvation whatever.
verses.ro: kore saika hajime kaketaru koto naraba   donna tasuke mo mina ukeyau de
verses.jp_1: これさいかはじめかけたる事ならば
verses.jp_2: とんなたすけもみなうけやうで

verses.en: You must clearly understand this matter. If it is stopped, I shall withdraw at once.
verses.ro: kono koto wa shikkari shochi sen naran   kore tometa nara suguni shirizoku
verses.jp_1: この事ハしいかりしよちせんならん
verses.jp_2: これとめたならすくにしりぞく

verses.en: Until now, the high mountains, boastful, have noisily done as they pleased.
verses.ro: imamade wa takayama ya tote kenken to   mamani shite ita koto de aredomo
verses.jp_1: いまゝてハ高山やとてけん／＼と
verses.jp_2: まゝにしていた事てあれども

verses.en: From now on, however high the mountains may be, they will never be able to do as they please to the low valleys.
verses.ro: korekara wa ika hodo takai yama demo na   tanisoko mamani sarani dekemai
verses.jp_1: これからハいかほどたかい山でもな
verses.jp_2: たにそこまゝにさらにてけまい

verses.en: I see many useful timbers ahead, appearing in the low valleys step by step.
verses.ro: konosaki wa tanisoko nitewa dandan to   oku yoki ga miete aru zo ya
verses.jp_1: このさきわたにそこにてハだん／＼と
verses.jp_2: をふくよふきがみゑてあるぞや

verses.en: Step by step, the Parent, who began this universe, will enter these useful timbers.
verses.ro: dandan to yoboku nitewa kono yo o   hajimeta Oya ga mina irikomu de
verses.jp_1: たん／＼とよふぼくにてハこのよふを
verses.jp_2: はしめたをやがみな入こむで

verses.en: When the Parent, who began this universe, enters them, there is no knowing what I shall do.
verses.ro: kono yo o hajimeta Oya ga irikomeba   donna koto oba suru ya shiren de
verses.jp_1: このよふをはじめたをやか入こめば
verses.jp_2: どんな事をばするやしれんで

verses.en: Whatever I do, do not worry. Any and everything is assured by the Parent.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o shita tote anjina yo   nanika yorozu wa Oya no ukeyai
verses.jp_1: とのよふな事をしたとてあんぢなよ
verses.jp_2: なにかよろつわをやのうけやい

verses.en: Quickly settle this matter firmly in your mind and hasten to begin.
verses.ro: kono koto o hayaku kokoro o shikkari to   sadame o tsukete hayaku kakare yo
verses.jp_1: この事をはやく心をしいかりと
verses.jp_2: さだめをつけてはやくかゝれよ

verses.en: Until today, there has been no one who has known what kind of a path this is.
verses.ro: kyomade wa donna michi yara tare nitemo   shiritaru mono wa sarani nakeredo
verses.jp_1: けふまてハどんなみちやらたれにても
verses.jp_2: しりたるものハさらになけれど

verses.en: Now at last, I shall fully reveal the mind's core step by step. Take notice!
verses.ro: mo kyo wa shin no kokoro o dandan to   mina arawasu de shochi shite iyo
verses.jp_1: もふけふハしんのこころをたん／＼と
verses.jp_2: みなあらわすでしよちしていよ

verses.en: Those who are acceptable in the eyes of the Parent will grow only more spirited step by step and day by day.
verses.ro: Oya no me ni kanota mono wa nichinichi ni   dandan kokoro isamu bakari ya
verses.jp_1: をやのめにかのふたものハにち／＼に
verses.jp_2: だん／＼心いさむばかりや

verses.en: Those who are regrettable in the eyes of the Parent may be gone in a moment as in a dream.
verses.ro: Oya no me ni zanen no mono wa nandoki ni   yume mita yoni chiru ya shiren de
verses.jp_1: をやのめにさねんのものハなんときに
verses.jp_2: ゆめみたよふにちるやしれんで

verses.en: By this talk, I do not indicate any particular place. All people in the world are My own children.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doko no koto tomo yuwan de na   sekaiju wa mina waga ko ya de
verses.jp_1: このはなしとこの事ともゆハんでな
verses.jp_2: せかいちううハみなわがこやで

verses.en: All children in the world are equally dear to Me. Though there is no discrimination whatsoever,
verses.ro: ichiretsu no kodomo wa kawai bakari nari   doko ni hedate wa sarani nakeredo
verses.jp_1: 一れつのこどもハかわいばかりなり
verses.jp_2: とこにへたてわさらになけれど

verses.en: Listen! There will be no help if your mind is in error. That is why I am giving you My care step by step.
verses.ro: shikato kike kokoro chigaeba zehi ga nai   sokode dandan teiri suru no ya
verses.jp_1: しかときけ心ちがゑばせひがない
verses.jp_2: そこでだん／＼ていりするのや

verses.en: On this matter, you on the high mountains as well as in the low valleys, set your mind so as not to be unaware.
verses.ro: kono koto wa takayama nitemo tanisoko mo   yudan naki yoni kokoro sadame yo
verses.jp_1: この事ハ高山にてもたにそこも
verses.jp_2: ゆだんなきよに心さだめよ

verses.en: Now a request. What do you think I request? Quickly assemble the musical instruments and begin practice.
verses.ro: sa tanomu nani o tanomu to omou kana   hayaku narimono yosete keiko
verses.jp_1: さあたのむなにをたのむとをもうかな
verses.jp_2: はやくなりものよせてけいこふ

verses.en: Though until this time I have continued to keep still on whatever matters,
verses.ro: koremade wa donna koto demo jikkuri to   mada osamarite itaru naredomo
verses.jp_1: これまてハとんな事てもちいくりと
verses.jp_2: またをさまりていたるなれども

verses.en: Now today, by all means, you must quickly do the Service.
verses.ro: mo kyo wa nandemo kademo hayabaya to   Tsutome seneba naran koto ya de
verses.jp_1: もふけふわなんてもかてもはや／＼と
verses.jp_2: つとめせゑねばならん事やで

verses.en: Though until now I have made requests of you in various matters step by step,
verses.ro: imamade wa donna koto demo dandan to   iroiro tanomi kakete aredomo
verses.jp_1: いまゝてハどんな事でもたん／＼と
verses.jp_2: いろ／＼たのみかけてあれとも

verses.en: Whatever I request, no one understands. Oh, the regret of the Parent...
verses.ro: nani goto o tanonda totemo tare nitemo   kikiwake ga nai Oya no zannen
verses.jp_1: なに事をたのんだとてもたれにても
verses.jp_2: きゝわけがないをやのさんねん

verses.en: Please clearly understand this talk about My regret and appeals at this time.
verses.ro: konotabi no zanen kudoki no kono hanashi   dozo shikkari kikiwakete kure
verses.jp_1: このたびのざねんくどきのこのはなし
verses.jp_2: とふぞしいかりきゝわけてくれ

verses.en: Today, whatever the Parent may say concerning any matter, do not oppose it.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa Oya ga nani goto yuta tote   donna koto demo somuki naki yo
verses.jp_1: けふの日ハをやがなに事ゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: どんな事でもそむきなきよふ

verses.en: Until now, whatever talks I gave and whatever I said were but a fragrance.
verses.ro: imamade wa donna hanashi o shita totemo   nani o yutemo nioi bakari ya
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハどんなはなしをしたとても
verses.jp_2: なにをゆうてもにをいはかりや

verses.en: But My talks today are in the fullness of time. Everything I say will be seen at once.
verses.ro: kyonohi no hanashi to yu wa setsu ya   mo sono mamani suguni mieru de
verses.jp_1: けふの日のはなしとゆうハせへつうや
verses.jp_2: もふそのまゝにすぐにみへるで

verses.en: This talk is that, now, I shall clear away the regret piling in My heart for forty-three years.
verses.ro: kono hanashi yonju san nen izen kara   mune no zannen ima harasu de na
verses.jp_1: このはなし四十三ねんいせんから
verses.jp_2: むねのざんねんいまはらすてな

verses.en: Unaware of this, those of you within are thinking of everything as being worldly common.
verses.ro: sore shirazu uchi naru mono wa nanimo kamo   sekainami naru yoni omote
verses.jp_1: それしらすうちなるものハなにもかも
verses.jp_2: せかいなみなるよふにをもふて

verses.en: This path has truly been a path of hardship for forty-three years.
verses.ro: kono michi wa yonju san nen izen kara   makoto nanju na michi o torita
verses.jp_1: このみちハ四十三ねんいせんから
verses.jp_2: まことなんぢうなみちをとふりた

verses.en: Though no one has known of it until now, this time I shall clear it all away.
verses.ro: sono koto o imamade tare mo shirai demo   konotabi kore o mina harasu de na
verses.jp_1: その事をいまゝでたれもしらいでも
verses.jp_2: このたびこれをみなはらすでな

verses.en: To explain how it will be cleared away: I shall reveal everything solely by the Service.
verses.ro: kono harashi doshite harasu koto naraba   Tsutome ichijo de mina arawasu de
verses.jp_1: このはらしどふしてはらす事ならば
verses.jp_2: つとめ一ぢよてみなあらハすで

verses.en: As to this Service, whatever the Parent may say about any matter, do not oppose it.
verses.ro: kono Tsutome Oya ga nani goto yuta tote   donna koto demo somuki naki yo
verses.jp_1: このつとめをやがなに事ゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: とんな事てもそむきなきよふ

verses.en: I request you earnestly, especially in this matter, so you will not be remorseful later.
verses.ro: kore bakari kuregure tanomi oku hodoni   ato de kokwai naki yoni ya de
verses.jp_1: こればかりくれ／＼たのみをくほとに
verses.jp_2: あとでこふくハいなきよふにやで

verses.en: If anyone dares to stop this Service, I shall withdraw even from the proxy at once.
verses.ro: konotabi no Tsutome ichijo tomeru nara   myodai nari to suguni chirizoku
verses.jp_1: この度のつとめ一ちよとめるなら
verses.jp_2: みよだいなりとすぐにしりぞく

verses.en: You close to Me, what are you thinking about this talk? I cannot wait even for a breath.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nanto omote soba na mono   mo hitoiki mo machite iraren
verses.jp_1: このはなしなんとをもふてそはなもの
verses.jp_2: もふひといきもまちていられん

verses.en: Quickly begin to bring out the musical instruments at least. I am hastening solely for the Service.
verses.ro: hayabaya to narimono nari to dashikake yo   Tsutome bakari o sete iru kara
verses.jp_1: はや／＼となりものなりとたしかけよ
verses.jp_2: つとめはかりをせへているから

verses.en: Until now, perhaps no one has known about the origin of human beings at the beginning of this world.
verses.ro: imamade wa kono yo hajimeta ningen no   moto naru koto o tare mo shiromai
verses.jp_1: いまゝてハこのよはじめたにんけんの
verses.jp_2: もとなる事をたれもしろまい

verses.en: At this time, by all means, I wish to teach everything about this origin clearly to the world.
verses.ro: konotabi wa kono moto naru o shikkari to   dozo sekai e mina oshietai
verses.jp_1: このたびわこのもとなるをしいかりと
verses.jp_2: とふぞせかいゑみなをしゑたい

verses.en: The origin is performed by two members of the Kagura. Truly, this is the beginning of this world.
verses.ro: kono moto wa Kagura ryonin Tsutome wa na   kore ga shinjitsu kono yo hajimari
verses.jp_1: このもとハかぐらりよにんつとめハな
verses.jp_2: これがしんぢつこのよはしまり

verses.en: What is called the Kagura this time is the Parent who began human beings.
verses.ro: konotabi no Kagura to yu wa ningen o   hajime kaketaru Oya de aru zo ya
verses.jp_1: このたびのかぐらというハにんけんを
verses.jp_2: はじめかけたるをやであるぞや

verses.en: There being no one who knows this origin, I shall teach you all of this truth.
verses.ro: kono moto o shiritaru mono wa nai node na   kono shinjitsu o mina oshieru de
verses.jp_1: このもとをしりたるものハないのてな
verses.jp_2: このしんぢつをみなをしゑるで

verses.en: Though even until now I have tried to persuade you day after day and to teach you step by step,
verses.ro: imamade mo nichinichi kudoki dandan to   yute kikashita koto wa aredomo
verses.jp_1: いまゝてもにち／＼くときたん／＼と
verses.jp_2: ゆうてきかした事ハあれとも

verses.en: And yet today, no matter how Tsukihi strives to teach, there is no understanding in the minds of all.
verses.ro: mo kyo wa ika hodo Tsukihi yuta tote   ichiretsu kokoro wakari nai node
verses.jp_1: もふけふハいかほど月日ゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: 一れつ心わかりないので

verses.en: Therefore, as the time has already come, I must now give you a return.
verses.ro: soreyue ni mo setsu ga kitaru kara   zehi naku ima wa kayashi suru zo ya
verses.jp_1: それゆへにもふせへつうがきたるから
verses.jp_2: せひなくいまわかやしするぞや

verses.en: Do not think this return is a small matter. It will appear here and there in a great number.
verses.ro: kono kayashi chotto no koto towa omouna yo   atchi kotchi ni oku mieru de
verses.jp_1: このかやし一寸の事とハをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: あゝちこゝちにをふくみゑるで

verses.en: There is perhaps no one anywhere, still, who knows the origin of human beginnings in this world.
verses.ro: kono yo no ningen hajime moto naru o   doko no hito demo mada shiromai na
verses.jp_1: このよふのにんけんはじめ元なるを
verses.jp_2: どこの人でもまだしろまいな

verses.en: This time, by all means, I wish to teach all of this truth clearly to the entire world.
verses.ro: konotabi wa kono shinjitsu o sekaiju e   dozo shikkari mina oshietai
verses.jp_1: このたびハこのしんちつをせかへぢうへ
verses.jp_2: どふぞしいかりみなをしゑたい

verses.en: Listen! This origin is the venerable Kunitokotachi and Omotari.
verses.ro: shikato kike kono moto naru to yu no wa na   Kunitokotachi ni Omotari sama ya
verses.jp_1: しかときけこのもとなるとゆうのハな
verses.jp_2: くにとこたちにをもたりさまや

verses.en: After looking through the muddy waters, these personages drew a fish and a serpent to them.
verses.ro: kono okata doromizu naka o misumashite   uo to mii to o soba i hikiyose
verses.jp_1: このをかたどろみづなかをみすまして
verses.jp_2: うをとみいとをそばいひきよせ

verses.en: This time, My regret is at the heart's core. Is there not a means to clear it away?
verses.ro: konotabi no zanen to yu wa shin kara ya   kore o harasuru noyo nai kayo
verses.jp_1: このたびのざねんとゆうわしんからや
verses.jp_2: これをはらするもよふないかよ

verses.en: Of this matter, God will firmly take charge. Know that I shall give every kind of return.
verses.ro: kono koto o Kami ga shikkari hikiukeru   donna kayashi mo suru to omoe yo
verses.jp_1: このことを神がしいかりひきうける
verses.jp_2: どんなかやしもするとをもゑよ

verses.en: When this return is seen, the heart of everyone in the world will be swept clean of its own accord.
verses.ro: kono kayashi mietaru naraba dokomade mo   mune no soji ga hitori dekeru de
verses.jp_1: このかやしみへたるならばどこまでも
verses.jp_2: むねのそふぢがひとりでけるで

verses.en: Though until now I have been keeping still, overlooking every kind of thing,
verses.ro: imamade wa dono yona koto mo miyurushite   jitto shite ita koto de aredomo
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハとのよな事をみゆるして
verses.jp_2: ちいとしていた事であれども

verses.en: Now, as the day is pressing, I shall give a return for all things at once.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa mo hi ga tsunde aru kara na   donna koto demo suguni kayasu de
verses.jp_1: けふの日わもふひがつんであるからな
verses.jp_2: とんな事でもすぐにかやすで

verses.en: If anyone comes here with a mind to stop Me, there is no knowing where Tsukihi will at once appear.
verses.ro: kono tokoro tomeru kokoro de kuru naraba   sono mama doko i Tsukihi deru yara
verses.jp_1: このところとめる心でくるならば
verses.jp_2: そのまゝとこい月日でるやら

verses.en: You may not know what My appearance means. Tsukihi will appear to take him away. Beware.
verses.ro: deru no mo na donna koto yara shiromai na   Tsukihi mukai ni deru de shochi se
verses.jp_1: てるのもなどんな事やらしろまいな
verses.jp_2: 月日むかいにでるでしよちせ

verses.en: Today, the time is fully pressing. There is no knowing what kinds of paths there will be.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa mo jubun ni tsunde aru   dono yona michi ga aru ya shiren de
verses.jp_1: けふの日ハもふぢうふんにつんてある
verses.jp_2: とのよなみちがあるやしれんで

verses.en: Be aware, all of you throughout the world. There is no knowing when Tsukihi will appear to take you.
verses.ro: sekaiju mina ichiretsu wa shikato seyo   nandoki Tsukihi tsureni deru yara
verses.jp_1: せかいぢうみな一れつハしかとせよ
verses.jp_2: なんとき月日つれにてるやら

verses.en: Today, I shall begin to tell you of a marvelous thing. No one knows what I shall say.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa mezurashi koto o yuikakeru   nani o yu tomo tare mo shiromai
verses.jp_1: けふの日ハめづらし事をゆいかける
verses.jp_2: なにをゆうともたれもしろまい

verses.en: Everywhere in the world, people are alike: you prepare to marry off your children.
verses.ro: sekai niwa mina dokomade mo onaji koto   kodomo katazuke koshirae o suru
verses.jp_1: せかいにハみなとこまてもをなし事
verses.jp_2: 子共かたずけこしらゑをする

verses.en: But no matter how well you prepare, no one knows what the future might be.
verses.ro: ika hodoni koshirae shita to yuta tote   sonosaki naru wa tare mo shiromai
verses.jp_1: いかほどにこしらゑしたとゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: そのさきなるわたれもしろまい

verses.en: Whatever intention Tsukihi may have, there is no one who knows the course of its path.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa donna omowaku aru yara na   kono michisuji wa shirita mono nashi
verses.jp_1: 月日にわどんなをもハくあるやらな
verses.jp_2: このみちすじハしりたものなし

verses.en: There is no knowing what you may see in a dream. Hereafter, things will change and your mind will be spirited.
verses.ro: konosaki wa dono yona yume o miru yara na   monku kawarite kokoro isamu de
verses.jp_1: このさきハとのよなゆめをみるやらな
verses.jp_2: もんくかハりて心いさむで

verses.en: You may dream of marvelous things. Take it as a sign to begin the Service.
verses.ro: dono yona mezurashi yume o miru yara na   kore o aizu ni Tsutome ni kakare
verses.jp_1: とのよふなめづらしゆめをみるやらな
verses.jp_2: これをあいつにつとめにかゝれ

verses.en: Today, you have heard Me on any and every matter. At any moment, things will change.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa dono yona koto mo kiite iru   nandoki monku kawaru koto yara
verses.jp_1: けふの日ハとのよな事もきいている
verses.jp_2: なんどきもんくかわる事やら

verses.en: Whatever may happen, bear no grudge. It is all what you have done to yourselves.
verses.ro: dono yona koto ga aritemo uramina yo   mina meme ni suru koto ya de na
verses.jp_1: とのよふな事がありてもうらみなよ
verses.jp_2: みなめゑ／＼にする事やでな

verses.en: To Tsukihi, all of you equally are children of Mine. Though love for you fills My thoughts,
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa mina ichiretsu wa waga ko nari   kawai ippai omote iredomo
verses.jp_1: 月日にわみな一れつハわが子なり
verses.jp_2: かハいいゝはいをもていれども

verses.en: There can be no help for what each of you has done self-centeredly. I can only look on caringly.
verses.ro: meme ni suru koto bakari zehi wa nai   sokode jikkuri mite iru no ya de
verses.jp_1: めへ／＼にする事ばかりせひハない
verses.jp_2: そこでちいくりみているのやで

verses.en: Though today you know nothing at all, look toward the morrow. A great broad path will open.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa nanimo shirazu ni iru keredo   asunichi o miyo erai okwan
verses.jp_1: けふの日ハなにもしらすにいるけれど
verses.jp_2: あすにちをみよゑらいをふかん

verses.en: When this path comes to be seen, there will be no one able to stand against Me.
verses.ro: kono michi ga mietaru naraba dono yona   mono demo kanau mono wa arumai
verses.jp_1: このみちがみへたるならばとのよふな
verses.jp_2: ものでもかなうものわあるまい

verses.en: Whatever intent Tsukihi may have, there is perhaps no one who knows this mind.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa donna omowaku aru yara na   kono kokoro oba tare mo shiromai
verses.jp_1: 月日にハどんなをもハくあるやらな
verses.jp_2: この心をばたれもしろまい

verses.en: When it begins to be seen, the innermost heart of you everywhere will be purified of its own accord.
verses.ro: kore oba na miekaketa nara dokomade mo   mune no uchi oba hitori sumikiru
verses.jp_1: これをばなみへかけたならとこまでも
verses.jp_2: むねのうちをばひとりすみきる

verses.en: From now on, I shall speak solely about all things unknown since this world began.
verses.ro: korekara wa kono yo hajimete nanimo kamo   nai koto bakari yuikakeru nari
verses.jp_1: これからハこのよはじめてなにもかも
verses.jp_2: ない事ばかりゆいかけるなり

verses.en: Though until now no one has known the truth of the human mind,
verses.ro: imamade wa hito no kokoro no shinjitsu o   tare ka shiritaru mono wa nakeredo
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハ人の心のしんちつを
verses.jp_2: たれかしりたるものハなけれど

verses.en: This time, as God is openly revealed, I shall teach you everything about all matters.
verses.ro: konotabi wa Kami ga omote i deteru kara   donna koto demo mina oshieru de
verses.jp_1: このたびハ神がをもていでゝるから
verses.jp_2: どんな事でもみなをしゑるで

verses.en: I do not indicate anyone in particular by this talk. I shall give notice through bodily disorders.
verses.ro: kono hanashi doko no koto tomo yuwan de na   minouchi sawari kore de shirasuru
verses.jp_1: このはなしとこの事ともゆハんてな
verses.jp_2: みのうちさハりこれでしらする

verses.en: Do not wonder why I say such things. I speak out of My deep love for you.
verses.ro: konna koto nande yu ya to omouna yo   kawai amarite yu koto ya de na
verses.jp_1: こんな事なんでゆうやとをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: かわいあまりてゆう事やでな

verses.en: Whatever you may do, there is nothing which is unknown to God.
verses.ro: dono yona koto demo waga mi suru koto ni   Kami no shiran to yu koto wa nai
verses.jp_1: どのよふな事でもわがみする事に
verses.jp_2: 神のしらんとゆう事わない

verses.en: Therefore, I shall give you notice of everything beforehand, and then begin My work.
verses.ro: soreyue ni nanimo yorozu o kotowarite   sono ue kakaru shigoto naru zo ya
verses.jp_1: それゆへになにもよろづをことハりて
verses.jp_2: そのゆゑかゝるしことなるぞや

verses.en: Though until now I have been patiently holding back in whatever matters,
verses.ro: imamade wa nani yono koto mo jikkuri to   shikaete itaru koto de aredomo
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハなによの事もぢいくりと
verses.jp_2: しかゑていたることであれども

verses.en: Now hear Me! Until now, you have only listened to what I said in My talks.
verses.ro: shikato kike imamade naru no hanashi wa na   nani o yutemo kiita bakari ya
verses.jp_1: しかときけいまゝでなるのはなしハな
verses.jp_2: なにをゆうてもきいたばかりや

verses.en: But today, as I am hastening the path, all things will quickly appear.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa michi ga isoide iru kara na   donna koto demo hayaku mieru de
verses.jp_1: けふの日ハみちがいそいでいるからな
verses.jp_2: どんな事てもはやくみへるで

verses.en: Once they begin to appear, it will be too late. Therefore, all of you must ponder.
verses.ro: soreyue ni dekakete kara wa domunaran   sokode ichiretsu shiyan suru yo
verses.jp_1: それゆへにでかけてからハとむならん
verses.jp_2: そこで一れつしやんするよふ

verses.en: Though even until now God has tried to persuade you by teaching you various things step by step,
verses.ro: imamade mo Kami no kudoki wa dandan to   iroiro toite kitaru naredomo
verses.jp_1: いまゝでも神のくどきわたん／＼と
verses.jp_2: いろ／＼といてきたるなれとも

verses.en: However earnestly I appeal to you, no one understands. Oh, the regret of the Parent...
verses.ro: ika hodoni kudoita totemo tare nitemo   kikiwake ga nai Oya no zannen
verses.jp_1: いかほとにくどいたとてもたれにても
verses.jp_2: きゝわけがないをやのさんねん

verses.en: Even until now, I made great efforts to persuade you. This time, indeed, you must ponder.
verses.ro: kokomade mo yoi na kudoki ya nai hodoni   konotabi koso wa shiyan suru yo
verses.jp_1: ここまてもよいなくときやないほとに
verses.jp_2: このたびこそハしやんするよふ

verses.en: What are you thinking on hearing this talk? It is the result of matters accumulated and piled up.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nanto omote kiite iru   tsumori kasanari yue no koto ya de
verses.jp_1: このはなしなんとをもふてきいている
verses.jp_2: つもりかさなりゆへの事やで

verses.en: Know that the regret and anger of God on this day are not small matters.
verses.ro: kyonohi no Kami no zannen rippuku wa   yoi naru koto de nai to omoe yo
verses.jp_1: けふの日の神のさんねんりいふくわ
verses.jp_2: よいなる事でないとをもゑよ

verses.en: Tsukihi is the Parent who began human beings and this world which did not exist.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori nai ningen ya nai sekai   hajime kaketaru Oya de aru zo ya
verses.jp_1: 月日よりないにんけんやないせかい
verses.jp_2: はじめかけたるをやであるぞや

verses.en: Be that as it may, the drum is being stopped by children who know nothing. Behold My regret.
verses.ro: sono tokoro nanimo shirazaru kodomo ni na   taiko tomerare kono zanen miyo
verses.jp_1: そのところなにもしらざる子共にな
verses.jp_2: たいことめられこのさねんみよ

verses.en: This time, I shall give a return for this. Beware of it, all of you, wherever you may be.
verses.ro: konotabi wa kono kayashi oba suru hodoni   mina dokomade mo shochi shite iyo
verses.jp_1: このたびハこのかやしをばするほとに
verses.jp_2: みなとこまでもしよちしていよ

verses.en: Until today, you have known nothing. But now, things are beginning to appearﾑa great promise.
verses.ro: kyomade wa nanimo shirazu ni ita keredo   sa miekaketa erai tanoshimi
verses.jp_1: けふまてわなにもしらすにいたけれと
verses.jp_2: さあみへかけたゑらいたのしみ

verses.en: What do you think this path is about? It is to cleanse the heart of everyone in the world.
verses.ro: kono michi wa donna koto ya to omou kana   sekai ichiretsu mune no soji ya
verses.jp_1: このみちハどんな事やとをもうかな
verses.jp_2: せかい一れつむねのそふぢや

verses.en: What do you think this matter is about? It is to clear away God's regret.
verses.ro: kono koto wa nanno koto ya to omote iru   Kami no zannen harasu koto ya de
verses.jp_1: この事ハなんの事やとをもている
verses.jp_2: 神のざんねんはらす事やで

verses.en: Hereafter, I shall not indicate anyone in particular. I am watching the innermost heart of each of you.
verses.ro: konosaki wa doko no hito tomo yuwan de na   mune no uchi oba mina mite iru de
verses.jp_1: このさきハとこの人ともゆハんでな
verses.jp_2: むねのうちをばみなみているで

verses.en: From today, Tsukihi will go forth to work. There is no knowing what I shall do.
verses.ro: kyokara wa Tsukihi dekakeru hataraki ni   donna koto oba suru ya shiren de
verses.jp_1: けふからわ月日でかけるはたらきに
verses.jp_2: どんな事をはするやしれんで

verses.en: The work that Tsukihi will do from now on: perhaps no one knows where I shall do it.
verses.ro: imakara no Tsukihi hataraki suru no wa na   doko de suru tomo tare mo shiromai
verses.jp_1: いまからの月日はたらきするのハな
verses.jp_2: どこでするともたれもしろまい

verses.en: I shall work in the high mountains as well as in the low valleys, here and there, throughout the world.
verses.ro: takayama mo tanisoko made mo sekaiju   ichiretsu o mina atchi kotchi to
verses.jp_1: 高山もたにそこまてもせかいぢう
verses.jp_2: 一れつをみなあゝちこゝちと

verses.en: When Tsukihi works throughout the world, perhaps there is no one who knows how to settle matters.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori sekaiju oba hatarakeba   kono osamekata tare mo shiromai
verses.jp_1: 月日よりせかいぢうをばはたらけば
verses.jp_2: このをさめかたたれもしろまい

verses.en: Therefore, I shall tell you how to settle matters. All of you in the world must ponder quickly.
verses.ro: soreyue ni kono shizumekata choto shirasu   ichiretsu hayaku shiyan suru yo
verses.jp_1: それゆへにこのしづめかた一寸しらす
verses.jp_2: 一れつはやくしやんするよふ

verses.en: Concerning the Service: never think that I have any other intention. I have only the single desire to save all of you.
verses.ro: Tsutome demo hoka no koto towa omouna yo   tasuketai no ga ichijo bakari de
verses.jp_1: つとめてもほかの事とわをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: たすけたいのが一ちよばかりで

verses.en: Unaware of this, step by step, everyone is thinking that it is somehow evil.
verses.ro: sore shirazu mina tare nitemo dandan to   nando ashiki no yoni omote
verses.jp_1: それしらすみなたれにてもたん／＼と
verses.jp_2: なんどあしきのよふにをもふて

verses.en: As human beings are shallow, you speak about everything without knowing the core.
verses.ro: ningen wa azanai mono de aru kara na   nani o yutomo shin o shirazu ni
verses.jp_1: にんけんハあざないものてあるからな
verses.jp_2: なにをゆうともしんをしらずに

verses.en: Until today, I have said nothing and remained still. Behold this regret of Mine.
verses.ro: kyomade wa donna koto demo yuwananda   jitto shite ita kono zanen miyo
verses.jp_1: けふまてわとんな事てもゆハなんだ
verses.jp_2: ぢいとしていたこのさねんみよ

verses.en: From now on, I, God, shall carry out My intentions. There is no knowing what I shall do.
verses.ro: korekara wa Kami no omowaku suru kara wa   donna koto oba suru ya shiren de
verses.jp_1: これからハ神のをもハくするからハ
verses.jp_2: とんな事をばするやしれんで

verses.en: Though until now you have said things and thought about things, doing as you pleased,
verses.ro: imamade wa nanimo yutari omotari   mamani shite ita koto de aredomo
verses.jp_1: いまゝてハなにもゆうたりをもふたり
verses.jp_2: まゝにしていた事てあれとも

verses.en: Hereafter, as God will rule, you will not be able to do anything as you please.
verses.ro: konosaki wa Kami ga shihai o suru kara wa   donna koto demo mamani deken de
verses.jp_1: このさきわ神がしはいをするからハ
verses.jp_2: とんな事てもまゝにてけんで

verses.en: Though nothing is visible to human eyes, everything is seen in the eyes of God.
verses.ro: ningen no me niwa nanimo mienedomo   Kami no me niwa mina miete aru
verses.jp_1: にんけんのめゑにハなにもみへねども
verses.jp_2: 神のめゑにハみなみへてある

verses.en: Please wait awhile before giving away what you have prepared. It is like throwing it into muddy water.
verses.ro: koshirae o yaru no wa shibashi machite kure   doromizu naka i hameru gotoku ya
verses.jp_1: こしらゑをやるのハしばしまちてくれ
verses.jp_2: とろみづなかいはめるごとくや

verses.en: Until now, I have said nothing about any matter. Today, I must speak out on everything.
verses.ro: imamade wa donna koto demo yuwananda   kyo wa nandemo yuwaneba naran
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハとんな事でもゆハなんだ
verses.jp_2: けふハなんてもゆハねはならん

verses.en: Now today, any and all things will appear. When the appointed time comes, Tsukihi will come to lead you.
verses.ro: mo kyo wa nandemo kademo mieru de na   kokugen kitara Tsukihi tsureiku
verses.jp_1: もふけふハなんてもかてもみへるてな
verses.jp_2: こくけんきたら月日つれいく

verses.en: Today, the time has become sufficiently full. There is no knowing when I shall come to lead you forth.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa mo jubun ni tsunde kita   nandoki tsureni deru ya shiren de
verses.jp_1: けふの日ハもふぢうふんにつんできた
verses.jp_2: なんときつれにでるやしれんで

verses.en: Leading you forth is no small matter. I see a great number of people but perhaps no one is aware.
verses.ro: tsureiku mo chotto no koto dewa nai hodoni   oku mieru ga tare mo shiromai
verses.jp_1: つれいくも一寸の事てハないほとに
verses.jp_2: をふくみへるがたれもしろまい

verses.en: No matter on how high a place you may be, today finally, things will change entirely.
verses.ro: ika hodono takai tokoro to yuta tote   mo kyokara wa monku kawaru de
verses.jp_1: いかほとのたかいところとゆうたとて
verses.jp_2: もふけふからわもんくかハるで

verses.en: Now ponder! From now you must replace your mind. It will not do, not to ponder and resolve!
verses.ro: sa shiyan korekara kokoro irekaete   shiyan sadamen koto ni ikan de
verses.jp_1: さあしやんこれから心いれかへて
verses.jp_2: しやんさだめん事にいかんで

verses.en: Until now, no one has known what path this is. From this day on, you will understand the path.
verses.ro: imamade wa nanno michi yara shirenanda   kyokara saki wa michi ga wakaru de
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハなんのみちやらしれなんだ
verses.jp_2: けふからさきハみちがわかるで

verses.en: What do you think this path is about? It is solely about the Kanrodai.
verses.ro: kono michi wa doyu koto ni omou kana   Kanrodai no ichijo no koto
verses.jp_1: このみちハどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp_2: かんろふたいのいちじよの事

verses.en: What do you think this Stand is? It is the prime treasure of Nihon.
verses.ro: kono dai o doyu koto ni omote iru   kore wa nihon no ichi no takara ya
verses.jp_1: このだいをどふゆう事にをもている
verses.jp_2: これハにほんの一のたからや

verses.en: What is the thinking among all of you about this? Perhaps no one knows its origin.
verses.ro: kore oba na nanto omote mina no mono   kono moto naru o tare mo shiromai
verses.jp_1: これをばななんとをもふてみなのもの
verses.jp_2: このもとなるをたれもしろまい

verses.en: At this time, by all means, I truly wish to teach everything about this origin to the world.
verses.ro: konotabi wa kono moto naru o shinjitsu ni   dozo sekai e mina oshietai
verses.jp_1: このたびハこのもとなるをしんぢつに
verses.jp_2: とふぞせかいゑみなをしへたい

verses.en: This origin is exactly the center of the bodies of Izanagi and Izanami.
verses.ro: kono moto wa Izanagiii to Izanami no   minouchi yori no hon mannaka ya
verses.jp_1: このもとハいさなきいゝといざなみの
verses.jp_2: みのうちよりのほんまんなかや

verses.en: There at the Jiba, I began all the human beings in this world.
verses.ro: sono toko de sekaiju no ningen wa   mina sono Jiba de hajime kaketa de
verses.jp_1: そのとこでせかいぢううのにんけんわ
verses.jp_2: みなそのぢばではじめかけたで

verses.en: The Jiba in Nihon is the native place of all people in the world.
verses.ro: sono Jiba wa sekai ichiretsu dokomade mo   kore wa nihon no kokyo naru zo ya
verses.jp_1: そのぢばハせかい一れつとこまても
verses.jp_2: これハにほんのこきよなるぞや

verses.en: As proof of My beginning of human beings, I shall put the Kanrodai into place.
verses.ro: ningen o hajime kaketaru shoko ni   Kanrodai o suete oku zo ya
verses.jp_1: にんけんをはじめかけたるしよこふに
verses.jp_2: かんろふたいをすゑてをくぞや

verses.en: If only this Stand comes to completion, there will be nothing that cannot be realized.
verses.ro: kono dai ga mina soroi sai shita naraba   donna koto oga kanawan de nashi
verses.jp_1: このだいがみなそろいさいしたならば
verses.jp_2: どんな事をがかなハんでなし

verses.en: Until then, the heart of everyone throughout the world must be swept clean.
verses.ro: soremade ni sekaiju o dokomade mo   mune no soji o seneba naran de
verses.jp_1: それまでにせかいぢううをとこまでも
verses.jp_2: むねのそふぢをせねばならんで

verses.en: In this sweeping, there will be no discrimination. Know that Tsukihi is discerning you.
verses.ro: kono soji doko ni hedate wa nai hodoni   Tsukihi miwakete iru to omoe yo
verses.jp_1: このそふぢとこにへだてハないほとに
verses.jp_2: 月日みハけているとをもゑよ

verses.en: Wherever you may be, Tsukihi will accept all of you in accordance with your minds.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa donna tokoro ni iru mono mo   kokoro shidai ni mina uketoru de
verses.jp_1: 月日にハどんなところにいるものも
verses.jp_2: 心しだいにみなうけとるで

verses.en: Whatever mind you may have had until now, replace it, even in the span of a night!
verses.ro: imamade wa donna kokoro de itaru tomo   ichiya no ma nimo kokoro irekae
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハとんな心でいたるとも
verses.jp_2: いちやのまにも心いれかゑ

verses.en: If you truly replace the mind in its entirety, Tsukihi will accept it, too, at once.
verses.ro: shinjitsu ni kokoro sukiyaka irekaeba   sore mo Tsukihi ga suguni uketoru
verses.jp_1: しんぢつに心すきやかいれかゑば
verses.jp_2: それも月日がすぐにうけとる

verses.en: To Tsukihi, all of you in the world are My children. Love for you fills Me: this is My single heart.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa sekaiju wa mina waga ko   kawai ippai kore ga ichijo
verses.jp_1: 月日にハせかいぢううハみなわが子
verses.jp_2: かハいいゝばいこれが一ちよ

verses.en: Until now, there has been no one who knows the innermost heart.
verses.ro: imamade wa donna mono demo mune no uchi   shiritaru mono wa sarani arumai
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハどんなものでもむねのうち
verses.jp_2: しりたるものわさらにあるまい

verses.en: This time, wherever you may be, I shall tell you all about the innermost heart.
verses.ro: konotabi wa donna tokoro ni iru mono mo   mune no uchi oba mina yute kikasu
verses.jp_1: このたびハとんなところにいるものも
verses.jp_2: むねのうちをばみなゆてきかす

verses.en: Until now, if you were set apart by even one wall, you would know nothing of whatever was said.
verses.ro: koremade wa kabe hito yo nite hedate tara   nani o yutemo choto mo shiromai
verses.jp_1: これまでハかへひとにてへたてたら
verses.jp_2: なにをゆうても一寸もしろまい

verses.en: From today, there will be no time even to look aside. There is no knowing what will be accomplished as in a dream.
verses.ro: kyokara wa yokome furu ma mo nai hodoni   yume mita yoni nani o suru yara
verses.jp_1: けふからハよこめふるまもないほどに
verses.jp_2: ゆめみたよふになにをするやら

verses.en: The regret of Tsukihi until now has been by no means a small matter.
verses.ro: imamade no Tsukihi zanen to yu mono wa   nakanaka chotto no koto de nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: いまゝでの月日ざねんとゆうものわ
verses.jp_2: なか／＼一寸の事で無いぞや

verses.en: Until today, though you have known nothing, now, the great main path is coming into sight.
verses.ro: kyomade wa nanimo shirazu ni ita keredo   sa miete kita erai honmichi
verses.jp_1: けふまでハなにもしらすにいたけれど
verses.jp_2: さあみへてきたゑらいほんみち

verses.en: Because I wished to see this path quickly, I have hastened. From this time forward, there will be joyousness in everything.
verses.ro: kono michi o hayaku mitote sekikonda   sa korekara wa yokizukume ya
verses.jp_1: このみちをはやくみとふてせきこんだ
verses.jp_2: さあこれからハよふきつくめや

verses.en: What do you think this talk is about? If only the tip of My writing brush begins to be seen...
verses.ro: kono hanashi doyu koto ni omou kana   fude no saki gana miete kita nara
verses.jp_1: このはなしどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp_2: ふでのさきがなみへてきたなら

verses.en: Until now, I have listened to whatever things. This time, indeed, I shall clear My regret away.
verses.ro: imamade wa dono yona koto mo kiite ita   konotabi koso wa zanen harasu de
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハとのよな事もきいていた
verses.jp_2: このたびこそわざねんはらすで

verses.en: What do you think this clearing away is to be? There is no knowing where or when I may withdraw.
verses.ro: kono harashi doyu koto ni omou kana   nandoki doko de shirizoku yara na
verses.jp_1: このはらしとふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp_2: なんどきどこでしりぞくやらな

verses.en: This regret from My long journey till now: know that it is not a small matter.
verses.ro: koremade no nagai dochu kono zanen   chotto no koto dewa nai to omoe yo
verses.jp_1: これまでのながいどふちうこのざねん
verses.jp_2: 一寸の事でハないとをもゑよ

verses.en: From now on, I shall give returns for it. Be aware of it, all of you.
verses.ro: korekara wa kono kayashi oba suru hodoni   mina ichiretsu wa shochi shite iyo
verses.jp_1: これからハこのかやしをばするほとに
verses.jp_2: みな一れつハしよちしていよ

verses.en: Without saying who it is to be, Tsukihi is watching everyone throughout the world closely.
verses.ro: sekaiju doko no mono towa yuwan de na   Tsukihi shikkari mina mite iru de
verses.jp_1: せかいぢうどこのものとハゆハんてな
verses.jp_2: 月日しいかりみな見ているで

verses.en: Whatever you may say or think, there is nothing that Tsukihi does not know.
verses.ro: dono yona koto o yutemo omotemo   Tsukihi shiran to yu koto wa nai
verses.jp_1: どのふうな事をゆうてもをもふても
verses.jp_2: 月日しらんとゆう事ハない

verses.en: Hereafter, whatever I shall do, Tsukihi will give you notice of it beforehand.
verses.ro: konosaki wa dono yona koto o suru nimo na   Tsukihi saki e to kotowarite oku
verses.jp_1: このさきわどよな事をするにもな
verses.jp_2: 月日さきゑとことわりてをく

verses.en: From now on, if the regret of Tsukihi appears, there is no knowing what will happen.
verses.ro: korekara wa Tsukihi zannen deta naraba   dono yona koto ga aru ya shiren de
verses.jp_1: これからハ月日ざんねんでたならば
verses.jp_2: とのよな事があるやしれんで

verses.en: Today, everything has piled up to its limit. Watch! I shall clear away the regret of God.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa dono yona koto mo tsunde kita   Kami no zannen harasu mite iyo
verses.jp_1: けふの日ハどのよな事もつんできた
verses.jp_2: 神のさんねんはらすみていよ

verses.en: Until now, no one has known the Jiba of Origin, where I began the human beings of this world.
verses.ro: imamade wa kono yo hajimeta ningen no   moto naru Jiba wa tare mo shiran de
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハこのよはしめたにんけんの
verses.jp_2: もとなるぢばわたれもしらんで

verses.en: This time, by all means, I wish to teach this truth clearly to the entire world.
verses.ro: konotabi wa kono shinjitsu o sekaiju e   dozo shikkari oshietai kara
verses.jp_1: このたびハこのしんちつをせかへちうゑ
verses.jp_2: どふぞしいかりをしゑたいから

verses.en: Therefore, I began to set up the Kanrodai. It is for the place of the true origin.
verses.ro: soreyue ni Kanrodai o hajimeta wa   honmoto naru no tokoro naru no ya
verses.jp_1: それゆへにかんろふたいをはじめたわ
verses.jp_2: ほんもとなるのところなるのや

verses.en: The reason I began such a thing is that I desire to save the whole world.
verses.ro: konna koto hajime kakeru to yu no mo na   sekaiju o tasuketai kara
verses.jp_1: こんな事はじめかけるとゆうのもな
verses.jp_2: せかいぢううをたすけたいから

verses.en: Despite this, it was taken away by My children who knew nothing. Behold My regret!
verses.ro: sore oba na nanimo shirazaru kodomo ni na   toriharawareta kono zanen wa na
verses.jp_1: それをばななにもしらさるこ共にな
verses.jp_2: とりはらハれたこのさねんわな

verses.en: Listen carefully! There is no knowing what kinds of returns will be given hereafter.
verses.ro: shikato kike konosaki naru wa dono yona   kayashi aru yara kore shiren de na
verses.jp_1: しかときけこのさきなるハとのよふな
verses.jp_2: かやしあるやらこれしれんでな

verses.en: This regret of Tsukihi: it is by no means a small matter.
verses.ro: Tsukihi yori kono zannen to yu no wa na   nakanaka chotto no koto de nai zo ya
verses.jp_1: 月日よりこのざんねんとゆうのわな
verses.jp_2: なか／＼一寸の事でないぞや

verses.en: About the returns: do not think of them as small matters. There is no knowing what Tsukihi will do.
verses.ro: kayashi demo chotto no koto towa omouna yo   donna koto oba Tsukihi suru yara
verses.jp_1: かやしても一寸の事とハをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: どんな事をば月日するやら

verses.en: What do all of you think of this talk? The regret of God is indeed great.
verses.ro: kono hanashi nanto omouzo mina no mono   Kami no zannen erai koto ya de
verses.jp_1: このはなしなんとをもうぞみなのもの
verses.jp_2: 神のざんねんゑらい事やで

verses.en: Though until now I have passed through every kind of path step by step,
verses.ro: imamade wa dono yona michi mo dandan to   torinukete wa kitaru naredomo
verses.jp_1: いまゝでハどのよなみちもたん／＼と
verses.jp_2: とふりぬけてわきたるなれども

verses.en: As the appointed time has not yet come, I have been keeping still.
verses.ro: mo chitto no kokugen kitaran soreyue ni   jitto shite ita koto de aredomo
verses.jp_1: もちいとのこくけんきたらそれゆへに
verses.jp_2: ちといとしていたことてあれとも

verses.en: Now, the day is fully pressing. At the appointed time, I shall give the returns at once.
verses.ro: kyonohi wa mo jubun ni tsunde kita   kokugen kitara suguni kayasu de
verses.jp_1: けふの日ハもふぢうふんにつんてきた
verses.jp_2: こくけんきたらすぐにかやすで

verses.en: When do you think this day will come? When the twenty-sixth day has come.
verses.ro: kono hi wa na itsu no koto ya to omote iru   niju roku nichi ga kitaru koto nara
verses.jp_1: この日ハないつの事やとをもている
verses.jp_2: 廿六日がきたる事なら

verses.en: Thereafter, I shall reveal all the true mind of everyone of you by all means.
verses.ro: sorekara wa nandemo kademo shinjitsu no   kokoro sorezore mina arawasu de
verses.jp_1: それからハなんてもかてもしんちつの
verses.jp_2: 心それ／＼みなあらわすで

verses.en: Do not wonder why I say such things. I speak out of My deep love for you.
verses.ro: konna koto nande yu ya to omouna yo   kawai amarite yu koto ya de na
verses.jp_1: こんな事なんでゆうやとをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: かハいあまりてゆう事やでな

verses.en: For all of you children in the world, there is only love in the thoughts of Tsukihi.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa sekaiju no kodomo wa na   kawai bakari o omote iru kara
verses.jp_1: 月日にハせかいちううのこどもわな
verses.jp_2: かハいばかりをふもているから

verses.en: Therefore, I desire to sweep clean the heart of everyone throughout the world.
verses.ro: soreyue ni sekaiju o dokomade mo   mune no soji o shitai yue kara
verses.jp_1: それゆへにせかいちううをどこまても
verses.jp_2: むねのそふぢをしたいゆへから

verses.en: Why do you think I desire this sweeping? It is because My thoughts are only for your salvation.
verses.ro: kono soji doyu koto ni omote iru   tasuke bakari o omote iru kara
verses.jp_1: このそふぢどふゆう事にをもている
verses.jp_2: たすけばかりをふもているから

verses.en: The salvation is not just to cure illness. I intend it to be a marvelous salvation.
verses.ro: tasuke demo ashiki naosuru made ya nai   mezurashi tasuke omote iru kara
verses.jp_1: たすけでもあしきなをするまてやない
verses.jp_2: めづらしたすけをもているから

verses.en: What do you think this salvation is? It is to be free from illness, death, and weakening.
verses.ro: kono tasuke doyu koto ni omou kana   yamazu shinazu ni yowari naki yoni
verses.jp_1: このたすけどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp_2: やますしなすによハりなきよに

verses.en: Such a thing has been unknown anywhere until now. I desire to show you the proof of it.
verses.ro: konna koto imamade doko ni nai koto ya   kono shoko o shirashitasa ya de
verses.jp_1: こんな事いまゝでどこにない事や
verses.jp_2: このよしよこふをしらしたさやで

verses.en: It is a thing not to be found anywhere until now. At this time, God desires to begin it.
verses.ro: koremade wa doko tazunetemo nai koto ya   konotabi Kami ga hajimetasa ya de
verses.jp_1: これまてハどこたつねてもない事や
verses.jp_2: このたび神がはじめたさやで

verses.en: Until today, you did not know what path you were on. Hereafter, I shall let you know the path.
verses.ro: kyomade wa donna michi yara shirenanda   korekara saki wa michi o shirasuru
verses.jp_1: けふまでハとんなみちやらしれなんだ
verses.jp_2: これからさきハみちをしらする

verses.en: What do you think this path is about? The regret of Tsukihi is the single concern.
verses.ro: kono michi wa doyu koto ni omou kana   Tsukihi zannen ichijo no koto
verses.jp_1: このみちハどふゆう事にをもうかな
verses.jp_2: 月日ざんねんいちじよの事

verses.en: What do you think My regret is about? The matter of the Kanrodai is My greatest regret.
verses.ro: kono zanen nanino koto ya to omou kana   Kanrodai ga ichi no zannen
verses.jp_1: このざねんなにの事やとをもうかな
verses.jp_2: かんろふ大が一のざんねん

verses.en: This regret of Mine is no small matter. There is no knowing what returns Tsukihi will give.
verses.ro: kono zanen chotto no koto dewa nai hodoni   donna kayashi o Tsukihi suru yara
verses.jp_1: このざねん一寸の事でハないほどに
verses.jp_2: どんなかやしを月日するやら

verses.en: Whatever may happen, bear no grudge. It is what each of you has done to yourself.
verses.ro: dono yona koto ga aritemo uramina yo   mina meme ni shite oita no ya
verses.jp_1: どのよふな事がありてもうらみなよ
verses.jp_2: みなめゑ／＼にしてをいたのや

verses.en: Hereafter, unto all places in the world however far, in the high mountains as well as in the low valleys,
verses.ro: konosaki wa sekaiju wa dokomade mo   takayama nitemo tanisoko made mo
verses.jp_1: このさきハせかへぢううハとこまでも
verses.jp_2: 高山にてもたにそこまでも

verses.en: Know that I shall sweep the heart of each of you in the world step by step.
verses.ro: korekara wa sekai ichiretsu dandan to   mune no soji o suru to omoe yo
verses.jp_1: これからハせかい一れつたん／＼と
verses.jp_2: むねのそふちをするとをもへよ

verses.en: What do you think of this sweeping, all of you? No one knows the mind of God.
verses.ro: kono soji nanto omouzo mina no mono   Kami no kokoro o tare mo shiromai
verses.jp_1: このそふぢなんとをもうぞみなのもの
verses.jp_2: 神の心をたれもしろまい

verses.en: Whatever regrets Tsukihi has borne, they were overlooked quietly until now.
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa donna zanen ga aru totemo   imamade jitto miyurushite ita
verses.jp_1: 月日にハどんなざねんがあるとても
verses.jp_2: いまゝでぢいとみゆるしていた

verses.en: Now the day is fully pressing. In any case, I cannot help but give returns.
verses.ro: sa kyo wa hi mo jubun ni tsunde kita   nandemo kayashi sezu ni iraren
verses.jp_1: さあけふハ日もぢうふんにつんできた
verses.jp_2: なんでもかやしせずにいられん

verses.en: What do you think the returns are about? They are solely about the regret of God.
verses.ro: kono kayashi nanino koto ya to omote iru   Kami no zannen bakari naru zo ya
verses.jp_1: このかやしなにの事やとをもている
verses.jp_2: 神のさんねんばかりなるぞや

verses.en: Do not think this regret is a small matter. It is a result of causes accumulated and piled up.
verses.ro: kono zanen chotto no koto towa omouna yo   tsumori kasanari yue no koto ya de
verses.jp_1: このざねん一寸の事とハをもうなよ
verses.jp_2: つもりかさなりゆへの事やで

verses.en: To Tsukihi, all of you in the world are My children. Though My thoughts for you are filled with love,
verses.ro: Tsukihi niwa sekaiju wa mina waga ko   kawai ippai omote iredomo
verses.jp_1: 月日にハせかいぢううハみなハが子
verses.jp_2: かハいゝばいをもていれども

verses.en: No one is aware of it, and the ponderings of each of you are only of dust.
verses.ro: sore shirazu mina ichiretsu wa meme ni   hokori bakari o shiyan shite iru
verses.jp_1: それしらすみな一れつハめへ／＼に
verses.jp_2: ほこりばかりをしやんしている

verses.en: Please think of the regret of God over such minds. Indeed, nothing more can be said, even should I so desire.
verses.ro: kono kokoro Kami no zannen omote kure   domu nantomo yu ni yuwaren
verses.jp_1: この心神のざんねんをもてくれ
verses.jp_2: どふむなんともゆうにゆハれん

verses.en: I shall not repeat what I have said until now. From now on, you need only to be spiritually awakened.
verses.ro: imamade no yo naru koto wa yuwan de na   korekara saki wa satori bakari ya
verses.jp_1: いまゝでのよふなる事ハゆハんでな
verses.jp_2: これからさきハさとりばかりや

verses.en: Hereafter, there is no knowing what I shall say. I request that you ponder thoroughly.
verses.ro: konosaki wa nani o yu yara shiren de na   dozo shikkari shiyan shite kure
verses.jp_1: このさきハなにをゆうやらしれんでな
verses.jp_2: どふぞしかりしやんしてくれ

verses.en: Sato, Sato, Ta-oto, Ta-oto, Byo-sama, Byo-sama...
verses.ro: Sato Sato Taoto Taoto Byosama Byosama
verses.jp_1: さと／＼たをと／＼びよさま／＼

verses.en: If this talk coincides sign for sign, know that everything proceeds in this way.
verses.ro: kono hanashi aizu tateyai deta naraba   nani ni tsuitemo mina kono tori
verses.jp_1: このはなしあいづたてやいでたならば
verses.jp_2: なにゝついてもみなこのとふり

verses.en: I earnestly request each and everyone of you to ponder deeply.
verses.ro: kore oba na ichiretsu kokoro shiyan tanomu de
verses.jp_1: これをはな一れつ心しやんたのむで

verses.ro: nichinichi ni kokoro tsukushita monodane o   Kami ga tashikani uketorite iru
verses.jp_1: にち／＼に心つくしたものだねを
verses.jp_2: 神がたしかにうけとりている

verses.ro: shinjitsu ni Kami no uketoru monodane wa   itsu ni naritemo kusaru me wa nashi
verses.jp_1: しんぢつに神のうけとるものだねわ
verses.jp_2: いつになりてもくさるめわなし

verses.ro: dandan to kono monodane ga haeta nara   kore matsudai no Koki naru zo ya
verses.jp_1: たん／＼とこのものだねがはへたなら
verses.jp_2: これまつだいのこふきなるそや
